The environment of Su is so simple, clean, quiet, comfortable that really gave me a home-staying feeling. I recommended to everyone I know, and all feedback are excellent !!

A place to get yourself pampered!. Great place for massages and facials! The Spa is cozy, clean and decorated with character! Staff is professional and welcoming. Owner speaks fluent Cantonese, English and Japanese (great for those who don’t speak Thai). Highly recommended!

Quick beauty and relaxation kick. What I like the most at Su Esthetic is that in only 90 min I get a full facial as well as a full body oil massage. The staff is friendly and the quality of service is excellent each time we are there. A relaxing beauty experience for the whole family. Try it out!

Best Spa in Bangkok. Wonderful friendly well managed Spa with the best facial and massage I have had in many years. Good value and great location for a quite peaceful treatment . Came out feeling like a new person.tim

Very cool spa for massage and facial. I had a 1.5 hour oil massage and facial last week and recommend this place for its great technique, cool atmosphere and good value. It attracts mostly French, Japanese, Korean and Australian expats living in Bangkok, but they do take visitors. It's small and friendly and in an old house filled with antiques just off Sukhumvit Soi 26 near the Emporium. It's a bit out of the way, but you can phone the owner who will give directions to you or a taxi. It's special and worth the trip for amazing Korean style massage and facial for just 900 baht.

Keep Calm And Go Float. I have been floating several times by now but could recommend it over and over again. When I started I had back issues and due to floating I am basically free of my back pain. Also it is a great way to extend mind and thoughts, specially because of the competent and friendly staff. Great place, great float ... you should go float!

Other Wordly. Donavan was a great host and the proprietor to this Float Center. As first time floaters he educated us about what to expect and floating completely surpassed my expectations. The place is immaculate and conducive to chilling post float.Piece of advice: come with an open mind, do ample research so you know what you are getting into, and let yourself go. The facility provides private bathrooms and showers as well as toiletries to freshen up afterwards. Thanks for an amazing experience Donavan!

First float session at Bangkok Float Center. My first visit to the Bangkok Float Center was fantastic. The facilities were super clean, all of my questions were answered about a first float. The folks there are very helpful. It was a great experience.

Meditation. This is a relaxation must for everybody. I've been floating for six months , and I must say, it is one of the most rewarding experiences I have been part of. The facility is spotless and nicely decorated. The staff is beyond accommodating and will answer any and all questions about floatation thoroughly. I come out of my float session feeling relaxed, yet rejuvenated. Don't forget to relax in the massage chair before you leave!

I Want to Be Back. Floating was an incredible experience for me. I tried it out of curiosity and was surprised at how significant an effect it had on me on my first try. Leaving the float pod I felt so light, like I was continuing to float even though I was walking. The peace that came over me in the float center stayed with me for the rest of the day. I hope to be able to continue floating as part of my weekly routine.

NICE WAY TO UNWIND AND CHILL. Staff were friendly and helpful. Dream pods were clean. Unique experience and quite relaxing. Noise, light proof float capsules, provided the ultimate fast track method in relaxation. I would go again. You come out and your skin feels great. You have a shower afterward and can wash your hair everything is supplied. I totally recommend going and trying it out you won't regret it.

Found the Peace I Need. This is my 4th visit to Bangkok Float Center and it was just as amazing as my first! Peaceful, comfortable, relaxing environment to let my body unwind. It really helps with back pain that i have suffer from for years, after my first session in the pod i had the best nights sleep with no pain. The surroundings are clean, relaxing and tranquil and I loved that I could relax in the chill out room and reflect on my experience.

Not worth the hassle. First time for "floating" and found the experience to be quite nice but really not worth the hassle to come here, was over 1 hour from downtown bangkok each way! Next day we had a massage in our hotel, which was just as relaxing and so much easier.

Relax Destress Let Go!. What a great way to relax and let the stress drift away. Bangkok Float Center has float pods that make it easy for you to destress in just a hour. I was a first time floater and the staff was very informative on the process and how to float and relax. You don't need to bring anything, everything was provided. Just make sure to make an appointment as they are very busy. If you want to try something new and relaxing than definitely give it a go!

Something to experience. My hubby and I decided we wanted to give this new float thing a go. We booked (you will need to book well in advance) and took a taxi from our hotel as it is not accessible by BTS. When we arrived we decided to ask the Taxi to wait for us as it looked like it may be difficult to get another in the area. The centre is in a gated commercial area with security. You take the first right after security and it's about half way down. Donovan welcomed us and took us upstairs to one of the float rooms to explain the concept and the workings of the pods. We had a one hour float. It is definitely something I would recommend everyone try, but it is a personal thing as to whether you would enjoy it. I am still undecided however my husband enjoyed it and is going back for a second float. The centre is extremely clean, staff friendly and overall it was a nice experience. Hint- you float naked so no need for swimmers. The centre has shampoo, conditioner and body wash as you will need a shower before and after the float. They also have hairbrushes, hairdryer, deodorants etc for afterwards.

Spa float. This place was simply amazing. Make sure you contact the facility before showing up as they are by appointment only. Upon arrival, Donovan greeted us and was very informative about what we were doing. It seems a bit intimidating at first, but after our conversation, I was ready to give it a shot. Before floating in the pod, you are required to take a shower to remove any fragrances, lotions, and deodorants that are on the body. Make sure you ease your way into the water as there is a lot of Epsom salt and if it gets into your eyes it may burn a bit. They do provide a spray bottle and towel in case that may happen. All I can say is that the float was awesome. You have a choice to float with or without relaxation music. You can also have a choice of keeping the lights on or off. I kept my lights on for at least half the session. After the float, I felt totally relaxed and my body and mind felt stress free. I highly recommend this place!

Must Try This . This is a must do when in Bangkok of your interested in true relaxation. Go with and open mind and do not expect anything. This first part is interesting to float and after that after the mind relaxes and adjusts, then it's very relaxing and peaceful. I will do this again the next time I'm in Bangkok. I highly recommend it to all friends and travelers.

Bangkok Float Center. This is one of those things you have to do! A perfect experience and unforgettable memory for our vacation in Bangkok. Donavon was professional and friendly from the very moment we started communicating. Once we arrived to Bangkok we sent him an email to confirm and he was always quick to respond. Once we arrived Donavon and Juan were fantastic. As cool as two old friends and an atmosphere both professional and relaxed. And really clean! You won't be disappointed! This is a must do! And return!Christina Ohio

An Amazing relaxed time, absolutely recommended. I was looking for the best SPA in Bangkok and find out this place, and can't be more surprised:They were normally closed but after havin received my email, they wait me at Bangkok Floating Center.The Manager is a very kind person and has provided full information about how does this work.The experience is for sure totally different for each people, and for me it was the best hour i had for a while, felt completely regenerated, energized and well balanced, the concept is really amazing and as I said i will be back sure to make more session of a couple of hours.Thank you once again mate for this experience, i'll be back soon by next month.Steve

Dragonball Z Pod. So I just came back from Bangkok Float Centre and it was such a great experience. This was my first time floating (Literally because I am that rubbish at swimming).I went with my girlfriend, we took the MRT to Udom Suk and then a quick taxi ride to the place. Its should be quite easy for the driver to find, I'd say try keeping a screenshot of the address/map on your phone if you dont have 4g. The information is all on their website/app.You get to the place and you're greeted by the staff who are very cool and chilled guys. Then you have to sign a waiver, just incase you somehow fall asleep and end up floating on your front. No but really theres a waiver form you have to fill out with the usual; name/d.o.b/health. Theres also a 35000B fine for contaminating the water with "bodily fluids" so no funny business, this isnt phuket.We then proceeded upstairs where one of the pods are (1 pod first floor/2nd pod second floor. No room and like 20 giant bags of salt on the side. The staff member then gives us a quick very informative talk about the pods, some tips and benefits on our first float. You go into the pods naked (who doesn't wanna be naked floating around in a strange pod), so need for any swim wear, you're provided with towels for the shower you need to take before and after the float, ear plugs to block the salt out and a face towel accompanied with a small spray bottle with water incase you get salt in your eyes.Once you're in the tub you can turn off the colour changing lights on the sides to turn the pod pitch black (which I stupidly forgot to do) then just float and relax. Everyones experience is different.In the beginning I was just relaxed and just starting thinking about super random things. Then moments of stillness, (had an itch on my nose. Scratched it and got one singular water drop in my eye. It burns. Alot. Just saying) then followed by thinking I was on the ceiling looking down and many more other experiences/feelings (hard to explain what I felt. Just go already). At the end of it I'd like to say I think I have reached a good level of Zen. Might try and go again this week if i have the chance.Tips:- First time floaters pay 1600B instead of the usual 1950B.- Dont need to bring swim wear/towel as you float butt naked and are provided with a towel.- Use spray when water gets into eyes.- Put earbuds in properly (which I didnt do. Got dried up salt in my ear as I type this).- Fully just relax your neck and let it just sit back into the water or you'll get a sore neck.- Dont forget to turn off the light like i did.- Finally just go in and don't think too hard. Just try to relax and let it happen.Happy floating. Peace

The World's Most Relaxing Weight Loss Program. I lost 102 kilos at the Bangkok Float Center in one day! Thus making it the most effective and relaxing weight loss program ever. All jokes aside, this anti-gravity, weightless experience is out of this world. I've been going religiously now for well over a year, and can't imagine my life without it. It is my weekly recharge ... which both eases away all my tensions, and at the same time fills me with invigorating new energy. I recommend floating and the Float Center to everyone I know. Please don't hesitate. You owe it to yourself to better yourself. I'm glad I did!

Float the stress away!!. Nice facility.Nice staff.Modern equipment.Great Experience.Floating really does help to relax and destress. Just 60 minutes floating felt like a 2 hour massage mixed with 8 hours of sleep. I felt to great coming out and very good feeling the rest of the day! I recommend to everyone that has never tried it before.

My first time. The first 15 minutes was a bit strange and awkward feeling but sometime after that I got really relaxed. I think because I turned the lights off and finally cut off all my senses. I noticed my breathe and very in tune with my heart beat. Time seemed to pass by very quickly and the next thing I realized was that he session was over and I had no clue what I had been doing for the previous 45 minutes. After getting out of the tank my body felt extremely relaxed and skin was very smooth. The staff helped me with the questions I had and also helped with getting my taxi back to my hotel. I'm glad I tried this.

"Outer Space Experience". Nice modern facility with nice staff to help with the experience. Clean room with cool looking floating pod. Very relaxing time in the pod for 60 minutes. Very nice and calm feeling after the floating session. There's a nice relaxation room to stay after the float for reading about floating or getting a massage in their massage chair. Tip: no need to bring swimming suit as you float with no clothes on for a better experience.

"Highly Recommended". Had a fantastic experience at the Bangkok Float Center. Went with a friend and we were both first time floaters. The booking process was easy. The place was easy to find. Once there we signed in and had a brief orientation on how to use the pods and what to expect. We floated for one hour but the time passed by so quickly. After floating we both felt very light like we had the best massage. We booked again for another round as we were told that the second float is even better. Looking forward to the next time!!

Love bangkok float center. Floating isn't new but many people probably have never heard of it. I learned of it through a friend that does it regularly. I purchased a package after my first float because I knew immediately that this is something that I want to do on a regular basis. I'm so happy I found Bangkok Float Center because i felt so safe and welcome there. Sean is a great guide and very helpful in answering any questions before the float. Even afterwards we chatted for a bit about my first experience in the tank. It's been a couple days since my last float but I still can feel the benefits from just 1 hour in the float pod, both physically and mentally.

Jon. I've heard of floating for many years now on the joe rogan podcast and have always wanted to try. To my suprise I found that there is a float center in Bangkok. I booked a session right away. Bangkok float center was the perfect place for my first float. The staff were very helpful in answering my questions and guiding me through the process. The whole experience was great. The equipment is modern and clean. And I came out of the pod feeling very refreshed and clear minded. I wish I would have tried this years ago.

Nice place to relax. I pround of this place a lot, they gave me new experience also take care of me as well. I book for only one hour but it felt nice all my plain got loss! Amazing hah. Next time when i have time i promise i will come to visit here again.
You use to come!. Nice place,nice relax ever! Who are not coming yet must try to find a time to float with this. My really good experience!. ✨
This is a great float !!!!. This place is very awsome it's good to visit and get relax go for now !!! I really like this place and good price what are you waiting for go now :)

Great experience, great team, great place!. Made the right choice to try out floating! It was a great experience and the team at Bangkok Float Center were the exact right people to run it. Always friendly service and always open to exchange experience. Defenitely coming back! ( pppsssstt ... I already was^^)

If you don't know, now you know!. Floating is awesome!! My new way to relax and let go. Massages are great for the body but floating is also for the mind. Great way to disconnect from the world and give yourself a break.

Super Relaxing . Waited for a long time to try this and it was everything I expected. The place was very nice and the staff helped me a lot in explaining how everything works. The tanks are are very big! I thought they were smaller and I'd have problems with the small space but it was quite the opposite. I did a hour float and came out very relaxed and stress free. Slept very well the next couple nights.

Fantastic first time float. I had a great experience today with my first float ever. So relaxed and full of energy afterwards. Definitely not my last float :-)The staff is very friendly, perfect English speaking as well. The spa is super clean and modern. You will feel well immediately. The location can't be reached by bts so best is to grab a taxi or go to the nearest bts (udom suk station on sukhumvit line) and take a taxi then.By the way: The mall Megabangna is very close by so you can go shopping before or afterwards :-)

I loved it!. I never tries floating before, my friend recommend floating to me as it help mind and body recover. So I tried it out and I came out the pod, feeling very refreshed! As a runner, I would recommend this for everyone who want to get an edge on your recovery.

Wonderful experience!. First time trying it..and I enjoyed it. I thought I would only be in there for 20 minutes before opting out. I was surprised when the music came on indicating my time's up (1 hour). I will definitely do it again.The only hassle was locating this place. Even after getting my hotel to ensure the cab driver knew this location and I handed to the driver the directions given by the Center (in Thai), I could see the cab driver having difficulty trying to locate it. His cab shot past the place but luckily I spotted the Enterprize Park signage and got down and walked back to the location.

The first of many (future) times to enjoy floating. I heard about this place through a friend, and was intrigued because I had always wondered what sensory deprivation would be like. Being a SCUBA diver, I thought it would be similar in terms of weightlessness and relaxation. And after just finishing a round of chemotherapy, I thought it would be a great way to heal my body and mind. I meditate regularly, but after the chemotherapy I was having a lot of trouble concentrating. So I had a lot of expectations and preconcieved notions as to what the experience would be like, and what I would get out of it. But still I was amazed. The first ten minutes or so was a bit strange, bumping into the sides of the tank and remembering to relax my neck. Then after about about 25 minutes I felt completely at ease, and a weightlessness that is different even from diving. I quickly lost track of time, drifting through various stages of relaxation, and from moments of intense thinking to complete silence of the mind. Getting out I felt very relaxed, although a bit spacey for about 45 minutes. That night I slept straight through, which hadn't happened since I started cancer treatment 6 weeks ago. I was impressed with the float experience, impressed with the facilities, and very impressed with the staff. I am going to be going in for floats as often as I can, and recommending this to all of my friends.

amazing experience. I heard so much about floating and finally had the opportunity to try it at Bangkok Float Center. The experience is indeed amazing. It is a totally different experience from normal massage and spa. It relaxes and heals your body and also calmed the mind. The facility is nice and clean, and staff are friendly. Make sure to book before you go!

Floating. Floating is a nice experience! Very relaxing indeed and also awsome for the body. The place itself is difficult to find: printed map and indications for the taxi driver and even so it was difficult tovarrive in time. However if you compare floating with massages in Bangkok, floating is expensive and not more relaxing than a good, professional massage.

Awesome experience, I will be back for sure. As an international DJ sometimes I don't see my home and my own bed for weeks, across cities and continents I am constantly on the move. I love what I do, however the lifestyle can really take its toll on the mind and the body. Recently I was in Bangkok for a big show and a good friend arranged a float for my belated birthday gift. As I had just come off a very intense two week tour of India - my first time there - I was eager for anything therapeutic. I have to admit I had no idea what to expect, so read up on TripAdvisor, as well as their very helpful website as to what to expect being a 'first timer'. Upon arrival I was very impressed with the clean, modern facilities … and the manager put me at ease and explained everything in a way that made me feel very comfortable., and even excited about what was to come. The experience itself was super relaxing and somehow cleansing to my mind as well, helping to wipe away many nagging stresses I had collected recently from the trip. At the end of the session, I emerged from the pod totally refreshed and invigorated. I'd recommend this to anyone, and especially for people who's lifestyle requires a proper balancing act. In fact, I will be sure to revisit the Center the next time I come through BKK..

Dreaming experience. If you are willing to experience meditative states in a fast way come here... if you are willing to make a fast cleansing in your body come here... make sure you do it at a time where you feel is time to rest!

A great experience!. I did the floatation four different times. Each time there was something new to be discovered. It's also very relaxing on the muscles and helped ease some of my back pain. It also has a very friendly staff and very helpful. I highly recommend Bangkok Float Center.

Bangkok Floating Center. We floated this afternoon and we alll enjoyed this activitiy. We went as a group and we all had different experiences but enjoyed it the same. Dont miss this activity on your visit to Bangkok.

Float Away!!!. If you want to float away all the stress or aches and pains then try floating for 60 minutes in a floating pod. Take advantage of the first time discount. My experience was AMAZING in the tank after the first stage of getting settled in.

Vary good . What a wonderful idea and experience. Floating in a float pod for 60 minutes had such a great effect on my mood and energy for the day. I was very surprised at how time passed by so quickly in the tank. The inside of the float tank is so calm and relaxing. The music in the start and finish really helped to relax my mind and also to bring me back. The lights inside the tank change colors for light therapy if you choose to keep the lights on. I turned them off after about 10 minutes. The center is clean and staff very helpful. Hope to float again soon!
Relaxing!. So relaxing... i felt energized and peaceful and calm afterwards. I'm thinking to try one more time with my friends.

Unique Experience and Great Results!. I tried this with my boyfriend and we were both first time floating. The Staff was very kind and helpful. The floating tanks were very high technology with light show and music. I chose music the whole session and my boyfriend chose silent mode. I felt liike i was floating in space in the begining but after this i went to a very calm and most relaxing state of mind. The time went by so fast and the next thing i remember is it was time to get out of the pod. I really want to do this again. My boyfriend also enjoyed it and says he will try again also.

Not so special. For the number 1 wellness place in Bangkok we had high hopes but wasn't so great. Firstly its nowhere near a train station so we had to go there by taxi and add extra time in our day for that. Its a nice clean modern place but the service or experience didn't do anything special for us.

Float Away and Feel Amazing!. Me and my partner tried this and extremely glad we did. First off the staff are just great. They made us very comfortable and informed before we started our sessions. The place is very clean and very zen like which helped us relax before floating. During the float is very relaxing and the feeling of no gravity is unlike anything I've felt before. After the float I felt very light and energized. Such a positive experience for us both.

Professional, Clean and Relaxing!!!!. Tried this after hearing about it a long time ago. I wish I would have tried it sooner!! The feeling is hard to describe but it's something that I can't stop thinking about and really want to explore deeper. After I got used to the feeling of floating I was able to let go and disconnect from everything. It was very interesting and the feeling stayed with me long after the float was over. I signed up for a package membership which makes the float much cheaper. Can't wait to try again.The staff, location, and booking process was all convenient and added to the overall experience. Highly Recommended!!!!-David

Amazing experience!. I finally tried floating for the first time at Bangkok Float Center and it's so amazing it's now become part of my life. It's truly been a life changing experience. Being able to get away from all the distractions and stress of work and life in general as well as all the noise in this crazy city of Bangkok is priceless. Whether you're looking to relax after work or just to chill out after or before a long flight, floating is definitely the way to go. It's also helpful for meditation and joint & muscle pain. The staff is wonderful and can help guide you through the experience if you're a beginner like I was. Everything is modern and very clean.

A wonderful first time experience!. This was my first time floating and it was such a unique and relaxing experience. The staff were really chatty and informative. They answered all of my questions before I even asked them and even arranged a taxi for me afterwards. I would definitely recommend this as an alternative (or addition) to a typical Thai massage.
Great experience and great staff!. Floating is a great experience, which I would recommend to anyone. The staff is wonderful, very helpful and friendly. I will come back many times.

My 3rd Float and simply loving it !!. As a resident Foreigner here in Bangkok, floating at the Bangkok Float Center has become ' a must-do' for me every week to 10 days. Experiencing weightlessness and the inner peace that comes with it., is something I would recommend to anyone who would like to 'shut-down' completely for 90 mins or more., and feel completely rejuvenated.I have bought my next 04 Floats in Advance at a discounted price and it feels good to know that all I need to do, is to call the 'ever-smiling' and extremely helpful Donavan or Suda to make my next appointment !!Shehan Seneviratne - Sri Lanka (Resident in Bangkok)

Amazing experience that keeps me sane in this city!. I have been a regular fixture at Bangkok Float Center for over one year now. In my line of work being a professional DJ, I need holistic resources that balance out my high flying party lifestyle in order to stay centered and grounded. These resources are not only a luxury, they are a necessity. Massage and yoga are wonderful tools, as well as occasional meditation, but thus far the very best resource I have found is floating. It is also the most effortless thing possible to achieve peace, as one need only to lie down in the tank and relax. Regardless of what mood I come in with, whatever problems or issues I may be facing, floating is my refuge and clears away all the clutter of my mind, and eases all my body's aches and pains. As well, I have chronic pain issues in my neck and lower back, and floating in an anti-gravity environment has proven extremely effective in relieving the pain. Floating has become such an integral part of my life, I simply can't imagine living without it ... and recommend it to everyone I know. The staff and service at Bangkok Float Center is second to none. It feels like coming home.

Difficult to find and not that great. Were really excited about trying floating for the first time but were pretty tired by the time we got there as taxi had a lot of trouble finding the location (its not in the tourist zone). Really wasnt that special experience in the float tank, not sure we just feel bad mood from stress of travel there or its not suit for us. but really couldnt understand why its so special and so expensive.

Wonderful experience, very professional service. I tried floating for the first time and I was a little worried that I might experience claustrophobic sensations inside the tank but my experience couldn't have been more relaxing and enjoyable. Suda, the young girl that manages the center, did a wonderful job of explaining how the floating works and she totally reassured me and made me feel at ease. Suda gives you a long talk before the float, then you go into your own private room, shower and undress, enter the tank (you can choose if you want the lid open or closed, the lights on or off) and float for one hour. Then you shower again to remove the salt.The experience inside the tank is incredibly beautiful, very peaceful and almost magical. The water temperature is pleasant, neither too hot nor too cold, the place itself is clean and welcoming and the general feeling is one of relaxed professionalism. I highly recommend this experience and thanks to Suda for the great job.

excellent!. After it was quite a pain to get there bc the location is not known to any cab driver in BKK as it seems (theres no way to get here with public transportation), it was just fantastic. The place is very small and when one gets here you would expect a world-class spa behind the walls :-). After an introduction, one gets to the rooms with the pods (they have 2 in total) and after a shower the magic starts. I was so gone couldnt use or control any of my muscles anymore and 100% relaxed. After the session, we got a very yummy ginger tea to drink and the lady came and talk to us about our impressions. 100% recommended.
Don't leave Bkk without trying this!. Awesome experience! I'm tad claustrophobic, but I managed to shut the lid, and the left the soft light

Highly recommended . I was excited to go to the float center after reading about it online and was happy that the experience exceeded my expectations. The center is beautiful and calm and their authentically approach to the benefits of floating (spiritually, mentally and physically) was impressive. Highly recommended!

What an experience! . My husband and I took a long flight from U.S. and wanted to relax on our first day in Bangkok and help get rid of the jet lag. We discovered Bangkok Float Center on TripAdvisor and wow! What an experience. It was so relaxing and the girl who welcomed us made us feel so comfortable and she's personable too. I would definitely recommend this to anyone if you're in Bangkok!

First time floating!. Bangkok float is the best thing I have ever experienced! Absolutely loved it. The service from the staff was amazing so helpful and welcoming and the owner is an absolute legend. Cheers guys will be back before we leave A++++

Bangkok Float Center Rocks!. Bangkok Float Center really does rock! The place is super clean, the staff is so friendly and helpful and wonderful! The girl working made me feel so comfortable and right at home! She was very knowledgeable about the tanks and also very personable! I visited other Float Centers around the world and the prices here can not be beat! My overall experience at the Bangkok Float Center was wonderful, from the second I walked in the door to after my float! I recommend the Bangkok Float Center and can not wait to come back, which I hope is soon! Marina Texas!
Something different. A meditative great experience. Professional and knowledgeable relaxing treatment for the whole body.

Good relaxation . Went to this place with friend who likes relaxation treatment. This place was clean and service was very good. Went into the tank and it was so relaxed. If you go to Bangkok, should try, recommend

Another great experience. If you want something to really remember from your Bangkok trip then you have to float. It's a real introspective experience. Beyond just being relaxing it's one of the most interesting things you can do! It's safe, relaxing and something worthwhile! Do Ur research see what it's all about then float!!!

What an amazing experience . This was my first time floating and didn't know what to expect.
From the owner Donavan to the staff are very courteous and will answer any questions you might have.
The place is immaculately clean and pods are spacious.
Wonderfully relaxing experience after a long and hot day in Bangkok!!

Unique experience!. Friendly staff and great introduction right from the very beginning! Didn't expect much at the start but turned out to be a calm and relaxing experience. Will recommend friends to try this! :)

Interesting experience . Feels like you are floating in the middle of the sea with at night no one around. After a while you will feel like falling asleep. The moment get out of the pod u will feel relaxed because you didn't use the muscles for an hour. Overall its recommended.

Best Experience Ever. Didn't know what to expect other than some youtube videos and some other reviews but hard to understand the feeling until actually doing it. The whole process is very relaxed and the staff walked me through every step of the experience. Everything is clean and nicely decorated. The float pods are very big and lots of space to float. There was music in the beginning and end of the session to get relaxed. After about 15 minutes i lost track of time and was like in a lucid dream. After getting out my muscles and body felt so relaxed. I want one of these pods for my home! Five star experience!! Highly recommended

Highway to Meditation. We are in Bangkok and we seen some reviews of this place online.We decided to give it a go because we've never seen it before, at least reviewed online...From the first moment you can expect a super fast response on emails and calls. Besides that it was a real relief to finally talk to somebody who has perfect English and you don't have to decipher what kind of words are going out of his mixed Thai and American mouth.Donovan gives you a great insight on what you'll experience and he makes you feel comfortable and at ease while he explains all the procedures that you're going to have before you enter your floating Capsule!I would define this experience as a highway to meditation. If you ever tried to meditate you know how hard it can be. In the floating capsule it's like you're paying the toll to an easier way to the meditation road!It is definitely an experience that I would recommend after some days in the most crazy city in the world.At some point you lose the track of your body, then time, and then space... And you silly float in the emptiness of your mind .The results? Well those ones are different from person-to-person, but mine were as if I was in some kind of massage for five days!Thanks Donovan for all the professionalism and sympathy

Relaxing and worth a visit. Its been a while since my first float so i had to get used to the feeling of floating. It didn't take as long to relax as the first time. This time I felt like i got really deep into the float and some interesting thing came to me in the dream pod. Eed was very good at helping me with questions i had after the session was over. thanks again

Body High. I wanted to try the sensory deprivation tank as it's not available in Manila. So when we were in Bangkok, we made it a point to give it a shot and were not disappointed! The float center itself is quite far from where we stayed in Asoke. We booked an Uber to take us there and back, but the only problem was that by the time our session finished, we were stuck in the middle of rush hour in the city! Make sure you can schedule your float when you don't have to endure the rush hour so that your experience keeps you relaxed.Eed, the float center's lovely receptionist, walked us through the process before we signed waivers. I personally did not know what to expect from floating for the first time, so I was a bit anxious to find out if it would work on me or not. But Eed had a really positive vibe that helped me relax upon waiting for my first float. An hour is enough for first timers, as you will definitely feel the effects for that duration. It really takes the floater the surrender of the senses by relaxing to maximize the whole experience. It's hard to tune out the different sensations of the physical body, but it's definitely worth a try! Mentally prepare yourself for some stinging for the first few minutes if you have skin allergies or even just mild rashes --- the saline solution will kind of give you a burning sensation (it goes away after you tune out). After the first hour, I got out with my body feeling really really light and relaxed --- I'd say the results done to my sore muscles was better than coming out from a massage! It actually stayed that way for the rest of the night! It takes a lot more practice to get better at meditating or tuning out while you're in the float, and as a first timer, I say that I'm definitely interested in trying it out once I'm back in Bangkok. Whether or not you get to have those psychedelic experiences you read about on the internet, you're assured that you will leave the float center with at least the benefit of floating in epsom salt (which is really good for the skin) and getting to get your mind silent from the noise for at least an hour.

Very interesting experience. Friendly staff and it was fun to try. Recently visited Bangkok and stopped into the Float Center. I wasn't really sure what to expect from the experience. I had had many massages in town already and thought it would be fun to try something different. I am not the lay quietly, let your mind relax kind of guy, so it took some getting used to. The concept is pretty simple, you lay in salt water that has something like 600 kg of salt inside an egg-looking shell. The salt in the water will suspend you and once the lights are out and you've taken a good 10 minutes or so to get over the fact that yes, you are just going to lay there quietly for the next hour, your mind will go blank and you will feel very relaxed. The salt and zinc are good for your skin we were told and being a major skeptic before going in, it was better than I had expected and I was surprised that I didn't dislike it. I would try it again but would do a 1hr session. This time I did 1.5 hours and it was too much for me. The staff at the centre were excellent. I think her name was Suda and she was very friendly, educated us and really wanted our feedback. The fun thing was that because the water is heated to body temperature, you forget that you are floating in water and occasionally feel like you are floating in air. It is ideal for people that meditate, people that like to have quiet time, mothers with screaming children, athletes and older people I would say. I will go again when I am in Bangkok next.

Interesting and Relaxing. The float center is located right off the Bang Na Trat highway and was a nice little place ran out of a stylish townhouse. The woman who worked there was also very nice and gave us an intro to floating as it was our first time. They have discounts available for multiple time floaters, worth checking out if you think you'll come back more times like us.

Worth trying. I can't swim so it's a great experience to float weightlessly.
Turn the light off ,relaxed and dissolved.

It was life changing! . Last night I tried out what we called a "Sensory Deprivation Tank" or a "Floating Tank". It's a place where you go and lie down in water that is full of Epsom salt allowing you to float freely without having to worry about anything. The lights are off, you are in there with nothing but yourself and your mind. The tank is mainly used for the soul purpose of relaxing your mind and eventually accessing different parts of your mind that is easier to reach since you don't have the distraction from anything around you. I experienced something whilst I was floating that I would have to describe as life changing and intense. I am so happy to have had the opportunity to experience what I have experienced and it has definitely opened my eyes to so many new aspects of life in general. I got to "reprogram" myself and think of my current state of being. Basically I was able to do a full self reflection for about 1h30. Anyone who has the opportunity to go and try to float, please do go. Everyone experiences it differently as we all think and feel differently. This will most definitely not be the last time that I'll be floating. Thank @bangkokfloatcenter for giving me this experience !

Amazing float experience. This was an incredibly relaxing experience. The staff were friendly and helpful, the facility was clean and pleasant, and it's absolutely something I'll do again anytime I return to Bangkok.

Total Relaxation. I wanted to check this place out, hearing about it from some friends. I didn't know what to expect at all. The owner, Donavon, gave me some great direction to calm down and not expect anything. It was a great experience and I will definitely be back the next time I am in Bangkok!

You must try this! :). This was one of the best expierences ive ever had. It makes you calm down so well so you can relax in the most peaceful way possible. The stuff is very kind and the place feel so comfortable. Since my first visit of Bangkok Float Center, i showed up again so many times. Its just that day when everythings so in rush and you have to hurry all the time, this will definately help you to relax :) Thank you so much for great times ive spent here yet!
I loved it!!. My friend told me about this place and so i tried it with my friend last weekend. I came out of the pod feeling very fresh and relaxed!!! So interesting! Cant wait to do again!!Thanks

Awesome experience. I wish I had booked for 90 mins instead of 60 as the time went so quickly. Make sure to print out the instructions for the taxi driver. I phoned the centre when in the taxi. The helpful staff got me a taxi afterwards.Feels a bit stingy when you first enter but then it gets dreamy and the feeling lasted all evening and I slept really well. (Booking process was easy via email). Definitely recommended.

Amazing experience. Where to begin... Not only did it help center my thoughts and help me at this cross roads in my life, and I felt so energetic after leaving but it also cleared my skin and left my face glowing . But I think the best part was the kind beautiful woman who guides you through the journey like an Angel.

Very Relaxing...I highly recommend!. The other day, I gave floating a try for the first time. Not being familiar with the area, I wasn't sure how to get there, but the staff was very accomodating and gave the taxi driver directions on how to get there. Once there, and in the pod, the first few minutes I had to get used to the feeling of complete weightlessness, but after about 15-20 minutes, I did my best to let go, and after turning off the light inside the pod I began to feel complete relaxation and serenity. It was an overall great experience, and I will definetely return soon for a follow-up visit.

Mint . This place was so good to me and very relaxed. There is easy to go to and i'm sure that anyone who prefer to go there u will feel relax and comfortable. The owner there was so friendly like we're in family. I like it very much, love it !! <3

Must try when in Bangkok. They say ' when was the last time you did something for the first time ' ; If you are looking for something worthwhile & significant to answer this, this is the place to come and experience. I read a lot of reviews on bangkok float centre & wanted to try it for myself. I was not the least disappointed. I have experienced many different massages but a session of floating definitely does something much deeper to relax , rejuvinate the mind & body. The place is kept clean, Cozy. I had booked for our session few hours in advance & was responded immediately with a confirmation. Was expecting to meet Donovan who could brief us before the session but his assistant did a great job. she explained every aspect in detail & was very welcoming & professional. Will definitely go for another session when Im in bangkok next.

Most Relaxing Time of My Life. Never thought that if would be as relaxing and intereresting as it was, i spent 90 minutes in the pod but it felt like 30 minutes. I was able to tune into my true feeling and thoughts that i havent confronted. After that it was pure relaxation and peaceful. I want to do this again and often.

Amazing float. The float was 10 times better than any massage, its a great way to resolve your problems and get in touch with yourself. this was my first float but the staff made me very comfortable and was very knowledgable of how it works. I will definitely be visiting them again very soon

Couldn't ask for a better first time experience . Absolutely fantastic center, Donovan the owner is an awesome super friendly guy, who chatted with me before and after the experience to help prepare me and to discuss the experience. The float tank itself was fantastic and the facilities were great with a nice little chill out room for immediately after where you can sit and have a cup of herbal tea as you want some brief time to reflect on the experience. One thing I would recommend is going for the 90 minute session,as the first 10 minutes felt like I was just getting used to the environment which feels quote bizarre at first, but once you left go and relax time will fly by! Overall an awesome place and experience that I would recommend to anyone
Jane . I was so happied and it's very relaxed.Also comfortable. I really like it. There were so friendly like in family.Welcome so warm and always speak nice. THANK YOU

Gotta try it to feel it. Amazing experience. First time floater and the lady at the reception gave me a 15mins breefing before I started. It's hard to actually say how it feels, but you feel so much lighter and relieved when you get out of it. Just go without any expectations and the result will probably be great!

Fantastic experience. This was my first time floating and it was all I could have hoped for. Without going into my personal experience, I highly recommend it for anybody interested in meditation or just simple relaxation. The facilities are comfortable and clean (my boyfriend napped on the comfy couches while I floated). The owner, Donovan, was incredibly helpful in giving our cab driver instructions and having a cab ready for us when I finished my float. The location is close to the airport, so it is a great place to visit either pre or post flight. I'll definitely be back on every subsequent trip to Bangkok! I did a 60 minute float, but next time I'll book a longer float.

Incredible Experience. Incredible experience! The center has Dream Pods Float Tanks, which is the best tank I’ve ever floated on. In the past I've floated on the standard Samadhi tank back home in Chicago. The Dream Pods are much bigger which has a few benefits… First - your hands and feet don’t touch the walls as much, which aids in the experience. Second - the roof is much taller which allows more air to come into the tank. In the Samadhi, it’s more cramped, and could feel like there’s not enough air inside. Third - the thing looks like a spaceship you'd see out of a sci-fi movie. Donavan the owner is really nice guy - if it’s your first float, he takes the time to prep you and make sure you’re comfortable going in.Definitely recommend it to anyone in Bangkok.

Floating. Floating in Bangkok Float Center is OK. The issue is that you get spoiled in Bangkok with respect to all the great places to relax such as the many spas, massage salons, etc. This float center is OK, but can only be seen as an average place in comparison with all our other great experiences in Bangkok

Great journey! Great isolation tank!. In Bangkok, Bangkok Float Center is the most relaxing salon. My wife and I got great experience and relaxing time. Mr. Don, the owner, and Ms. Ead are very kind of us. And they are professional about isolation tank (floatation tank). So they will give you good advice about isolation tank (Great journey!) If you get relaxing experience, you should go to Bangkok Float Center. I think you do not have to go to the other esthetic salon and spa. Have a Great journey at Bangkok Float Center!アイソレーションタンクをご存じの日本人なら一度は訪れたいたところです。場所はメガバンナーから車で5分程度。Enteprize Parkという大きな看板の在る敷地内に、あります。守衛さんには「バンコクフロートセンター」といえばオーケー。オーナーのドンさんはタイとアメリカのハーフ、受付の女性イードさんはタイ人ですが、英語も堪能（イードさんは少しなら日本語もわかるかも・・・）。ドンさんは草津の方に旅行したこともあるとか。リラクゼーション効果や身体の痛みを和らげる効果はもちろん、情報を遮断して脳を休ませ、感覚を鋭くする効果を持つアイソレーションタンク。ココのタンクはDream podで、マユ型の近未来的なフォルムが美しいものです。LEDライトがキレイでつけてみたくなりますが、個人的には真っ暗で素晴らしい旅を楽しむことをオススメします。万が一があっても、タンク内に緊急ボタンがあるので、安心ですよ。2階と3階に1台ずつタンクがあるので複数で行っても同時に楽しめます。3名以上でもサロン風のウッディーなリビングがあり、そこではマッサージチェアや飲み物、クラッカーや飴がフリーで楽しめ、のんびりできます。受付の水槽付きテーブルなど、インテリアもなかなか秀逸。ぜひ一度訪れてみてください。

More than just a float.. I had my first float there and what can I say -- the owner is passionate about floating and it was a great pleasure not only getting an extensive introduction so that I knew pretty much exactly what was going to happen but also chatting after the float about the experience and more.The facility is modern and quite spacious I would say. The chill-out zone where one can stay for some time after the float is a unique feature that clearly shows that the owner does not intend to "just provide a float tank" like most facilites around the world do.

Bangkok's most relaxing. The personnel took great care in explaining to me how to get the most out of my experience, coached me along to make sure I was relaxing as much as possible, and inquired thoroughly afterward about what I had felt, to make sure I had all the guidance I needed.My experience in the tank was relatively typical of a first-timer's experience: I felt disoriented and out of place in the tank, initially, but soon found a nice float, and was able to release muscle tension and attain a very deep state of relaxation that stayed with me throughout the rest of the day and into the weekend.The staff were incredibly kind, helpful, accommodating, and tried their best to make me feel relaxed throughout.

Amazing experience. After hearing about it on the Joe Rogan podcast and other online articles I really wanted to try this experience. I am visiting Bangkok with my brother and came across the Bangkok Float Center and decided to finally try. It was really one of the most relaxing and positive experiences I've ever had. The place is easy to find, very clean and the staff is amazing. Right from the orientation they give you such a good vibe and make you feel comfortable.if you are looking for relaxation and amazing experience be sure not to miss this place.

Incredible experience on what you called 'Spa'. Never tried it before but feels like you had passed a super full course on a spa package. Super relax and refresh. Your skin feels like a little new born baby skin. Recommended this float to everyone !!
Must try. Love bangkok float center everyone must try.the owner donavan he is vary nice guy thank you bangkok float center

My first time floater. This was my first time to try floating and bangkok float center was nice to show how it work and explain the step to have a perfect float.all my worries were gone and the float was awesome.i am vary interrested in doing this more often.thank bangkok float center

Fantastic experience . "went with my friends and loved the whole experience from start to finish, the staff were great, the orientation was helpful, and the float was magical, even after the float we had a great time visiting and feeling relaxed from the 90 minute session!! Recommend to everybody looking for a new way to de-stress and let go for a bit!

Clarity and therapy. Neck and shoulder pain going on 3 years, done everything Accupuncture, etc. massage 3 times a week for atleast 2 years. Reduced after 3 sessions of floating. General feeling of clarity, I didn't realized I was numb. Definitely will continue sessions. I was nervous my first session but friendly helpful staff made me feel safe.

Relaxing. I tried this with a friend and was very interested to see if it would work for me. I work long hours and drive a lot for commuting to work. After floating the 90 minute session, I found that my body felt very relaxed and also I felt more calm. I hope I can do this more often and recommend to everybody! Thanks

Tranquil experience in floating meditation. I had been interested in floating for a few years now. When I had a free day in Bangkok I was happy to unintentionally come across Bangkok Float Center online. It felt like it was meant to be and that now was the time. I struggle to maintain a daily meditation ritual, but have tried to keep some kind of practice throughout the last few years. Floating was a new level of meditation. It was serene. Donovan, the owner, is a very friendly guy who immediately makes you feel at home. It did not seem like a business. There was no rush about anything. He seemed willing to talk with me about my experience both before and after the float. The facilities are new and clean. It was a very positive experience and I hope to have an opportunity to do it again. 5 out of 5.

Must Try!!!. Loved my session at Bangkok Float Center! The place was easy to find, super clean, and the staff were great!!! My 90 minutes felt like 20 minutes. The music in the beginning was very relaxing and then the quietness and feeling of floating in space with no gravity was amazing. Will recommend to all my friends and will return soon!!!

Great experience at BKK float Center!. I went because of reviews and it was well worth my time. If you are into yoga, have meditate before ,, this will be an awesome experience. I 100% agree with other + reviews about the owner and the center. I m glad I did it, and will go back when I m in BKK again.

Incredible experience - to do again at 100% !. Difficult to say in few words, but it is an unforgettable experience.
I strongly recommend it and I will do it again soon!

Spare some time and just GOOO!. I was nervous simply because im used to spa and massage centers in the middle of Bangkok (sukhumvit mostly) and this place is a bit far - i used the bts however and it turned out just fine. The experience is unlike anything ive felt before. I was told id spent atleast an hour in the tank when all it felt like was maybe 10 minutes.. also since this was my first time the darkness got a bit overwhelming in the beginning but then you just sort of drift away and the magic begins. Loved it and wont miss it when im in Bangkok again. Thats for sure!

Don't go on full stomach. I ate to soon before going so I couldn't finish the hour because I felt sick. but the homemade oat balls where delicious and compensated. Well the staff are cool and understanding.pricey but worth a go.

Still Relaxed...!!. Please book our appointments prior as it may be hard to get one on short notice. Owner was nice to provide us with the available slot @ 9 pm. The place is easy to find and you will get detailed map from owner. The lady at reception was extremely nice and provided us with all information related o float.I was very calm after speaking to her. The equipment they have is very nice, it is very clean and quiet surrounding which made my float experience fantastic. I look forward to do it again.

Awsome. The float tank is an amazing experience but what Donavan did there is more than that. I love the living room where you can relax after floating while having a cup of tea or reading a nice book. He really brings up more value by taking the time to talk with his clients about theit experiences. And this is the cheepest place in the world where you can float. You can't find anywhere else a better price so if you wanna try the floating, this is the place to do it.

Great place. I didn't have the greatest experience floating myself. Once I started to get into it after about 25 minutes I started feeling a little uncomfortable. Maybe I hadn't quite eaten enough, maybe the room temperature was a little too warm for me, maybe my low blood pressure was causing it, I don't know. However, it was quite interesting for the 25 minutes I was in there and I would've liked to stay in there for at least an hour or so.The float center itself is GREAT! It's REALLY clean and very nicely decorated. I talked quite a lot with Donovan who created this place and told me his story and explained the entire floating process to me as well. Even though my floating experience wasn't that awesome, I did have a great time talking to him and think I learned a few things from him as well.All in all, I definitely recommend anyone who thinks the concept of floating sounds interesting to check out this Bangkok Float Center. I think my so-so experience was due to myself and judging from the other reviews it's an outlier.

Amazing Experience. I was in town just for a dayI was lucky enough to experience thisEverything was truly amazingDon, the owner is the bestClean Safe Secure atmosphereYou are given the opportunity to totally shut down and reconnect with yourselfMy only regret is that I had no time to float againI would return most definitelyI loved it and would recommend it to everyonePlease experience this at this establishmentYou would also love it

Deep relaxation, new level of meditation and letting it go.. This was one of the best experiences I have ever had. I had never heard of floating before, so it was completely new to me. It is amazing!!! If you have never done it, you should definitely try it! I believe, it is different for everyone, but for me it was very much needed. In the stressful lives that we live, it is very important to find time for yourself and it is often so difficult to relax. This floating experience gave me such a great feeling both physically and emotionally, that I would like to do it again and again. The Floating centre is great. Very beautifully furnished, very clean, and the moment you walk in, you feel the calmness and the nice atmosphere. At first, you get an introduction about the process, what to do, what not to do. Everything is being very well explained, it is impossible to misunderstand something. The floating itself is just great. If you let it go and just relax, it is amazing. It feels so natural and easy. Afterwards, I was drinking a very delicious ginger tea, feeling very relaxed and great. We were talking some more about my experience and how important it is to relax in this stressful life that we live in. Thank you so much, it was so great!!! I will definitely go there again next time I possibly can!A small TIP to others regarding the location of the place. If you go there by a taxi from the metro station and even if you have the instructions in Thai on how to get there, it might be that the taxi driver doesn't know the place and somehow can't even understand the directions (in Thai). It happened to me, and it took me 40 minutes to get there instead of around 10, because the taxi driver just couldn't find it. As they mostly don't speak any English at all, it is impossible to talk to them. When at first I asked him if he knew where it is, he was nodding his head, so I thought he knows it, but apparently we misunderstood each other. Just be careful with that. Maybe it is better to print the google maps location and way how to get there.

Everyone should try this!!. This was an amazing float session at one of the best float spas I've been to so far. After having floated 3 times before, I was really curious to try this float spa I've heard so much about in Bangkok. Once I entered I could already see how professional it is set up and after speaking to the staff and owner, how dedicated they are towards floating. Once in the tank I probably had the best float session ever. I was suffering from light insomnia for the previous weeks and it had really bugged me. After the float I felt so relaxed, calm, focused and chilled out. I felt like I was finally able to let go and to be able to control my thoughts again. Once back home I had the best night sleep in weeks. This is something really amazing that in my opinion everyone should try. Most people don't even know about floating, or very little, although it can be such a powerful tool which can solve so many problems in life, For me, I can really recommend this to anyone!

Helpful. bangkokfloatcenter is a vary good place to relexing and and float here is a vary good experience and the place is nice and clean and vary easy to get to bangkok float center and donavan the owner he explain us so clear about everything what gonna happen when im in a float tank love here @bangkokfloatcenter

Amazing recharge in an hour!. Highly recommended for people who are in need of deep relaxation with limited time. The service staff gave me wonderful service and guides for using the dreampod. Just do nothing and enjoy. The result is amazing.
Amazing,. Unbelievable experience from atmosphere,staff, cleanliness, and décor. Very easy for a first timer to go learn and enjoy!
Absolutely awesome. Thanks to all the staff for being so cordual. Would not have went anywhere else. Thanks especially to Donavan swanapal!!

Great Experience - Awesome Staff. From the moment I stepped through the door the staff was welcoming and very warm. The overall energy at Bangkok Float Center is overwhelmingly positive. I will definitely float there again next time I'm in Bangkok. Cheers to the staff and management!Thank you for a great experience!

Great Time. A couple of friends and I read about the this float center and decided to make a weekend of it and it was amazing! Great way to relax and the staff was very informative about all aspects of the floats! Don't wait another minute to schedule a visit!
A+++++. Best Float Center ever!! The staff did a great job and was really nice. I would highly recommend this to anyone who visits this area.

Amazing experience!. I had a truly superior floating experience at Bangkok wellness center. Their staff was extremely knowledgable and the facility was beautiful and relaxing- strongly recommend paying them a visit!
My first float experience. Thank you for the great experience. I'll be visiting again! The staff was helpful and the facility was clean.

***5 STAR EXPERIENCE***. I was skeptical about the benefits when i first booked. However after floating for 60 minutes in the float tank i am a true believer in what floating can do. I came in with back and should pains that i have had for years. Im constantly taking pain pills and have lived with these pains for years. I came out of the tank with no pain at all!! It was gone and has not came back since i floated 3 days ago. The lady at the float center was great in preparing me for the float session and the place was easy to find and very zen like. I purchased a 3 pack and will be returning very soon. Highly recommend floatation to all that are on the fence about it! See you next time!!

How to Be a Better Person, start floating.. Life is a constant exercise in self-improvement. And while some of that focus lands squarely on becoming more educated or rising in the ranks of the workplace, sometimes we forget to improve how we treat ourselves and those around us. In the rush to achieve, the idea of being "better" can become lost to ambition and selfishness. The journey to improving your soul and your compassion toward yourself and others begins here. There is no environment on earth that allows the human body to hyper relax and be alleviated from gravity, while at the same time plugging the mind, the real you right into your mainframe. The power of nothing is really the most powerful something.Once you make floating a part of your monthly routine you will only become a better person holistically. You will find yourself looking for the positives in all things, looking for smiles from all faces. You'll be humble and true to yourself in a way you never knew was possible. As Terrace Mckenna famously said: “You are a divine being. You matter, you count. You come from realms of unimaginable power and light, and you will return to those realms.”– Terence McKennaFloating will be your vessel to such realms. Bangkok Float Centre can provide you the keys :)

THREE MONTHS LATER & MORE THAN A DOZEN FLOATS. Wanted to update my earlier review in the hopes of turning more people on to this amazing self-help tool … as well as possibly sway anyone who is on the fence about trying it out for the first time. I had my first float a little over three months back, and since then have been back a dozen or so times, roughly once per week. At approximately the same cost as a decent massage in a high-end spa, I've found that the floatation experience goes wayyyy beyond the physical relaxation one enjoys from a massage - and for the money, an unbelievable self-therapy bargain. I think the main point I felt compelled to convey to your readers is whatever amazement, joy, and relaxation I experienced with the first float … it was quickly surpassed with each subsequent float … a higher and higher vibration with each one … a deeper and deeper exploration. An amazing phenomenon began to take form as routine … whereby I would emerge from the tank simultaneously relaxed utterly, yet at the same time deeply energised and revved up. Try as I might, I can't recall any activity that ever brought me such a polarity of energy, such a contrasting state of mind and body … yet with a delightful synergy. In short, I'm hooked. If a week goes by now without slipping into the tank I notice I'm not feeling at full power. I can't recommend it more highly. Just go in with an open mind, allow your body and mind to relax, let go of your need to control everything … and enjoy your float!

Must try.... At the urging of a friend, I visited the float center. Overall it was a very clean facility and the staff was helpful and answered all my questions. The experience was relaxing and the back pain I had been experiencing for some time had been relieved.

Amazing-First Time Experience. This weekend me and a friend tried the float spa and it was beyond expectations. We were met by the most friendly staff that explained how everything works and eased our minds about any worries or concerns we had. The place was super clean and decorated very nicely. The place had a vibe that made me feel very calm and worry free which was perfect for getting me relaxed before the float.During the float I was able to let go right away before the first 10 minutes of music was over. The tank was very futuristic and bigger than I expected. After letting go, all time disappeared and I was in a weightless and thoughtless state for the whole time until the music came back on at the end of the session. After showering and moving in the chill room I sat in the massage chair for even more relaxation as the staff joined me and helped me interpret what had just happened. All pain in my back was gone as well as the migraine that I had prior to arriving AT Bangkok float Center. I purchased a membership that makes the float very affordable and will be repeating this every week as the staff told me it gets better with practice. Thanks and see you next time! -Kat

Impressive effects and service.. I had never done floating before so I went without knowing what to expect. first the indication on the website on how to get there were good and the taxi and I found it easily. Then, the hall space is bright and nicely decorated. The staff explain to me how it works, take her time and replied to all my questions. She made sure I was feeling comfortable with everything before starting. The place and especially the bathroom were perfectly clean. The experience of floating is amazing. The body is totally relaxed within seconds. It's so comfortable! (even more comfy than a bed!) at some point, I caught myself thinking I wish this is not going to stop soon... it's so good! I really enjoyed that it was total silence, not one noise got to the room, and totally dark. It puts your mind in perfect condition. And you have the option of turning on a light or calling for help at anytime and you are in control of the door, so you do not worry. Afterwards you have this total relaxation feeling in the mind and in the body which stays with you for hours... absolutely amazing, I was totally impressed! Also, I work a lot on the computer and have regular pain in my shoulders. I did not have it since the floating and it's been days now. I will go back for the kindness of the staff, the cleanness of the place, the perfect silence and the amazing long effect... definitively!

Healing for the Mind. The Bangkok Float Center is a really quiet and relaxing place with friendly and competent staff. When I arrived, the woman at the reception explained to me everything I needed to know about floating. It feels weird at first, but after a while you get used to the situation. It's hard to explain, but I felt like I was on a higher level of consciousness.I strongly recommend the place to anyone who is into meditation and also everyone else who just wants to relax from the city's madness.

A Very Relaxing Experience. We had visited the Bangkok Float Center about a week ago, it was once first experience with floating and it was better then expected! The instructions from the staff had been thorough and detail, and because of her expertise and advise we were able to fully experience the experience there. I would strongly recommend those who have never tried floating at Bangkok Float Center!

Great service & a very unique experience.. If you've never tried a float, it's a pretty amazing experience & this is great place to do it.Lovely staff & even has a massage chair / selection of teas to relax after you, erm, relax!

An amazing floating!!!. I come to visit Bangkok float center today , Is really nice to float here .I love the shop how they mad it feel so comfortable and the staff is very friendly , with the float is amazing his is not the first time for me but i love it every time i floated ….for everybody who want to try something New and want to know to learn how to LET GO! you should try this Its Amazing!!!

A Unique Experience. Getting to the float center was a bit tricky because they are located outside of the city center, but getting there by bus/taxi is no problem. Donavan was very helpful over the phone, and provided very clear directions.The center itself is very new, clean, and relaxing. Eed at the front desk is welcoming and helpful, informing me about what I needed to know and ensuring that I was prepared.I cannot adequately place it in my mental schema--perhaps it may be compared to the practice of meditation, but it remains a new experience in and of itself. One can lose track of time while in the pod. With the lights off, earplugs in, and temperature-differential calibrated exactly, being inside the pod is truly the epitome of sensory-deprivation.

Great First Time Floating. I had a great first time float at the Bangkok Float Center. They offer a special deal for first-time floaters. The owner Donavon took me through the process and answered all the questions I had about the session. He is very knowledgeable and will give you tips to enhance the experience. He sat down with me after I had finished and took the time to talk with me about what I had experienced. I found the whole thing very interesting and would highly recommend it to anyone interested in floating. The place was a little out of the main part of Bangkok so I would definitely print out the directions in Thai to give to your taxi driver. On both of my visits, neither taxi driver spoke English but read the directions I gave them and took me there without hassle. The cost of the taxi from Udom Suk BTS station was 100B and the return fare to that station was 80B.

Pure Bliss. Bangkok Float Center has phenomenal staff who are very knowledgeable and were able to guide me through the steps to having a successful first float. As a result I had a phenomenal first Float experience thanks to the great staff and peaceful atmosphere at the Bangkok Float Center.

Went to Bangkok Float Center on a whim and I am glad I did. Using TripAdvisor to get the best out of my trip to Bangkok, I filtered things to do by best to worse, and Bangkok Float Center floated to the top of the list. I can see why it did.I never floated before, and neither did the other guys I was with, so the skepticism was there. Thankfully Donavan, the owner, was there to explain things thoroughly with us. I think that was the most important part for us first timers.After careful explanation and reassurance, the rest fell into place. We did an hour each (wish we did longer to be honest), with 2 people going in separate tanks/rooms at a time. When in the tank, it was pretty great. Very relaxing being able to let everything go.When not in the tank, just as relaxing because the waiting rooms had massage chairs, soft furniture, and refreshments.This is a must stop sort of place. Great price, excellent service, and you get more than enough value. Cannot wait to return.
cloud 9. friendly experienced staff and good atmosphere. had an awesome time floating..felt refreshed..definitely coming back.

My New Found Therapy!. Very nice and clean place to relax at any time of the day! Friendly and safe equipment yet full of benefits! No reviews beat your real first-hand experience here! definitely come back for more and recommend to anybody!

What a Amazing relaxing time.. I heard about The floats online and wanted to try it out for myself. I Found it relaxing and peaceful.So much so I bought a membership and will make it part of my weekly routine. The place is very Clean and easy to access. Lots of parking. I highly recommend it. You won't be disappointed. Cheers.

New Experience. I heard about this online and wanted to try it out. It was more than i ever expected. true nothingness, and alone time. I had a few moments that i felt like i had went to sleep because it was so relaxing. The experience is suppose to get better with each session so i can't wait to try it again!
Float center in BKK. Awesome place and experience... clean & easy to find. Highly recommended to get away from your bustling city life.
Perfect time. Best place to relax and take a break from the city. Love the concept and relaxing feeling i get from floating in the dream pods. I will tell all my friends about this new place!
A must experience you should not miss!!. very very relaxing! just trust in it and you will float with no worries. make sure you book in advance. blew my mind :)

Amazing new experience, will definitely repeat =). I was looking for a new experience in Bangkok, and i had heard about 'floating' from the West - getting more and more popular, but super expensive. Then I heard about a new place in Bangkok - fraction of the price, beautiful atmosphere, awesome owner who speaks perfect english and thai so i was sold. An AMAZING two hour experience, HUGELY recommended for everyone :)

Perfection of relaxing.. For this longday after work,thouugh very excited to try the new float tank.It was my first experiance of getting a new direction of relaxing!!! I took a course for 90 minute,feel very calm and peaceful.....this wellness spa are clean and cozy! I feel like I'm home...and of course after I'm out of the tank,finished took a shower all i want is sleep i almost fall as sleep at the cough haha damm cozy! Maybe you need to make another bedroom for type people like me!.......and after all this spacial experiance I really proud to introduce Bangkok Float Center,I'm sure here will give you a new feel!
Must try !. It's a very good place,go there easy.Help my pain getting better, real relaxed and it wasn't so expensive. Thanks Bangkok Floating Center

Great experience!. Tried this with a friend on our trip to Bangkok and found it to be a truly amazing experience. We found the location easily with the instructions provided after booking. We did 90 minute sessions and it was perfect. We both came out feeling refreshed and super relaxed. Afterwards we chilled in the relaxation room and spoke to the owner that answered all the questions we had. We plan to find one of these places near our home in New Mexico when we get back. Thanks Donavan for guiding us through the process. Highly recommended!!!!

First float for my 10 year old boy....... Hayden my 10 year old had a great time, it should have been my hour but......Great facilities and staff, we will be back again, thanks Donavan for the kind welcome and helping Hayden get comfortable, my time is next!!!!
Best time. First time in Thailand and to float. The place is relaxing and clean. And the owner is very helpful with all my questions.

Garfield. There was the best relaxed in the water by float ! It's really AMAZING! Can helped me with my paint muscles. In there was really quiet good for relax. And they were so friendly with me, tought me how to used. Comfortable to go there and also have lots of parking!! #Bangkkok #Float #Center #is #the #best !!

Perfect experiene after travelling. I had a very relaxing time floating at bangkok float center with my friend last weekend. This is an amazing thing to do when you are feeling tired ans need a break. I wish I can do this more often. We loved the lounge room as well. We will go back! Thank you

I'm a new person – totally relaxed. Empty mind, open world & all aches and jointpaines gone!. First time floater!Hard to write how good it was! interesting, peaceful, relaxing, invigorating, enlightening all rolled up into one amazing hour. A great feeling of lightness and peace lasted the entire night and into the next day!the tank is a lightless, soundproof tank inside which subjects float in salt water at skin temperature.It's completely dark and feels like nothing.. like not having a body in an awesome way!I think the 1st time is important and cant say how good the reception was. We went with 3 guys and were received by Donovan. I think him being the owner and receptionist, host is on itself a success formula. The man is inviting, stress free, friendly and extremely knowledgeable about floating. He takes a lot of time to go over all the things. From physical to mind-stuff but keeps it open fo you so you start the experience in a stressful and peaceful mindset-environment! perfect! He has been a monk in thailand too so the information can go on from floating to meditation to thailand. A very very welcoming place!Before the float you can read books on floating or mindwork, have a masage in an amazing chair, listen to music or try some different teas.. all perfect! At 1st I thought the location wasnt ok but it's perfect. BTS can bring you and just a taxiride from there or just taxi all the way. My mind was so relaxed that I think it's perfect it's not in silom or sukumvit because you have a bit of time to adapt to city life again before you go full on bkk again. Already booked for next week and cant wait! Love this place
