My boyfriend and I had the following;30 minute body scrub- amazing feeling and seriously leaves your skin soft for about 1.5 weeksSignature 1.5 hour treatment- This includes massage, hot stones and facial Love everything about this treatment and every time it has been amazing. I really won't advise anyone to treat themselves to this. 1500 baht (30 gbp) approx for 2 hours is a bargain for this quality of massages and treatment. Thank you to all the ladies there for making it specially for us

not for a facial . I came to check this place out after reading all the wonderful reviews.Tried the hour facial and felt that the facial itself was alittle rushed. But during the mask there came a really wonderful massage that relaxed my body.So if your in need of a serious facial then it would not be the place. Its more a place to have a massage and relax in this homely environment. Plus one hour is simply not enough, so pick a longer session.Its an easy walk from the bts and enjoyed the stroll over. Also when you call they might not pick up so just try again.

Very restful!. This home SPA is very close to where we live but never tried it out. Couple of friends recommended the place and I went last week with my daughter. I honestly don't know why I did not visit before!!! To think of all the restful massages and treatments I have deprived myself off!!This is a beautifully converted old house with lovely staff. I think the owner is also personally involved and takes bookings. The rooms are clean and smell very nice. The treatments are very different from regular treatments. I guess more along the Korean style but I am not an expert on that. We took the facial and massage package and it was just perfect!! My face has never felt so soft in ages - nothing intrusive or harsh was used! Anyway the entire experience was blissful!! I am definitely walking back again

Cool place with amazing treatments. We read about this place in the Malaysian Airlines magazine and thought we'd give it a try and were glad we did. My husband and I did a scrub package together (please note ladies - very romantic!) where we had a herbal steam and sat in a wood tub before getting scrubbed down with rough gloves. Ouch! but we loved it. My mom and dad had a massage (dad) and facial and massage (mom) and they said it was very good. They we also happy because the owner could speak Cantonese to them and took time to explain every treatment in detail. So nice!

Great Place for a Massage. First time my wife is visiting Bangkok and she wanted a massage. And not a place where women sit out front soliciting people. A friend suggested Su Esthetic and she was right. We booked our appointment and we were warmly greeted upon arrival. We were given a menu of services and I selected a 90 minute massage and my wife a massage & facial. Overall, the people were very helpful and pleasant. The facility is a house and a very relaxing environment. I would highly recommend Su Esthetic if you're seeking a spay with great service & value. Tip: The place is a little tricky to find and not to close to the BTS. Suggest you take a taxi instead of trying to find on your own.
Wonderful massage. Love this place, great full body massage with a facial, so relaxing and the staff very attentive, great value for money, would highly recommend

Great quality products . The staff are good with body massage and products used is of certain quality.I got a the package of facial and body massage for 1000 baht and top up another 500 body srcub which is divine. It's leave my skin super soft and smooth for a a few days. I won't hesitate to return if I ever return to Bangkok.

Must visit n fall in love with the feeling . Initially wondering what they are doing but soon u will love n want to do more n keep going n once u finish u start missing everything they doing n want to go back within a week fab: creme they use, oil, massage, price. Recommended to all my girlfriends n their family

A spa without pretensions or breaking the bank.. What a great time for travellers in Bangkok this season, if you want to treat yourself to a very high quality spa, a vast selection of treatments in an authentic location with a casual non pretentious atmosphere, excellent therapists, this is the place for you. One must book, so check out their menu online, I opted for a combination of treatments beginning with the Korean steam followed by a shower then the Japanese hot tub followed by the Korean scrub, after which I continued with their incredible organic coconut oil face and body massage. All I can say people is.... to die for.

Wow!!. I am glad we chose Su esthetic home spa out of all the myriad of spa options available.The owner was warm and welcoming and took time to explain the package we had chosen which included the Korean steam, Japanese hot tub, Korean scrub & the signature face and body massage.The masseuse were like skilled craftsmen never missing a pressure point and if you sleep through most of your massage, then their skill levels ought to be off the charts.Go here to be amazed.
Wonderful experience . Relaxing quite place. Nice people. Good money value. The massage was great. The tea after massage was relaxing. I am planning to visit again.
Amazing spa. Amazing atmosphere. Great technique. I highly recommend this place. I only go to the best spas, restaurants and hotels. Finally found the best spa in Bangkok after coming here 5 times.

A great experience!. My sister and me visited from Hong Kong and found the spa on the Internets and there was so many good things written about it in the Chinese blogs that we thought we would try it. We usually have a Thai massage in Bangkok and thought we'd try something different and Korean sounded good. We were very lucky. It was very special and the owner speaks Chinese and staff were very nice. The place is also very clean and organized. We arrived early and were given a cup of tea and talked with the owner until our time came. we were then lead upstairs to a beautiful room and had a wonderful Korean massage and facial. This is our new best spa in Bangkok!

Korean Style of Home Spa Treatments. Chance upon this spa from trip advisor reviews, largely positive, and doing some reading from their website on the different kind of Korean style treatments, I sort of giving it a try to distinguish the different between Thai, Javanese, Balinese and Korean style massage. I have chosen Summer Treatments using organic coconut oil sea salt scrub, coconut oil massage and facial for 2.5 hours duration. The entire process is wonderful as I enjoy the 3 stages of treatment, relaxing from the way the therapist do the massage which is totally different from others style of massage and satisfying with the quality of material used as I could feel the thickness and smoothness of the coconut oil spreading onto my body. I would say it is an amazing experience couple with the professional work of the therapist working on the entire duration without dropping in standard and quality.If time and space allowed, I will return to try other Korean style of treatments.

Excellent Service Excellent Massage Excellent Spa. I've always love a Korean scrub and was so surprised and happy to see that there was a Korean spa in Bangkok offering all sorts of Korean facials, massages and treatments. I had the Korean scrub package and was very pleased. We stared with a Korean steam, then soaked in a wood tub and then lay on the table where the masseuse scrub us down with some coarse mitts. I once had one in Korea and this was just as good, but cheaper and the atmosphere was much more friendly and relaxed. worth a visit.

Keeps getting better and better. I first visited this place about 5 years ago, loved it, and returned again last week. It was as good as I rembered and even better. The menu has grown and there is now more rooms and they have added a really, really amazing new Korean scrub treatment. Another nice thing, I got the same masseuse as last time and the owner rembered me from my first visit. All this combined to give me the feeling of returning to a friends home after a long time away. Thank you to the kind owner (Ms Monique) and the wonderfully talented and warm staff. See you again soon - I hope!

Best Massage Experience Ever. My second time visiting the spa and this time round together with another friend who is visiting this place for the first time. We both chose package C that comes with Korean Scrub, Japaneses hot tub and their signature face and body massage. i can say this is my best spa experience ever!!! They masseurs were very meticulous in their scrub and both the facial and massage were flawless. We both felt so good and relaxed after the sessions with (baby-liked skin). My friend was so impressed that she is going to recommend her friends who frequents Bangkok yearly. Definitely a place that i will visit whenever i am in Bangkok. A little tricky to find the place though hence you may want to take a cab and get the spa to talk to the cab driver on the exact location.

What a Wonderful Experience!. I went there the second time within a year and tried this time a package of Korean steam, Japanese hot tub, Korean scrub with face and body massage. Coupled with the tranquil and scented atmosphere and the experienced masseuse, I enjoyed this package very much, especially was impressed by the Koren-styled scrub and massage. I felt very relaxed after the treatment. Also, the staff there are amicable. Hightly recommended!
A comfortable visit!. The environment and atmosphere is very relaxing. It is very clean n make us feels like home. The staff is skillful and polite. We enjoy our massage very much!

Massage and facial is very relaxed . The masseurs are experienced and the massage is very relaxed.I tried some massage which almost broke my neck or back.I enjoyed it very much and almost slept all the way.Highly recommend this Spa to people who looks for relaxation.

Great New Experience!. Korea-style massage was a whole new experience for me and it was amazing. The masseuse massaged my whole body (including my breasts!) and I left feeling completely relaxed and wonderful. The people there are very nice and polite and the spa is very clean and attractive. Highly recommended!

Best Facial Ever!. Booked in for the facial and aroma massage package. It was AMAZING! Have had many facials and massages but this was really outstanding. It is my first time to try Korean style and won't be my last!Staff were very friendly and ambience lovely. Even though we were late (due to lost taxi) we were offered tea and time to relax before we started the treatments. Decor in the treatment room was lovely and en suite bathroom with shower offered complete privacy. Very peaceful setting and relaxing experience.Fantastic value at 1000bhat for 1.5 hours. Will definitely be back next time I'm in Bangkok.

Perfect Oil Massage! . I don't like oil massages because usually it leaves me uncomfortable and heavy after, but this place changed my mind. I zened out and felt light as a feather after. Highly recommended! I always try to schedule this in my visits back to Bangkok.
great facial..... one of the best facials I have ever had...nice and quiet relaxing room, ok to walk from.bts,.about 10-15 minutes.

Best spa experience ever.... I am the sort who will always hide in spas whenever possible and Su Esthetic is one that I will always have to go whenever I visit Bangkok. Planning another trip soon and will definitely drop by again for sure.

Best Facial I have had in Thailand so far!. Super serious yet friendly staff, clean place, relaxing ambiance. My massage was amazing and I have extremely happy about my facial. I will be back for sure and recommend this little gem!

Top notch quality and service . The masseuses are very therapeutic and skilled. They know how to pamper a person. It was a very tranquil and serene environment. This place was a god-send after a hot day of walking in Bangkok. We walked in tired and exhausted and after the 2.5 hour treatments, we felt refreshed and at peace with the world. We all came out feeling absolutely amazing! We will be visiting again the next time we are in Bangkok. Highly recommend the Su Esthetic Home Spa to anyone who wants a really great massage!

Very relaxing and highly recommended. Spent a fabulous couple of hours here getting a full body and face massage. Staff were very lovely, and the Korean touch was a nice change from the thai massages. Tranquil setting and professional staff. I chose the 1000 baht special offer, which is great value. We topped it off by having our hair washed and blow dried (for 150 baht) at a little hairdresser on the way back to Sukhumvit Rd. Felt a million dollars!

Came again and will return . A really relaxing massage that will put you to sleep. If you prefer painful massages that undo knots in your body, this might not be it for you. Conducive, soothing ambiance, from lighting to music to scents. Warm packs and cooling face masks were just great. Staff are really courteous and well aware that they contribute to the entire experience for couples. A very polite owner was there to greet us both occasions we visited. Attentive but never intrusive. Will probably make this a destination every time we visit Bangkok.

Spectacular Experience. I went for a Facial (Moringa) at the spa with a few girlfriends. It was a delightful experience, from start to finish. We were greeted with cool water, in their lovely space, and then brought up to the room for the treatment. The facial consisted of cool and hot towels, a mask, lotions, and steam, and while the mask was drying, I had a full body massage with oil and the strongest hands I've ever felt. I am still in a haze of relaxation, hours and hours later. I will for certain be returning.
Hot pillows. The facial wasn't that great, but maybe it's just my skin type. Massage was nice. They cover you with hot towels and hot pillows.

Couples package. Very cleanGood ambiencePersonalized attentionGood menu of servicesGood package offersGood products on the shelfThe scrub and massages were a tad too gentle for our liking. The oils could be used more sparingly.

Really great massage and spa. Su Estetic is a hidden gem Between sukhumvit soi 26 and 34. Great value for money, very clean and nice place. Not the high end type, but relaxed and enjoyable! The terapist listen to your requests, are polite and do night rush. I always get value for money, no matter what kind of treatment I try.

Would have gone back for more if only we'd had more time!. Opting for a massage at a Korean spa in Bangkok may not be the most obvious choice ever made given that Thai massage is world-renowned, but do yourself a favour and give this place a try. It's friendly, family-run and has a setting full of character and charm, despite being slightly off the beaten Bangkok track on a little side road that twists and turns and had our cab driver doing his best to guess exactly where we were going. All that said, the journey was hardly harrowing and cost less than 150 baht from our central downtown hotel, so the place is more hidden gem than epic exploration find. Do make the effort. Su Esthetic had been recommended as a "must do" while on a brief break to Bangkok, not least because getting massaged in Thailand is one of my wife's favourite pastimes. Monique, the owner, had squeezed us both in at short notice for a basic hour-long massage. She had carefully explained to us how Korean massage differed from traditional Thai massage, seeking to manage potentially unmet expectations. There was no worry on that score as before we'd finished being kneaded and unknotted by tiny Thai women expertly trained in the Korean technique, my wife was already planning her next visit and treatments. Sadly Monique couldn't fit us in before we were due to leave town, so it'll just have to be something we do next time - it's a reason to go back to Bangkok all on its own.

Best massage ever!. I've been to Su Esthetic multiple times and I would never go to another spa in Bangkok. From the moment you enter you are treated with great attention. The therapists take such care to make sure that your massage is individualized for you and that you are comfortable. After the signature treatment my face felt the softest it's ever felt and all of my stress had completely melted away. It's a wonderful environment and the people there are so lovely.

Heavenly facial and massage. I had a signature body and facial treatment (90 mins) for a promotion price, only 1000Baht. Boy, it was a good decision! Coming from Cambodia, I was looking for a professional facial treatment, and glad that I chose Su Spa. My skin glowed afterwards, and a week later it still shows! I was shown to a private, quiet room, and from that point, all I needed to do is relax, everything else was done by the therapist. I could not list how many different massages and facial techniques were used, all quickly and efficiently. One thing that is rare to find was done here: with a vacuum machine they quickly removed the blackheads, it only took like 1.5 minutes and was perfectly painless. The warm pillows that were put on my chest and belly immediately had me relax deeply. I booked an appointment a day before on the phone (recommended), and thanks to the map and directions on the site, I found the spa from the BTS station quite easily. The ambience is just amazing, everything is beautiful in the salon. I will definitely come back when in Bangkok next time!

Wonderful Korean spa, hidden gem in BKK. Came highly recommended by close friends. The spa did not disappoint. Staffs are very professional and friendly, the spa owner is also super helpful. Love the body scrub, where you really do get the scrub down, not some superficial work. Super cleaned and ready for the spa for both facial and body message. A combination of Korea and Thai message style is efficient and relaxing. Time flies by quick here and you don't feel like the spa was there to encourage sleeping or to burn time. Truly get your money's worth Pro: body scrub, oil message, facial, combination Korean + Thai message styleCon: noneOverall: will come back for more in the future.

Great massage + great service. It was my first time visiting this place as I was recommended by a friend and indeed it was very impressive. The staff were very nice and professional. I would visit this place more regularly every time I go to Bangkok. The massage and scrub is what I recommend. Definitely worth paying for such a massage service

Wow environment. Meh treatment by therapist.. I was wow by the surroundings the moment I entered Su Esthetics. The lady boss was very friendly and personable and the environment is very calm and relaxing. We started with the aroma floral bath which was very soothing and calming.Then, we had the salt scrub which really smooths and nourishes the skin. I loved how soft and smooth my skin felt after the scrub! However, the scrub may not be suitable for people with very thin skin as the grains are really coarse. We then proceeded with our body and facial treatments. We didn't enjoy this experience though. My therapist was rushing to finish the entire treatment. There was no pressure from the massage at all (I'd specifically requested for a medium massage pressure knowing that my body's quite stressed) and everything applied on my face was just cold with no warning. My boyfriend's therapist was quite ok. She applied the right amount of pressure to soothe his tension. However, she may have focused a little too much on his armpits, he suffered from bruises for a couple of days. His face was really cleaned after the facial. I may visit Su Esthetics again as I liked the environment a lot. However, I will definitely not want the same therapists for the treatments.

Best Spa in Bangkok. Visited here again quite recently -- really impressed. Courteous and friendly, very reasonably priced, lovely surroundings. And the Korean style treatments are the best. Will definitely visit again, and set aside a half day.

Good massage but not my cup of tea. Had their signature treatment. The whole process was very fast and the therapist was professional. The owner was nice. However, I did not feel relaxed during the whole treatment. It can't heal my shoulder pain at all. I did note the reminder of tipping therapist. I did not give any tip as I did not enjoy the treatment. Although it is not my cup of tea, I will still recommend people to try.

Blissful experience!. I have previously visited the spa in August and had an amazing massage, so much so that I made it a priority to visit the spa during my short trip in October. Lots of thought and effort has been put into the design and decoration of the spa. The spa is well-maintained and very clean. All the staff are well-trained and I have always received excellent service. I made 2 visits in 4 days to fix a very sore neck and back and I left very satisfied. Thank you so much for the wonderful experience, and I will be back again when I visit Bangkok in the near future.

Great massage, great service, clean. It was our first visit and the massage and service here were great. There were 4 of us and all of us felt the massage was really good. The masseur exerts adequate strength and checks with you to ensure you're ok. The environment was quiet and peaceful, place was clean and cosy. Don't expect luxurious settings and fittings, just a pleasant home based spa. The room we had was good - not stuffy, spacious enough and temperature set was just nice. We have been to places where it was stuffy and with a faulty aircon that we were perspiring while having the massage.Service was great, making a reservation was a breeze. Monique was prompt in replying to emails and is able to recommend treatments based on one's needs. She explains and ensures that her masseurs are aware of any special request from the customers, making it a pleasant experience for us. She is able to converse in various languages so don't worry about any miscommunications. Just a minor setback is that the procedure seems to be inconsistent - e.g. some of us had certain parts massaged and some of us didn't. Also, on our second visit, one of us felt that the masseur was not as good as the previous and that she left my friend unattended for quite a long period of time during the treatment. Overall, one of the best massage we had, great service and well worth the money.
Amazing place! . Great service, excellent customer relations, amazing location and very good price! Really enjoyed the massage there, thanks!

Pure indulgence. Revisited Su Esthetic today as my treatment last year had been so pleasant. A bit hard to find, out of the way , but if you use the map and the instructions provided on the website it is an easy walk from BTS.I had the signature facial and massage and the one and half hours of pampering were great value. I particularly like the fact that the staff are so professional and you feel like you are in a very professional , serene environment. Well worth a visit.

Su Esthetic VS Baan Sabai Spa. I was fortunate enough to visit both spas the same day as they are about 5min walk away from each other and rated very highly here on tripadvisor. Masseuse:The therapist at Su Esthetic was less skilled and experienced as during the scrub session she didn't notice my obvious wound on my back and scrubbed on it hard while I winced in pain.Atmosphere: At Su Esthetic there was renovations being done so it was difficult for me to be relaxed with the pounding of the hammer.Final thoughts:The owner at Su Esthetics seemed to be strictly business during my conversations with her. One will also notice signs in every room indicating a Tip for the therapist.As tipping is a personal choice. (I always tip for good massages) I kind of confused why there were signs everywhere "reminding" us to tip.

Definitely the best one in BKK. If you're looking for a nice, clean and quite place to indulge yourself, Su Esthetic is the right place for you. Lovely Thai house, away from the crowd, on a small soi close by the BTS Phrom Phong, the kind therapists and Monique will make you feel home. I highly recommend the face and body treatment which is pure heaven! I lived in BKK and since I discover this place it becomes my favorite and the only one I would go now. I have been recommending this spa for almost 2 years to ALL my friends and family and everybody absolutely loved it!

Wonderful Service!. I came away relaxed and rejuvenated. Loved the signature face and body massage! They are very clean. I actually appreciated the recommended tipping sign, you just never know here in Bangkok. I will be back!

Very cosy home spa. Was here this afternoon. Arrived very early as it sounded very strict about being punctual from the website. It was okay not being able to start early as I was too early, but it was rather unexpected that the start time was delayed 10min later than my scheduled time. This, however was a minor minor issue compared to the treatment they provided. email responses were very prompt and easy to arrange an appointment with them. The place was quite some distance from the nearest bts station, but quite easy to find according to the map/instruction provided and its very cosy. I was very sweaty upon arrival and the waiting time allowed me to cool down. And needless to say, the staff was very professional. She tried to make sure I was comfortable as I then requested for a stronger massage. I felt sorry as I could hear her hands/fingers cracking and she said she was okay. It was very relieving and quite relaxing during facial massage that I nearly fell asleep. Very humble people and I highly recommend this cosy place :)

Good massage . Tried the massage after reading much positive reviews. Indeed, the massage is good. Reservation is highly recommended as the capacity of the spa is very limited. Only setback I feel is the operator put up several signs at obvious place advising customers to tip the masseurs if they are happy with their services, going to the extend stating 100bath is greatly appreciated. I do usually tip the masseur unless it was really bad. However, in this case, I do feel the unnecessary pressure from the operator abit annoying. Understand some countries service staffs income depends alot on tipping but I don't think Thailand is one of them.

Great massage therapists, lovely atmosphere, clean establishment,. I had requested the Signature Face and Body Massage and thoroughly enjoyed the experience. Great, strong massage therapists, I walked away feeling refreshed. The spa itself was clean and easy to find.

Best SPA in Bangkok!. I am Big fan of Su esthetic since opening (almost 10 years !)Their treatment is so wonderful and attentive.Especially I like Yomogi herbal steam. It is really good for skin and womb. My skin became smooth and period pains have gone. Facial and body massage feel incredibly good, pressure is just as well. I love also the sense of interior and full of cleanliness. Most of estheticians there are long-lasting, it is evidence that shows the goodness of this SPA. Therefore, I can recommend here without reservation.

A worthwhile experience..... I visited the establishment based on reviews. From the menu, I chose the Traditional Korean Spa; my experience from start to finish of the multi-treatment was so wonderful and truly relaxing. I can truly justify that the steam therapy was very effective, the Korean scrub was fantastic and the face/body massage was phenomenal.Also, the staff are skillful and very professional. I had the chance to speak to the owner and is so pleasant to interact with. I look forward to my next visit to Thailand and will definitely a must have appointment for another pampering treatment.Thank you.

Nice Spa experience. The whole experience was good, I chose the strong massage type and it was really strong and excellent. The facial was quite good too as I am not really someone familiar with spa or facial, the overall experience is just great for me. :)

Different & worth the experience. I like the relaxed feeling a good massage can provide. I never had a Korean massage and wanted to give it a try. I've had Thai (never sure of the training the masseuse has though), Moroccan and Japanese massage. After checking their web site and calling the owner, I decided to go for it. The special price for the Signaturewas right too. I called the spa and spoke with the owner, a lady from Hong Kong. Her husband is from Canada. She assured me her staff were professional and trained. The experience was relaxing, professional and done in a clean environment. I suppose one could bring their own sheets and towels if they wished. The spa is a bit out of the way, but the directions are easy to follow. The massage is a top to bottom, front and back affair. A caution, if you're a female, you might want to be cautious as to the pressure they apply to your breasts. If one is shy about having the hips and thighs massaged, one might want to mention this to the staff in advance. This isn't a happy endings affair though! As a guy, I was comfortable with the medium pressure massage. The facial was great. I lift weights thus I enjoyed the relaxing feeling the back massage gave me. Based on my experience, I'd recommend if you're serious about a good massage, this is a place to go. See their web site for more info regarding services, prices and location. Relax and enjoy yourself.

Felt so relaxed!. Came in for some massages with my family. I got one with a herbal ball. It was great! The herbal ball is the equivalent of a hot stone, only the surface area is larger. It was a delightful surprise because I was not sure what to expect. The lemongrass tea was also nice and refreshing. I would've returned if we had enough time. The location is also a bit off the main road, but you will find it. It's worth the visit!

Wonderful and beneficial massage technique. Massage a cross between the brutal Chinese deep tissue massage and long stroke Thai method which was beneficial and relaxing at the same time. Facial with Korean products smelled lightly scented and left skin feeling and looking clean and brighter. Will definately return for more when in BKK again. Certainly recommended!

Esthetic gives you a clue. They do really well for what they offer, so come here to be pampered and relaxed (I did it twice in a week). Prices are reasonable, and the environment is cosy, clean, excellent. Masseuses are attentive, professional, and have smiles all around. I took up the signature treatment (inc. of facial) and korean scrub. Very relaxing, and enjoyed it very much. Don't expect the average-to-good massage to ease too much muscle tension though, it is comforting but they are not by any means, experts who can seek out and relieve knotted areas.

Amazing experience!. Went there on 11.07.2015 with my sis for traditional Korean Spa. The moment we stepped it, the ambience and its people made us felt at home. It's so cozy and after we were given a cold of glass water to unwind ourselves, we were guided by the masseur to start the treatment. Thumbs up for the masseur as they're very friendly and throughout the 2.5 hour session we were so pampered with the services. Thanks Monique & your team, We'll definitely come back again! =)
Fantastic!. Awesome experience! Great massage and loved having a facial!!! First time for this guy.......great experience and I highly recommend for total relaxation!!!!!

In 2008 for the first time to Su Esthetic fell in love with the store environment, and masseur gestures, I will go to Ba. In 2008 for the first time to Su Esthetic fell in love with the store environment, and masseur gestures, I will go to Bangkok once a year

A hidden gem in Bangkok !. The best massages I have found. I've traveled around the world and this is definitely my favorite place. Clean, the staff is very professional and friendly. The SIGNATURE FACE & BODY MASSAGE, the best!

Awesome experience (don't miss out). I was recommended SuEsthetic by friends, which me and my other half decided to check out in April 2015 (did not leave a TripAdvisor comment last time as I did not have an account yet). My account all setup now so by a stroke of luck I had another trip to Bangkok in June 2015 so I called them up to see if there were any availability slots. It was a fluke there were one or two no shows so they were able to accommodate me and my friends.The experience is a must try from the second you walk into the spa, you are greeted with warm smiles. Then they sit you down with a glass of water to cool you down after getting to the spa (it’s a short walk but with the Bangkok weather, it’s hot) She (Monique) will then share with you the types of treatments they have available. I took the 1.5 hours signature face and body, it was very relaxing and the masseuse checks on you to make sure the strength being used isn’t too strong, as not everyone can’t take it. I requested for the medium strength to play safe.After you are done, you will head back to ground floor with a nice tea (think it was Chinese tea) served to you and then just rest a while before you make your move.So when I am next in Bangkok it’s near enough confirmed I will defiantly pop over again.

A splendid place. So as to avoid traffic congestion, we took BTS and the location was a bit tricky to find at first. But this little home spa is worthy of note. Love the homely decor with taste and the staffs are all well trained. I thoroughly enjoyed my 2 hours Oil Body Massage in there. Can't explain in words, you need to try it yourself. Highly recommended!

Best place in Bangkok for a massage. Great owner, great staff. You could spend more somewhere else but it honestly could not better better.My wife and I went there three times on our honeymoon and the staff is clearly highly trained. We enjoyed every second. Not to mention it is a great space in a nice part of Bangkok. Can't say enough about the experience.

Fell asleep twice during the spa. I booked for the SIGNATURE FACE & BODY MASSAGE + RF FACE FIRMING which cost 1300baht which isn't too bad considering their service.The owner and the therapists were very nice and friendly to us. We were greeted with a cup of hot tea and then briefed through shortly by the owner. She even asked us the preference that we want. (strong/medium/soft) I chose medium and it was a bit too strong for me. The awkward part was when she pulled down your towel and massaged your breast. I didn't like that part. (and yea, it's included in the package) The leg massage was so comfortable that I think I've went into dreamland. I was awaken by the cold mask which was applied on my face. The facial treatment was pretty good too. The therapist applied many layers of liquid/ mask on my face which smells and feel good. I fell asleep once again as it was really comfortable. I bought a bottle of hair shampoo which costs around 250baht if i remember correctly. They also sell other spa products such as lotion, soaps, massage oil. For couples, You can request for 'Room 6'. It is a room with 2 bed, quite spacious. We couldn't get a taxi at that area so we used uber.

Amazing. I have been going to Su Esthetic regularly more than a year now and I did not even get a slight disappointment during any of my visits. Amazing management, amazing staff, amazing service at very reasonable prices. I have been to different Spa's while travelling across Asia and also in Bangkok, but Su Esthetic is definitely my number 1. I have also taken my aunt and mom there, who didn't have any asian spa experience before and they both got addicted to the place. Besides services, they also offer natural products for body, face, hair etc. which I also use and really happy with. A place you should not miss while in Bangkok - I am just looking forward to my next visit!

Great massage. Situated just off Sukhumvit Road in a quiet, interesting house, this spa is well worth visiting. It is comfortable, clean, reasonably priced (especially with the special offers) and the staff are lovely. My massage was different from the other aromatherapy massages I have had in Thailand and, while the hand strokes felt stronger than usual, the experience felt gentler than a traditional Thai massage. I felt so relaxed afterwards and was particularly impressed by the masseuse's willingness to adapt the massage when requested.

Be pampered with a full Spa Experience. An exclusive home spa where u can relax and pamper yourself! U may feel alittle rough as their hand strokes are much quicker than other spas or massage place that I have been in the past. However you will thank them for the 'refreshed' you after the session (I had a 2.5hrs full spa session). I will be back when I visit Bangkok again.

different & efficient is very enjoyable!!. Su Esthetic offers an unique combination of massage and facial! So Two in One! Nice products , very professional staff and clean rooms! Also some nice jewelry and spa products shoppingshopping afterwards.

Fantastic. I go to Bangkok quite a bit and have tried most of the spas ranked near the top on tripasdvisor and a few of the luxury ones in five-star hotels. So on this trip my girl friend and I decided to try this place and booked the 90 minute signature package. To start, the service was great from the quick reply to our online booking, to the friendly greeting (the manager seems to speak about 10 languages) and we really like the massage and facial. Very relaxing. After, they gave us tea and we sat around in the nice room and did our emails.It's difficult to remember all the massages I've had in Bangkok, but this place ranks right up there with the best of the best, even including the places charging five times more. I highly recommend it.
Great face & body massage. My husband and I had a wonderfull treatment both here. The staff is very professionel and friendly. Service is great. Definately want tot come back!

The Great Escape!. The lovely and peaceful courtyard makes it hard to believe you're in the middle of Bangkok. Inside, it's cool and very tastefully decorated, and you are warmly greeted by the owner, who explained the treatments and provided the basics on how to communicate with the masseuse. I chose the 90-minute "Signature" face and body massage -- which was incredible. The masseuse got deep into the muscles (which proved very therapeutic after my squash game that morning), but she was never painful. Her technique, which apparently incorporates Korean massage principles, translated into pure bliss on my legs, arms and hands. Overall, this spa seems very well managed, the experience is incredibly soothing and relaxing and for what they charge, very good value indeed. An hour and half will zip by, and then you will gently return to earth.

Bliss...... If you are looking for a great massage or facial in a city that has hundreds (if not thousands) of spas, I definitely recommend you try Su Esthetic for its warm, homey feel and excellent service.This charming little spa makes you feel at ease from the moment you step into the garden courtyard. The signature facial and massage was exceptional with the masseuse using just the right amount of pressure and some interesting gymnastic techniques to work the knots out of my back. Also loved the warm herbal pack to keep your core warm while the rest of you is chilling. And to top it all off, this package includes a collagen facial. My skin is glowing and I feel fantastic. Definitely coming back soon....

Pure relaxation. Wow this place is amazing. My partner and I were recommended this Spa and the experience was the best. The host was so helpful and the girls here know what they are doing. We felt like new people after our experience here. Can be a little hard to find but no need to worry... just call when in taxi and they will give driver directions.We look forward to our next visit here.
Awesome. Great place, amazing service and nice boss !!Super recommend!!!The place is quiet and super nice and comfortable bed!!!
So nice!. We really enjoyed visiting this spa. My husband said this is the best spa ever he had. I really think so.Staffs are all nice, I really like them.

BEST SPA IN THE WORLD. Words cannot even begin to describe how incredible this spa is in every way.My husband and I travel the world and we have never had an experience like this one.We go every year when we go to Bangkok.As soon as we arrive, we go immediately go to this spa and spend hours doing treatments.We do it all!I even do eye lashes and it is amazing how it looks!The prices are fair and the staff s perfection....search no more!!!!

i'm telling all my spa co workers about this place. i just love it, its a small house between a whole lot of fancy condos at the end of a block. easy to walk to from the bts stop, super clean, everyone speaks a decent amount of English and i can tell that everyone didn't just finish their hours at the massage school but really had experience and attentive. not that many treatment rooms so no the only thing i would change is that the "V" steam was not in a communal room. and defiantly the best deal for the cost.

extraordinary. Located in a peaceful residential area in a home. The owner was very warm and welcoming . took her time to explain all therapies and customize my package very economically. They also conveniently shifted my appointment . the massage was vrrty comforting and sonwas the facial. I went immidiately after I landed which means a journey of about 10 hours and after the session I was just fresh and new. The masseuse has some different set of skills than usual bangkok street stuff.
The best way to relax. Every time when I want to escape from busy city life and relax I think about this place. Professional stuff, great atmosphere and specific decor makes every visit remarkable.

Thomas & Brenda. Everytime when we come to Bangkok, visiting this spa is always a priority. It is clean with very friendly and professional staffs. The 1.5 or 2.5 hours packages are the best way to get a complete treatment.

Finally found the spa I was looking for !. Friendly and upscale, without being overpriced and pretentious. We had a room with two beds for couples which my wife really enjoyed. I heard about Su Esthetic Spa on my last day in Bangkok. I wish I had found it sooner.  Excellent massage. Very relaxing.  Great experience.  Will be coming back on my next trip to Bangkok.
Excellent massage and facial. I have become an affionado of their 90mn massage and facial, a great way to start the weekend in a lovely environment.

An oasis!. I was out walking on a hot day and thought that the road I took would take me through to the next Soi, it did not but it did take me past the location of the Su Esthetic Home Spa. On the way back I decided to visit the spa, it looked very appealing and nice on the outside. Inside was just as nice, large open homely space with very attentive staff, including the owner.I chose a treatment, I am not sure of the name now but it was for a 90 minute oil massage with a Korean influence. It was one of the very best oil massage that I have ever experienced, quite the work out yet relaxing at the same time.

A relaxing afternoon. Staff are friendly and with professional massage skill. Environment is hygienic and comfortable. l am so relaxed after the two and a half hours facial and body oil massage. This package is value for money and worthy to try especially for ladies. Last but not the least , the Korean Steam is interesting.

Excellent massages and facials. I come here every time I visit Bangkok and never leave disappointed. Quiet, clean and above all super relaxing. It's a place to shut off your mind and let your body soak up glorious massages and facials. I will definitely return here and highly recommend. Super cool facility and friendly staff. Best to book in advance as it gets busy some days.

Always perfect, always relaxing. I love this place. Its small and friendly, the prices are great and the treatments leave me thinking I've gone to heaven and back again. Another good thing is that the staff don't change, so I can get the same masseuse every time I visit, and the manager remembers me, so it's like meeting old friends again. I recommend the Signature massage/facial combo. Great! Until next time...

An Oasis in Bangkok. Su Esthetic is a luxurious spa experience. A serene setting. Dark wood floors, beautiful decor. Very clean. Completely relaxing, refreshing, energizing. I had the Signature massage, 90 minutes, with facial. Unlike other places that separate the massage and facial these two treatments were integrated, and it is a real treat. The lotions and oils were wonderful.  I highly recommend this affordable luxury. Close enough to BTS at Phrom Phong for an easy walk. But far enough from the craziness of Sukhumvit that while in the spa I could hear the sounds of the birds outside instead of the noise of traffic.
Great Massage. What a gem of a place. A great treatment / massage at a fair price.Friendly staff and well trained masseuses in a quite well designed environment.Can not wait to go again.tim
Almost prefect. The treatment was great. The facial part was amazing. There is just a little room of improvement for the body massage part. However, it was refreshing and relaxing overall.

Was good. my masseuse used different strokes during the massage which I thought it was cool, It felt ok ,but not very relaxing, I chose the package on special for discounted rate of 900 BHTthe place is one step up from the street massages available in BKK.staff English is just OK .I stayed at the Double tree Hilton, and was able to walk to the place 5 mnts.or 7 minutes from Phon Tom BTS station.I may give it another shot to decide if it is really good or not.C U around

as good as ever. kudos to the owner for helping to accomodate my group of 7 and even having to call back one of the massue on off so that they can accomodate my big group. practically my group booked the whole spa for that afternoon. owner was patient and esp friendly towards my group and explaning the procedure of the spa in details and also ensuring that the 2 n a half hr session is really 2 n a half hr.highly recommended.

Enjoyable experience . My daughter & I visited Su Esthetic Spa after reading reviews on TA. The place is a bit out of the way but they gave clear instructions to my taxi driver and he was able to get us there easily. The place has a perfect spa ambience. It is extremely clean. The therapists are well trained and know their job. The massage was perfect. My daughter went for 2&half hours of Korean Spa and loved it. I did a one and half hour face & body treatment with intensive eye treatment. Everything was fine. My only complaint is that the massage felt a bit short. Though the treatment lasted full one and half hours, the actual massage part was much less than what I had in other places. There were times when the masks were drying, which could have been used for massage. Having said that, it was a minor quibble & the entire experience was quite enjoyable for us.

Amazing atmosphere and service at a great price. The location is a little out of the way in a private estate deep inside the heart of Sukhumvit, but the journey there will be worth it. Upon entering the spa, the scent of lemongrass immediately calms nerves frayed from travel. The friendly owner will introduce to you the packages available over spiced tea. English, Mandarin, Cantonese or Thai, her multilingual abilities should make sure nothing is lost in translation. The decor and warm lighting exudes zen befitting of a renowned spa house.The spa/massage itself was amazing, the quality of treatment you receive worth every dollar spent. Professional masseurs will tend to your every need for a comfortable experience. If the roadside parlours aren't your kind of thing, you'd be glad spending the extra buck for amazing quality and value here. Comfortable for visits alone, with your spouse or even friends, to pamper yourself on holiday.
Two and a half hours of heaven. Best spa treatments - message you can ever have. A professional staff with a very big smile and welcome with a reasonable price. Will absolutely come back again.

Seems like a rush job. My bestie and I booked for 2 hours treatment, 1 hour massage with 1 hour facial package. Our treatment ended 20 minutes earlier. Didn't feel like a relaxing massage cause it was rushed throughout. We booked our treatment 1 day in advance after reading reviews on tripadvisor. Disapppointed, wished they treated us fairly.

Excellent spa experience-. Let me preface- I've been to a LOT of little massage joints around Bangkok where the ladies sit around and chit chat with one another- and even talk to one another while massaging you... (I realize this type of massage is normal at a certain price point- and if you go up over $50, it rarely happens... but when I'm here, I'm in the business of daily massages- so I'm looking more for the less-than-thirty prices...) Su Esthetic was away from the busy streets (while slightly off the beaten path- they are happy to speak with your cab driver and explain where they are located- or there are good walking instructions on their website)- It was clean- quiet, and adorable. I had a facial and massage, and my friend had a body scrub and facial... They were WONDERFUL, quiet, perfectly gentle and so so relaxing. She asked before beginning how strong I wanted my massage- I also expressed some concern about skin sensitivities- She really listened and both were perfect. The staff were very professional- courteous and quiet- And as it started raining, they scrambled around to try and get us a taxi- even going as far as rushing out to the main street to flag one down... (Although it didn't work out, we TRULY appreciated the effort... ) The place is already affordable, but the promo prices are an extra sweet deal. I will absolutely be back-

Full body bliss. My husband and I visited Su Esthetic as first time guests and we loved our massages. I have had massages before, but this one was my favorite by far and my husband's first full body massage. Upon arrival we were greeted by a front staff member who invited us to remove our shoes (to keep the interior clean), enjoy a cup of tea, and wait on the couches in the lobby area. The establishment itself is very quiet and peaceful. It was not hard to find but we had our phones with a map application. It was approximately a 15 minute walk from the closest MTR, but the walk was through a quiet neighborhood. Regardless of the method of arrival, THIS PLACE IS WORTH THE TREK! The interior of the spa is clean--from the waiting area, to the bathroom, and the massage rooms. Everything is immaculate and quiet, thus creating a calming environment perfect for relaxation.We booked a 1 hour couple's massage. Our masseuses were punctual, professional, and very polite. They routinely asked if the pressure level was acceptable and adjusted their firmness as was appropriate. We both enjoyed how balanced and detailed the massage was in that they paid proper attention to individual parts of our bodies, working their way from head to toe methodically and evenly. This massage was a blend of Thai and Korean influences, as they advertise on their website. Be prepared to be bent in (comfortable) ways you have not thought of, but the end result is worth it! At the end of the massage we both felt mellow, relaxed, and I personally wished we booked more time simply because it FELT. SO. GOOD. We paid 1500 baht total with tip included (those ladies were great and earned it!) for both of us for a full hour, which was approximately $46 USD. It was such a good deal, especially when some of the other places we considered were over 2000 baht per person. We highly recommend Su Esthetic and would return here if we ever visit Bangkok again!

This is it!!!. After many average and some poor massages in BKK,I finally found this place after reviewing trip advisor.I am please to say that this is up there with the best full body massage I have had and believe me I have had hundreds!My wife also enjoyed hers and facial treatment and she is not a big fan due to past experiences but is now converted.My advice is simple,walk past every other massage and spa in the area and go to this place 10/10

Best relaxation ever. Quite hidden place (take a tuktuk!), but the way was worth it. The service were overwhelmingly friendly, interior was finest, we had a tip to toe pampering for 2,5 h with massage, masks, Jacuzzi ... for special price of 1800 baht pp. We'll definetely return.

Absolutely awesome. Been here for the first time because of recommendation from trip advisor and it is indeed good! Will add on to the praises! Friendly boss and staff that makes you feel at home. Coming to Thailand as a getawat is certainly not enough if you haven't visited Su Esthetic!

Wonderful spa with friendly staff and boss. Went there in dec 13. It was one of the better spa in bangkok. Charges were reasonable for the treatment rendered. Treatment was carried out as advertised. Even provide free samples for take away. The only problem was the not so easy to find location. Need to take a taxi there. Not close to any BTS. So if you visit too late, might run into the problem of finding transport back. Overall still highly recommended to visit for a relaxing time

No wonder Su's received such great reviews.. We went to the spa on a Sunday evening and it was the best 90 minutes and 900 Baht I've spent so far in BKK.I went with my husband and took the signature body & facial massage and it was really professionally done - right from the fact that they were punctual to how good they were at their job.They say so on their website and it is in fact a little tricky to find them. We walked it from Phrong Phong and I would suggest that to everyone else to. One finds any massage parlors on the way but the 15 minute walk is worth it. I would suggest booking an appointment on their website prior to the visit. Must visit people. I had an excellent time!

Relaxing as ever. This was the third time I visited Su Esthetic in four years and clearly the business has grown but surprising it maintains the same excellent services and hospitality just like I first visited four years ago. The therapist, though without much English, was very professional and pleasant. In fact I found the lack of fluent English much better than having someone trying to chat or wanting to sell me something during the massage!The owner is extremely friendly and helpful, just like when I met her years ago at the spa, and I admire her for her patience and the way she handles customers from different countries.I will recommend this spa to anyone who wants good services and a relaxing time in busy Bangkok.

Wonderful home spa in Bangkok. While in Bangkok on holiday, we came to this cozy home spa recommended by some friends from Hong Kong. It is located in a 2-storey garden house tugged away in a tranquil neighborhood not far from Thong Lor BTS station. The staff were very friendly. The shop owner Monique speaks several languages including English, Cantonese and Thai, and made us feel at home. I tried a signature massage package which was extremely good value for money. The therapists were professional and attentive. It is definitely a wonderful experience I would recommend to my friends going there on holiday. I will visit again when I am in Bangkok next time.

The shop owner is awesomely friendly and extremely helpful!. It's a must go place considering there are so many spa service in Bangkok! The masseuse are very skillful and pro, the place is quiet and clean, staff are courteous including the shop owner Monique (I think that's what she called!), I would recommend someone who really wanna try something good and worthwhile!

A nice place to unwind after a long day. My friend and I know this hidden gem from word of mouth. The little cosy home spa is on Soi 26. From BTS Phrom Phong station, the walking distance is around 10 minutes. It is a two-storey house with treatment rooms upstairs. Their staff and therapists are warm and friendly. When making our appointment, we were happy to know that their signature treatments are now on promotion. We booked a session of face and body massage (90 minutes) under the special promotion price of 900 baht (regular price is 1800 baht). The face and body massage is really a complete top-to-toe pampering including a korean aroma oil massage, facial massage, bust lifting, special tummy massage with herbal hot pack to soothe the tummy and improve blood circulation. I must say that the therapist is very skillful and well-experienced. I enjoy korean massage with relatively strong and fast massage techniques to ease the tension of my tired muscles. It is the first time I tried bust and tummy massage and they are wonderful ! I will surely return next time.

Will visit again, definitely.. Both myself and my boyfriend have visited Su Esthetic around end of June 2014. Their signature massage package is superb, the price is reasonable and the masseur are really professional and attentive to your request. Would definitely come back again the next time we come to Bangkok real soon.

Amazing Experince. I've gotten massages many times before, but this was my first real "spa" experience. I purchased the 2.5 hour special. First off, compared to the other prices in BKK I feel like it's a really great deal. The entire staff was extremely professional and my masseuse in particular was very talented and did a great job. The Korean steam treatment was really great and is a great way to start off the treatment. I will definitely go back!

Great Spa!. We, a young couple, looked for a spa to relax and were absolutly satisfied. We had a great, relaxing time there and our skin - especially the face - feels so much better now. We definitly recommend it!If you use the tripadvisor app, beware that the spa is now pinned on the map at the wrong place. We corrected it, but it might take some time to update. Just have a look at their website or Google Maps. Anyway, it was easy to find and just a short walk from the BTS.---Und auch ganz kurz auf deutsch: Absolut empfehlenswert! Eines der Highlights unseres Bangkok Besuchs.

A Korean Touch!!!. .. I simply love Sukhumvit neighborhood!!! since there are endless hidden & exciting places you can discover. Today I found Su Esthetic Home Spa in Soi 26 (BTS Phrom Phong, around ten minutes walk from the station). You will see this lovely old house with shocking pink fence!! Today I tried their aroma body massage (with their lovely & very light scented lavender massage oil) which lasted for 90 minutes (900 baht). My therapist (khun Pa) is super strong and has such confidence (now I know the meaning of "a Korean Touch"!!!). If you're looking for a watered down & pampering kind of treatments, this spa may not suit you. However, if you enjoy a stronger & faster massage with Korean, Thai and Chinese techniques combined together, then you'd REALLY love the massage here. The staff here are polite, lovely and sweet too!!!

Great value for money. Tried the 2.5 hr Traditional Korean Spa. Very good value for money. The masseuse was quite professionally skilled. The deco of this place is quite simple but cozy. It's not as grand as some of the chain spas, but I was pleased with what I got.However, I found it a bit odd to see reminders/recommendations of amount of tips on the website and in the massage rooms.
A must visit for spa lovers. Second time visiting them and always a pleasure visiting them! Just had a 2 1/2 korean spa and my wife and me gona come by again this Thursday!
Amazing!. We had a wonderful massage here, super professional and really effective, the place is also very pleasant and stuff really nice and understanding.Must go & back!

A Must to try. I visited Su Esthetic Home Spa with my visitor from London. What a great way to start the day for the two of us. I had the full body massage while my guest went for the combine facial & body massage.My masseuse was spot on with the amount of pressure I asked for. My friend was very impress with her facial due to the fact that the establishment use organic products as she's a great fan of anything organics. Both of us felt it was very good value for money for the services we were giving compare to London.We had the most relaxing 1 & 1/2 hour experience. I will definitely go back there again with or without visitors. This time I'll try their other services. Highly recommended!!!

Everyone who visits Bangkok MUST try this one-of-a-kind spa!. Wow, what an experience we had here! I visited Su Esthetic Home Spa with my parents for a 1 &1/2 hour massage & facial. Upon entering the spa, we were greeted by the ever so sweet spa owner, Monique, and were asked to remove our shoes (slippers & hot tea were provided). We were then escorted upstairs into a beautifully decorated and clean room separated by curtains for a little more privacy. We slipped into a wrap towel and laid face up on the massage table. We are massage enthusiasts and never have we experienced a massage & facial simultaneously. The massage was deep, relaxing, and at times awkward (bust lifting & firming). My built up tension (knots) melted away with the rather interesting yet effective Korean techniques. The facial was equally fabulous as they applied a series of soothing masks & even an ultrasonic cleansing machine that sucked all the impurities & blackheads out of my clogged up skin. Once our services were complete, I went into a room downstairs to apply my makeup and fix my hair. The room was set up with a large mirror, table, bed (if one would like to take a nap) and supplies (cotton balls, qtips, hairspray, etc). Overall, the most wonderful experience one could have at a spa at very affordable prices. Highly recommended!Note: It was a bit tricky finding the location. We took the BTS train to the Phrom Phong station. We wasted 15 minutes trying to find a cab driver that understood english or was able to read our printed map of the location. We ended up walking into a bank to exchange money (the spa only accepts cash) and we asked one of the bank tellers to write in Thai the address of the spa. It was then that we were able to find a cab driver to take us to the spa. I recommend doing the same as well as including the phone number of the spa so the driver can call and ask for directions.

Very relaxing experience. I didn't have an appointment but they made some time for me. I took the package and it was a truly relaxing experience. The rooms were quiet and the decor very pleasant. The masseuse was friendly and always smiling. I finished off with a bath in the jacuzzi. I would definitely go back. It's a little difficult to find - but look for the small signs put up or follow the instructions on the website! My cab driver didn't know where it was.

Amazing experience. I visited Su Esthetic after reading Tripadvisor, and the experience was totally fabulous. All of us enjoyed ourselves lots. The location wasn't too hard to find when we follow the instruction on the website. Is a Must Visit for my future Bangkok trip!

Very nice!. I am a guy with little interest in anything about spa, but my friends strongly recommend me to go to Su Esthetic for a visit if. I go Bangkok, and they said I will not regret for it. I did pay a visit last time in Bangkok. I find a new experience on enjoying a spa, as well as wonderful hospitality from each of the staff. The boss, more over, can speak fluent English, Mandarin, Cantonese, and most importantly, Thai, which means you can communicate very well for what you want with the massage technician who mainly only knows Thai, no matter which language you are using. It is really a great place to go. Trust me.

Great Spa. We tried out Su Esthetic as most of the other spa in Bangkok were very pricey and/or did not have any packaged treatments that includes a good soak in a large tub.Booking was done online through email and Monique who handled the reservations was rather prompt in replying as well as professional.The Korean massage package was a full 2.5 hours of pure bliss. The staff were well trained and throughout the massage they barely stopped for breaks unlike other places where the masseuse sort of leave you waiting in between different treatments which in turn shortened the treatment time.Definitely will be back for more the next time I'm in Bangkok!Note: If you're considering this spa, remember to print the map on their website or save their phone number as the place is a little tricky to get to. Our taxi driver actually had to keep referring to the map and even then missed the turning. He finally resorted to asking those local motorcyclist guys who were chilling about by the road side in that area.

Amazing and Affordable. Our full body massage and facial here were absolutely brilliant. The quality of the therapist was amazing...highly trained It's a very professional business. The interior was spotlessly clean and the atmosphere very nice. The session lasted the full amount of time (which isn't always the case) and the prices are a very good value.  I have a problem with the sent of some oils and they were able to accommodate with something just right.  A great spa - we'll be back!!!

Refreshing!. After reading many positive reviews, We have decided to try out the massage at Su Esthetic and yes! It was great, I had their signature face and body massage, while my friend had the aroma oil body massage, we both had enjoyed our massage; my face also felt so smooth after the facial.It's so relaxing and refreshing, before we left the place, we have made an appointment for the next day!

Excellent. -the place is not so difficult to find-" lobby" is beautiful and the owner + staff will make you very comfortable once you arrive -I did the signature facial and massage and was VERY impressed : one of the best facial I ever : my skin was so smooth right after the treatment / the massage was excellent and very different from anything I have ever experienced -the spa is in what seems a private house : very nice neighborhood / staff are very polite and seems highly skilled . ( One small detail that could have made it perfect : my masseuse was chewing a gum throughout but thats not a big issue ) -I will recommend this spa and will visit again on my next Bangkok trip

Best Spa experience in Bangkok.... I've been living in Bangkok for around one year and have tried many of the basic foot massage shops and also some of the high end Spas. Monique and the team at Su Esthetic provide the best value for money spa experience in Bangkok. The Spa is set in a quiet back street location but the Spa is relaxing and friendly. The massages are as strong as you want it but a great experience and definitely gets rid of stresses and strains! If you are in Bangkok for a break or even living here and want to try something really unique for a really reasonable price, give it a go.

Professionally run, effective massage. I had a long layover in Bangkok and decided to go for a body massage/spa for 2.5 hours. After researching different spa services offered in Bangkok, I decided to try out Su Esthetic Home Spa because their services offered are unique and different. I made an online booking to obtain a promotional rate.I corresponded with Monique via email who help me select the appropriate treatment. Her responses were prompt and addressed my questions. I selected the Traditional Korean Spa which includes aroma spa bath, full body scrub, and their face and body massage. Upon arriving at the Spa sweaty, I was offered a chilled drink and Monique explained the different type of oil. I was led to a pleasant, clean private room which has the spa tub and two massage beds. The aroma spa was pleasant, refreshing, and relaxing. After the spa, my masseur explained the various procedures that she is going to performed. My masseur started with my face cleaning before doing the massages. Her massages were firm and strong which helps me to loosen up the tight muscles around my shoulders and lower back. The whole process was not rushed, even though I had a plane to catch, and made me feeling very comfortable and relax on my next long-haul flight. When I arrived at my final destination after travelling about ~ 30 hours flight time due to a strike at Frankfurt airport, the body still feels fine!!!Thank you for your treatments, prompt responses and suggestions, and running a professional place which I truly appreciate.

Skillful massage, Value for Money. Went back to Su Esthetic again. Despite the local being slightly inconvenient for foreigners, the websites actually provide very detailed directions and finding the place isn't hard at all.Plus :+detailed and well designed website (and mobile site)+ambience was great, the place felt relaxing+given a choice to try and select of essential oil is a plus+the promotional package is definitely value for money+body scrub was done in great details, felt so smooth! +massage was done skilfully+kept to the time punctually+competitive rates for treatments.Su Esthetic will still remain my top choice whenever I visit Bangkok.

New favourite spa. We were there yesterday and we had a wonderful massage. We took the combination massage and facial treatment, which is one of their signature treatment. Nice atmosphere, the manager was very friendly and also they have a good range of products from Korea on sale, worth checking it out.

Great Choice. My wife and I tried numerous spas in Bangkok and Su Esthetic quickly became our favorite. We found it a great choice for spa treatments and massage at very reasonable prices.It’s clear the massage therapists here are well trained and experienced. They have great technique and were also quick to pick up on spots that needed extra attention. My wife has very high standards when it comes to spa treatments and she was very satisfied as well.Overall there is a very relaxed atmosphere here, very clean, and great service, we’ll defiantly be back on our next visit. It is a bit tricky to locate this place for the first time so do not rely on a taxi driver to know the address. Have the location on any kind of map and it’s no problem to find.

Worthwhile Experience~More than Expected. Unlike the ordinary spa place, "Su Esthetic" makes me feel calm, rejuvenated & reliable with it's classy environment and pleasant hospitality. The price is more than reasonable. I have a very bad experience last time in Bangkok airport and do not like any massage again. However, I can never wait for visiting "Su" again and to be refreshed with new expectations of different kinds of massages⋯I can say everybody worth trying at least once⋯

The highlight of my Bangkok trip. I came across this spa by chance. Apart from being great value for money, it was highly professional and incredibly relaxing. I opted for the Korean Spa treatment -- two and a half hours of sheer bliss. I'd certainly recommend it. There must be thousands of spas in Bangkok -- I've never been to a better one, and, as far as I know, this is the only Korean style spa in the city.

where to get pampered in BBK. Where to get pampered properly in bkk:Suesthetic is an amazing spa located in the heart of bkk (sukhumvit soi 26).It is the ideal place to relax and get pampered properly.Suesthetic offers an incredible skin care menu such as facial, scrubbing, collagen, whitening mask and so on.They are using very high range skin care products from Korea and have very skillful employees.I recommend the signature face and body massage of 1 HOUR 30 MINUTES for only 900 bats!it is A complete top-to-toe pampering combining a Korean aroma oil body massage and a facial treatment.Suesthetic is properly equipped: steam machine to open your pores and all the facial tools to get a proper lift up. The must of the must is their professional masseuses that take care of you while waiting for the collagen mask to get fully absorbed by your skin.Very good value for your money.Suesthetic is not only a spa it is also a very professional massage parlor, I usually go for the signature facial and my husband just for the professional massages.I love: its quiet location, its very relaxing ambiance and decoration, the real professional masseuses, the good price for the value.Most of others spas that I have tried on Sukhumvit soi 24 and Thonglor are very expensive and they don’t even provide the massage and don’t use the professional facial equipment’s.The owner, a lovely lady from Hong Kong, speaks English, Cantonese, Thai and Japanese!She will always try to accommodate you the way you want.Suesthetic is a must do.

Best Spa in Bangkok for reasonable price. My favourite Spa in Bangkok. I live as an Expat in Bangkok and I m a regular customer at Su Esthetic. I brought lots of friends there and everyone loved it. You can find lots of massage places in Bangkok but not one is like this. All staff are well trained and excellent. They really know what they are doing. After 1.5 hours you feel refreshed and totally relaxed. Cozy and welcoming place, I can really recommend Su Esthetic.

Hidden Treasure. Great FindThe price is really reasonable and the spa has been around for a long time. You could tell that they took pride in offering great service at a good price. The spa itself is nice, clean, small and the staff are polite, if a bit shy. This was my first experience at a Korean spa and I was blown away by the whole experience. They pampered me from the moment I arrived to the end of the treatments. It’s worth remembering that they don't just do just a massage, but a massage and full facial combined. It gives you a complete experience.Facial- A+Massage A+

Average. By Bangkok standards this was quite an average experience although price was reasonable. It's probably worth paying a bit more for a lot more luxury at Oasis Spa or Divana Spa, or pay much less and go to one of the standard foot massage shops all around.

A must visit. One of the best places if not the best, as I have yet to explore, places to have a spa experience. their signature facial with Aroma therapy was really brilliant. It was so relaxing and soothing that that for some time even after the treatment you remain in the state of bliss. Finding the place can be a challenge, notwithstanding the map they provide, so for the benefit of my traveller friends, I have given the suggestion to the very nice lady who owns the place, the general direction from Sky train station Phrom Phong station which is nearest to it. Walt toward soi 26 if you coming from direction of Siam you walk in the direction train went. turn right in soi 26 sukhumvit walk for 10-15 min depending on your pace. Keep a watch for small lane going to the right turn into that another 100-150 mtr. is where it is located. Take prior appointment recommended.

Good quality massage.. We booked our pampering session of their Signature Face & Body Massage (1.30 hours) after reading reviews on Tripadvasor.co.uk. They had a special promotion on their webpage and we decided to take this offer. I am massage therapist by myself and I have very high expectations from treatments. I was very happy with outcome. Mine and my husband masseurs both were very professional and very skilful. Some of the massage techniques were really great and my skin after facial was so smooth and tender that I wanted touch it time after time. There is only one regret that we found this place on the day when we should leave Bangkok. We will recommend this place to anyone!

Just wonderful. Tip to get there: write down the phone number and the address of the spa, and give it to your taxi driver. Ours just called and got directions from the spa, and drove there directly with no problems.About the experience: just wonderful. Me and my boyfriend had the 1,5 hour signature face and body massage, and it was amazing. Value for money too, the price was just 900 baht. They were very professional, and definitely knew what they were doing. The cups of tea before and after the treatment were also a nice gesture, and they helped us get a taxi afterwards. High recommended.

A great expereince for a great price. These therapists will really work you over! You certainly get your money's worth with a visit from the spa. A great time in a great environment. Extremely tricky to find though: when heading towards The Four Wings after turning off of Sukhumvit, the street the spa is on is BEFORE you hit the hotel on the left. Look for the tiny sign high up on a power pole.

Satisfied!. Of all the spas my partner and I have been to, Su esthetic provided us the best massage. Our masseuses spoke a wee bit of english, thus I did not face any difficulties understanding her instructions. The receptionist is fluent in english and was kind enough to call us a taxi after our massage, and relay to the drivers our destination, despite it was nearing their closing time and most of the cabs were uninterested in picking us, so it did took quite a bit of effort from them to get us a cab. I do agree that the location is hard to get to. While there was a map provided, the map is not drawn to scale and we underestimated the distance of the spa from phrom phong station. Thus, we did face a little difficulty going there. Do note that the walk from Sukhumvit Road to Soprano House (along Soi 26) is about 10-15 minutes walk. Thereafter, there are clear signage directing to the spa. The whole atmosphere at the spa is truly tranquil and comforting. As mentioned above, the massage provided left my partner and myself very satisfied. All in all, I do recommend everyone to try Su esthetics.

Dissapointed. Went for special treat and quite disappointed as not very special inside and price not cheap compared to many places outside same area.Massage was good but did not make me feel special experience.

Treat Yourself (or a Friend)!. Living in Bangkok, we go to Su Esthetic every month or so. It is absolutely wonderful. The staff are all excellent, the massages are among the best we've had anywhere, the facials leave us feeling years younger and our skin looking wonderful. The house is lovely and the whole atmosphere is one of calm and peace. As others have said, it's an easy walk from the BTS station and they are only too happy to provide good directions.

Amazing spa. Best massage so far. It's about 15 mins walk from the BTS station and it can be a tad difficult to find. I found it with the help of google map. The place is a home spa and is relatively small. The owner will welcome you and ask if you have any areas you would like more focus on and instruct the therapists. The therapists were fantastic and they do ask you in the pressure is fine or not. They do not know much English but they are definitely very skillful and professional. I was so relax throughout the whole spa experience. I would definitely come back again.

Very good and refreshing!. It's about 15 mins walk from the BTS station and it can be a tad difficult to find. However once you locate this place you will not be disappointed. It's a home spa and is relatively small. The owner will welcome you and will take a note of the focus areas and instruct the therapists. The therapists do a good job and they do ask you in the pressure is fine or not and that much of communication they understand. They are very professional and the massage was very refreshing. The 90 mins massage and facial package included a facial and it was a pretty decent one. The best part of the whole treatment was no time is wasted in the 90mins.
