Something or the other is constantly happening during the 90mins (either your face or body). I infact slept off at one time as I was so relaxed! I am definitely going back next time I visit!May be the owner should consider putting a banner or something to make the location easily accessible or try putting it on google map. I did not quite find it on google map and hence was a bit lost. So that's definitely an area they should look into / invest.

Fantastic!. We were visiting at friends in Bangkok and thought a little pampering would be nice too. Our friends recommend Su Esthetic. We were lucky and got appointments next day. I've always wanted to try a Gold Mask facial, but the high cost in Hong Kong always put me off. I was happy to see the high-end Japanese Kinka gold mask treatments here (available at Harvey Nichols HK) were about one-quarter of the price they are back home - so I went for it. Fantastic! I really had a great massage and faciaI, do not remember massage therapist name i think Pat.

Do not agree. Do not agree with the high rating of this spa. Firstly very difficult to find and nowhere near downtown so not convenient location for tourist customers. Secondly very bad communication skills. Thirdly massage weak and not following any real pattern, just moving around the body in random sometimes fast and sometimes slow, so strange.

Refreshed and Revitalized. My wife and I visited Su Esthetic on the recommendation of a friend. Upon arriving we discovered that the spa was located in a house which made for a tranquil and non commercial feeling. The treatments offered catered to both women and men. The clients that i saw waiting were all expats. As a newcomer to the spa experience, I can say that I am now hooked and since coming back to Canada, I have not experienced anything similar here despite my wife bringing me to some high end spas. I can't wait for our next trip to Thailand as this spa will be one of our destinations. Guys, do your yourself a favour and make this one of those destinations for your significant other. You will definitely be in their good books for doing it !

A relaxing afternoon. This is my second visit to Su Esthetic and I always leave feeling amazing, calm and rejuvenated. The location is in a wonderful part of Bangkok and could be difficult for non-Bangkokians to find - so remember your map or phone and get directions for the taxi! The spa itself is spotlessly clean, well maintained and has a relaxing atmosphere. I have had their Signature Massage & Facial every time and would recommend this if your are only having one treatment. One hint for readers is that if you should book on a weekday afternoon - mornings are much busier. We went on a Wednesday after lunch and at times it felt empty! Lovely. Another mention is that ALL of the staff from receptionists to therapists and housekeeping are super professional and helpful. Overall I really enjoy this spa and find it good value for money.

Island of Tranquility. Su Esthetic is a perfect escape from the hustle and bustle of Bangkok. Its location in a quiet but accessible neighborhood combined with its pleasant staff and restful treatments is ideal therapy for both the mind and body. The range of treatments they offer should provide relief for just about anyone. As a client for several years I can attest that the staff is both genuinely gracious and experienced. They are always ready to accommodate any requests and have always remembered the type of massage I prefer. I highly recommend paying them a visit!

Must visit in Bangkok. We visit Su Esthetic every time we are in Bangkok, even just a short stay. The staff are professional and pleasant. The deco is beautiful and most important of all, tasteful and classy. I like the package that includes everything from facial to massage. They don't waste your time that after they put the mask on your face, they start to massage your feet etc. They are always doing something to your body and you don't just lie on the massage bed waiting idly! Every minute at the spa is a joy.I can't wait for my next visit to Bangkok!

Amazing Experience!. I’ve visited a couple of times in August for both facials and massages and truly enjoyed my experience. They have very friendly staff. The spa treatments were fantastic. My masseuse was very professional. She put the right amount of pressure where it was needed - my muscles felt perfectly relaxed after the massage. It was one of the best I’ve ever had!Highly recommended. I’ll definitely be back next time I'm in Bangkok!

spa place for a full day !!. I arrived Su Esthetic after business meetings, started full body treatment one-after-another, all day long. The environment of Su is so simple, clean, quiet, comfortable that really gave me a home-staying feeling. I recommended to everyone I know, and all feedback are excellent !!

A place to get yourself pampered!. Great place for massages and facials! The Spa is cozy, clean and decorated with character! Staff is professional and welcoming. Owner speaks fluent Cantonese, English and Japanese (great for those who don’t speak Thai). Highly recommended!

Quick beauty and relaxation kick. What I like the most at Su Esthetic is that in only 90 min I get a full facial as well as a full body oil massage. The staff is friendly and the quality of service is excellent each time we are there. A relaxing beauty experience for the whole family. Try it out!

Best Spa in Bangkok. Wonderful friendly well managed Spa with the best facial and massage I have had in many years. Good value and great location for a quite peaceful treatment . Came out feeling like a new person.tim

Very cool spa for massage and facial. I had a 1.5 hour oil massage and facial last week and recommend this place for its great technique, cool atmosphere and good value. It attracts mostly French, Japanese, Korean and Australian expats living in Bangkok, but they do take visitors. It's small and friendly and in an old house filled with antiques just off Sukhumvit Soi 26 near the Emporium. It's a bit out of the way, but you can phone the owner who will give directions to you or a taxi. It's special and worth the trip for amazing Korean style massage and facial for just 900 baht.

A wonderful experience.. As an engineer, I usually avoid this kind of engagements. Seeing is believing for me and have I seen some amazing results on my friend. Then I met one of the most kind and gentle lady. Her wisdom and therapy made some unexpected positive changes to my life. Thank you Mustsumi.

Mutsumi's healing energy. It was great!! Just great!!:) I felt like a feather after the session. A lot of sharing moments; gentle, kind, relieving & inspiring at the same time! i would totally recommend it!:)) ❤️❤️❤️🙏🔆🔆🔆🍀 @mutsumiadachi

A centered healing experience.. I've engaged with many, many practitioners in various healing modalities. I found Mutsumi to be knowledgeable, balanced, and caring. In all my interactions with her, she was always present to the emerging moment, which is more than I can say for 99% of the practitioners out there. It is clear she has walked the path. And the healing session left me centered and energized. Whatever the issue you are facing ... go and get a session and afterwards you will leave with a felt sense of what it's like to live in possibility.

Great Experience Overall. After seeking some inner healing I came across the Omroom in Bangkok. Reading over their detailed website I made a booking for Tarot and a Healing. Building location was easy to find and staff were incredibly friendly and welcoming. While I was waiting I noticed a list of charity work that was being done by the team at Omroom which I was impressed by. Healing and Tarot were great, I left feeling recharged and clear minded. Highly recommend for those starting a journey and those who just need some time out and inner peace. Thank you.

Fantastic!. Research had led me to the conclusion that upsetting childhood incidents replay themselves continually in our adult lives, this until such time we heal them. Looking at my own life, I could clearly see a pattern of behavior in my adult relationships that stemmed back to my childhood. I telephoned Omroom for advice, and I was initially impressed by the genuine sincerity I experienced. The suggested healing modality for me was Memory Therapy with Mutsumi. My session was Mutsumi was amazing. Without telling her any information, she was able to pinpoint and heal events in my past that were indeed still replaying themselves today in my adult life. Her overall conclusion of my past was unbelievable because it was so accurate. Everything about my experience with Mutsumi was perfect. I cannot recommend her highly enough. My wife and son are clients now also because of my fantastic personal experience. Both have also had similiar experiences. Thank You Mutsumi and Omroom!

Simply wonderful. I attended my first yoga class at Omroom yesterday and it was amazing. The instructor was lovely and enlightening along with the vibe of the whole room. Such a good experience. I will be attending weekly classes from now on.

Excellent spiritual guideance. Have been struggeling with chi headache for 7 months and have seen many different people (Monks, healers etc) for spiritual guideance. Nothing worked until I went to omroom. After the treatments, I was told to shift my diet (among many things). Since that day everything has gotten better :)

Incredible ! . Mutsumi is a master, she understands spirit, She understands her purpose and what she brings to the world through her life's work. I had a 2 sessions of cranial sacral therapy for a back issue. Mutsumi was able to pinpoint for me what was contributing to the pain and condition. For the first time I felt like someone was able to really touch the truth of the pain and Mutsumi does so in a way that I have never experienced-- I could only describe as true compassion. Mutsumi spoke of grief I was harboring and spoke of someone close to me that I lost. It was a profound experience and release for me, and I'm sure it will continue over the next few days, weeks and so on it has really brought me closer to my true self. I feel this is the beginning of something new and a shedding of the old. I cannot thank Mutsumi enough or recommend her anymore highly. A Bangkok blessing.. Bangkok is a better place because Mutsumi is doing her thing in the city. I look forward to seeing Mutsumi again I've already planned when that will be. Thank you Mutsumi,Tegan.

A safe haven. My friend and I were lucky enough to each have a memory therapy session with the beautiful Mutsumi, and it's been like a light has been turned on for us both! It was such a healing experience that we decided to go back a few days later and join in the sound healing journey with Wil Kolen which I highly recommend if you get the chance. Huge thanks and love to all at the Omroom

Great experience. I've been here a few times and can say that each experience was remarkable. Mutsumi is a wonderful and generous woman who is genuinely interested in you. I came out feeling much more aware about myself. There are also some very experienced yoga instructors here. It's located very near Central Chit Lom, so is convenient to get to by public transport. I have no hesitation at all in recommending this place.

Reiki with Roshni. My friend recommended Omroom and I must say I am truly happy and grateful that she did! The vibe at Omroom is so peaceful - I didn't want to leave. I had a reiki session with Roshni. It was my first time and I had no idea what to expect. Roshni was very kind and gentle and I felt so relieved after. She helped me realize my potential and the steps to get there. I plan on going back and trying memory therapy.

Serene place, extraordinary people. Omroom is wonderfully serene place in the middle of hectic Bangkok, offering variety of interesting classes and individual therapies, and everyone on the path of discovering authentic self might want to pay the visit. I have been attending memory therapy sessions with Mutsumi and they have been remarkably effective on a body/ mind/ emotions level. It is all about releasing and healing traumas and blocks, and it is a bit difficult to put in few words to what extent this deep work changes one's self.Seek Mutsumi - a wonderful healer with extraordinary abilities, and moreover, very special person who simply makes a world a better place.

Magnificent experience. Mutsumi is a magical women!!!! I met her in Istanbul , during our session I feel like I have released from all my traumas.... It was a magnificant experience...after that very beautiful things happened in my life :) Thanks Mutsumi , I love you

Amazing Experience. I had the chance to meet with Mutsumi in Istanbul Turkey at insana guven academy. During her therapy session she pointed out my trauma's soo accurately it was really amazing to see how very small things can have big effect on our lives. Her healing energy was really strong that i felt really good after only one session. I had also chance to join her workshop during the weekend. Workshop was really amazing. Those two days there were many information to bright us up and gave us different perspective, which will be guide for us for the rest of our lives. I feel really lucky that i had the chance to meet with Mutsumi she helped me to start my transformation, I totally feel I am not the same person as before I met Mutsumi.

gracious and helpful. Having never experienced anything like this before, I didn't know what to expect. I am just going to give an almost detailed account of my visit and experience. My appointment was at 5:30 and I reached there and hour early, since I had a tendency to get lost. My appointment was lost and Mutsumi already had a client scheduled @ 5pm. The client called in and cancelled her appointment 5 mins prior while Mutsumi was trying to figure out a way to assist me. It was just meant to be :)She was amazing, took me in and it was supposed to be a consultation, but she started tracking down stages of tensions/issues, asked me questions based on feeling my palms and from there on it was some startling revelations, therapy and ways to balance my inner self. Before i left, she gave me diet tips and exercise to work on releasing the pressures and anxieties.She also keeps in touch through social media and replies whenever I have questions.I would absolutely recommend anyone to try it out once and experience the healing. Thank you Mutsumi for the continued guidance.

My omroom experience. Omroom to me is an oasis and healing space for the mind, body & soul located in the heart of Bangkok. I have been to omroom on various occasions; for reiki shares, reiki treatments, an acupuncture session, and a workshop on "Collective consciousness & intuitive development." And each visit has been both deeply revealing and healing. Every time I go, I leave with a sense of peace and greater harmony.I highly recommend the omroom experience to all!

Discover a sanctuary in central Bangkok. It has been almost a year that I moved to Bangkok, after settling down the family, time for me to seek for a sanctuary to continue my Reiki practice. The OmRoom is centrally located and easily accessible by BTS. I felt the calm and tranquility from the moment I walked into the OmRoom. I met Mutsumi who spoke openly and gave valuable feedback about how Energy Healing is viewed in Bangkok. Being a Reiki Master since 11 years, I have confidence that I can contribute some experience to this community. OmRoom doesn't just provide various therapies to emphasize the importance of the connection between Body & Mind, they also host talks and lectures with a variety of topics, like Acupuncture, Crystal energy transfer...etc.I recommend whoever is interested in various forms of Energy Healing, or simply want to love yourself more and get to know yourself better; go and visit OmRoom. It is a good place to do some self-discovery in order to improve one's well-being.

Enlightening experience. I recently had a session with Mutsumi, having never done this before i wasn't sure what to expect. The experience was incredible and Mutsumi was able to locate immediately underlying emotional and physical strain within me. Her spiritual energy unlocks her amazing ability to heal from a very deep level. I'm very happy and grateful for the experience.

Biocranial Therapy at OmRoom. Having been to Omroom a few times, I always get something out of my experiences there- reiki treatment sessions, magnetic therapy, tarot card readings, and few more whose names I can't remember. The latest therapy I went for was Cranio Sacral therapy. I went in, lay down, didnt inform Mutsumi of any issues I had, and after a 45 minute session, I came out deeply relaxed and calm. She accurately pinpointed both physical long and short-term issues that I had, to my amazement, along with some emotional stress and tension issues. She also told me of the connection between my emotional state with my physical state, and how this therapy could help. I was particularly amazed by the fact that she picked up on my physical issues (as these were quite specific and had only been picked up recently by an orthopedic surgeon). I look forward to my next session.Mutsumi's deep knowledge and experience in various therapies, and her ability to mix and match her learnings and therapies for varied needs, is what I find most effective. I'd urge anyone thinking about exploring the mind-body route to better their lives to give Omroom a try.

Beautiful & Rejuvenating Experience. During my recent visit in Bangkok I had the good fortune to meet the genuinely wonderful people at Omroom and experience a beautiful craniosacral therapy session with Mutsumi. At the beginning of the session Mutsumi told me that I’d fall asleep, and she was right. Sometime after she gently placed her hands under the weight of my head I slipped into a peaceful trance and entered a state of deep relaxation. I was so profoundly relaxed that I did not realize Mutsumi had already finished the session and left the room until I eventually became more awake. The whole session felt like a beautiful and rejuvenating dream. Mutsumi is a gentle and caring soul, and her pure intention and genuine caring can be felt in her peaceful presence. Her dedication to her passion is evident, and she is a wonderful inspiration.

Oasis in Bangkok. Life in Bangkok is not easy as this city could alienate you, make you feel lost in the journey of life.Even when you are happy surrounded by loving family members and friends, sometimes you feel something is missing.Omroom can provide you opportunities to explore your feelings, emotions and different levels of consciousness, and be in touch with what I might call God or others might call higher beings. I have been having wonderful time there through taking memory sessions, tarot reading classes, intuition building classes...I enjoyed them all because they are all fun. But at the same time all of the things combined brought me back creativity, confidence, comfort being myself, core values in your life. Highly recommended!

Omroom is a place where I meet with myself. My acquaintance with Omroom started with class of Yin Yoga. It was amazing space and spiriting atmosphere and good training for my body and mind. I fell in love with this place at first sight:)) The introduction crystal talking with Mutsumi is so powerfull and full of discoveries in the development and self-knowledge experience. Omroom is special "fresh" place for me in Bangkok. Thank you Mutsumi and all teachers which provide interesting topics and various practices and experience.with love, Tatiana

Relaxing Space and Helpful Treatment. I am very new to the "healing" world and the different options that go along with that, but the Omroom in Bangkok, Thailand makes you feel very comfortable and the staff (especially Mutsumi) are there to answer any questions you may have in full. I attended an introductory talk on Energy Healing (which was interesting and fun) and was tempted to come back and try a private session with Mutsumi. I did a Cranial Sacral Therapy session to probe into the possibility of why I have constant headaches. Once again, I am new to this type of healing practice, therefore I was skeptical at first considering traditional doctors can not find anything wrong. Mutsumi is extremely gentle and walks you through what the experience will be like. I am not quite sure what I experienced, but I was deeply relaxed and learned some information about possible underlying causes to my issue based off Mutsumi's observations from the private session. Long story short - my headache actually feels better and has temporarily disappeared. Coincidence? - I don't know - however I was impressed by the outcome. I know I need to book more sessions to truly learn more and see if this type of therapy is actually helping in the long term. Regardless, this place is definitely a great place to try! Good people - Good vibes!

A haven of peace in the city, a lovely community and a place of learning.. I go to Omroom very often for my yoga classes, and to attend introductory talks on a number of different topics. It's an excellent place to discover new therapies, theories, ideas and healing techniques, and to meet new people. Depending on the time of the year, they offer yoga and meditation classes about 3 times a week, and a lot of their activities are for donation: this is definitely a laudable idea in a city where yoga is often overpriced and commodified -- they make yoga and guided meditation accessible to everyone, which is brilliant :) I am currently a regular at the Thursday yin yoga classes with Chiharu and at the Monday Dru ones with Britta. I love both teaching styles -- I am also learning about aspects of yoga that are not asana, which is just what I like. These types of yoga are quite restorative and meditative, as opposed to the types of yoga one finds more often in Bangkok, which focus more on asana, physical activity and less on meditation and breathing techniques. Omroom also offer a variety of treatment types by appointment, with several reputed therapists, energy workers, and healers. I only tried this service once so far (craniosacral therapy) and that was also a good experience.Everything is clean, and the therapy and yoga rooms are quiet and welcoming :)  I am so glad I found this space in Bangkok, it helps me slow down the pace of my life in the city, keep a healthy routine and gives me the opportunity to meet like-minded people. Thank you all!

Deep healing with Mutsumi. I received Mitsumi's private healing while she was visiting Sydney, Australia. It was a beautiful sunny day as we sat on the grass in front of Clovelly beach. The sounds of ocean soon dispersed as Mutsumi touched my head, taking me to a peaceful state. Mutsumi untangled many of the events of my past which had been the cause of my emotional and physical unbalance in the present. Mutsumi is noramally based in Omroom, Bangkok. Make sure you visit if you are in Bangkok and on the path of personal healing.

Treatment and Some Learning. A truly profound journey I was helped by Mutsumi to rid my body of this life's nasties tucked away in my subconscious that was affecting my very right to breath this is a lady who through her gifts is able to offer hope to all that need it and just as good a teacher

Weekend course. I spent a week-end learning The beauty and simplistic nature of Chi, Group consciousness and its ability to assist pain with intention. We all have the power to speak directly to the creator and easy methods to assist a person's life journey by allowing the energy to provide answers to follow. Magical information. Mutsumi is without ego in any form and freely shares years of work. Thank you.

Beyond Influential. I had the opportunity to experience Mindscape and Memory Therapy with Mutsumi. I didn't know what to expect going into the sessions, but I was immediately graced with her warm nurturing energy creating an extremely comfortable environment. She was able to reccognize areas I had been holding energy blockages from past events in life. Upon recognition, she took me through to releasing them and feeling tremendously better at the end!Additionally, I was there at a fortunate time to have some work done by Michael Lokko. Immediately, I was able to see he held a great deal of knowledge in healing the body. His movements coupled with his calming words helped me realize tension in my body and to surrender resulting in a euphoric relaxation.Both Mutsumi and Michael are truly talented and will continue to better lives! A must experience!

The world needs more places like these. I've had two sessions so far @ Omroom, 1 Reiki healing with the lovely Roshni and 1 tarot card reading with the extraordinary Mutsumi. I have to admit that all the glowing recommendations on tripadvisor do them justice.I've only met the both of them (I think there are more therapists), but they are kind, knowledgeable and they make you feel at ease immediately.Even if you are not a believer of the 'spiritual' world, give it a try. It might bring you a little bit of peace and joy, something the world is currently often lacking.I was blown away by Mutsumi and we ended up discussing several topics with her in French. She is such an experienced, wise, elegant, sophisticated and truly genuine person and I thank her from the bottom of my heart for helping me out during a difficult time. The world needs more people like Roshni and Mutsumi, let's clone them :-) Jokes aside, even if you are a non-believer, give one of the sessions a try, you might by surprised. I am a clinical psychologist, and I stand behind every therapy - spiritual or not - that can lead to a happier and more balanced life. Even if some of the effects could be placebo ones, who cares. If it helps the person, let it be so.I am very happy with my experiences and I would definitely go back to try out some of their other therapies.

Mutsumi works magic!. I have only heard of places and people like that, but never actually experienced...it is THE place to visit!!! Just wished i had longer time in Bangkok to absorb more in that place. Such a pleasure to meet ALL this great people in "Omroom" and Mutsumi...omg Mutsumi really does work magic! I had a physical pain for a long time and after just one session with Mutsumi it is disappear!!! Since then I'm waking up amazed, that uncomfortable feeling in my knees is gone :)

Unbelievable Reiki Healing experience with Roshni!. Firstly, Visiting Omroom is an absolute MUST for those on a spiritual journey.The whole place has an amazing positive energy, the staff know what they are talking about (We ended up chatting about consciousness, energy, astral projection etc for ages!), the whole experience was amazing!I stumbled upon the Omroom by coincident, after a very intense experience with negative energy. I met Roshni who listened carefully to what had happened to me, and knew exactly what needed to be done. I had 2 reiki sessions over two days, and i can honestly say i feel PHENOMENAL! It was my first time having a reiki healing session. After the second one, my whole body was vibrating, i could feel the energy flowing through me... such a profound experience.Roshni was very nurturing and made sure i was comfortable. This is the real deal.My words cant do it justice.. If youre reading this and are interested in spirituality, take this as a sign. VISIT!
Memory and Craniosacral with Mutsumi. Great body work by Mutsumi. Released a lot of tension from my neck and back that had been there for waaay too long.

Incredible healing experience with Reiki session. During my trip in Bangkok, I had an amazing Reiki session with Roshni. I originally wanted a memory therapy session but unfortunately the therapist was out of the country for training. An Omroom staff suggested the reiki session with Roshni and at first I was a bit skeptical about whether it was what I wanted. My understanding of Reiki was that it focused on the flow of energy, while what I wanted was more mental therapy as I was feeling stressed from work. Roshni proved me wrong. While she did work on my energy flow, she also spent the entire time explaining to me how my childhood memories had affected my mental state and consequently resulting in the physical issues I had. It felt amazingly rejuvenating and my mother, who I saw after the trip, commented that my facial expression has softened and I seemed much happier.I highly recommend Roshni's reiki session to anyone in Bangkok. Even one session has considerable effect.

A Refreshing Healing Experience. I had a full day in Bangkok before catching an overnight train to Ko Samui for a meditation retreat. Seeing the great reviews here, I decided to come for a Memory Therapy session with Mutsumi.Mutsumi is a very nice and calm lady. The venue was also very clean and serene, a stark contrast from the bustling Bangkok city centre right outside. I was placed in a soothing environment, lying down, and Mutsumi and I had a brief chat about my background. She then initiated a diagnosis and rather quickly identified the issue that had been troubling me recently. Afterwards, she proceeded to put me in a relaxed state before treating my knee problem (a persistent dull pain).After the session, I immediately felt lighter. I also noted that for the next seven days during the meditation retreat, my knee gave me no trouble at all, despite the fact that I was climbing stairs up and down a mountain.Seeing the benefits, I went back to omroom twice when I returned to Bangkok. Mutsumi was so kind to use the swimming pool in her house for the treatment, to better stretch my legs.Overall, I highly recommend this to anyone who has chronic pain but failed to obtain satisfactory answers from western medicine. The result may just surprise you.
Mutsumi is magical. The time with Mutsumi was magical. I am so pleased to find such a haven for personal growth in Bangkok

Reiki. I went to see Roshni , the reiki therapist there . I was not very sure about this whole process but needed something for the stressful period in my life. Being a medical doctor I was very skeptical. However I felt a difference immediately after the treatment that I can't describe. I would highly recommend it.Dr Pranav Pancholi

Qi intuitive healing.. I had the privilege of doing a 2 days workshop with Mutsumi at Omroom on the 18th and 19th of July. It was the most empowering, uplifting and enriching experience.The group was small and like minded on a journey of discovering and learning and were really fantastic people to be with.The energy and knowledge of Mutismi was just phenomenal.Thanks very much for an amazing experience and looking forward to my next workshop with you!

Really great healing experience!. I've been having muscle pain in certain areas of my body due to history of intense training and sport injuries and have been trying many things such as physiotherapy, movement rehab, sport massage, etc.. Two weeks ago, a friend of mine mentioned about OmRoom and encourage me to try it. I was quite skeptic at first but I thought there's nothing to loose and decided to give it a try. I had a 1hr session with Mutsumi and to my surprise it was incredibly relaxing, more than anything else I've ever tried so far. Most importantly, it wasn't just the muscle pain/stiffness that was released, I also felt that my state of mind is kinda improved. I felt more relaxed, calm and grounded, plus I also noticed that I can think slightly clearer. I really do recommend it if you are having troubles with your health/well being or ever have a chance to try it.

Emotionally Therapeutic. I seeked sanctury at omroom. Not knowing what to expect, I gave it a shot at a time when I was in most dismay n emotionally torn. There was no message like some of the haters have commented nor was it a waste of money, in fact the price was very reasonable indeed. I went and received healing from a wonderful caring lady by the name of Mitumi, who gave me her precious 2 hrs to heal me with light and energy. I further went to have dinner with her to get to know her more and understand her as a individual and what is their concept at omroom. Basically, my sub conscious mind was tapped upon and region in the body where there is a block in energy needs to be released and sometimes bec of much turmoil in a individual life one can harbour a lot of energy that is unhealthy that can affect one physically as well. This is no one stop solution miracle center and if you are expecting that you need to get your expectation set straight. What I can tell as a customer is that If you do have some emotional affairs that you wish to seek love and light for than omroom is the place was energy, friendship, love and light.

Spiritual Meeting - A true sanctuary for peace and tranquility. Visited Omroom for the first time last week and tried Memory Theraphy with Mutsumi. First treatment, I felt lighter. Second treatment I felt more confident and certain of what to do in my life. Mutsumi was patient, diligent and attentive to my situation. She provided a very personalised service that made me felt safe, secure and unafraid. Her energy was calming and reassuring. I would definitely recommend Omroom to anyone who wants to find out more about the Universe, human energy or seek answers from a spiritual sense. Looking forward to my next session! :)

I had very extreme lower back pain that was shooting down into my left hip and leg.. The treatment was very interesting and it was more Energetic based then physical . I thought that not much had happened . Now my back feels at least 50 percent better and that is significant because I have had this pain for over three weeks and it was not getting any better until now . I am very happy . Dr. Joseph

A sanctuary for wellness and truth. Amidst the hustle and bustle of Bangkok, a non assuming little place is quietly, yet powerfully helping those seeking something deeper and richer in their lives. A place for healing, a place for discovery, a place for like minded souls to connect. Mutsumi's memory therapy sessions are especially rewarding and beneficial for those open to her insights and wisdom.If you're a seeker and on a journey of discovery, Omroom is like a bright diamond - multi faceted and sparkling with light.

Rejuvenating mind, body and spirit experiance. I flew from Sydney to Bangkok to attend the Qi healing‏ course conducted by Mutsum last month. It was by far the best calming and educational course I have done. Coming from an engineering and science background, I often doubt phenomenon that are unexplainable by science. This course is great in that sense, since Mutsumi use videos and other materials to explain the science behind these phenomenons. Small group sizes and very calming environment at Omroom encourages you to ask questions and learn more. All in all I wish if Sydney had a place like Omroom so I can go regularly. I would highly recommend anyone to go check out Omroom. You can look at their website for the courses and services they offer. Can’t wait to go back to Omroom and learn more.

Nothing But A Disapointment. After reading all the reviews from TripAdvisor my husband decided to give it a try. What he got was nothing but a disapointment. During one hour of theraphy The theraphist was saying something about the life of my husband before his current life, which is ridiculous, she also did a very short and gentle massage (the thai massage at Healthland was alot better said my husband). It was nothing worth but a waste of time and money.

It works!. I was not sure what I was getting into and had setup an appointment for Memory Therapy based on reviews here. At the session, Mutsumi suggested CranioSacral Therapy instead as my back and ankles were hurting.During the session, she cleared the blockages at my knees and worked on clearing/shifting around energies in my body. The effect was immediate. I cannot explain it but it worked wonders - for the next 9 days I was in Bangkok, my ankles did not hurt anymore and I was doing a lot of walking around. I returned for a follow session a week later where she worked on clearing my energies from the inside. I felt much lighter after the sessions and I was pleasantly surprised Mutsumi was able to tell me what were the underlying root causes of the problems I was having, both physical and mentally. She was spot on in stating my bad diet habits and recommended specific changes to my diet. She also taught me some exercises to open up and alleviate some of the injustices (perceived or otherwise) I was feeling. I had not shared this with her but she was able to tell.I make regular trips to Bangkok and always get massages done but this is the best investment I have done - beats all the massages and spas. It will definitely be on top of my to-do list of activities whenever I go Bangkok. Will try Memory Therapy next round.Getting to the place was a breeze. It is directly behind the Central Chidlom mall at BTS Chidlom. You should make an appointment ahead and not walk in.
Wonderful Experience!. Great environment, amazing therapists/healers. I thoroughly recommend it to anyone coming to Bangkok - it can be a life changing experience!

Warm and welcoming. . I recently completed the Qi Healing workshop with Mutsumi and feel very blessed and intuitive. I've learned to believe in myself more and feel much stronger. Thank you so much! Looking forward to learning much more from you.

Tarot Carding and Memory Therapy. The first time I got to know about Omroom is while I was searching for Tarot card online. So I booked myself a session. Upon arriving the place warmed me as it's very warm, bright and spacious. Mutsumi was a lovely lady who really tried to help me giving advices through the reading of the card. I enjoyed my session with her. And recently after much consideration I booked my first memory therapy session with her hoping to become a better person. She took time and patience to understand my situation in order to help me with her therapy afterwards. I am committed to carry my sessions with her on a regular basis. I highly recommend Omroom to everyone reading this. You will not regret nor disappointed.

Amazing place!. My daughter and I went for a short holiday to Bangkok. We visited Omrom and had a body memory therapy and cranial therapy with Mutsumi. It was an amazing experience and we highly recommend it !! The place has a beautiful and relaxing atmosphere and Mutsumi is very professional and friendly. We love it !!! A must do in Bangkok, visit Omroom!!!

Wonderful Experience. I visited Omroon following a recommendation from my wife. I was a little skeptical, but the memory therapy sessions with Mutsumi have been wonderful.. Life changing perhaps. Omroom has a very relaxing ambiance - I recommend Omroom highly for therapy sessions or therapy techniques.

A place to learn how to be happy!. Bangkok is famous for it's spa. While my friends were looking for relaxation, i have discovered this small place called omroom in the center of Bangkok.They have mediation, group hypnosis and yoga classes, many are by donation. They also teach how we should shift our consciousness not to be attached to our own emotions and belief our problems are caused by other people, we always try to accuse others and we are happy to play the victims role. Omroom has given us opportunities to see ourselves, listen to our inner voice. I have started to see my unpleasant experience as a part of collective consciousness. So my ego diminished a lot. omroom is a haven and an oasis to find your happy self.

amazing healing experince. I read all the reviews on trip advisor when my friend recommended me to go to this place.I met Mutsumi and she is amazing and her memory therapy is very good. Within an hour she found out the unpleasant experiences and the reason why my energy was blocked into negative things. At the end of the session which went over an hour easily i felt very light and she also gave me some exercises which i have been following to reduce day to day stress and has helped me improve focus.She pinpointed the root of my stress and worries and i would recommend her therapy to all.I fact i would like to encourage Mutsumi to take up classes to teach people her amazing therapy..Thankyou OS very much.Shantanu

Body Psychology Relief. I have suffered from chronic migraines for years now which are totally debilitating. Anyone who has had them can attest to the associated pain and complete sense of helplessness when having an attack. I have seen Wanee twice now for her Body Psychology massage when experiencing these bouts and she has a way of speaking with her hands which can locate and also release tension but for what felt like something beyond just the physical side. She has a very caring and attentive nature that translates through her own intuitive technique. I will keep going back to her 100% and recommend it for anyone who might have real issues like this.

Awesome healing experience. My chiropractor told me to check OmRoom out as he said I can find lots of useful healing stuffs. I've had a couple of reiki/memory sessions with Mutsumi so far in the last month. Being somewhat new to these techniques, I was pretty amazed by the relief I got (mainly muscle tension problem for me). Mutsumi also helped me work on some of my deep memory related emotion. So yeah, I'll definitely go back again when I can, and I think it's worth giving a try even for people who are new to these stuffs.

Healing centre with a heart. I have visited Omroom 3 times now. I have been for three cranial sacral therapies by Matusmi and she is an angel with the biggest heart :)i have been suffering with chronic migraines and the treatments have alleviated the pain some what bu also made me feel 'better in myself'. It is so lovely to go here, it is small and cute and filled with love. Most of the money seems to go to a charity for Autistic children. You can buy healing crystals and so jewelry. there are yoga sessions regularly for a donation. There are many courses to take in healing and many options for different types of healing :) If you are interested in 'alternative' healing to modern medicine GO HERE! If you want to do yoga, learn something new or just meet some lovely people COME HERE :) Thank you Omroom for sharing your healing powers with all :)

Gifted Healer. I cannot speak more highly of the 1 hour memory therapy both my husband and I had with Mutsumi. I planned on doing the cranial sacral massage but my husband went ahead of my and came out strikingly different. He urged me to change it to memory therapy and I was very happy I did. In just an hour Mutsumi was able to tap into something from my childhood that was creating behaviour issues in my present day life that I would not have ever detected. I felt an instant release when I realized this. Both my husband and I have been amazed at her confident, gentle approach and are already planning another visit to Bangkok just to see what other therapy we can do. Kindly she did some cranial sacral on me, and her touch was mysteriously powerful even though the movements were so small and intricate. I highly recommend Mutsumi for all the therapies.

Credible Experience. I went for Memory Therapy while on vacation in Thailand. Mutsumi has a gift and could identify many events within my life and provide the exact age at which these events happened! I went in not knowing what to expect, but after experiencing this I can say this is a credible experience.

Warm and welcoming. Omroom brings a welcome retreat from the bustling city. Offering a variety of holistic services with something for everyone. The group meditation is warm and welcoming for anyone at any level and encourages the practice and sharing of experiences.

Interesting and well worth it. I took a one hour Memory Therapy session with Mutsumi Adachi. She is a very nice lady and a good therapist. I dont know how the system works but she was able to tap into my body and give me some very useful feedback about the possible causes of the problematic emotions I was facing. Something I never thought of and had not told her about either. Unfortunately I had a short stay in Bangkok so could not visit again and there is a limited amount that can be achieved in a single session but I will have to work on it on my own. I believe she is available on Skype for continued remote consultations. I believe this system works well for depression/anxiety/fears and other such negative emotions and states of mind. Well worth a try if you are open and willing to share your problems with the therapist.

Works for me. I came to Omroom at the suggestion of a friend. I am a septic and so was on my guard for spooky mumbo jumbo. Instead I found that the meditation groups with Michael Paul Stephens down to earth and practical. My goal is to become more mindful and in that sense it has worked well for me.The room ambiance of the room and the groups are conducive to meditation.I don't really prefer guided meditation but I understand that there is a balance that needs to be struck for the varying requirements of the different attendees.They have changed the policy to donation so that also makes me feel more comfortable giving what I can afford. I recommend that anyone new to meditation or who just wants to spend some time meditating with others.

enlightening experience. i felt very relaxed and fulfilled after just one session, and the tension from my hip felt better. within a few hours i was completely pain free. I highly recommend going to the Omroom and will do so each time I go to Bangkok.

Wonderful. I was having a lot of issues and I went to Mutsumi for Memory Therapy. After the session I didn't feel much difference but the next few days, in situations that i would have been stressed, desperate, sad or mad, i was not. Of course it was still uncomfortable, but I was in a much better control of myself. I was even wondering how she managed to do that only after one hour.Subsequently I have attended other events, like reiki with Eri, group hypnosis with Marleen and Yin Yoga with Chiharu.I also go to Marleen for relationship counselling. She's fantastic.Hope more people can find out this place and have a much happier life!

Highly Recommended!. I've tried several classes and therapies at Omroom including qi gong, memory therapy and tarot card reading. All of them have been great experiences and really helped me pinpoint and release major causes of stress in my life. After clearing my energy blocks I feel more balanced and revitalised and I've learnt to let go of a lot of negativity. I've also been taught simple techniques to balance my energy flow that I now practice on a daily basis. It was very interesting to learn and experience first hand how energy flow can have a profound effect on the wellbeing of body and mind. All of the consultants I've met are very knowledgeable and kind and the atmosphere is serene and comfortable. I am very happy with my experience at Omroom and the results I've had from my therapies, and highly recommended it to anyone who is looking to restore balance to their life!

Nice people. The people here are really nice and feel sad not to give positive review but I don't want other people expecting more from the high TA ranking same me. Actually the place is just average and the treatment about memory didn't really help me.

Great yin yoga class with Chiharu. On our Thailand trip we had the chance to join Chiharu's wonderful Yin Yoga class. Chiharu is a great teacher and a wonderful person! Would love to join her class more often, but distances are just a bit too far ...Eva and Andreas

Gifted Healer. I had 2 Memory Therapy sessions with Mutsumi last month and the effects are still working. The Omroom clinic has a really lovely tranquil energy around it - hard to image be in the hustle and bustle of Chidlom. Thank you Mutsumi for clearing my energy blocks! I'll be back again next year.

Great experience. The memory therapy sessions with Mutsumi were a fantastic holistic experience - completely new to me; however, the comforting and comfortable environment and atmosphere set by Mutsumi makes it easy to be relaxed and enjoy such a positive, empowering experience.I can highly recommend the Omroom, and especially sessions with Mutsumi!

Amazing memory therapy session with Mutsumi. I wanted to write a review about a fantastic enlightening treatment that I had with Mutsumi yesterday. I have been finding great difficulty in finding enjoyment in every day things that I should be able to enjoy. Mutsumi was fantastic and spot on with events that happened and the age that they did that had affected me and was enable to provide me with positive ways to deal with these moving forward. I left the appointment feeling very positive and almost like a weight had been lifted from me. I have not felt distressed or agitated since I have met with Mutsumi who is a very gentle, knowledgeable and caring person. I cannot recommend this treatment enough for anyone who just needs a little help to get more of a balance in their life.

Unique experience. First off, i admit to being a skeptic about mysticism and holistic treatment in general due to my own ignorance on the subject but after reading all the excellent reviews on TA, i had to try. I booked a last minute session with Mutsumi Adachi and arrived not knowing what treatment i wanted. After some discussion, she suggested Memory Therapy, followed by chakra balancing with Eri T.It is hard to describe the session and i can only quantify the result physically. I wanted to find a solution to my sleeping problem that i had been having for months. Not only did i get just that but also my neck pain was gone immediately after the session. Mutsumi highlighted some events in my life that may have been the cause of my physical or emotional pains and understanding that made me see certain aspects of my life differently. Big thanks to Eri T as well for the reiki chakra healing and explanation and reassurance. As for the high price (for my budget), i consider money well spent for my own personal well being (even after 2 massages, my neck was still sore). I only regret not having discovered the Omroom sooner. I will definitely come back next time i am in bkk. I feel very lucky to have discover and experience this healing session, in a litteral sense.

Serenity in Bangkok. We love Omroom! Our family moved to Thailand 2 years ago and we were fortunate enough to have found Omroom. All four of us have very much enjoyed and benefitted from Omroom's different types of bodywork offerings, meditation sessions and workshops. We've personally done the Memory Therapy, BodyTalk, Tibetan singing bowls meditation and other occasional workshops. And I have friends who have recommended the Reiki and Tarot after their sessions. I have found the Memory Therapy sessions to be very transformative, so if you're looking for a positive change, I highly recommend it! The environment in Omroom is so peaceful, warm and welcoming and the people are wonderful :) All of their sessions are relaxing and restorative. What a nourishing addition Omroom has been to our Thailand experience. Hope you have the chance to experience it!

Memory Therapy with Mutsumi. I recently had a memory therapy with Mutsumi, I had met her before so I completely felt at ease and comfortable around her. After explaining the basics of quantum physics and memory therapy, I was asked to lie down for the process. She then easily tapped into my subconscious and very accurately pointed out some underlying issues I was dealing with which were affecting me both physically and emotionally. She was also able to point out how some organs were being affected by these issues and helped me release through deep breathing and I immediately felt lighter after. I know it will take more than one session for me and I definitely intend to go back and indulge in more clearing. Mutsumi is a very warm person so it was easy to open up to her. The whole session took about 1 hour. Highly recommended!

erga g.- qi gong class. Omroom is a really warm and welcoming place. I got there to learn how to practice qi gong and i found a place that not only teaches but also explains about the meaning of this kind of practice. Mutsumi is a very kind, patient and professional and i'm sure i'll try there other interesting classes thay have.

Body Talk. I have had two delightful Body Talk sessions with Mutsumi Adachi at Omroom and am making progress in dealing with a very tense, painful body and type 1 diabetes. It is an amazing process in which your body tells you, via the practitioner what it was that caused the issue and then provides a way to deal with that energy and release it. The session is very private in one of their 3 comfortable treatment rooms and uses muscle testing and questions to identify an issue (which may seem insignificant now but had a serious effect on your belief systems and energies when the event occurred). Once identified the energy can be released using a variety of methods so that healing can begin. All you need to attend is an openness and the desire to heal and let Mutsumi do the rest. Omroom also has yoga, Reiki, Chi-Gong, Tarot and other events which can be seen on their website. I will certainly be going again to finally address these frustrating health issues.

Memory therapy - intriguing and enlightening. I had a memory therapy with Mutsumi because I have been having trouble sleeping recently due to some personal issues. Mutusmi gave me a brief intro. in some of the history and background and explained the process thoroughly. Not having tried this before, Mutsumi was able to tap into my subconscious and uncovered and was able to identify some underlying emotional and physical strain within me. Then through healing and guidance, I was taught to learn to let go of these strain. In all, these have helped relieve some of the stress that I have built up recently. Truly enlightening and comforting experience.

Enlightening experience. I went to memory therapy with Mutsumi. I had never been to any similar therapy before and wasn't sure what I was in for. By tapping into the subconscious in the pursuit of uncovering deep underlying emotional and physical strain she determined easily that I had a sports injury (which has stopped me from doing any sports) despite not having any physical signs of it. This gave her an insight into the blockages that were being created in my lymphocytes which she also related to a injury I had when I was 12 (alluding to a time where I cracked my head open). These were all creating blockages within my core area which she began the process of releasing. She is extremely passionate and insightful, as well as very dedicated towards spreading her knowledge on memory therapy. I am very glad I was able to partake in such an interesting experience.

BIOTHERAPY with Ivan Roca. during our biotherapy with Ivan Roca in BKK..he treated my son Dylan .he was allergic to Peanuts (walnuts/hazelnuts) since he was 3-4 years old...and was on his first blood test at level 1 maximum nearly level 2 (it's out of 6) ...just got the blood test from the hospital and the result is negative : he is under the minimum so less then 0...dylan is not allergic to peanuts anymore (they don t test ALL the nuts...they don t have it) but he was always allergic FIRST to peanuts then to a few more......so then we had to try one...and we did....30 mins later NOTHING.....amazing and a big thank you to you IVAN...because traditional medecine says that there is nothing to do for peanut allergy.

Memory therapy & hypnotherapy are incredible. I had been searching for a place to do yoga and and came across the Omroom. Mutsumi, one of the partners, welcomed me like I was an old friend. She's not only kind but she is also humble, knowledgeable, honest and passionate about offering and teaching healing to others. These qualities and Omroom have drawn me in. I've had the Mindscape or Memory Therapy and for lack of a better word, it's been incredible. I also attended the by-donation Hypnotherapy session with Marleen and booked a session with her afterwards. I've only ever witnessed hypnotherapy in a comedic sense but knowing how the mind and body CAN work together if we are open to it, is beyond anything I could have imagined. I wanted to work on self-confidence. The result didn't hit me until I point blank asked my boss to hire me for a newly created position that I wanted and he did. Prior to the session, I never would have been so bold. That was 2 months ago and my professional success has moved rapidly upward in ways I never would have imagined. People around me have noticed the change in my confidence and I know it was because of that session. I've since had 2 more sessions to work on weight loss and the changes (although it's taking time) have been staggering. Whatever you go to Omroom for, know that the healers want the best for you and as long as you're open to success, you'll receive it.

Omroom an oasis in Bangkok. I came across Omroom while searching for meditation training in Bangkok and found that it offered an array of classes and therapies in the area of self-awareness. I was intrigued to try something called Memory Therapy. As I understand it, this process helps to release long-standing embedded traumas from within the subconscious. The practitioner, Mutsumi, while being very comforting, was able to quickly hone in on several deep-seated issues and bring them to the surface. I found this to be an illuminating experience and felt a lightening of some deep emotional burdens. I was also fortunate to have met Marleen for an excellent hypnotherapy session, which was both soothing and empowering. I'm happy to have found Omroom and consider it a unique, restorative spiritual retreat within the urban jungle of Bangkok. I highly recommend it.

Memory Therapy with Mutsumi. Some friends recommended Memory Therapy with Mutsumi as they all had had a wonderful, healing session with her. I took their advice and booked a session with her and found it to be very interesting, calming and accurate experience. Mutsumi clearly possesses a natural ability to read chakras and spirit. I thoroughly enjoyed the experience and would recommend it to anyone who would like some healing or guidance in their life. It is a very insightful, enlightening experience.

Omroom major contributor to holistic healing. Highly recommended.. Prior to Omroom opening I had had no exposure whatsoever to healing and was sceptical. But after discussion with the 3 partners, I was open to try some of the healing options, so I could decide for myself. After spending time with a number of Omroom’s consultants, I am totally in support of healing. It works. I don’t understand why, but it works. In my view, Omroom is one of the high calibre healing establishments that is contributing to a mindshift in support of healing and wellness across the world. They are totally professional, compassionate, and have a range of capable local and visiting international healers across diverse modalities. I wouldn’t hesitate in recommending Omroom.

.. welcome hOMe!!!. .. my dear friend is going through a very rough time - and i invited her to the Memory Therapy by Mutsumi here at Omroom. and since i was rather sceptic and curious to know what this treatment was, i decided to try it out first today!! .. WoW!! this turned out to be quite a miracle indeed. the Memory Therapy allowed my own body to tell me the exact time, person, place (and more) that cause these blockages (in my lower back and spleen!!). Matsumi not only released these blockages, but also recharged my CHI!!! after the treatment, she kindly offered me refreshing mint tea and some fresh fruits as well!! This amazing experience was much more than I'd imagined. Thank you Matsumi!!

Thanks to Omroom. I had participated in memory therapy with Matsumi over my brief visit in Bangkok. Through her professionalism and guidance , my memory of fear and conflicts were erased . To follow up on my progress, and thanks to Skype, I would be able to continue my other sessions with her over long distance.

By experiencing Memory Therapy at Omroom by Mutsumi.. I have discovered the cause of my chronic problem and understood more of my emotional pattern. Her sessions have shifted my believe system.I highly reccommend her therapy.

A space for peace and healing.. I have to admit this is not something I would normally consider trying but I found myself in an emotional hole and needed help getting out of it..desperately. So, Mutsumi convinced me to come down for a bio/memory therapy session with her at Omroom. I was surprised at how comfortable she made me feel, and sharing with her and hearing what she had to say was an enlightening experience. The treatment I received played a big part in getting back to my normal state. I am so glad I opened my mind and tried it. I would highly recommend it. Thanks Mutsumi! x

Bio Therapy. Mutsumi is not only a talented healer but a wonderful person: need bio therapy when in Bangkok? I recommend Omroom highly, even if the recipient is abroad, distance healing works. Omroom is a spiritual center with specialists in all types of energy healing incuding bio-energetic heaing and Reiki. Just a great vibe there :)

A wondefurl expirience!!. I went to Omroom and take the Reiki Level 1 with Micheal Stephens and it was the best thing in my life, it is amazing to learn to know ourselves and to go further in that pad! I really recommend you to take the course! Micheal is a great person and a great teacher!!! I wil come back to thailando to take another course!! :D thank you so much for showing me the pad!

Memory Therapy. I did a Memory Therapy session with Mutsumi, and I wasn't sure what to expect exactly. However slowly I got into it and I must say she has been very professional and accurate. I can highly recommend her treatment as part of your individualized emotional healing.

Spiritual center in Bangkok. Was searching for a spiritual center in Bangkok and found Omroom. Took one session with Mutsumi and I must say, the price they are taking for 1 hour session is amazing. I REALLY got value for money. And will absolutely recommend anyone to go there for a visit.

Do stop by.... You will meet like-minded people,You will have a great experience,You will want to come back!Omroom offers a variety of treatments and events that enable people to connect to others and especially to themselves. You will learn something new everytime and most likely exit the room with a big smile. If not on your face, for sure in your heart. I had a Dissolve Therapy session with Andy which made me feel incredibely relaxed. I also had the chance to share a tarot reading session with the sweet Mustumi which brought tears to my eyes. And last but not least, I have been lucky enough to experience biotherapy with Ivan. THANK YOU.

Oneness. Omroom is the place to be if you want to get connected with yourself again. Very calm and friendly environment. You'll feel right at home as soon as you walk in. Mutsumi's Memory Therapy session had guided me to look within which I found really healing. Omroom is not just a healing center but as well a big open classroom (to learn about what's really important in your life). You'll love it here.

I love omroom. Omroom is a great place to discover yourself via all the modalities they provide. Qi Gong is one of my favorite class and Tarot reading is really useful for me. This is a place I could find my happy self again. I love omroom.

"A soothing experience". Easy to access, omroom offers excellent holistic services with excellent therapists. I would recommend omroom to anyone interested to improve their personal well being and to live a soothing experience.

Healing in Bangkok. I must admit I went in quite a sceptic being very new to most eastern practices. Without going into too much detail I have to say I was amazed at the outcome. I had a session of memory therapy and found the results unbelievable. I'm now going in weekly and have found myself feeling better and better and not to mention learning new skills to cope with stress and overall well being outside of Omroom. I've been recommending this place to all my friends and family!
omroom. great place to be for some peace of mind, healing, optimising your energy and meeting great inspiring people!

A quaint holistic healing sanctuary in the middle of Bangkok. I went to Omroom seeking any form of healing as I was going through a lot of personal problems at that time and everything I had tried wasn't working. I am not a big believer of energy healing and such holistic treatments, but I was at my wit's end. A friend recommended Omroom to me and when I entered their facility, I already felt much lighter and comfortable. It really is like a little sanctuary in the hustle and bustle of Bangkok. I ended up receiving Memory Therapy treatment from a warm-natured consultant called Mutsumi. She was a very good listener and took in stride my skepticism. She gave me a great insight into my mind and body that I never really knew and it was very interesting to learn where the sources of my negative energy was. After she was done tapping out the harmful energy out of me, I felt amazing. There was a huge difference in how I felt before walking into Omroom and after leaving. Omroom has an impressive range of healing services such as reiki, chi gong, yoga etc and a very nice staff to explain what each thing is. It's definitely worth checking out.. even if you aren't normally interested in those kind of things because, like me, I found something that worked.

A place of Healing................. A wonderful, peaceful space conveniently located near the BTS in the center of Bangkok. Escape the hustle and bustle of Bangkok and step into the tranquility of this special space. I wish I could come by for another session but we have moved on. Possibly when we are on this side of the world again . I know all the caring work at Omroom helped me. I do feel much better! Thanks for being there!Nancy

Great healing resource in Bangkok!. Omroom offers a wonderful array if healing resources for people in Bangkok - from reiki to yoga and chi gong, family constellations, releasing, and many more. Their rotating roster of talented and kind healers and therapists offer alternative energy therapies to heal and soothe even the most weary traveller or uptight city resident. A calm little oasis floating up above Bangkok's CBD, this spot is highly recommend for anyone wanting support on their journey towards complete wellness. Not sure what you need- just ask, as they are well informed and happy to help and can easily walk you through the many great options! Thank you Omroom Bangkok!

Memory Therapy at Omroom.. Omroom is a place I highly recommend to others. I have tried many other healing modalities elsewhere, however I felt safe in the hands of selected practitioners here at Omroom. The advice as well as guidance given was very compassionate and not fear based which is very important. What I was very impressed with is Mutsumi's Memory Therapy! Amazing what she is able to tell from tuning into your body and discover what might be the cause of underlying issues that is causing imbalances or pains in your body. I am also very pleased with the results! Thank you so much! :) xx

A place to discover, learn or practice new age technics, very near BTS. A very nice cosy place where you can discover, learn or practice many kinds of meditation like yoga, chi cong, energy healing like reiki, psychotherapies and meet nice people interesting in new age development. I went reiki sharing, meditation with bowls and Friday night gathering. Omroom it really a place to go!

Alternative healing, yoga, reiki, tarot. Calming room filled with books, crystals, pillows, and teas. Come to meditate, read, or make an apt to try different yoga styles or sign up to receive or learn reiki. I come here to de-stress, meet like minded people, and learn new ways to heal myself and love others. Very neat pleace. We need more of them in the world.

Advanced Healing therapies. I can use one of the latest achievment in natural medicine science at omroom: Metatron diagnosis and treatment, Together with Reiki, Chi - Gong, or freedom dance, Omroom is a place to visit in Bangkok for sure.

A holistic haven that cannot be missed!. Conveniently tucked in the city center, Omroom provides a conducive space for the cultivation of balance and wellness of patrons – through our heart, body and mind. With a variety of choices in holistic services, you will sure find something which sings with your heart in Omroom. A holistic haven that cannot be missed!
Reiki at Omroom. I started with Reiki sessions then went for the Reiki Level 1 lessons. It was fantastic! I loved it! Thank you Katherina for being such an inspiring teacher!

One of the most magic spots in Bangkok. Whether you want to learn how to practice Reiki, or go on a Yoga class...or even talk, Omroom is the place to be. Their Staff makes you not want to leave the place (literally)...peace of mind in the center of Bangkok, you cant miss it!

Best organic spa in town. Everything here is perfect! I really had a great time enjoying my 60 min Prana-stress Relieving Massage. Starting with warm welcome from receptionists then they served me lotus organic tea which it was my first time trying that and i LOVE it! The masseuse was very nice and professional, her massage technique was excellent. The massage oil that i picked was organic black jasmine. Everything that they use in spa is all organic and this is why i love it. Overall experience was amazing and I highly recommended this place.

Amazingly Professional Service. This was my first time at Pranpuri Organic Spa and I am very satisfied with the level of service. I have back pain/office syndrome problem therefore I always chose to go to places with high level of service. At the Pranpuri, the therapist are well trained. The massage technique is of advance technique – healed my pain very well. In addition, the therapist had shown care and service-minded. They ensure that I feel better throughout the spa experience. After one hour of massage, my back pain was relieved.

In one word: perfect!. In short: the entire visit and massage was perfect. The welcoming by the reception, facilities, care for customer, etc. was not only as you would expect from a top-end spa, but it was much better, there was a distinct personal touch to it. For example, not only was the masseuse able to follow-up on my request to focus on specific back muscles well, but she could feel where the problem was and address it effectively. After the massage I felt as reborn. With other words: recommended for (frequent) visits!

Excellent spa quality. The experience at Panpuri was over expected. The quality of the massage and aroma oil is perfect. The massage room is well decorated, relaxing, quiet and clean. The bed is so comfortable with the adjustable temperature. I like the way they set the cool temperature for the room and warmer at the bed. Overall treatment has shown how they putthe best effort to provide the best service. The location is also excellent with the link to the sky train at the center of the shopping area. Price is reasonable, worth of time and money paid for.
The best. First visit and sure not the last.. did the aromatherapy full body massage and enjoyed it. Products used were organic and oils used were so calming. Cant wait to visit them again
Very well technique and relaxing. I went to Panpuri Organice Spa last week with my friends. The Spa is well decorated. Music, environment, dim light, service are all excellent.

Very relax and beautiful small spa in the heart of Bangkok , Thumbs up!. The place is very clean , beautiful and relaxation with nice smell and relaxed music. The staffs were very friendly, gentle and efficient. It's right in the middle of shopping area of Bangkok. After long hours of shopping, it was nice to have a good relax massage. I would recommend to come here for massage.

Very professional massage. For me, it is worth and reasonable price. Very caring staffs and I was very relaxed. The most thing I like about this massage is Mali oil. It smells really good. My skin is very soft.

Fabulous Experience. This spa lives up to all of its excellent reviews. This was one of the best spa experiences I've ever had. The spa itself is beautiful and the staff were all friendly and accommodating. I had a fabulous facial treatment with their own product, therapist was absolutely amazing! (feel guilty that I forgot her name). The shower room has products which smell amazing. I can't wait to come back to use that spa again! :)

Superb!!!. So here I am writing a review after completing my 90 minute soontaree massage. I've never had an intense massage before and never thought I needed one. TRUST ME, I wish I got this kind of massages a lot sooner from Tar! Super sweet, soft spoken woman that welcomed letting her know if pressure or focus areas needed more attention. I didn't feel a need to tell her though because she was on point with both pressure and attention to problematic areas for my ‘office syndrome’. I didn't wanna leave the massage table after my 90 minute session wishing I signed up for the 120 minute session instead! 5 stars all the way for Panpuri Spa!
Excellent Spa & Service. My first time tried Mali Moonlight Massage, it help me relax. Tension & muscle spasms melt away. Love it, will come back for sure:)
Relax experience. Very good service and very comfortable. The staff is very nice and good location and have privacy. Keep it up.

Top of the range. I've been to a few spas in Thailand and this was definitely the best spa experience I had. Yes, the price was up there too, but if you want to treat yourself with something really nice once a while, then this is it. We were lucky that there we could walk in and they could slot us in immediately. Usually need to book in advance. The oil range to choose from was good. If you can't decide which oil just ask for ladies there for assistant, don't stress over it coz you meant to be there to distress. The services were great and their English was good enough to have a conversation. The ambience was relaxing without being overwhelming. And there's discount if you go during office hours so book ahead if you could.
Worth every penny. The best spa I have been so far! It was very clean and the masseuse was very professional. I will definitely return on my next visit.

Quality product and service. This is my first time at Panpuri spa but not the first time for their products because I usually use it at home that I can confirm it's so good. The spa gave me an awesome relaxing time, good services and also good quality products. In each spa room is very privatcy that no need to worry anything. I will come back again for sure

This place provides quality spa treatments.. We had two days where we went to Panputi Spa and on both times the massages were fantastic. This is definitely not a cheap place however the treatments are excellent and nothing short of this. They take care of you the second you walk in and I would not hesitate in going back there.
The best. I had 2-hour package for men, 30 mins body scrub and 90 mins muscle relaxation massage, it was heavenly. Tamarind scrub and lemongrass massage oil was what I picked, so good.
Good overall. Good overall. Clean environment. Cosy. Affordable price. Location is easy to access. Good service overall.

EXCELLENT SPA IN BKK. I have been to many spa in bkk. Panpuri is one of the best spa since I have been.The tip is to get a special promotion between 11am to 2pm.Scrub is good and smooth. A therapist is delicate and excellent and spa room is clean and luxury. Im strongly recommend this spa!!

Best massage in Thailand!. I had a body scrub and one hour massage and it was heaven! The amenities are beautiful, clean and it smells amazing. You get to tell hem how you'd like your massage. I hose firm and it was incredible. You shower in the room so no need to walk around in your robe. You get to select which scrub and oils are used by smelling them. It's more expensive than other massages in Bangkok but you get what you pay for! Totally worth it!

A perfect relaxing time!. It's my 3rd time to visit Panpuri Spa. 1st time i went with my boyfriend. A venue is very convenient location at Gaysorn Plaza, the center of shopping street in Bangkok. You can go by bts (Chidlom Station) or drive and park here. The atmosphere is very good and perfect for a relaxing time. I really like an organic products here especially a massage oil. When you come to spa, you can choose a scent of oil from 5 aroma. I prefer Geranium and Black Jasmine. A spa room is very stylish, unique and clean.They also have a couple room. The therapist is very polite and have a good professional services...i'm sure that i'll come back soon :) Recommend to experience a luxury organic spa here!

Truly heaven! Beyond any expectation!!. This luxury spa is conveniently located on the lobby floor of Gaysorn Plaza. From the second i walked in till the moment i leave, everything was such a pleasure. The venue and atmosphere is really good and beautiful, yet relaxing with the scent and sounds - totally love it. The staff and therapist are very friendly and attentive. They offered the best of service. Their manners are very good indeed. The massage/spa itself was just wonderful. I had the 90 mins aromatherapy which is just heavenly. They offer tea and fruit after the session too. I will definitely be back and would highly recommend this place to anyone.

Wow what an amazing place!. Really nice location, amazing atmosphere. They make you feel special as soon as you enter their doors and everything is done with care and grace. The smell of everything they use is amazing, the girls they have are beautiful and kind. It left such an impressions on me that I bought a big bottle of massage oil that they had, just so I could smell it every now and then. My friend liked it so much that he went 3 times in three days!

Average. The treatment starts with a heated neck cushion followed by a foot scrub/wash, a 60-min body massage and a 75-min facial. A 3-hr package at just 4200 bahts, in such a nice quiet, convenient location, definitely a good deal though we found the facial is a bit old school!Hint for couple, better go before you do shopping. They have not so big closet for keeping personal belongings.

Panpuri Spa. Stressed out from work..Cant wait.. #Panpuri_Spa was called..Relaxation here is great with excellence serviceAnd i was impressed by therapist, Khun Korn..He is really nice and cool So should be a member here

Value for money. My wife and I chosen Panpuri Spa based on the rating we found from TripAdvisor, and it is the nearest from our hotel. The two hours session recommended by the staff there were value for money, massager are very professional and skillful, and patient -- we were the last couple there before the end of their business hour, they don't seem to "rush" us to leave. In sum, we had a relaxed and rejuvenated spa experience there, and we are definitely will visit them again in our next trip to Bangkok.
Relaxing and smoothing. It was a 3 hours treatment. Excellence service, quality of their products are beyond doubt. Can't go wrong with them if you want quality down-time and relax your body.
