PHIPHATANUN . Very nice services of the staff with full of smile, polite, humble and attention to detail. Comfort room with calming feeling. Good massage and made me feel so relaxing. Great Natural Aroma oil massage helps to nourish and sooth my skin. Love it

Not exactly what I was looking for.. I reserved their 3-hour treatment but unfortunately left disappointed with the quality of the service. Reflecting on the good stuff, the space and overall ambience is beautiful, and from the moment I walked in, I was well looked after with a cold towel, tea and options for my package. Once we discussed the options, I was ushered to my private suite - it was incredible to say the least and extremely well equipped. My package included a body scrub (60 min), body massage (90 min) and concluded with an Indian head massage (30 min). The body scrub was by far the best part of the overall package - a great product/service, and especially nice to actually shower after the scrub, rather then enduring multiple warm towels to wipe off the product. I chose their most firmest massage but unfortunately it was anything but firm - I suppose I should’ve asked to intensify the delivery, but as someone who gets regular massages, I was also disappointed on the overall technique as there was little focus on muscle tension, it was more so relaxation. The Indian head massage was also disappointing with technique also lacking - it was more head rubbing, rather then a traditional Indian head massage.Taking out the showers I had at the beginning and end of the treatment, the total time was only 2 hours and 15 minutes, which was 45 minutes shorter than the 3 hour treatment I paid for. For almost 4000 THB, I wish that I went back to COMO Shambhala at the Metropolitan hotel.

very enjoy. I am very glad to have a chance to experience Panpuri Organic Spa. Before I walked in, I was a little bit irritated by the hot weather in Bangkok at the beginning. Then, the staff served me with a cup of iced-cold tea and hand towel, and my irritation from the “heat” was all gone at the moment. After filling out the customer information, the staff explained to me for a Spa procedure and the options from the scents of the massage oils. I chose lemongrass massage oil because I like the refreshing and light scent in the summer. However, I’ve tried the Thai massage on the street yesterday and it didn’t relax my sore muscles at all. Thus, I am looking forward to enjoying Panpuri’s spa service today. The staff guided me into a mysterious spa room and gave me a brief spa procedure.Then, the spa session begins! I thought it was just a regular Thai massage with essential oils. The therapist used the strong force to massage from my feet to the whole body, even the sore parts of my muscles, and of course, the lemongrass smell was very pleasant as well. After 15 minutes, the treatment from the therapist let go of my tiredness and soreness. However, I always needed to rinse off the massage oil after the regular spa sessions. To my surprise, my skin completely absorbed Panpuri organic spa’s essential oil after the session and no need to rinse it off. Spa room was decorated in a luxury, mysterious style with scented candles. Bathroom and toilet are separated in a simple style as well.The Siamese water shower gel and shampoo are full of beautiful jasmine aroma, which brings me a sense of refreshing. I am looking forward to another panpuri organic spa session soon.

Impressive at first visit. Hi everyone, I'm Chonlawit (Jeff) from Thailand. These days I have business trip around Bangkok for a week, after I finished busy weekend, I want to relax and do the face treatment. I started searching a right place from a local website then I came across this spa called "Panpuri Organic Spa" is very interesting. With the easy to access location in the heart of Bangkok, I walk only 5 minutes from Chidlom Skytrain Station to thse lobby of Gaysorn Plaza Department Store. It's very easy to find.Apart from that, the staffs are very nice. They smile and talk to customers in a good manner. I am really impressed the service here. That day, it was not too busy, so I can look around the shop. The products are awesome as well, they are mainly made from jasmine and organic ingredients which can help anti-aging system, the staff said. I did facial treatment for 75 minutes, I feel very relaxed, comfortable and my face is brighter, skin was softer after doing that with the aroma therapy could make me sleep. The therapists are nice and friendly and they don't push any hard sales on you. There are both facial treatment and whole body available. You may search from its website to reserve and check the promotions. I can tell that it's worth for my money and I was happy. I strongly recommend this Panpuri Organic Spa to Trip Advisor and everyone.Thank you and have a nice day.

Wonderful journey. It was impressive since I walked through the entrance with a genuine smile and warm welcome from spa receptionist. The room was fully equipped with luxury amenities, very hygiene and private with relaxing smell of signature blend essential oil. I had an organic body scrub from well-train therapist, leave my skin so soft and smooth like a baby. Total experience was truly pampering.
Best of the best. Relax, best service and very professional. I tried many spas around the world and I can say that Panpuri is one of the best. I love their products used in all processes.
Great Massage. This was a fantastic experience from start to finish! Very professional with attention to detail and a unique massage experience.
Relax Place!!. I did the facial mask there. The staff very polite and helpful.Really good sense of Organic ! Feel like a queen.

Most relaxing treat after a long day's walk. Both husband and I had an 1.5hour aromatherapy massage. It was the most relaxing experience. The 1.5hour just flew by!!The environment was very clean, spacious and calming. Perfect ambience for a relaxing massage. Masseuse were very professional. Bed was very comfy!Had a bit of trouble getting the shower to the right temperature, but that's ok.The treatment had definitely removed all the tiredness and aches on my legs from day's walk at Chatuchak.Very good value, highly recommended.

Treated like royalty. Wow! Im so impressed with this spa. Its the little touches they added that made the whole experience wonderful. You will have to just go there and check it out yourself.Total luxe. Love this place.

Super perfect . When i walked in to treat into the shop and all staffs are very warm welcome with their smile & welcome drink, one of them advised me which program is suitable.Then, they prepared all amenities such as bathrobe, oil, the box to put your stuff  The women staff take care and treat as smooth as flawless. u know I used to massage many places but here is super perfect and the location is convenience to go (in the heart of city) stop at chidlom skytrain station Thank u all so much to make a real relax day for me:)

Ideal Spa Experience!. We had the most incredible experience at Panpuri Organic Spa! The atmosphere was so relaxing and calming. Ideal ambiance! The products were fantastic quality - gentle & so cleansing! They spoke perfect English and were so accommodating to special requests. I cannot wait for my next visit!

Full satisfaction. I have had the most relaxing massage ever. The staff was welcoming, spoke good English and asked me about all wishes. I could take a shower before the massage in a private bathroom, drinks and everything needed was provided. The massage was proceeded according to my wishes. I can really recommend the spa if you want to recharge your batteries.

Exceptional, a real treat.. As a Londoner who is an expat in Bangkok I’ve been to a lot of good massage places and hands down Panpuri is the best in the city. If you are here on a trip add it to your itinerary, if you live here and go to the spa often make Panpuri part of your routine. The staff optimizes Thai hospitality, all speak good English, and thoroughly explain all the treatments and will give you a choice of a whole range of different organic massage oils to pick before you begin your massage and let you pick the one best suited to you mood and preference. This is actually one of my favorite parts as they place a small drop on your arm let you smell each oil and then gently wipe it off to show you the next one.I’ve been to the spa multiple times and this time I picked the Samruam Luk Pra Kob Herbal Tranquility Massage which makes use of the traditional Thai Herbal Hot Compress which I had never experienced before. This massage was the perfect way to kick off my weekend on a Friday night after a long week at work. I could feel the stress leaving my body with this massage and I recommend the compress massage to anyone looking to treat themselves. There are lots of places you could chose to go in Bangkok for a massage but Panpuri gets it right with all the little details such as offering you a cold organic beverage and wonderfully scented cold cloth to wipe your face before you begin, to the complementary foot scrub with each treatment, to putting beautiful flowers floating in a bowl so that when you are face down on the massage table when you open your eyes you are not looking at the floor but rather a splash of beauty. Panpuri is my go to place not only for myself but where I take out of town guest to treat them. I can’t wait for my next visit. 5-Stars all the time, every time.
The best experience. Good location when ladies are finished their shopping, caring and professional staffWill revisit when we return to Bangkok

Lovely place quality time.. Today was raining in BKK i have chance to get to this spa and i love it.*Impression*When i walk in the spa. The lady at reception offer me if i need to change or use the towel so i would feel more comfortable.She prepared the herbal lotus drink awhile i wait for the spa. And asked me which flavors of oil i would prefer. They have about 5 different smell as different oil for different purposes like Skin care, relax massage or muscle release.The spa is really good decoration like 5 stars hotel, and they have private shower and restroom in the spa room and make me feel really private.(some place i've been they have 1~2 changing room and the staff will manage the traffic so the guess not come in the same time) She starts to clean my feet with warm water and bargamot lime. And she described how this work for my health. And also warm herbal neck pillow awhile she clean my feet.The process of message is really nice i asked for my shoulder and back spot as i was stress from the gym yesterday and she spent time enough to release the stress on my shoulder and back.For the small girl i found out that she has more strength than me!!!! The massage is not too weak or too heavy and the level is stable for 1 hour (normally i asked for the man to do the massage because i like it hard)Awhile massaged she dim the light to get the perfect spot of relaxation and the music not to loud or too low.After finish she took me to the lobby, and lovely reception again bring me the lotus herbal tea.I'd spent many hour at massage place around bangkok. I would say Panpuri is the one that really like. For the service and atmosphere. I've Really enjoy my 1 hour in this place. "They changed my bad raining day to the bright and relax and stress away day."

Best Spa in BKK. Firstly I spent great time at Panpuri Spa, but only one thing was disappointed me. When I called shop to make reservation, the receptionist didn't understand English even phone number. I told my phone number again and again, but she couldn't catch it, and finally terminated phone call from her. She told me to call back 10min later, but how? Of course I did't get call back. I am sorry for not speaking Thai language, but I think to hearing the number is required skill for receptionist at least. Well let me share about good point. The receptionist was helpful and nice. I felt welcomed indeed. I got summer promotion which 3 hours treatment: foot bath, body scrub, herbal ball massage and head massage. Products and atmosphere was great. Heat mat was good to prevent for feeling cold. Tamarind scrub made my body so bright. It would be more better, if the therapist offered me to some drinks during treatment. 3 hours is too long without hydrate. (I found a bottle of water in the room by myself) But totally, I was satisfied with treatment.

Excellence Spa. This was an amazing experience with Punpuri Organic Spa. The staff were very professional and polite. The rooms was beautiful with good smell & very relaxing music. I felt comfortably on the warming bed. I was very relaxed and enjoyed my massage.I was given a hot tea with organic fruit after my journey.Punpuri Spa was such an amazing experience for me. Highly recommend!!!

Premium service. This was a one off experience as I don't usually go for massages since I have very sensitive back muscles. However this spa(which is morrocan style) was very helpful because I was given a diagram to choose the exact parts of the body I wanted massaged to save any awkward ticklish incidents. The morrocan style room and shower was very pleasing and unique. I would recommend this place to anyone who wants a 'real' massage. I was very surprised with the options of oils I could choose and the type of massage I wanted. This spa caters to anyone so I assure you, you wont be unhappy with the service.

The ultimate luxurious relaxation experience!!. If you're looking for a luxury spa experience, look no further!This place is amazing. We went for a massage and I felt like I'd checked out of Bangkok and stepped into a peaceful relaxing haven. The essential oils they use for the massage smell and feel wonderful, and Panpuri do a whole lot to make sure u have a calming experience. They sprayed a wonderful fragrance over my massage bed as I was getting massaged. I wanted to stay and sleep on the massage bed afterwards because it was just so relaxing! The best spa I've been to, the service is fantastic as are the facilities. The staff were very professional and very friendly, and brought us organic coconut water and herbal tea. The interior design of this place is so beautiful, I felt like royalty. Most definitely worth a visit, I highly recommend this place! There's also a shop that sells all of the essential organic oils and candles. Nothing bad to say about this place at all.

Excellent Service in central Bangkok area. My massage at Pañpuri started early in the morning and lasted for one hour. I had a foot and leg massage and the service I received was amazing. Super friendly and respectful staff members, attention to detail and, of course, a great service. Fluent in English, they asked me a few times about the adequacy of the pressure and temperature. And their shop is also very nice! Incredible vanilla and rose butter creams, very recommended!In one word, the whole experience was wonderful!

As good as it gets!. To put it simply, this was the best package I have experienced. The staff were exceptional, very kind, professional and attentive. My girlfriend and I went together and were catered to with a couples room. My massage was superb and my girlfriend was very, very happy with her facial. Will definitely be going back again soon. Phenomenal service!

Panpuri is Always a Good Idea and a Sure Bet. The Mali-Anantara Gentlemen’s Energizing Facial is incredible. I was at Panpuri once before for a massage which was great and came back and decided to have a facial this time. Most guys don't think to get a facial but I actually loved it, it was incredible and so relaxing. This is the best spa I have been to in my life. As an expat in Bangkok I have been to lots of spas and Panpuri hands down beats them all, they have me as a regular now and I can't say enough about the professionalism of the staff and how truly wonderful they are. Also the foot treatment that comes complementary each time you go is a nice touch. Well done Panpuri! Highly recommended.

Amazing Experience!. This was my first experience with Punpuri Spa and absolutely loved it. A friend of mine had recommended it and I'm glad he did! When I first arrived I was greeted by such a friendly staff. I was given water and towel, while they went over the package deals with me. The one staff member recommended one to me, and I'm glad she did as it was amazing. I was taken back into one of the rooms where it was beautiful. A little room with candles, music, shower and all to myself. The therapist was kind and made sure that I was comfortable in the bed before she started working. While she was massaging me she made sure the pressure was okay for me. I have been to many massages and not once had I felt as comfortable as I had here! I was relaxed and enjoying my massage. She had worked on the parts of my body that I had asked for a little more attention and did a terrific job. I was sore when I went in and totally relaxed when I had left. Leaving the spa I was given a hot tea a fruit to enjoy while I sat and relaxed before I left. Such an amazing experience and I highly recommend Panpuri Spa. I can't wait for my second visit!

Experience at Panpuri Organic Spa. I am from Canada and am living in Bangkok for the following year and have been to several different massage parlours around both areas. That said, Panpuri was deffiantly the most beautiful spa I have ever seen. I recently heard about Panpuri from several different people and decided to treat myself by getting a massage. I have never received something so de-stressing, as the environment was extremely relaxing, not to mention the spa itself was absolutely gorgeous. The staff were very friendly, calming and and spoke fluent english which made it easier to understand as to why each product was being used. My skin has never felt so smooth nor have I ever felt so mellow, as I did not want to leave. I recommend this spa to everyone as it offers many different treatments that are suitable for all people.
Such a pleasure experience!. It's my first time to experience Panpuri spa. It's a unique and refined method of every details. Love it so much!
recommend to all of u. professional staffs,environment and products and covenience location very good experience and will recommend to my friends

Best yet.. My partner and I have visited many spas in Bangkok at various levels. Panpuri was our best yet - based on ambience, service, massage technique/experience and product. We returned for a second massage on our recent visit to Thailand as once was not enough. Special thank you to my therapist Kon.

Excellent Spa Experience. We had excellent 90 mins body massage and 60 mins facial treatment. The masseurs were very professional. The spa location is very good, in the shopping center right next to four face Buddha. We would definitely go back.

LOVELY experience. I did a 1 hour massage with my boyfriend. The place was very clean and nicely furnished (like a hotel!) The staff was very friendly and professional. I felt so pampered during the whole process. I fell in love with the products and bought some handcreams as souvenirs at the airport (it's slightly cheaper). I would definitely go back next time I go to Bangkok!

Phantastic treatment. The spa is in Gaysorn shopping center and easy to reach and find. I pre-booked a 2 hours 45 min package with massage, body scrub and facial. The place is super clean, stylish furnitured and the staff is extremly friendly and professional. All treatments were excellent!I can only recommend the place and will definitly come back!Tipp: ask for special rates on weekdays and mornings!
Very satisfied. I've been here with my girl friend. We recieved 2 hour program at black room. Room was very romantic and massage was very nice. I'd like to visit again.
Nok. The Receiptionist is so kind and warmly welcomed when I arrived. I spent 75 mins. here with facial scrub. The Therapist was nice and good quality of Therapist's work, I would highly recommend.

Pure bliss !!. From when we walked in we were warmly greeted. The front desk lady was kind and made sure we comfortable while we waited. The massage was out of this world. Back in the states (California) I visit Burke Williams and I must say, if they had this chain out there they would most definitely give them a run for their money. When I visit Thailand again I will Certainly make a stop back here.
Never disappoint me!. Panpuri spa is always my favourite spa. The staff gave a very warm welcome and the spa itself was superb! I'm looking for next visits!
Soothing, relaxing. This is my first time at here and i will be back again very soon. Nice atmosphere. Excellent service especially nong som. Thank you Panpuri for giving me such a great time.

Amazing Spa in Bangkok. Today we went to panpuri spa at Gaysorn plaza for me and my boyfriend. We chose the jasmine oil massage and coffee body scrub. When we arrived we got a warm welcome from the receptionist and the therapists are both very polite and they take good care of the customers wishes. In the beginning of the treatment we were so in love with the bath ritual, they have many different flavors to chose. make you feel very relaxed and enjoying with next step of the treatment. The therapist was so professional and highly skilled. After treatment we shower and use some panpuri products. The jasmine body wash its my favorite one. The massage room is very clean and the bed so comfortable, I didn't wanna leave it :). We enjoyed our treatment today and can't wait to come back again. If you are looking for a good massage or treatment, you should definitely try this place, highly recommended.

awfully great!. Today we went to the Pañpuri Spa. The best decision we could make was to choose exactly this Spa. Perfection from the beginning until the end. The staff asked us which kind off massage we want to have, which oil we prefer and where the focus should be on our body.The massage was awfully great. I felt so comfortable!Honestly a experience everyone should have at least once in a lifetime!

Best Spa Treatment ever!. Today me and my girls went to the Pañpuri Spa because after a few weeks in Bangkok we felt like we needed a nice facial treatment. We had an appointment and the staff was already awaiting us when we arrived. It was such a warm welcome and they described the treatment perfectly to us before they started. The whole atmosphere of the spa is fantastic, the staff is super professional and really lovely and gave each of us an individual treatment. The facial felt like heaven and the result was just amazing. I loved the different products they used and really enjoyed the massages they gave us. At the end i was so sad that it was over - I'll definitly come back.

Luxury day. I'm very happy that my friends organised a relaxed day for us in The Panpuri Organic Spa! From the first moment of our arrival we were treated like princess and that kind of feeling lasted during our whole stay.I had a facial treatment with organic products that was amazing! Everything was perfect...I wouldn't change anything about this place! Friendly staff and professionality!!! Highly recommended...

An excellent oasis of calm in the busy city! Definitely worth it. I had the opportunity to try this gem of a spa during a break between sight seeing and shopping in Bangkok. I had the traditional Thai massage and all I can say is .... Wow!! The facility is beautiful, the staff is excellent and you leave feeling refreshed, relaxed and rejuvenated. I would definitely recommend this experience to any traveller looking for a massage in Bangkok, I can't wait to go again!!

Fully recharged!. PROSexcellent quality of productComfy massage bedVery very relax roomProfessional masseur Soft lighting and musicCONSPrice ( if they don't have promotion)I must re visit to Panpuri spa again In my next Bangkok trip. Don't forget to visit their boutique store next to the spa. Their spa products are excellent.

Best Massage I've had in a long time. I have been living in Bangkok for five years now and have at least one massage a week. I decided to splash out in this place as I've tried their oils before and liked their aroma. I was the only customer when I got their and the reception staff were very welcoming and professional. After talking about what sort of massage I would like my masseur, Korn, led me to the massage room.The room was large and very serene with beautiful soft blue lighting. It had a large private shower room attached and I the bed was very slightly heated, which made it feel like slipping into a warm bed. The massage was excellent, possibly the best I've had in Bangkok, and the masseur was so conscientious. I would really recommend this spa to anyone who is looking for a luxurious massage that's a cut above the a lot of other spas.

Great way to relax in the city. Amazing experience. The spa is beautiful and well presented! (I was slightly late for my appointment and they made no fuss - I was even given slightly longer than my scheduled time).The receptionist, Nok, was very friendly and took time to explain all the different treatments available. And Jenny, my masseuse, was incredible and very professional.I would definitely recommend for anyone looking for a high quality massage in a nice setting.

treat urself with a true tranquil & relaxing spa in da middle of shopping heaven. On my shopping day, i popped into this little luxurious spa hideaway, Panpuri, just to get an hour away from handful christmas shopping.To my surprise, the spa menus are very interesting, u wl find one of your own for sure.the prices are attractive and there is not much que.i got selection of massage and the oil and went right in.the ambience changed vividly to calm, serene, with tranquil music.i felt good already.the massage therapist was very good. The treatment was with the right tone, at the right spots, and the last thing i knew before falling asleep, was the oil used here is exceptional.you will definitely wanna take ur favorite oil home.. I love a few exotic Thai aromas, they are quite different from other spas.i left with such an awesome feel and and a plan to return.I noticed that they offer promotional packages for all walk-ins too.Go shop & give yourself a treat.

Great service, lovely products (but high end prices). We came here on a buy one get one free Wednesday - highly recommend it if you can squeeze it into your schedule. It means you can either bring a friend and get the second treatment free, or you can choose two treatments for the same person and get the second treatment free. We went for the Maliwan invigorating facial with eye lift treatment each (at 3500 baht) and the signature massages (around 2900-3100 baht each). These prices have yet to include the 7% VAT. The therapists were professional and friendly, and my therapist had a very delicate touch. I found my whole treatment relaxing and she checked in with me from time to time to make sure everything was ok. The oil products are supposedly all organic and it definitely smelled wonderful. The price for two people for a full 3 hour treatment was around 6500+ baht. Very good for a top quality spa! Overall the spa was spotless clean, and the ambience of 4/5 star quality. One of the best spas we have visited in BKK so far, although at full price it's definitely in the expensive range. It is, after all, within Gaysorn - sporting some of the highest end brands. It was a lovely 3 hours well spent. One note - we shopped at the panpuri product shop next door, and found moments later that central world (shopping mall) across the street sold the exact same products for an extra 5% off ... Just know that the adjacent shop may not be the cheapest; but you do get top quality service to try out all the products before you purchase. Another note is that they are one of the larger aromatherapy/skin product companies in BKK, which reminds me a bit of Thann, but panpuri boasts certified organic products; if you're into the authentic independent Thai experience e.g. wooden floors, religious statues and sarongs, this wouldn't be the place - it's more an upscale modern hotel style spa with zen decor and dark, sleek overtones.

relax and forget about the rest. I tried Panpuri's products and really love them. So, I decided to try the spa...What a wonderful experience. The quality of the massage and the aromatic oils met my expectations. The staff was discrete and professional. I highly recommend Panpuri spa.

Good facial massage. I went to do facial for 75 mins. The services and the quality of products are good .I can feel the better change after. The price is fair for me compare with the service and product that they use. Transportation is comfortable to go too.

Wonderful spa in bangkok . I went to Pañpuri Organic Spa in Gaysorn mall for a facial treatment (gift from my boyfriend!). I’m not usually a big fan of spa: #1 they make me feel a bit shy and #2 I have a very sensitive skin and I don’t trust anyone but me to take care of it. But this one is different. Everyone (receptionist, therapists) was so lovely and welcoming that I immediately felt “at home”. Before the ritual starts they took the time to ask me some questions to make sure the treatment would be perfectly suited to my skin type and to my tastes - they take health and well-being very seriously and only use organic products including the towels (!). The ritual itself was amazing and so were the delicate scents of jasmine and rose (only essential oils, I was told), the therapists obviously know what they are doing. I couldn’t believe how soft and comfortable my face was afterwards. Right after the treatment I was offered a delicious herbal tea that left me feeling even more relaxed and comfy. By far the best spa I’ve ever been, a wonderful experience. I would go back every week if I could…

Great relaxing experience . I had a one-hour full body oil massage and it was a wonderful experience. The staff was professional and spoke very good English, the massager was also lovely and finally the massage itself and the premises were very satisfying. So I highly recommend this place if you are looking for some peace and quiet in crazy Bangkok :-)

A good choice in the land of spas. Panpuri was another must try on the list of Bangkok spas. We decided to stop by for an impromptu visit after lunch and the receptionist was kind enough to fit us in for a one hour massage. The spa is located at the basement level.The husband and I both chose the stress relieving massage and were able to select our favorite scents - lemongrass and rose respectively.We were showed into our massage room and our massages started. Being a novice toThai massages (I usually get Swedish massages), I underestimated the strength of the petite Thai therapists - they are strong. The medium pressure was a bit much for me at certain points but boy do I feel great after the massage. All the knots were massaged away and I felt like a warm puddle of water - no bones. This spa is highly recommended. Make an appointment for 90 minutes; an hour is difficult to immerse in the experience.

Will be back for more.... Came here with my family after a morning of shopping...the overall experience was good and the therapists were skillful with every pressure points and their experienced strokes shortly send my husband into a deep sleep! My daughter also did a full body aromatic massage using baby oil. We are looking forward to patronize your service again and hopefully not too long :)

Exquisite serenity! Some new Thai experiences to try!. I'm not a big fan spa, but this organic spa was exceptional! I was so impressed with a great service since got there, mint-scented cold towel and an organic drink ready to serve. it was an hour full of relaxation inside the aromatic room. I had the Youthful Facial package. The therapist was very gentle to my face as she massaged. It was very relaxing that I felt asleep during the session. At the end of the session, I could feel that my face is softer and very smooth! I came out the room found the organic tea and dragon fruit waiting for me! Overal experience I was very impressed and totally come back again!

Great therapist. I have a high standard for massage. The therapist was really good. Her hands were tender and smooth enough. The strengh she used was just right and she knew what a customer wants. She was obviously well trained and didn't disappear like other spa shops' therapists did. I think the therapist makes all the difference in deciding whether the spa is good or not.There was soft relaxing music. Room was very clean. Bed was covered with electric warm blanket, which was good because the air-con was quite cold.I did a tailored organic spa package. I was only allowed to choose the massage oil but not the body scrub as the consultant simply recommended me the coconut scrub. It would be even better if i am allowed to choose the scrub as well.

Amazing experience. Good servicesThe environment is excellence, the therapist is kind and warm.The most important the shop is next to the spa. U can buy what u like after treatment. That is so convenient .I must be back again and again.

So nice and relax. I went to try Spa here where recommended by my friend. And i was like OMG!!! Everything start from welcome until farewell was very peaceful relax and nice. The price is very worth for about it.

Beautiful Spa in Bangkok. I was recommended this place by a friend who lives in Bangkok as somewhere a bit more special than other places across the city. It’s located downstairs in the Gaysorn mall- so both convenient and very easy to locate. On this trip I went for a 90-minute facial and found it be excellent. The staff are very friendly- they helped me choose the right treatment and made me feel very relaxed and ease. I should also add that the spa itself is wonderful- it has a luxury feel and feels very upscale. The treatment itself- oh wow! There were a number of stages using a variety of products- from gentle exfoliating, herbal presses, soothing cream and a glorious floral toner. In addition to all this there was a gentle body massage whilst the face mask was applied. It is difficult to think of what was missing or how I would change this treatment. The Panpuri products are wonderful- high quality, sensual and very good for my skin. The treatment ended with a fresh cup of tea and papaya and I am sure I will be attending again. Top tip- go earlier in the day when it is less busy

Perfect Refuge from Bangkok Madness. I had a wonderful visit to Panpuri Organic Spa last week! From the warm welcome at the reception to a truly unique and relaxing facial, everything was perfect. The organic products they used made my skin feel refreshed after a day in the BKK smog. I also really enjoyed the mini Thai massage at the end of the treatment. Additionally, the beds are heated which made for a very cozy and comfortable experience! All of the staff are extremely professional and the atmosphere is great. Overall, cannot recommend this place enough!

Thailand Best Organic Spa. I went to the spa on Sep. I so impressed with "everything that touch you body is organic. I picked the deep tissue massage with Lemonglass and Mandarin massage oil. The oil scent is so unique and lovely. The therapist had a good technique to remove all of my muscle pain( i am a fitness model). The ambience is good and i really really luv the warm bed which I never found from otherspa. The spa has a great promotion buy 1 get 1free cos I am AIS Serenade member. Valued for price paid. I will visite your spa agian before flying to LA this month.

Very nice spa in Gaysorn Shopping Centre. This is one of the nicest massage places I have tried in Bangkok. Very nice facilities and and uses only organic aroma therapy products that smell wonderful. Overall and very relaxing experience that was worth the price. This place is more expensive then the average massage in BKK but you get all the premium service and facility that you would expect for the price.

Luxury pampering. There is no place like Bangkok when it comes to massage and body treatments and I cannot recommend Panpuri organic spa highly enough. It truly was a luxurious treat. It feels like a sanctuary right in the middle of the city.The staff is extremely warm, professional and attentive. I was greeted with tea, a comprehensive menu of treatments to choose from and a warm towel to wipe my face and hands.The lady at the front desk was extremely helpful in explaining the various types of treatments and helping me select the best one for me.I was also given a selection of oils to choose from for the massage. The massage therapist and the ambience were just outstanding. This place is focused on total relaxation and I left feeling rejuvenated and craving for more. One of the best pampering experiences I've ever had.I totally recommended it.

Truly Relaxing Experience. I made an appointment around 7:15 PM but arrived a bit late, the staffs were warm and welcoming and ushered me to sit down and sip cold welcome drink. The receptionist was very detailed in asking me health questions and specific needs - very attentive.The therapist followed exactly my request - soft hands massage and never forget to ask if the pressure was right. I loved the heated bed! Never found that in any other spa. Very unique settings, feels like in a heavenly forest! Would definitely return.

Bangkok’s best spa retreat ever. Had my first experience at Panpuri organic spa the other day. It was surprisingly wonderful.Ideally located in the heart of Bangkok’s shopping area, with convenient access to BTS Chidlom station. Staff were warm welcoming and very informative.I had the Prana Stress Relieving massage for one hour. The treatment starts with the organic foot soak, followed by the body massage. The massage therapist knows the exact target spots to relieve stiffness and correct the issue quickly. Plus the skilled hands and healing touch of the therapist's on my body was so perfect. I had a really relaxing time. The treatment ended with a heavenly head, shoulder and neck massage.Not many spa places in Bangkok can offer organic spa, combining with the skilled massage therapists, great rooms with pleasant décor. For those who suffer from back pain or office syndrome, I would highly recommend to try the Prana Stress Relieving massage. I can say this place would be my favorite spa from now on. Absolutely can't wait to come back again :)

Fantastic SPA. Everything was perfect. The staff is very professional. They are attentive, discreet, and very nice.Cares were perfect and suitable for man skin. Product used are organic, very good qualityMoreover, the place is chic, nestled in the mall "Gaysorn" in the heart of Bangkok. A little bit expensive but a real value for money. Ben (France)

I recommend this SPA to everyone. Nearly everybody goes to a SPA centre when visiting Bangkok. I am no special. Howver, I usually go to the SPA centre at the hotels I stay at. I won’t bother travelling to one even though the price is usually more reasonable or the place accessible. However, the divine experiences I got from Panpuri Gaysorn Bangkok have changed me. One afternoon I was wandering in the shopping mall for nothing. And I walked pass the Panpuri shop. Out of curiosity, I browsed their price list at the front door. Soon a man came out and greeted me. He introduced me the different treatments offered by the SPA. And he said that there would be a 15% discount for treatments after 1930. At that time I was not sure about my itinerary and so didn’t make any appointments. After a while I was bored at my hotel room and so I called the shop. Luckily there is a room for the treatment and so I rushed there. The price for a full-body treatment was about 2200 bahts. After discussing with the beautifician, they recommended another treatment which was cheaper. I then made the payment. Not long after the man who greeted me earlier discovered that they didn’t offer me the discount. He informed me about it and I got my money back. This was a very noble thing he did. Honesty goes a long way. And soon I was directed to the SPA room, which was comfortable and spacious. The messeuse did a great job. The oils they used smelt great. For your info, there are Rose, Lemongrass, Vetiver, Jasmine and one more (I forgot) oils to choose from. They claim that their products are natural. I am no expert in the field so I can’t make any comments. The experience was impressive. Everybody was nice and professional. I went to my hotel feeling relaxed and blissful. And the next day I couldn’t help making another appointment there and enjoyed my last night in Bangkok. Time was so precious and I chose to spend my evening there again. And next time when I visit the city, I will definitely go there again. And I recommend this SPA to everyone who loves aromatic massages.I love Panpuri and I love Thailand.

Best Spa in Bangkok Hands Down. I recently visited the Panpuri Organic Spa in Bangkok and I can say hands down it was the best spa visit I have ever had. I am an expat in Bangkok and have visited multiple spas and Panpuri by far blows them all out of the water. Tong was the front desk clerk, he greeted me and immediately brought me a delicious cold flower drink. I signed up to get the Prana Stress Relieving Massage and a Maliwan Invigorating Facial with Eye LIft Treatment and Tong thoroughly explained all the treatments. I have a bad back and he helped me select the correct massage that would be most beneficial to relief some tension.From there I entered the treatment room which was in itself a reason to go to the spa. The interiors are beautiful and are a must see with lit candles in the rooms. I felt like I was in a scene from a movie; it was gorgeous. My spa therapist was Maew and she was great and is truly a professional. She checked in with me multiple times to make sure the pressure that she was applying was appropriate and to my liking. Also the facial was amazing, I fell asleep for a brief moment I was so relaxed. The foot scrub was also really relaxing and the perfect way to start the treatment. Even the golden bowl that my feet were placed in to soak was beautiful and I felt right at home and totally relaxed even before my massage began. The only regret I have about this experience is that I didn't book myself in for a longer appointment and I was there for over two hours, I didn't want to leave! Finally when I was done I was served more relaxing tea and brought organic dragon fruit which I had no idea was so incredibly delicious. I can't really put into words how great and unique this spa is, you really have to see it for yourself, it is unlike any other spa I have ever been to and is my new favorite. The staff were wonderful, totally sweet and kind with absolutely no pretentiousness, they were just great. If you really want to treat yourself and experience a Thai spa that is hands down the best of the best this is the one you want to visit. I went in on a Friday morning and left feeling great and felt relaxed and wonderful the entire weekend. Thank you Panpuri, I will be back, count me in as a regular client.

2.5 Hours Sunrise Lemon Invigorating Treatment. It was a great spa escape. Overall experience is superior. Providing that this spa is locating in the middle of the city, I can find an absolute sanctuary being here. The treatment started with steam, foot bath/scrub, body scrub (the scrub itself is not painful; the feel after is sillky), bath, and of course, oil massage! It has to be said here that the therapist is very well trained. The massage is super relaxing. I fell asleep half-way after and woke up once it's over. Absolutely a recommend.

First class organic spa one of its kind in the world. Every girls oasis away for few hours.. Living in Thailand as an expat for the past 10 years I was fortunate to experience Thai culture and spas. PANPURI completely is a different experience than what you would get even at the. Ritz Carlton or Four Seasons in the US. Located in the beautiful upscale Gaysorn Plaza PANPURI Organic Spa truly bar none. Purpose for my first time visit was to take my Korean mom visiting from California who has never experienced a spa in her whole humble life. I wanted only the best and leave a lasting experience to remember for our mother daughter bonding time.The lobby and staff are professional and consult your problem areas and take their time asking questions and also offer and educate you on the high quality essencial massage oils. Each room has a private room. They start you off with Rose water foot bath in dim lighting with aroma oils and meditating soothing music (not the annoying kind you are forced to listen at other spas). This is probably my 20th time at a spa massage experience in my entire life and for the first time PANPURI really puts you in another euphoric mind set and body. At the end the offer you wonderful tea and light snack. When it was time to leave my mom would not get off the lounge area. She was in shock of the wonderful experience she just encountered. I would highly recommend this for any local or tourist who wants an out of body experience to relieve stress, relaxing, and soothing mind and soul.

My very first visit at Panpuri Organic Spa. I don't hesitate to rate this spa as 5 star literally. The moment that I walked-in, all staffs gave a very warm welcome by Wai greeting which I was really impressive, and served me with welcome drink which could refresh myself from my tiring day. I chose aromatherapy& massage with signature oil (jasmin oil) for my relaxation, The therapist is very well-trained who could provide excellent massage skill, very humble, polite and very attentive for all the details that I was really relaxed, calm and comfortable also I could feel my back pain condition has been relieved incredibly . Another point that I really love this spa is all products that being used for customer, are made from natural organic stuff even towel.....In terms of the price...is very reasonable compare to the excellent services and luxurious products provided. At last I would definitely come over again and this spa is very recommended to all those need a true relaxation.

One of the great spa experience. I had a chance to try Panpuri spa last week and it was really impeccable. Since I first stepped in, staff gave a genuine warm welcome with welcome drink and spa service advice. I must say all staffs from receptionist, spa therapist and salesperson at the shop are well-trained. They know what they are doing and what they are selling! Talking about the spa, it is very private with luxurious ambience. The smell is great. Also, the staff taking care of me is polite, well-trained and really friendly. Please keep up the good work!I surely recommend my friends to try Panpuri spa!

Excellence service. My mom and I visited Panpuri Organic Spa for the 2.5 hours SUNRISE LEMON INVIGORATION TREATMENT. The treatments were relaxing and professional and the service was efficient and friendly. Everything they used is ORGANIC. So, if you love organic, Panpuri Organic Spa best fit with you.

Amazing Spa.. #Panpuri #organic #spa ;____________________________ It's amazing spa. This spa is luxury, very private, peaceful, service mind. ____________________________I try body massage with the jasmine scent. I was so relaxing and fall asleep.____________________________ I feel lovely this place.

My best Spa Experience !. The Spa looks luxurios but the price is very reasonable comparing to Spa in those 5stars Hotels ! The staff at the reception paid well attention since I was arriving, explaning all the massage programmes and essential oils and their effect to my sences. My massage therapist was so goodlike really really good, like you can tell he has a good trainning and practices.The Oil + whole body massage was so good that I felt like new after 90 min. The Bed is heated and also the lemonglass smell (I chose), came across the room from time to time. I like also the all wooden floor (even in the shower, quite sexy for me). They use organic towel, it is a bit softer than usual towel, quite lovely !It's worth my money and I knew at the end that they have promotion with a certian credit institute which you have the deal "buy 1 get 1 free", unfortunately I didnt have a credit card from the Bank. I had a wonderful visit there !

Good choice for spa. As a frequent traveler to Bangkok, finding a good spa treatment is no longer a hassle for me now. Panpuri Organic Spa, situated at the basement of Gaysorn Shopping Centre, is my first choice to locate a relaxation moment there. Their service, quality and location are definitely comparable to other hotels while it's value for money than those spa in 5 star hotels. Their receptionist are also very friendly and polite who give full consultation, explanation of the products they use for my massage. The environment is nice which gives much privacy to customers, leaving the mood ready for a spa journey. It's a wonderful experience for me there and I shall come over to this spa every time I visit to Bangkok. Good trial and hope they will open up more branches at Bangkok.

My favorite Organic spa!!!!!. I had revisited this spa at the end of April.The new expandsion of the spa looks very relaxing with Zen style. The flower arragement at the counter was impressive.The girl who welcome me was very polite and she helped me to select the teatment with all useful information. I choosed the deep tissue massage as I am a Gym addict. Khun Pom was my therapist. Her skill is top notch and the pressure just what I want. The massage bed was very confortable. The room is a bit small but very luxury. The products were all organic. My experience just fabulous. Thanks to Pom to remove all of my pain. I had no wonder why this spa won Day Spa of the Year 1014. Highly recommend and definatly come back soon.

More relaxing/More aroma and wonder more comfortable!. Wow! It's amazing for massage in spa Thailand. Because this place is luxury, very private, peaceful, service mind and important! It's organic spa. I feel lovely this place. I feel clean for skin as same as detoxing. And have a good smell, aroma for relaxing weekend.

The best spa ever!. It was really amazing, staffs are welcoming and the place is so clean and modern.I have tried body massage with the jasmine scent. I was so relaxing and fall asleep.After massage i bought a siamease water hand cream back home. highly recommended

Hidden Oasis in Bangkok. As I love the Pañpuri products I decided to try their Spa in Bangkok and I can say that it is fantastic.The personnel are very welcoming, attentive and ready to help customers with information.I've tried the Indian head massage, and the masseur Pho was incredible.The products, oils, shampoo, etc are of course all Pañpuri and organic, with fantastic and relaxing scents.The décor of the spa and the suites are fancy, chic and contemporary with oriental touches.Prices are correct for the quality of service you get, around 2000Bht for 60min signature body treatment. Can't wait to come back and try the other body treatments.Highly recommended!

Great massage & gold package. The staff are so friendly and the gold oil massage and gold facial mask were great. I don't normally like massage because it hurts but the staff were so gentle. Was a little hard to find at first but was so worth it.

Superb!. Had body scrub, mask and aromatherapy. The products they used is so natural and good that I could feel the result the next day, smooth n glowing skin. The staffs are also so polite and professional in their field. Definitely visiting soon.

Wonderful!. A lovely two hours spent at this wonderful spa. A pretty veranda entrance makes it feel very separate from the rest of bust Bangkok. I indulged in a body scrub, massage and facial treatment. I was asked about my massage preferences at check-in, and given an option of scrubs and oil scents. The room was lovely, staff was quiet but attentive, price was more than fair. I would not hesitate to recommend!

Excellent and friendly. Very polite staff. Establishment is very clean and modern. The staff ask & listen to your input to provide a better massage to address any area's of pain or discomfort.. Well priced.
Great Massage & Scrub. Baan Sabai was very close to our hotel and the Aqua package was amazing and lasted about 3 hours, will definitely be back when we get back to Bangkok.

Very Good Massage But Expensive. The massage was professionally done and very good. However, I think the charges are a little on the high side considering that there are equally good and better value for money. The facility and ambience was adequate. However it is difficult to catch a taxi to and from the place. Wasted for more than 30 minutes to catch a cab that refuse to accept meter charges.

Tranquil setting in busy Bangkok. Visited Baan Sabai during our recent stay in Bangkok. We were staying in Ploenchit area and tried another massage place nearby the day before, but I was not very impressed with the service or the environment. Based on the reviews I saw here, we booked our 2 hour services (me, traditional Thai massage and scrub, my mom aromatherapy massage and scrub). We didn't call until the morning of to make a reservation, and they were already pretty booked. I'd recommend making reservations ahead to make sure you can get the time slots you want. We chose scrub and aromatherapy oil to use before being guided into the treatment rooms. My mom did not speak any Thai or English, but she seemed to get through the services fine. They provided tea before the service and tea and sliced mango after the service, which was very nice. I've had better massages but prices were very reasonable for what they provided. Great value.

Highest level at good prices. Second visit to this SPA for a real treatment with professional therapists.Ambience is nice, clean and friendly.They produce their own oil with almost 10 different varieties plus other products like scrubs and Thai compress.I had Thai massage first time and aroma today. Thai massage 1hour 400 BahtAroma 1 hour 800 BathVery professional and really made a huge difference for my bad lower back!Will be back soon!

Fantastic . We visitors the spa in the morning and had no issues getting in having booked online the night before. The staff we ready for us and helpfully accommodated for a 30 min delay due to traffic. It has a lovely garden outside which helps to set the scene. Service was immaculate and massage one of the best I've ever had. Very very good

highly reccomand. My friend who is Jeff reccomanded to me this place so i went 4times during my trip.I made a reservation by JOSHUA so think that staffs can remember me.An excellent place beautiful and clean. The massage itself was amazing and don't have much more to say cause I have no complains at all I enjoyed every moment and I highly recommend this place. I did the Sport massage which I really needed. The price is also reasonable and worth it. The masseuse was very nice and made sure I feel comfortable once and didn't talk which is more relaxing obviously than talking during the massage.Very easy to get there take bts and take off just phrompong station than you can ride a motorcycle. Just go there :)Mr Kim who loves bkk from Korea.
Perfect Spa Relaxation. Had both massage and scrub. It was an awesome experience! Staffs were friendly. Definitely one of the best spa experience.

Very good spa. This spa is highly rated on tripadvisor and the reviews are really good.Went there and was not disappointed.Facility is clean and staff courteous.They have excellent therapists.Will definitely visit next time.

Best massage we've had!!!. Staff was very polite and professional. We had the hot stone massage, aroma therapy massage, and deep tissue massage and each of us decided it had been the best massage we'd had. Definitely a don't miss!

Reelaxxxxx. That's what you feel after visiting Baan Sabai Spa.Amazingly good massages, extremely polite staff & lovely ambience.Above all Marco was so cool & sweet. He responded immediately to my query.Must visit for sure.

Very good massage and body scrub. My boyfriend and I booked a 2 hour aromatherapy and body scrub, 1600 thb on promotion for each person. It was a rainy night so we got a bit messy upon arrival.We were welcomed by a warm cup of tea, and we were given some oils and scrubs to choose.We chose and ylang ylang oil(not sure about the spelling) for massage and wild rose for body scrub. We were theb arranged into a couple’s room with a shower. The room was well furnished with comfortable lighting.The body scrubs starts, and the scent of roses was so good. We took a shower after the scrub and then the massage. The ladies were very skillful and had catered to our needs.Both of us enjoyed the body scrub andmassage very very much. Mango was served after the massage.Overall very good massage and good services and good environment. Recommend.

Great place for relaxation in BKK! . Been all over thailand and over 20 times in BKK. This is by far the best massage place / spa I've been to. couple room is spacious. single room private. very clean, well kept and super friendly staff. Thanks to the male owner (sorry didn't get ur name) for trying to help us to get to Taling Pling (a superb nearby thai restaurant too)! We got there in the end with a taxi, thanks for your advice to use GPS for guidance !

First but not last visit. I visited based on favourable Trip Advisor recommendations and was not disappointed. Opted for a 90 minutes Thai massage and left a new person and with a new appointment for Thursday.

Soo good!. I normally visit the popular spa chains when I'm in BKK and decided to do something different this time and booked Baan Sabai through the recommendations of Tripadvisors.No problem booking through online with a very quick response from Marco the owner. The place is a corner house located off Soi 26 which the taxi driver did not have any problem locating the place.Stepping in, I was glad I booked the place as it had a nice tranquil atmosphere which was not crowded. Marco had been excellent to make sure we were served well.I had a couple spa room and it was beautifully decorated. Although there was a little bit of traffic noise (it was on a weekend thus the road was clear and the motorbikes tend to ramp up a little more speed), this was felt only at the beginning and it wasn't that bothersome. The masseurs were very professional (never chatted) and the massages were really good! There were towels and tea before the session began, and dessert and tea after the session ended.It had been an amazing experience, and very much worth the value for the service with the extra 100-200thb I pay per person compared to the very popular chains that most tourists frequent.

best massage in bangkok. friendly staff, good masseuse, peaceful astmosphere...it was best massage I have taken in Bangkok. there's a famous local noodle resturant in between BTS and this massage shop, so you can eat noodle after or before massage on the move to BTS.

kindness and nice spa. I Visited Baan sabai with my familyWe chose 2hour thai massage and 90mins Aroma massage.The massage shop is quite and cleanand owner was very nice and gave us good service with smilingWe are very satisfied of that :)I will surely visit here again+ Some taxi driver doesnt know this spa location. in that case,show them an address and number.

Great massage, will come back. Went there for 2-hours scrub + aromatherapy oil massage. Decoration/atmosphere is very relaxing with classic music and candle lights. The masseuse therapist was also absolutely fabulous. The manager enquired before starting the session what I wanted to have and any focus points so the lady knew exactly my expectations. Pricing wise was value for money and less than 1/2 of what you would be in hotel spa's.All in, would highly recommend and definitively a place where i would love to return!

Fantastic!. I consider myself something of a spa veteran, with long standing back pain and a love of deep tissue massages. Had the 2 hour massage with hot herbal bundles and it was out of this world...The therapist was really experienced and knew what she was doing and I came out feeling miles better. The location itself, while in the heart of Bangkok, is in a lovely little green enclave - very calming and serene. Highly recommend a visit!

Perfect. On a work trip to Bangkok and was recommended Baan Sabai by a friend. Wow it did not disappoint! From the moment i arrived i was made to feel welcome and relaxed. The massage was the best i have had and i am looking forward to my next trip just so i can return.

Loved it . Wow! Loved the massage here. I took some time to explain that I preferred a medium pressure massage. During the massage I felt very comfortable. The lady giving me the masssge did not talk much which I found good because I just concentrated on her strokes. Felt wonderfully relaxed at the end. Would definitely go back.
Wonderful spa. It is really amazing to have the boss of this spa shop, Marco to share with me his story.Will definitely come back for more enjoyment.

Authentic Therapeutic Thai Massage. My wife & I landed up without a booking on a busy Sunday afternoon. Marco welcomed us with tea, but also expressed his inability to accommodate us as all the rooms were fully booked. Since we had walked a fair bit to reach the Spa, we asked if we could wait in the hope that some of the guests would not show up so we could get the massages. Marco was fine with this, so we chatted with him while he managed the guests, his therapists and phone calls.As luck would have it, two guests did not turn up, so we were able to get our therapies done. We chose the 90-minutes Deep Tissue Massages. The therapy rooms very clean, though there was some noise coming from outside. The therapists were professional and polite. I slept through most of my massage, which is always a good sign (at least for me) because it shows I was relaxed during the treatment. Later, Marco spoke with me (since he had left the Spa) and enquired about our experience. I thought that was rather nice of him.To summarise, I highly recommend Bann Sabai Spa and hope to visit again the next time I'm in Bangkok. Of course, I will make a reservation this time as I cannot hope to be lucky twice.
Has potential . Massage & facial were ok but the organisation was a bit off. I was reassured that it was a busy day which culminated in delays. I may give it another try next time I am in Bangkok.
Excellent. I recently went for a massage and I thought the service as well as the massage was excellent. I would really recommend everyone to go to Baan Sabai

Below expectation . I went there for a 2-hour massage. The massage was ok but the masseur was too strong even I gave her multiple reminders. The room is designed for one person only so it's very small. The air con was facing right to the massage bed, so I was freezing cold during my massage. We started at 7:30pm but finished at 9:10pm. It's fine as I don't want to stay any longer. I went there because of the rating on TA but I guess The spa was overrated.

Our New Favorite!. My wife and I travel to Bangkok often and enjoy taking advantage of the many wonderful, affordable massage opportunities available. On our latest trip we discovered Baan Sabai Spa and now, without a doubt, it is our new favorite. We called ahead and made a booking for a couples massage. Marco greeted us at the door and gave us a brief, informative orientation and took our specific requests. Our masseuses were well-trained and knowledgeable. The spa is very clean and beautifully decorated with lovely Thai art. I got the two hour oil massage and herbal compress. My wife chose the two hour coconut oil message and facial. Both of us were extremely pleased! Our only regret was that we discovered this sensual oasis near the end of our trip so we'll now have to wait until our next visit to Bangkok to return. We highly recommend Baan Sabai Spa for anyone looking a truly wonderful message experience.

Great 3 hours.... or were they 4 hours ........ or were they more ?. I am not used to give an "excellent" rating, but here I could not do differently !To say that I enjoyed the session booked at the Baan Sabai is to say little about the fantastic hours spent with a wonderful masseuse who managed to put me back into shape, touching muscles I did not even know I had and giving me the opportunity also to be alone with my own thoughts in a very relaxing environment. I booked a body scrub, a facial and a massage, all were wonderful and regenerating. The room was quiet, the oils and essences of quality, but above all the, at time steely fingers, at time the soft touches, of the masseuse, made me forget the outside world and transported me on my own cloud were I had time to be with myself. A wonderful experience that I would certainly repeat when in Bangkok and would recommend undeservedly.

A+++. Got a 2 hour hot oil massage and 30 minute body scrub. As soon as It began I felt transported to a cloud where I spent the next two and a half hours. Everything was wonderful, tranquil, and relaxing. I would most definitely recommend this to anyone for a fabulously relaxing experience.

Pressing on the right points. I made an appointment for 3 persons the day before. Took a BTS to Phrom Prong Stations and walked. It was a 20 mins fast faced walk.I broke out in a sweat by the time I reached there. Maybe a good idea to take a Tuk Tuk in from station. The masseur was good as she knew which were my sore areas without me saying anything. She kept trying to break the knots at the neck and limbs region. After the massage, I felt less tensed and muscles lighter. It was a good massage and I would visit them again. Only drawback is the distance from the BTS.

Love this place. Best massage ever. The therapists technique is so good. I felt relaxed and recharged after the massage. I also loved the oil scents and body scrub. They use the best oil on the market. Totally impressed and will definitely come back :)

Excellent Service. I came to Baan Sabai with my wife. It provided us a very impressive service. I missed my way and being late for almost an hour, but Marco was still very nice and arranged us a 2-hours treatment. The message here was wonderful and the price is reasonable. If any friend of mine asks my recommendation on spa in Bangkok, it will be no doubt for me to suggest Baan Sabai.

Best experience ever. So clean and professional. Great technique. I have to say that I'm very impressed with this spa. Good customer service and management by owner Marcos. Thank you for everything! Will definitely be back.

I really enjoyed Baan Sabai Spa. I tried several massage places in Bangkok and Baan Sabai Spa is my best. I loved its massages and all people treated me very kindly. Prices were reasonable and facility was very pleasant. This Baan Sabai Spa is my favorite and dont make a mistake to confusr with Baan Sabai Center

Deserving of high rank. Went in the afternoon wasn't crowded. Greeted warmly by staff and was a quaint home looking facility. You'll feel at peace once inside. Not dirty or smelly or sleazy. Was shown ala carte and package choices. Went with a 2hr massage with oil. A little pricey but worth it. Best to identify with host where you have pains or want to have more attention given. All throughout everyone was polite and friendly. Simple decor that's very inviting.The massage was very good as they were professional and done with controlled strength. Not the painful kind. After the relaxing 2hrs you get a warm tea and mango! And it was super super sweet and tasty. Overall enjoyable experience. Stayed in Doubletree which was near to Baan Sabai and Emporium Mall. Lovely location.

enjoyable massage . My husband and I thoroughly enjoyed our massages. The masseuses are very experienced and professional. Would have preferred a massage table rather than mattress on the floor though, as lying on the mattress meant that the neck was craned to one side and I had to switch sides repeatedly to prevent neck cramps. Overall it was an enjoyable experience and will be back if I am staying nearby.

Heaven on Earth. If you are in search of a touch of Heaven then Baan Sabai Spa is the place you are looking for! My wife and I are on holiday in Bangkok and have loved our trip. With so much to see and do in Bangkok, its very hot and tiring so we tried out a few massage parlors for some pampering ...Unfortunately the first massage we tried was in the Nana area and it was a nice looking place on the outside but the experience was not a peaceful and tranquil one! It was staff talking to each other and mobile phones going, so we tried another 2 but again was let down by the service.We decided to look online and we found Baan Sabai Spa and the reviews were great so we called up and booked a 2 hour session each. When going there we just stopped a taxi in the street and said Baan Sabai to the driver who ended up taking us to 2 other massage parlous that were not the real Baan Sabai Spa as the first 1 was just full of young girls and very dirty looking. I was lucky to have my phone on me with the internet or I am sure the wife and I would have ended up in the wrong Spa and again left feeling let down.Anyway we arrived at the real Baan Sabi Spa and it has a lovely little garden outside...We walked in and straight away was greeted by smiling ladies and a guy called Marco whom was extremely friendly and polite. We were shown our way to our treatment room by the masseuses and the touch of Heaven we had been searching for we finally found! The massage and service was outstanding! We both loved it, so much in fact that we have already been back another 2 times to try out some other treatments and loved them. The owner Marco has got to know us well and is always a great help when selecting the right massage.So overall Baan Sabai Spa is a little touch of Heaven on Earth and once found you will want to stay! Be sure to find the right Baan Sabi Spa it is on soi 26 and is on the corner because as we found out there are other massage parlors around in the same area but they are just imitations and look like they offer more the "happy ending" massages.Thanks again to the staff at Baan Sabai Spa...We will be seeing you again very soon I am sure.
Cool. We just had an relaxing massage on Baan Sabai. Everyone was very friendly and they've the knowledge which one is better for the customers.Thanks to all of you.

Amazing quality, great service, and great price!. My friend and I received the 30 minutes feet and 30 minutes back and shoulders, which left us feeling absolutely refreshed! It was the best massage I've ever received and at a great price. The ladies were very sweet and even served us hot tea afterwards. The wi-fi was reliable and the air conditioning was a nice break from the outdoor heat. Would 100% recommend and will definitely visit again.

fantastic. went to bangkok on business, found the best spa i have visited, felt really welcome has soon as i arrived. the thai massage was fantastic, i felt great when i left. Cant wait to go back. FANTASTIC.

I had an amazing massage and experience...i'll be back.. i recco this massage place, great experience. I am a tourist and i havent had much previous experience this massages, they made me feel very welcome,. Now i feel like a new person. Cant wait to go back !!
Good service,will visit again. Baan sabai is probably one of the top rankings spa in Bangkok but with more reasonable rates, just a reminder to call them up & make your reservations..

Great place for Thai massage in Bangkok!. This place is run by an Italian guy who speaks Thai! He is very impressive! I loved my time here! You get amazing hot Thai tea and your feet washed before you are ushered into a room and told to put on a loose fitting pant and shirt combo. The women as very strong! The massage although painful loosened me up completely! I cracked in places I didn't know could crack! The price for a one hour Thai massage was only 400 baht! So cheap! Highly recommended!

Is Thai massage supposed to hurt?. This was a very beautiful and clean spa. They gave us slippers and tea right when we arrived. After we had our tea they washed our feet which was so nice because it was hot and dusty outside. Then we went to the massage rooms and put on clean shirt and trousers they provided. The beds were very comfortable. The masseuses were very nice and good at their job, but it was much harder pressure than I'm used to. They kneaded and stretched me for an hour, and I asked twice for lighter pressure- which was a no go. I think that this must be how Thai massages are supposed to feel? Very similar to deep tissue massage. Although it was not very pleasant during the massage, I felt loose and stretched after which was nice- and I think the purpose. We were offered hot tea and fresh mango after the massage which was very nice. Extremely nice spa- just a warning If you don't like very hard massages.

This is real Thai massage. Bangkok is full of supposed massage parlours, many with scantily dressed young girls, but Baan Sabai offers real Thai massage. Not only are the staff excellently trained, this spa specialises in understanding your ailments or needs and delivers just the right treatment. I had a knee problem and received excellent treatment for it. If you want to have a couple of hours pampering in a relaxed and professional environment then this is for you. Tell Marco that Roger sent you!!

Excellent on all levels. This is the ideal spa experience. Located in a peaceful house, very well decorated, Baan Sabai has impeccable and talented staff. My massages (deep tissue) and facial were fantastic.The owner himself makes sure everything run super smoothly: from arranging last minute booking to very fair price,a ll the way up to insider advice about Bangkok shopping !I will come back for sure.

Perfect post-trekking massage. I came here a few days after hiking Mt Kinabalu. My muscles were incredibly sore, and the deep tissue massage with Ya-Ya was the perfect way to recover. She clearly knew what she was doing; she was able to find all the tightest areas and worked out every little knot. The owner was also extremely friendly, welcoming, and knowledgeable about which spa treatment would be the best given my preferences. Great atmosphere and overall a fantastic place. I'll be back again!
Perfect !!!!!. No more words were needed.I can dare say that their thai massage is one of Bangkok top shops.Kindness, Skill and Price..... Everything is best.

The best massage I´ve ever had.. I have back and neck problems and I get massages frequently and, after reading the good reviews, I decided to try Baan Sabai Spa the first day of my 15 days trip to Thailand. I told my masseuse, Mali, about what I wanted and I will never forget her: the massage was so good, so healing that, I booked immediately another one for my last day in the country. She was a great professional and she knew exactly was she was doing. I will come back the next time I´ll visit Bangkok.

When you spoil yourself. A must when in Thailand after a long day to have a full body massage. Non sexual but ohhhh bot you feel so good after and makes the walk home so much better. I'll go again tomorrow night.Thank you gorgeous girls

Great experience with Baan. Well it was great day for me:-From location little bit hard to find but most of taxi know it well-from Receiption was great impression -staff friendly but not extremely-wooden place and clean-great value* the room which I was little bit noisy not sound prof and cooling system were split unit.Orval was excellent :)

nice place. I had to use their Line ID to confirm the booking and things went pretty well from there.We arrived on time for our appointment after the taxi driver got directions from spa staff. Once there, we were settled down and given towels to wipe ourselves down as it was raining. We were spoiled for choice. After making our choices, we were paired with our masseurs and off we went.

Just fantastic!!!. This SPA is on my way home and has been around for at least a couple of years. Never went in. I believe the ownership has now changed. And it is just fabulous - we are so pleased we went!! The owner or manager took so much care of my questions and requests. It showed they wanted to make a good impression. He organised the right person to take care of me as I had a knee surgery. Then the massage itself was fantastic! The masseuse made sure the pressure was right. She also put a cushion under my knee without me asking when I turned over and she saw I was not comfortable. The room was restful and quiet. The only negative I can think off is the sound of the traffic that comes into the room from Soi 26. But when you weigh the whole experience against this, it does not matter to me Will be back!!!

Awesome!. I was so tired from walking around all day, that i got a 60min thai massage, and a 60 minute foot massage. The place is very tranquil, clean, and spacious. The massages were just right, and I was very so satisfied, that i went the very next evening again.

Deserved 5 star . Private rooms, properly trained masseuses, reasonable prices, en suite showers. Had two excellent aromatherapy massages, one with a lot of deep tissue work to loosen tense muscles. Highly recommended.

Discovery of the Thai massage. I highly appreciated both massages that I had last week in Baan Sabai Spa Bangkok. Indeed, everything was perfect: the welcome by the Manager to help me choose the most appropriate treatment, the quality of the therapist's work, the peaceful atmosphere and the cleanliness of the premises. Many thanks for the wonderful experience.I will gladly recommend the place.

Super!. Fantastic deep tissue massage!I went in this spa for 2days.The first i did a wonderful thai massage and i felt so good that i booked the second day with hot oil and deep tissue massage.Even better!The Spa is well decoreted and very clean.I got a private room and it was very peaceful.The staff are friendly and very professional.They were able to fix my neck and shoulder problems and releve my head ache.I definily raccomande this place.Thank you to all Baan Sabai Spa staff.

Nice thai massage. I had a 90 minute thai massage and I really enjoyed it. The place was a bit difficult to find, but we made it eventually. We were the only people there when we arrived which felt a bit weird, but the owner and massage therapists were very friendly. The massage itself was painful but really good. I guess good thai massages have to be a bit painful. The only slightly awkward thing was that the massage therapists kept on chatting and giggling during the massage which made me feel a bit uncomfortable.

Ahhh....90 minutes of R & R!. My husband and I tried Baan Sabai Spa and had a 90 minute Thai massage. We walked in without an appointment and the owner, Marco was kind enough to take us in and give us a large room where we were together. It was a very relaxing experience. The ambience of the spa is very calming. At the end of our wonderful experience, we were offered some mango and warm tea. Marco, the owner also offered some restaurant recommendations and due to the pouring rain, was kind enough to drive my husband and I to Sornthong Seafood Restaurant (look for my review).It was a great evening where nothing mattered but just you and the masseuse.
