The facilities were great and there are many types of treatments to suit almost every need. The therapists were professional and attentive. Prices were reasonable as well. I would definitely come here each time I'm in Bangkok for work or leisure.
A really good deal. The combined massage of 2hrs was really worth it. The package includes upper and lower body. Masseur is very professional and I will definitely visit them again!

Incredible experience. I was in Bangkok on business and was looking for a good, clean, professional, and sophisticated massage place. Dhara was definetly the place. Very nice decoration and reception area. Super clean location and massage rooms. The staff was very cordial and attentive. I had the salt scrub plus the Thai massage and it was excellent. The showers are very clean, table and clothing as well. I was very satisfied and strongly recommend Dhara. I will go back on my next trip to Bangkok!

Wonderful full spa treatment. Visited on my stop over to Italy. It was a fantastic way to spend almost 4 hrs. Lovely setting. The quality of treatment by Rose was fabulous. Highly recommend a visit you won't be disappointed. I felt amazing after

Great spa day!!. We booked a 4 hour massage package online for half price for my husband and I and LOVED it!! We got a few massages while in Thailand and this location had the nicest people, clean establishment and very professional!! I would highly recommend booking yourself for a long spa day. The ladies we had were so professional and did an amazing job!

Simply the best Spa in Bangkok!. This is my 6 time at Bangkok, did like 100 massages all over the city. This place is by far the most processional with a really reasonable rates. Visted twice and will definitely come back. Keep up the good work.

Relaxing but overpriced. I went there with my husband for head neck and shoulder massage. The price is 400 baht per person for one hour. Place is nice and massage was great but i think its a bit overpriced compared to normal rate which is 200 to 250 baht at the area. Overall was good!

Great place and reasonable price. I went for a Full Day Spa during my recent trip. The ambiant was relaxing.Staff were friendly and speaks English. Certainly a recommended place to go. Location of spa is also easy to find.
Full massage package . Went to have a 4 hrs full package massage. Was wonderful and the staff were excellent. Had one of the best massage.

Full treatment review . 10/10 for ambiance. 10/10 for aromatherapy massage. 10/10 for facial. 10/10 for cleanliness/facilities. 10/10 for ambiance. 10/10 for body scrub. 8/10 for body wrap (was told we would be left for 15 minutes by both staff...however wrapped up like sausages we were left for over 30 minutes...maybe they nipped off for some food as when my therapist returned she smelt of garlic! Overall a great experience. 3.45 hours of treatment...well worth it.

Thai massage. I was looking for a nice and clean massage place in Bangkok and decided to trust the reviews on Trip Advisor.As mentioned by other travellers, the place is very clean, the masseuses very professional and the service is top notch. After the 2-hour massage, I was offered a very nice tea. The massage is not very cheap according to Thai standards, but the quality has a price! I went to this place twice during my stay and was each time very pleased with the professionalism of the team.If you are looking for a great (and not dodgy) massage, this place is for you!

Great place, great massage. Visited the Sukhumvit branch, which is conveniently located a short walk from Asok BTS. Place is quiet, spotless, and the service is great. Prices are really reasonable too, we also got a 20% discount because we made a booking online. We did the 2-hour Royal Thai Massage and it was really effective and relaxing - we came back again 2 days later!

superb massage experience and ambience. We booked this place as we had a 50% discount code, thus we took up the 4900 baht package which includes a scrub, wrap and facial on top of the thai massage. We booked 2 couple rooms for 3pm but were late, and fortunately there were still 2 couple rooms available for us. We were warmly greeted when we entered. Tea was served and we were asked to change into the slippers provided. Shortly after, we were led upstairs to the rooms. The room was really clean, nice, spacious yet cozy with a shower inside. I really enjoyed my green tea scrub, honey milk wrap and green tea facial. it was supposed to be a 3 hour 45 mins session but it lasted about 4.5 hours. the massage was good and very comfortable, it wasn't too painful nor too soft. My face also feels smoother (and whiter) after the facial! Would definitely recommend this place and I would definitely be back.
Really nice place, great Thai massage.. This place is spacious, clean, friendly, relaxing and good value for money. I would definitely go here again.

Peaceful, relaxing, terrific. We walked in on a Saturday night and from the moment we opened the door until we left the premises it was just pure relaxation and we he had great break from busy, loud and exciting/exhausting Bangkok. The treatment was well above average compared to what we got to experience so far. The ladies didn't seem to just follow the steps and get it done, we enjoyed our tim at Dahra. - we both loved the little treats like the served water and cooled towels upon check-in, the slippers provided or the hot towels at the end of the foot massage (plus an awesome Ginger tea at the very end). I'd definetely recommend this places for a massage treatment and would come back if time allows. Thank you very much.

great massage. I had the Royal Thai massage here. I found the spa to be very peaceful and clean. I have Thai massage quite often in the Netherlands, so it was refreshing to find out that massage in Thailand is actually very similar to that. The massage is without oil and was quite hard and included all the traditional stretching. I found it a great experience and got a discount because it is summer season. Would definitely recommend.
Perfectly!I love it. My friends and I enjoyed the scrub and Thai massage,it's clean,quite,service was good comeback again here

My visit to Dahra. We visited their Sukhumvit branch during our 5 days stay in Bangkok. When we went there, we waited for awhile as some of their Massage Therapists were ill and they are short of manpower. But time wasn't wasted as they introduced and explained to us the types of treatment which enable us to understand and choose the correct type of treatment we wanted. We went for their Deluxe Spa Treatment and Herbal Massage. It was a brand new experience and it was fantastic. The massage was good, hard, Therapists were friendly and professional, environment was quiet and relaxing. During my stay, I also visited Healthland. In my opinion, i prefer Dahra over Healthland. Both the massage was fantastic but Healthland is very crowded which seems rushing. whereas Dahra, the place is not crowded which allow me to really enjoy the massage. Best of all if you book online with Dahra, you can enjoy the massage at a discounted rate! Definitely will visit Dahra again in my next trip. If you are staying in Dahra, do consider it. They have2 branch, 1 at Silom another at Sukhumvit. For more information you can visit their website.

Wonderful experience. Booked for full spa treatment online with a 50% discount. The staff was really friendly throughout! My BF and I enjoyed the scrub and aromatherapy the most. Only thing was that we didn't get the jacuzzi even though we opted for the couple room. Perhaps the newer branch didn't have it. Overall it's worth the price paid!

a serene haven in Bangkok. I stayed in Holiday Inn Sukhuvmit, the spa is 5 min walk fromThe hotel. the place offers an extensive service ranging from traditional Thai massage, aromatherapy, Facial to manicure. There's a ongoing 20% discount, which it the spa menu value for money. I love the place, it is clean, quiet and lightly scented. Waiting area has comfy sofa and table ( very important after a long day of shopping). I had Thai massages and aromatherapy massage, the room is Spacious and clean. Most importantly the staff is professional; no hard selling,no chatting, courteous. Will definitively head back to the place when I am back in town
Amazing. Service was extremely good. Best I've ever been to. Would definitely come back again here and relax.
very good.. Wonderful experience.Very relax and good service, good place!I will spa in Dahra when i go bangkok everytime.

Mostly good. 6 of us went and all of my friends enjoyed their deluxe spa promotion, which was at 40% off the listed price. My masseur wasn't great. The next day we went back for a foot massage and it was fantastic! She ended the massage with a shoulder massage which helped me with my aches which wasn't fixed the day before. Friendly service staff. Service was slow. Booking for 3.30pm but we started at 4pm so definitely give yourself more time. Do make reservations especially for Saturday's. Many people were turned away when they tried to walk in for an appointment. Only 4 chairs available for mani/pedi or foot massage. So book early too if you are not into the full spa.Would have preferred hot ginger tea. Not sure what hot drink was being served.

Very nice!. Me & a girlfriend both have tried the Full Spa Treatment. They have a promotion of 50% discount for this treatment. So, the price is very good & worth for value. If there is no discount, I feel it's expensive.Their reception is very nice. The package included: Body scrub, body wrap, body massage & facial. All are wonderful!

Thoroughly recommend. I've been here several times the last 9 months and thoroughly recommend it. I've had the aromatherapy and Thai massages and they are always 100% professional and you feel relaxed during the treatment and fully relaxed afterwards. The facilities are excellent with great design. When they opened the Sukhumvit branch last year they had a promotional offer of a discount card as long as you had one treatment of 2,000thb or over. I hope they give something similar the second year but even without it is in a different league to most other places.

Peaceful oasis in the heart of sweltering Sukhumvit. Among the hundreds of dodgy Bangkok massage parlours, Dahra is a genuine oasis where expert and professional staff will revitalize you with traditional Thai techniques in a spotless and elegant ebvironment.

Heaven of relaxation . The most amazing spa I have ever been to. All the facilities are so clean and do modern. The staff is very well trained, very friendly and professional. I was in Bangkok for three days and I visited Sahara spa three times for three different treatments. Nothing was less than perfect. I recommend it to everyone and I will be visiting Dahra surely the next time I am visiting Bangkok.

Heavenly. After dropping our bags off at the hotel and spending 29 hours traveling to Bangkok, this was our first stop. I booked the 4-hour spa package and my husband picked the 3-hour. They put us in a room together which was nice, as my husband has never been to a spa before. We were greeted at the front desk and chose the specifics of our package. My only complaint: We were not told what was going on during our session. I wish they would have gone over what order we were doing things, and let us know that we would shower between treatments. We were just kind of confused as to what we were doing and what was happening next.This was truly the best massage I have ever had and I would highly recommend coming here.

The best massage I ever got. This is the best massage you will get in Bangkok. Arrived with stiff muscles and aching body and left with a very refreshed and relaxed feeling. The pressure is just spot on. If I had more time in Bangkok, I would have definitely come back for more.

Pampering Time. My most enjoyable experience of spa and massage. Staff were friendly and professional. Love the ambience and the tastefully decorated Deco. Highly recommended for a good Spa and Massage. Variety of Massage and Spa selection
Full Spa Treatment with my partner. Our Full Spa Treatment came with a lot of choices both went for different oils and minerals. Had no issues at all and really enjoyed our afternoon there.

Excellent massage. Me and my husband went to Dahra Spa to have 1 hour of thai massage.
We had nice time there and really enjoyed!

Fantastic experience. Bum you are the best!!!!
It's the most beautiful spa that I visit in Thailand
Very serious and good price

Great Foot massage. It was my first time getting a foot massage and I gotta say, it was terrific!! Khun Wan was very professional and did a great job relieving the tension in my feet. Everyone was very kind and welcoming. I will definitely return!! Thank you!!
Excellent experience, reasonable prices. Really great massage experience. Staff are great, prices are reasonable, and the facility was top notch. Highly recommend this for a massage in Bangkok.

Fantastic. Having a Full Spa Treatment at Dahra has always been on my must do item list whenever I'm in Bangkok. For its super value, and now even better as I'm always staying in the Asok/Nana area! Fantastic!

Wonderful afternoon. My husband and I booked one of the 4 hour spa treatment packages and it was heavenly. The staff was very friendly and professional and the massage was phenomenal! We highly recommend it aND we will be back next time we are in Bangkok.

Sumkhuvit area GEM!!!. Please do yourself a favor and come here to pamper yourself. Prices are very good...esp compared to prices back in the US. If you reserve via online, you save at least 20% off their rates.My wife had the head, neck and shoulders massage, plus the mani/pedi. I selected a package which included a body scrub and wrap plus aromatherapy massage, which had a 50% discount at the time. Amazing!!The staff were professional and the place leaves you with a sense of calm as soon as you enter. Very clean and well appointed. We were so glad we chose to treat ourselves here!

Excellent treatment highly recommend . Highly recommend this spa - I paid 320 for a hour traditional thai reflexology foot massage. It was excellent and I do think the treatment is on of the best I ever had in Thailand ( I have traveled in Thailand since 1995 once a year) The place look very expensive, clean and exclusive. The often have promotion and discount!! I'll sure will be back for more
High quality massage. This is a very peaceful and amazingly looking massage place. It has many different rooms and designs which along with a very skilled staff contribute to a unique atmosphere.

Each knot and kink has been expertly kneaded out. I went with my partner today for a neck, shoulder and head massage. I had a great experience. We were greeted with a warm welcome and the enchanting smells of the various salts/oils used (presumably) in their aroma treatments. We waited for our therapists at a grand dining table. Our massage began with a footwash before we lay down on our massage beds upstairs. It was exquisite! My therapist traced kinks and chronic sore spots on my back down to my toes and worked them out in my shoulders and neck. My partner's treatment was also customised for his various ailments/ At one point my therapist was working out knots with on her toes and guiding my body into full body stretches. Working out the knots can be a bit painful but my therapist was receptive to my pain threshold. This is a new location for a reputable spa and I urge anyone in the area to go for a visit.

A must-do for any Bangkok trip. A friend was living in Bangkok and recommended Dahra for their 3hr 45min spa package and it did not disappoint. The facilities are better than many of the spas I've seen in the UK and the treatment was incredible value for money. If you book the package online before the end of Feb 2016, you can get it for 50% off! Apparently the Sukhumvit branch is the slightly newer of the two so head there.

Worth every single cents paid.. Read up on Dahra Beauty and Spa from a blog, check up on the website, very impressed with all the prices stated with no hidden cost. Reservation was hassle-free, was 30mins early for the appointment, however everything was arrange nicely, did not have to wait for the time of reservation. The staffs are excellent in terms of skills and service, do not talk to each other during massage. Mine even went to ask the customer next door to silent his phone as it was constantly ringing loudly. The price is mid range, however you get a first class service and totally worth the time travelling there.

Very invigorating . I've been to a fair few spas good and bad but this was quite a treat. From the moment you step in, you're greeted in such a wonderful way. The smell, the cleanliness, the decor was enough for me to be relaxed from the moment I walked in. Considering the spa is on a very busy road I heard nothing in the room. The spa room was simple but extremely clean and well kept. The booked a deluxe spa treatment for 2 100b. The massage was on the lighter side as most aromatherapy ones are but the therapists hands and skills were very much stand out to me. Very well looked after and I will go back probably in the next week! Easy to find as well, but if you want to save some money book online as they fantastic online promotions. Khopkunka :)
Pleasant relaxation. A fully invigorating experience, worth coming back to again.Very helpful staff and experienced therapists. Pleasant ambience.

Super good . Can't believe it is that good! I been many different spa in bbk! This one is highly recommended! Don't forgot to check on their website, they do monthly different offer, need to book online! I did the one is full spa treatments and I get 50% off discount for 3 hours 45 min! Including body scrub, body wrap, aroma massage and facial! Definitely will come again! The place is clean and massage skill is professional!

OMG!!! What a relaxation. This was our first visit to Bangkok,and we were fully exhausted after going around Bangkok especially shopping. So we wanted to have a massage in best spa so we choose DAHRA and also it was very near to our hotel which was located in Silom.We made a reservation and upon reaching their we were greeted with water end with tea.Staff's are very friendly and they speak English. As this was our first massage we did not have any idea what kind of massage will relax our mind and body.As we had limited time they suggested to have Aromatherapy.We can choose the oil for our massage.The most what i liked is they offer different kind of rooms including couple room.Whole spa is very clam and pleasant.The massage is for 1 hour and it was very relaxing and mind blowing.If I ever visit Bangkok i would definitely visit DAHRA again...worth the visit.

Full Spa Treatment was amazing. I had been to Dahra Spa at their Silom location previously and been pleased with the service. So I was quite happy to find out that they had recently opened a spa in Sukhumvit. I went for the full spa package, which was absolutely amazing and relaxing. Very clean facilities, professional therapists, Highly recommended.

What a great experience!!!. Made a reservation for my boyfriend and I to get thai massages, this was the first time either of us had one. This was an awesome place to get one done! Location is clean, they greet you with water and end with tea. The staff is friendly and speak English. There are different type if rooms depending on your massage and the tradition thai is in a location where the room is divided with curtains. There were times people walked by and you could hear them talking, but for the most part it was quiet and relaxing. I would definitely go back!

Great Experiance. Visited Thailand, and this has to be the best spa i visited during our stay. They have a great selection of massages and treatments to choose from. The spa is in superb condition and the amenities are 5 Star and above! I received a warm welcome and the lady who conducted the massage and treatment was very well trained and provded the best service. I would reccomend you go for one of their packages which covers everything from Facial, Scrub, Wrap and Massage. You will come out looking refreshed and glowing!The location was perfect, as it was opposite our hotel, but its very close to 2 MRT stops including Ashok, which makes it a perfect central location. There are many shops, restaurants and bars located next to the Spa. Choose this spa, if you looking for a professional, quality service with value for money. Would return again.
Excellent. My facial appointment was nothing but spectacular. I had an enjoyable time during the 1 hour facial. The therapist was polite and professional. Highly recommended.

My second visit and it will NOT be the last!. I have been to both their outlets and I love the ambience and friendly staffs. The Full Spa Treatment that I had was very value for money. They have quite a good range for scrubs and cream for body wrap. The masseurs were professional and it made the 3 hour 45 minutes treatment very relaxing and rejuvenating. I have recommended friends over and they enjoyed the experience as well. It's my must-go spa whenever I visit Bangkok. Keep up the good service Dahra Beauty & Spa!
Facial spa. Exceptional service and great ambience. I highly recommend. The hostess was very friendly and the staff are highly accommodating and great at what they do.

Fantastic Customer Service and Treatments. I booked the full spa treatment at the new Sukhumvit branch and it was incredible. I got held up in work, and subsequently Bangkok traffic, so arrived a little late for my appointment but was able to enjoy the full treatment time as there no booking directly after mine.All of the staff that I met were friendly, helpful and professional. My treatments exceeded my expectations and I left feeling wonderfully relaxed. The venue is squeaky clean and well designed.Would highly recommend booking here and am confident that the Silom branch is equally good (will be trying that one out next...)
Awesome message. Very relaxing and professional mesaage the facilities vey clean and well maintained had a very stiff and sore shoulder but after the masssage completely fix it was happy about

Fantastic Spa experience in Bangkok. Bangkok,like so many places in Thailand has so many places to have a massage it is difficult to know where to go, or who to trust to avoid disappointment. My wife and I were looking for a clean, modern spa which offers privacy and also properly qualified staff who know what they are doing!We had a recommendation to use the Dahra from one of the leading guided tour operators in Bangkok, and the Dahra ticked all the boxes. It is easily found in a good location on the Sukhumvit Road near the holiday inn, and is only 100m from a skytrain stop (Asok), and is also easily walkable from Terminal 21 shopping mall which my wife loved!The Spa itself is new, so in great condition with air con and good quality massage tables in private rooms for comfort. However, the best thing about it is the quality of the staff. We visited twice for 2 hour massages and these were exceptional, delivered by qualified therapists Taeng and Katty. We have been fortunate to enjoy great massages in many places in the world, and these two masseurs are now in our top five! We would go back in an instant next time we are in Bangkok.This is not for those wanting a cheap massage, because it is not aiming at those clients. However, neither is it hugely expensive by Bangkok standards, coming in competitively against the hotel spa's, whilst beating them on the quality of the staff and the great environment and experience that it provides.Thanks Taeng and Katty for the professional experience you provide, and for anyone like us who is bamboozled by the choice of spa's available, be sure you will love the Dhara!
Brilliant. We bought the full spa package and it was wonderful . The facilities were excellent . Best spa we've been to in Bangkok. Thank you Dhara

I love my pedicure and manivure. I really enjoyed the pedicure and manicure at this spa... They offered me two beauty therapists, it was fast & professional... The nail polish was OPI - all in all a great experience!

Great value and perfect massage skill. Great value and reasonable price. Staff could speak various languages which is very impressive. Yuko is very friendly. A nice place if you wanna have a nice Thai traditional massage

Great massage and amazing owner and staff. Thank you to Yuko and her staff for a great massage. Yuko was so friendly and sweet. She gave us small gifts that were handmade. The place was very clean and professional. Definitely go here!!

Excellent massage. It was easy access from MRT station.At exit 1, take an escalator. Then, walk along as taking off the escalator.Take the left turn at Grand Mercule. Take right just at corner of 7-11. Walk along 100 m, then I found blue 3stories building, Yuko's Spa.Yuko is very kind and helpful to chose the menu.I had one hour aroma massage and then one hour herbal ball massage. The combination of these massage made me very relaxed.It kept me warm from strong AC for few days. It was amazing!!I would come back to have massage again whenever I visit Bangkok.

Heavenly massage and 5* service!. I had a vitamin massage from Yuko herself and I have to admit, I felt absolutely amazing afterwards. It was the perfect intensity and felt so good during and afterwards. Yuko is such a kind, giving, enthusiastic, beautiful lady and she made our experience a first class one. It was my friends birthday and she treated us with lots of little presents which was lovely. Brilliant experience overall!
Great service, great treatment!. We had a vitamin massage which was great and lasted a long time. Yuko gave us tea and treats after and she was very hospitable and happy throughout.

they really are good! . this is my first time using trip advisor so I was skeptical. but yuko's place did not disappoint. her guy went to work on my aching neck and back and in the end I felt like I floated out of there.
Great service!. Easy to find, great prices and of course great massage. Honest and friendly, will be back every time i come to thai!

Great service!. Read great reviews and had to make a trip just to try this out. Yuko didn't disappoint. Had the Aromatherapy message for an hour..Yuko greeted us with a cold towel and cold green tea while we chose the massage... A great feeling considering the heat of bangkok!Then we went to the other building for the actual massage... Yuko personally did my massage and it was great! We ended off with cold cut mango and brown rice tea..Yuko was very polite and has great service!

Great body massage and nice atmosphere. During Bangkok trip, we had nice massage around Pratunam area and also Chinatown. But this one, which is just around our accommodation in Phra Ram 9, is super great body massage and have the most relaxing atmosphere.The body massage is quite painful but feeling really great and body relaxed after massage. Great value of money

Good massage with heart. About a 5 to 10 minute walk from Phra Ram 9 MRT. My dad was extremely satisified with his massage as his masseuse was extremely skilled and strong. We were also satisfied with our massage. A delightful touch was the Japanese green tea and Thai mango and dragonfruit served after the massage. Best visited in the day, especially if you are travelling with senior citizens. Extremely reasonable massage : 250 baht for 1 hour in a no-frills massage place. Those aused to plush massage places like Healthland, this is not for you. But if you prefer to patronise a local place with a lot of heart: then visit Yuko Massage.

Experience Japanese hospitality. You really must try this massage shop once!
There is a huge variety of massages to choose.
i bet you will be satisfied!!
この辺りでは珍しい日本人が経営しています。
こちらに引っ越してから今では毎週のようにお世話になり生活の一部です:)
安心してリラックス、大満足のマッサージを堪能できます。他のマッサージ店に行けなくなりました。
沢山メニューがありますが私のおすすめはヘッドスパとアジアンビューティートリートメントにハーバルボールプラスです。
気さくで優しい優子さんから楽しいバンコク情報も聞くことができますよ:)
旅行者の方たちとマッサージ後に気軽にお喋りできるのも楽しいです。
Good Pricing. Good pricing and good Thai massage. Massage strength I felt was just nice and the lady that massage me was nice enough to cover me with a blanket when I was cold.

Best Customer Service!. Went at Yuko's spa with a friend, we had the traditional Thai massage which was very GOOD and at the same time Affordable. And the Owner Ms. Yuko, was very accommodating and friendly. What touched me really was, i found out that she helps by hiring the native tribe from Myanmar for job.they live in mountains with not much opportunity for income. So giving this girls some extra tip is really helpful for them. Eventhough the masseurs from Myanmar cannot speak Thai or English, they give you a warm smile, and Yuko was there to assist, and Yuko can speak the tribe dialect! Really amazing. I am really happy for my fellow Japanese doung great in foreign country. After our massage, Yuko invited us for her own prepared snacks and fruits! And even gave us Her handmade products as souvenir for free!! And also, she will give you tips on where to go and what to see in Bangkok. She can also guide and go with you if you want to feel like a local only for an extra massage more! No tour guide fee! I will definitely come back here next time. And recommend to everybody.

Excellent massage in Bangkok . What a pleasant experience＼(^o^)／ Yuko's massage & spa popped up when I googled for "Top massage & spa in Bangkok" and it was right. This salon is located in a very local spot of Bangkok, not fancy but very clean and cozy. Yuko is very friendly, funny and kind owner. Her staff is very skilled and excellent with massage techniques. I highly highly recommend Yuko's massage & spa. Please try their herbal ball treatment. It is soooo relaxing. Coincidence to have the same name as the owner, Yuko (o^^o)

Unforgettable and impressive honeymoon in Bangkok. We had the unforgettabe and romantic honeymoon in Bangkok . Its seems too short for spending about 8 days but we almost impressed by guiding and receiving help from Spa Yuko team . Sirocco is wonderfully splendid place in Bangkok. We had a breathtaking panoramic view of skybar and enjoyed live jazz music featuring vocalists of international repute . We also visited Asiatique The Riverfront and very excited by collourful picturesque beauty like as Yokohama night and satisfactory shopping in here.We had so much funny feelings when walking along the Maeklong Railway Market and we were so interested by " umbrella pulldown market " as the train was running on rails. At Spa Yuko we were treated deep relaxing experience with techniques of the traditional Thai massage and natural herbal extracts. I am very pleased and really appreciate about that. Thank you for going along with us and supporting throughout. We will comeback Bangkok for long holiday as soon as possible !
super good energy & enjoyed. my first trip to bangkok, enjoyed spending here. high recommendation for spa yuko, i would come back here again for sure.

Relaxing place. I come here weekly. The onsen is very great. Feel relaxed and my skin is much smoother n healthier after onsen.The shampoo, conditioner, shower gel and lotion there is quite good, I never need to bring my personal stuff for these.You should bring some sheet mask for face after onsen. I love the yukata here also. Very kute.I also like the hokkaido drink in the bar here after onsen.

Japanese Hospitality in Thialand. I live in Tokyo and was surprised to see a Japanese person running a massage shop in the middle of Bangkok, so I went for a visit.Yuko is an awesome person to talk to, really funny and very kind. She also gave me the best Mango I've ever eaten in my entire life!! Spa Yuko is worth going JUST for the Mango!!The massage was also very good, although not quite as good as the Spa I had been the day before, but that spa is supposedly the best or 2nd best spa in Bangkok, so that was to be expected. Yuki more than makes up for it with hospitality and delicious Mango though. As I said, it's worth going just for the delicious Mango!!

Tips for this fabulous place. Everytime I come to Thailand, I visit this fabulous SPA mangaed by Ms. Yuko who is so attractive with plenty of knowledge regarding real thailand.I dont need to refer that how wonderful this spa is anymore this time, however, I would like to give you tips for accessing to this place.When you come to the SPA, using MRT or BTS is highly recommended than taking taxi since it would be difficult to explain the exact location accurately and it would lead to the several risks of unexpected danger by the driver.Hope enjoy and get relaxed well in much safer and time and cost efficient way!

Easey access, no need to take taxi. Location is about 5~6minutes walk from MRT Phra Ram 9(MRT) พระราม 9(รถไฟใต้ดิน) station. MRT and BTS is very convenient to transfer. How to get there is from Phra Ram 9, walk towards the bridge and turn right at the signal along the Hotel Grand Mecure Fortune, and you will see SevenEleven, turn right at the corner. You will see very lively street with restrants, shops and markets. Spa Yuko is on that street, you will find it soon.Be careful about the taxi, many taxi drivers say that they cannnot find the place or they know nicer massage shop, and try to take you to other place. Because they want get the commission from those shops. The location is about behind Hotel Grand Mercure Fortune, and near Seven Eleven. Yuko, a Japanese lady/Manager is very kind lady, please enjoy the massage and her warm hospitality.

Good SPA. When I stayed Grand Mercure Fortune Bangkok, the front staff introduced a massage shop with written map. The massage shop is "SPA Yuko" and is located near place where is behind of the hotel and around five minutes' walk from there. The SPA has Japanese hospitality "Omotenashi" with very clean facility and with hearty massage, because the manager of the SPA is Japanese beautiful lady.I would like to recommend "SPA Yuko", when you stay in Bangkok.

Still enthusiastic!!!. I went this place because I saw a high evaluation by lots of people.Actually, my first and second visit there were failed as Yuko, the owner, was away from store because of an urgent business or something like...However, I am still enthusiastic to visit and go through her excellent service.I'm looking forward to getting highly evaluated SPA service there next month.
Ok. Location was not too convenient and shop not very wow. It was clean and tidy, and very reasonable priced, but nothing special about the service to differentiate from another place.

Yuko's Massage is a cozy place!. During my holidays in Bangkok,i went to Yuko's Massage for a couple of times. it is a cozy place,the master-- Yuko is a lovely lady from Japan,she runs a thai-style massage near RAMA 9 station(subway). The staff is nice and the price is reasonable, i think i will go there when my next time to Bangkok!

Relaxing and luxurious. Loved this place for its great service and luxurious interiors which made one feel like being in a resort. I had a two-hour aromatherapy body massage and my masseuse was really good. Her massage strokes were firm and deep, just the way I wanted it. The lemongrass drinks and fruits served before and after the massage was also a nice way to start and finish the session. Verdict: Highly recommended

Wonderful luxury spa. When I want to treat myself, I use this spa.Set down a side soi close to Asoke station, you feel hidden away from everything. An oasis of calm!Offers massages, facials, body treatments- all at a reasonable price considering the level of luxury. The spa itself is beautifully decorated and the treatment rooms are private. Worth the splurge!

Great ambience, great massage!. Very accessible location near BTS station. Luxurious ambiance and very friendly staff. Little expensive for Bangkok's massage but worth every cent. Masseuse seems to be experienced and very polite. Make sure to tell masseuse for softer pressure if you feel uncomfortable because my masseuse had a little stronger pressure than my expectation.

Good service. I have booked the massage on their website. Expect someone to call me the next working day but there is none. So I called to ensure my booking is confirm. The massage place is walking distance from ashok bts. Maybe 8 mins walk? The service is very good. They greet us at the door and immediately serves refreshment. I visited at a busy hour and waited 20 mins before they can attend to us. So got some hand cream as a complimentary due to the waiting. The ambience and deco is nice but the cleanliness needs to be improve. Especially at the massage room. The floor is very oily. After all, the massage is good. Worth the try..

It's so wonderful time.. Until have the time, I used to hear the name of spa in the net. Finally I could have wonderful time in there. The location is good as close to BTS station Asok. But it's so quiet and could forget that I'm in Bangkok. All stuffs are so friendly and elegant. Also the building with garden is so beautiful. Then the time made me like a princess! I ordered a course of scrub massage and amazing oil massage for body, milk bath with rose petals( for 190 minutes ). I was healed my body and mind by these services with lovely drink. Of course, my skin became like soft silk. If I have chance of visiting Bangkok again, I would try to have the time in Divana again.
Best massage. Very good service and very nice place I've done so many thai massages but this one was amazing its really professional and great team

Consistent massage. My Thai trip always begin with a Thai massage, after then extensive fixing and stretching, then ends with an Aroma massage. Divana always my choice. It is located not far from Terminal 21 with a thai style wood house at a beautiful garden located in a quite street. Their masseur skills may not be the top but always consistent. Pretty good.

Great ambience but average massage skills . The service and ambience are great if that's what you are after. Well decorated facilities - you will be served with a cool welcome drink and after your spa session you will be served with a got herbal tea as well as fruits (in my case pineapples and banana). You will definitely feel pampered. However the massage is somewhat disappointing and lacking solid technical skills. Of the many massages on offering throughout this city, you can get better massage else where. The price at thus establishment is above the average.

A Great Spa. I chose this spa after reading good reviews on TA. They have several locations and the prices vary...this was less expensive that other Divana spas. A lovely facility with beautiful gardens and flowers. I was warmly greeted. My entire visit was comfortable. The spa is immaculate. Everyone is attentive to your privacy and comfort. Technician adjusted the pressure to my choice, and unlike sometimes happens....she remembered and maintained moderate pressure for the entire message. I will definitely return and highly recommend.

An Excellent Massage, Atmosphere, Staff.... If first impressions are everything, then this place is incredible. In the hustle and bustle of Bangkok you go to the end of a short alleyway and are surrounded by a quiet, lush garden with ponds and flowers. The building itself is a joy to behold. The staff are very kind and welcoming. I was made to feel relaxed with tea and soft seating in the reception area. I chose the East/West Allure massage.I think this was the best massage that I have ever had. It is a mix of Thai and Swedish massage. The masseuse was outstanding. The massage room was warm and relaxing. Soft music played in the background. It was everything I hoped it would be. Back in the reception area I was given some tea, mango and a small thank you gift. Yes, the prices are a littl higher than other places, but if you are looking for a memorable experience it is well worht it.

Napped like a pig. Booked through the phone. Asked to do Foot Massage and the Anti-Stress Massage. Walked there from Asok station. Got there in the evening. Entrance and garden was beautifully presented. When we arrived we were asked to wait and given a selection of oils to choose. We were also given a small towel and lemongrass tea.Clean room. The foot scrub was thorough, but not rough but gentle. The body massage itself was strong and relaxing, such that I immediately fell asleep within minutes of the start of the Anti-Stress Massage.Afterwards, we were given mango, sticky rice and lemongrass tea. Overall experience was one of the best massages I've had in Bangkok. Definitely worth going.

Serene and relaxing environment with superficial massage. My husband and I spent 2 hours at a couple's room for this special treat. The herb and oil applied were preselected by us individually. We showered after this application and received massage. Although I requested for deep massage to my neck and back in the questionnaire which I completed upon check in, my therapist gave me light, superficial massage. Not an invigorating experience.

Luxury Massage and Spa !!!. When I found here at the first time, it was hidden gem, but now many people know this lovely shop. Even though the price is much higher than the average of massage shops in Bangkok, I think we can pay it for their service.Their package programs are about 1,000~2,000 baht per 1.5~2 hour. They also serve tea and fruit as dessert after finish massage.Walk around or just sit down in their beautiful garden for a while !

Divine and Divana. Had a excellent experience at Divana.My wife and I had a full body and foot massage for about 3 hours. The atmosphere it's absolutely beautiful. From the furniture to the setup of the room. The masseuses were professional to say the least. It was synchronized massage. We both got the same treatment from how they washed your feet to folding the towel to dry them. We also requested specialized areas so that added a bonus of customization. What's good about the synchronized service is what you know that everyone is getting top rate standardized service. My only complaint is the price. This is expensive for Thailand. Although compared to the world this is very cheap for this level of service. I would not hesitate to visit here again.

Excellent three hours of massage before head to airport. My husband and I booked a 70min foot massage + Siamese body massage 70 min each on a Sunday morning. We were first served with a cold coconut drink and a cold towel. Within 5 minutes we were then led to the room and properly introduced to our masseurs. I requested in advance for a couples room which was awesome. Had a bathtub, shower and toilet in that room. The room aroma was very relaxing but the only one thing is the music was quite loud at one point. My masseur was super professional and I had some amazing stretches. Then afterwards it was followed by the foot massage . We could just lay down in bed without moving to have the foot massage. The only suggestion is maybe the massage lady could have informed me that she was going to use a stick ish to stimulate the circulation of my feet. It was a bit itchy for some spots. I guess it was a typical foot massage in Thailand. Overall with the price I paid for it did indeed meet my expectation. Probably we would be charged double the price in HK. Keep up the good work!

Good Spa with matching services. Had the Spa Exotique package and it was very good. However I think the ambience can improve further with better design and decor. The masseus were friendly and have the right technique. Worth the visit.

Nice Spa but experience better in its sister spa. I was in Bangkok last Dec and tried their other chain called the Divana Divine which I definitely had one of the best spa experience in Thailand.So when I come back this time in Mar, I have decided to try this one withou hesitation as it's closer to where I stayed this time. Tried to email them through their online booking site but without any feedback for two days when they said they gonna respond in 24 hours. So I send again and still received no respond. I ended up needing to call them to make reservation which creates some confusion as the first staff I spoke with basically doesn't speak English. Location is perfect , just right off ASOK. Ambience is great and staff is nice. The spa experience is in general very nice still. But just the other time when I was at Divana Divine, the masseuse seems to be more professional and caring.

Amazing,Relaxing, Top Notch. What an incredible find. Spent our first day having a 6 her spa day! What a way to ease into vacation. This place is top notch very friendly, clean and professional. Spent a few weeks before had communicating with the spa manager to get what we were looking for and she was more than accommodating. I highly recommend this spa to anyone like looking to relax and unwind.

Excellent Service, amazing time . best spa I have ever had! Service - very good service with a detail minded. masseur is very thoughtful. the receptionist helped us to change our pick up time with the taxi driver and helped us to carry our luggage back to the taxi!spa - took the spa elegance choice. The milk bath is the highlight! we all smelled super good afterwards and lasted for at least half a dayfruits are provided in the mid way of spa and at the end of the spa

Kinda ok. Massage was good but not exceptional. Setting is nice and quiet. Unfortunately extremely inflexible. I had to choose between letting the second half of my voucher go to waste or have my gf wait for 70 min. They're unable or unwilling to issue a new voucher with separate massages. Neither when buying the voucher nor when making the appointment was that made clear. Also nothing on the voucher stating that either. Bad surprise after having spent around 6000 thb with them. At least my gf got a discount on her massage...

Absolutely amazing. Quiet retreat on sukhumvit soi 25. Private house offering excelkent service and a professional massage. Went for the 1300thb 70 minute aroma oil and had a blast. Tea and bananapinapple served after. Offering nice gift products as well.

A safe choice. My hot stone massage there is the best I have ever experienced, the temperature of the stones were just right and my son's Thai massage with herbal compress is also comfortable (he has a bad experience of overheated herbal compresses at another spa the other day). However, my husband's masseuse, according to him, was inexperienced and the standard of which is not at all satisfactory. Apparently, the massage standard varies among different masseuses.Moreover, the decoration or the room facilities are a bit dated. my husband and my son's treatment room even has stains on the linen. My room, though small with a bit dated decor, is good enough for me.The other thing that adversely affects the overall ambience is construction site just opposite to the spa. However, it's beyond factor the control of the spa. Hope that the building will be finished soon.Despite the above, we still found the experience pleasant. The massage oil is exceptional and the fragrance on my body after treatment lasted for over 5 hours, which makes Divana stand out from the other spas of similar setting and level.The Receptionist is great and accommodating. They can prolong the treatment time at a charge (other than the time shown in the program menu) so that my family of 3, though choosing 3 different treatments, could start and end at the same time.Divana is definitely a safe choice if you are clueless about what to choose among the large no. of spas and massage parlours in Bangkok.

Nice spa, good massage. This is a nice calm place in the middle of the bustle and hustle of Sukhumvit. The staff are quite friendly, the interior is beautiful, especially the massage rooms. I had booked a 100 minutes Siamese massage, which was good, although not exceptional. I visited their Thong Lor branch (Divana Divine Spa) some time ago and I think I found this other place to be even nicer and I remember the massage to be more exceptional. But massage experiences may vary from therapist to therapist. All in all a good place to relax.
Relax time. It's a relax hours in Divana Massage and spa and enjoyed the massage, facial and scarab package, also they have amazing products to buy

Too Moldy. ~It's well known to Taxi drivers so you won't get lost, but you really need a driver of sorts to get inside the lanes, it's pretty far from the main roads & make sure you get their reception to book you a return trip out!~the HUGE showering Urn in the room was what I spotted straight away. It's behind a wooden screen but entirely open to water condensation all over the room. A little tough for shorter legs to get up and into.~the massage itself was good so you can rest & relaxI would not recommend to folks with allergies
Always the best in Bangkok . This was the 3rd time to visit. Divana always give me a fantastic massage. All staff is kind and professional.I will go again.

Heavenly spa. We are spa lovers. We visit Bangkok 4-5 times a year and enjoy spa every day when we are in Bangkok. Divana at Sukhumvit Soi 25 has been our most favorite spa so far. The cottage is hidden in lustre of green and lined with lotus pond in the front yard. When we enter the premises, we are immediately impressed by the tranquille ambience, feeling relaxed, body and soul. The treatment room in nice Thai decor is very clean and comfortable. In the last few visits, we have tried spa packages, Siamese massage and aromatherapy oil massage. In all occasions, the therapists did the job skillfully and professionally. As Divana appears to be quite popular in Bangkok, it is advisable to make reservation in advance through their website.

Serious Spa in Bangkok!. The spa is in sukumvit and is a real oasis of tranquillity few steps away from the chaotic city. The girls at the reception are nice and efficient, the place is beautiful and clean and the massage is just great. Everytime I go I always buy one or two beauty products, such as the signature massage oils... I go everytime I am in bangkok. I Highly suggest it!

Perfect retreat from the bustle of Sukhumvit. You begin to feel calmer the minute you go through the front gate of Divana where there's a beautiful courtyard that sets the tone for the rest of the spa. I walked in without a reservation and the staff were able to accommodate me within ten minutes. From the receptionist to my therapist, the staff were kind and professional. The relaxing facial I had was half the price as the basic facial offered at my hotel. I highly recommend this place and will definitely be back the next time I'm in Bangkok!

Good but have to try your luck with the therapists. Generally speaking, we had good experience. However it was a pure luck what therapist you got. My husband was unfortunate to have a one who coughed a lot and after message, she forgot to tell him to shower. In the end, he had to get back to the hotel and rushed to shower.

Fantastic experience!. Really clean and friendly day spa. Got cold trink and towels before, fresh fruit and tea after massage.
The massage itself was perfect. I always visit spas when i'm in Thailand, but this one is exceptional.
Great and professional treatment, super friendly staff. Thanks a lot!

Been there twice and will definitely go again!. First time I visited this spa - I made a reservation for aromatherapy but upon arrival asked to change it to a foot massage - this was adjusted and confirmed on the spot without any issues. Second time round went as a group of 6 and everyone was happy with their massages.Upon entering the premises - it is seriously like a tranquil quiet & calm descend upon you. There is construction happening next to the spa at the moment - surprisingly this does not affect the calmness and experience at all.You are greeted by the front door, asked to remove shoes and then enter the seating area where a cold tea and scented cloth is provided to freshen up.Then one of the hostesses will come over and confirm the reservation, kinds of massages, number of people in the party, names and any medical issues.The rooms are then prepared and you will be accompanied to your room - in our case couple rooms and introduced to the masseuses.They will instruct then the procedure and what not of the treatment and wait outside till you are ready.We had a foot soak and wash, and then a 70min foot massage. It was so extremely relaxing that the time flew by, probably because I dozed off almost immediately when the massage started.Afterwards the ladies will wait outside while you compose yourself and come out of the massage zone and then they escort you downstairs for a fruit snack and lemongrass drink.What I like about this spa is the atmosphere - half of a good massage is the ambiance and the zen feeling of being in a spa as well as the scents and the aromas floating around.Then also the attention to detail and customer satisfaction and convenience is something to experience and behold. I have been to countless spas and massage places in Bangkok - but this one is definitely my all time favorite because everything that happens and takes place here is done with the customer in mind and to make sure that they have the best and most relaxing experience as possible.Highly recommended!

Excellent Massage. I was a walk in and was still accomodated with only a 10 min wait. Options extensive though I went for the massage and the therapist was superb. Started with a foot soak and the skill of the therapist was great she concentrated on the areas requested. To finish up you are given pineapple, banana and some tea that is also nicely presented. Surroundings were very relaxing. The massage is on the more expensive side for Thailand but you could not get the same service in Australia for this price. Had a small issue at the end as they wanted my signature for credit card despite the receipt clearly indicating this was not required. Perhaps local policy for their site but not needed for them to receive payment and made me a bit suspicious when they kept pushing especially when their is no place in the receipt designated for a signature.

Good and yet to be even better. I have a very high stardard for massage. I did a Gold Crown Ayurveda package. The therapist was well trained and good. The room's spacious environment with a view of nature outside was what i liked most.Things to improve:1. I hope therapist can keep the customer informed of what she is going to do next.2. Add some background music. 3. Therapists should not leave the room for longer than 5 minutes during the spa.4. Allow the customers to choose their preferred massage oil and body scrub. I have never been asked about that.5. Steaming time and bathing time should be limited to not more than 15 min each. I guess most customers just want more massage time. 6. The bed had better have a hole for people lying face down to breathe. Either my neck or my chin was feeling uncomfortable when i lied face down.7. The stones for massage might be a little too hot. I am not sure if it is the hotter the better?

Wonderful. This is certainly an oasis in the heart of Bangkok. The staff is very professional and truly dedicated to the art of relaxing. The treatments were amazing the sense were incredible and the food delicious !

Great Facial and environment. Went there for a facial after a disappointing experience at Asia herb in thonglor. The service was great. I honestly just googled it and chanced it. The detox facial package is probably best value. Costs a bit more than 1600 thai baht, but it really feels great. The environment really adds up to the experience as well. After the facial, I was rushing to get to a restaurant, then the staff helped me book a cab as well, which is really considerate.
A touch of excellent. I really enjoy a very nice relaxing moment in this place. it is really refreshed me after a long trip in Thailand. the room is very nice and the staff is excellent.

Luxury after a long day. My husband and I enjoyed Aromatherapy Massages, Milk Baths and I had an Anti-Stress facial at Divana after a long day of walking in the city with Jet Lag. What a treat! They were highly professional from beginning to end and it was one of the best massages I have ever experienced. It was very easy to book this online prior to reaching Bangkok, and I would highly recommend a well-priced and luxurious experience at Divana Massage and Spa!

A lovely 130mins of bliss. I did a walk in on a Friday afternoon without any reservation and luckily one guest did not turn up so I managed to try the Spa Sensational treatment. Dont try this as the spa is always fully booked, please make a reservation if you do not wish to be disappointed. The 130min treatment included a thorough foot soak, a mixed berry scrub and an eculyptus aromatherapy massage. The scrub was very nice smelling, I felt like I was some toast and had berry jam all over me. After a shower in this lovely wooden tub my skin felt very smooth. I believed I fell asleep during the massage, Sung the therapist was strong but not painful. Ended with a lovely snack of pineapple and banana served with their post treatment tea. I love the spa which is part of an old Thai house. Very atmospheric with a pretty garden.
Gorgeous experience.. Excellent experience. Relaxing moment. Nice staff, explained to customer clearly with reasonable English.

My Favorite Spa In Bangkok. I have been to Bangkok on several different occasions. I visit this spa every single visit. It is usually the first spa that I visit and the last one I visit when I leave. I have visited quite a few spas in Bangkok, but Divana stands out because of its location. It feels like an escape in the heart of Bangkok where you will feel like you are somewhere else. The staff is always polite, warm, professional, but yet caring. The service is always consistent and the therapy rooms are in true Thai style. I love the products they use and the price of their services.

Heaven!. We went there twice in one week!!It was bliss. Yes, it is a bit pricey, but we decided to pamper ourselves and were we pampered!The entrance to the spa is peaceful and quiet with lots of plants, trees and running water.A staff member greets you at the entrance. You are given a choice of oils that you would like them to use when doing the massage.They serve you with a drink and cloth to wipe your face and hands.It is one (two) of the most relaxing massages that I have had in a very long time. The staff at all times were courteous. My husband and I had the couples room and what I really appreciated, that while giving us the treatments, there was no talking to each other.The music was soft and soothing, enough to make you fall asleep.We were served with fruit and a drink after the massage.I purchased some of there products while there.When we go back to Bangkok, I will make a point of going back for another massage or two.

Fascinated Spa Sensational Experience. Wonderful indulgence to relax and moisturize the body in about 2.30 hours with excellent therapist. Beautiful ambiance with well-designed oriental Thai style atmosphere and decoration. Also feel peaceful and close to nature with nice trees and plants. Well trained staffs are polite and courteous. Nice and clean spa room with facilities. Variety menus http://www.divanaspa.com/MassageAndSpa/Program.php

Wonderful experience. Beautiful interior, service was good, they even ask in details to cater our needs before the spa. Had a wonderful experience with Divana spa. Advise to make reservation online before going.

Lovely Massage . Just received a Thai traditional massage from Nuey. She is super sweet and really worked my legs (where I said the most attention). The spa is beautiful and relaxing. This location is easy to reach. Definitely recommend!

Lovely massage and ambience. Divana is definitely a beautiful decorated and lovely place. If you are willing to fork up a little more money, the service and massages are definitely worth it along with the free drinks and dessert.

Too expensive but great experience. I booked aroma oil massage for two hours. In that time I really really felt so nasty and comfortable. They have many specialist for massage and serve the best value.Before massage they serve a cool tea with cool facecloth and after massage serve tropical fruits with warm tea.Anyway... They do their best. So I was moved.

Well worth the price. Went with a colleague and did a 3hour spa session. Great service, fantastic masseuses. Quality products and oils. A snack of banana and yoghurt was served along with tea after the 1hour scrub followed by an hour of aromatherapy massage and then an hour of hot herbal compress. Then another snack of mango sticky rice with tea after yum! Only minor complaint was the bed didn't have the hole so at some points had to lie flat on my face for her to work properly on the back and neck. But will definitely be back!

Aroma massage with friend. I went there on 22 June 2015 with my friend and tried their aroma massage. This is not my first time this place but I think it's a bit pricy compare to some other places I tried this time. Service ok & environment good.

A must visit . Boyfriend and I weren't sure of where to go for a good massage. After some research we ended up at Divana, which was also close to where we were staying, and we pleasantly surprised. Paying that little extra was well worth it. I had the anti-stress massage, leaving me feeling absolutely relaxed. Service is great and staff are friendly and very accommodating. The masseuse definitely knew what they were doing, and it was a quality Thai massage.

Superb experience. I had an extraordinay experience with the divana spa. This is my first time to visit this brunch. The spa was magnificent in the colonial style with thai touch. The atmosphere was really wonderful All staff provided me with professional services and didn't make me feel uncomfortable. They have many choice of spa menu. I had 2 hours of a wonderful treatment therapist was skillful i can said that they are the treatment expert ^___^So, just a few hour in divana spa is not enough. Must have a second time and more for sure.

Bliss. The staff was very friendly and very attentive. We received a beverage before and after the massage. They took their time explaining each spa package and answered any of our questions. I had the aromatherapy relaxation massage. Relax I did. That was the first time I'd ever dozed off during a massage. My friend had a type of Thai massage and she said they beat her up- in a good way. She walked out rejuvenated and kink free. After our massage we were served lemongrass tea and fresh mango with coconut sticky rice.This place really is a peaceful oasis set back from bustling Sukhumvit Rd. We went at night and the garden outside was beautiful. It was just what we needed after a long flight and first day of sightseeing in Bangkok.I went with a friend but I would highly recommend Divina for couples or for a day of solo pampering. If I ever find myself in BKK again I will definitely return to this spa!

Excellent ambiance and service. Went with my partner and chose the 70 minute Thai massage followed by the 60 minute aromatherapy facial at Divana Spa. On arrival we were greeted and each given a cold towel and chilled lemongrass tea, which was refreshing after wandering down Sukhumvit Road in the Bangkok heat (though the spa is a short walk from the Asok sky train station). When the room is ready you're introduced to your masseurs who present you with the clothes to change into (they are like huge pyjamas) - there is also a safe in the room to store your belongings. The Thai massage begins with a foot soak which felt wonderful, and which I think also lulled me into a false sense of calm before the massage commenced! They do ask you prior to the massage what level of pressure you like (soft, medium, strong) and if there was any area you wanted them to concentrate on. I opted for medium, which 95% of the time felt good - my masseur really knew how to work my muscles. The facial afterwards was a great way to follow up the massage, and the scents of the products used were really pleasant. I was so relaxed during this that I fell asleep for a while - I think the ambiance of the room, the music playing and the sound of the thunderstorm outside all helped! Once your session is complete you're led out to the main reception area where they give you a small snack of mango and sweet sticky rice. We weren't too keen to rush outside as the rain storm was in full swing but decided to "make a run for it" - one of the staff led us outside, giving us one of their umbrellas to walk back through the garden to the street - we got outside and asked if we needed to it back - she replied "I give to you". Such good service and a really great way to end our time there.
fabulous. amazing two hour massage...floated off...definitely recommend. Gorgeous building, tranquil and lovely staff. Will go several times while here.

Still very good. This is the second time I've been to divana. Last time was 6 years ago and this time was again a very nice experience.The whole spa experience was relaxing. I fell asleep half way during the massage, it was that good.But I must say the decor is getting a little old and the price is not cheap compare to other spas in Bangkok.

Awesome service and ambiance . Having tried both the Thai massage at Divana Massage and Health Land, I must say that it's not an easy decision to choose between. Here's my verdict:Divana Massage is amazing if you are seeking for a relaxing ambiance. I got the couple Siamese massage with my girlfriend and was truly amazed with their service. We were greeted with Thai herbal tea and was asked how we liked our massage; soft or medium. We chose medium. We were directed to our own private room to change. The room is clean and has a great decor. The music was relaxing and our masseuses were polite and accommodating.Now on to the massage, the massage was *drum roll* okay. I felt that was it softer than expected. It could be because I'm a guy so I didn't feel much pressure. After the massage, Divana treated us with mango and sticky rice.Now onto health land. I tried to book an appointment with health land over the phone and can agree with past tripadvisor's reviews, they're a bit rude and rushy. I decided to give them a try anyway. My girlfriend and I made an appointment but were late due to the sheer madness that is called bangkok traffic. Upon checking in, they told us that our appointments were no longer valid because we were 20 minutes late. They asked us to wait along with several other people for an hour. We both chose the Thai massage and were directed to our own room.How was it? It was long, amazing and painful. If you can take the pain and are looking to get rid of all of your knots, health land is it! In addition, it's only 500 baht for two hours !Health Land:Cleanliness: 8/10Customer service: 6/10Ambiance: 6/10Thai massage: 9/10Pain: 8/10Price: super affordable DivanaCleanliness: 9/10Customer service: 9/10Ambiance: 9/10Thai massage: 6/10Pain: 2/10Price: upscaleOverall, I liked health land a lot more. If you don't mind not having all of the bells and whistles but can take the pain and want all of your knots removed, health land is it. In contrast, if you are seeking for exceptional service and have never had a Thai massage before, Divana is the place to go since Thai massages could be quite painful.

Heaven of SPA!. Me and my boyfriend has spent amazing 5 days in Bangkok and we love this place as always. this time we tried out the famous spa Divana which also highly recommended by friends despite a bit pricy than others but you wont regret it. we booked the spa online and very soon received confirmation email from the spa and til we stepped inside the virtual venue in Asok which closed to the terminal 21. It was just beautiful and peaceful and very soon the friendly associate came out to greet us and serve wif fresh and tasteful tea and assisted us to chose the oil for the coming treatment. Their service is warm and professional and later we were led to a couple room which is so comfy and the real good spa specialist did their best to provide the extraordinary service to make me feel purified and totally relaxed. it took 2 and a half hours for the treatment and the process was just so detailed and enjoyable that i could not wait to have another trip to Bangkok just for experiencing all of it again.Also the product of Divana is quite famous and good IMO so you could enjoy some discount with it if your package reaches certain amount. Also they have promotion from time to time so just visit their website and print out the promotion page like what i did and enjoy the promoted price or discount on the treatment. It is recommended to book in advance as it is quite full for the spa but me and my boyfriend really love it for its graceful environment, professional service and convenient location.
great spa. great spa,great experince,it's easy to visit (just in the neighborhood of bts surasak).you must try.don't forget to make a resevation on its website before you go.

Our Favourite Spa in the Heart of the City. We have been going to Divana Massage & Spa for the last 3 years. The atmosphere is very garden-like, and calm despite being in the middle of the city. The staff is friendly, warm and welcoming. The massages offered there are consistently great, very pampering and nourishing for the tired body and soul. This is a thoughtful and very well-run place. Despite being busy (which is a good sign), the staff always make an effort to accommodate the bookings and always respond promptly via emails to confirm the appointments. They make their own products and we have tried some of them. Nice!

Good experience, but a bit expensive compared to what the competition offers.. We booked a different spa everyday of our trip to Bangkok and this spa landed somewhere in the middle of the spas we visited. The grounds and atmosphere are lovely at first glance, but there were random Thai workmen sitting in the garden doing nothing during our wait for the massage which made a strange impression. The bathrooms and facilities could be better maintained at second glance and the room we were in had constant construction noise from outside so they kept turning up the volume of the music in our treatment room which was very annoying! Our 2 ladies who gave us the treatments never smiled and it gave me also a weird feeling that they hated their jobs. The treatments themselves were good, but there is a very limited choice on the menu and for the price, comparing to the experiences we had elsewhere, I would not return in the future.

The Shrangri-La in Bangkok. Went there on the first night we arrived in Bangkok. A very relaxing and clean place, almost like a heaven in the middle of buildings. Service was unexpectedly good. Will go there again if go to Thailand again,

Perfectly pampering!. The facilities are a bit older but the place itself has such a relaxing and luxurious vibe, we couldn't help but be swept away! We felt so pampered and cared for, we practically floated out of there. If you are in Bangkok and want to treat yourself to a spa experience (in between cheap and cheerful chair massages), this place could be for you. We had the Spa Exotique package (2h 40m of bliss) for a fraction of what it would cost in Australia!

Superb massage. I selected this establishment after my regular spa informed me they didn't have appointments available. It was a blessing.The location is easy to get to...Asoke BTS, take exit 6.Once you knock on the door, you'll be asked to leave your shoes outside. I had selected 90 minutes aromatherapy. The staff discuss with you the treatment and ask if there are any body areas of concern. You're asked to select from choice of six fragrances. The treatment is thorough and relaxing.Tea and fruits offered after treatment.Amex card promotion led to 10% discount.Highly recommended.

Dreamland spa full of charm and integrity. Welcome to dreamlands. From moment you arrive from the non stop Bangkok city streets you begin to chill. After foot baths, body scrubs and a fantastic massage came the coconut milk bath. You leave feeling younger, fitter and smarter while admiring the hard work tge staff do with a smile and ousing serenity. We enjoyed a private room with Divanie signature massages. Excellent. Recommend booking fore the day you arrive.
Amazing experience . My husband and I just visited and had an amazing experience here. I'm used to going to some pretty amazing spas in the US and this one tops them all for a fraction of the cost.

paradise in Bangkok. I've been visited this place for twice, first in 2010 and second time in this week.I truly enjoy the service and environment, feel so relaxing and cheerful after the treatment.In fact, you will start to feel relax once you have stepped in the main gate, it is totally different world with the hustle and bustle of Asok, although the distance is just 100m away.Took Spa Exotique and Spa for Massage Lover treatment before, both are great.Remember to print the promotion voucher from the website to enjoy discount.

Nice Place. Easy to access via BTS Asoke station, very kind and friendly staff (especially Francis, the filipino gentelman), clean and tidy, good treatment, satisfactory service. Prices are similar with equivalents.

Just great. HAd a hotel booked nearby and just found the reviews here. Gave it a try and it was worth every single bath. Yes, you can find cheaper, no doubt, but the warm welcome to the treatment and friendliness of the employees, all that has its price. I really enjoyed the East meets West massage and the lady took really good care of me. Yes, I will come back for sure once I will head back to BKK
Well done. We have just completed 70mins of anti-stress massage which was amazing. Great pressure, nice ambience. Music could be smoother but overall was worth it. Good job by the therapist!

Would love to go again. Last time I had my first treatment at Divana Virtue in Silom, and since then I became a big fan of Divana group. This time I had Aromatic Anti-stress facial treatment in Asoke. Even though it is owned by a same owner, the concept of the spa seemed quite different. The exotic atmosphere was very beautiful and attractive. The receptionists and therapist never disappointed me just like the other branch. It's really worth paying money for their quality. Will definitely go back there for the Signature Treatment someday soon!

Favourite spa. Divana is now my most favourite spa.I have been here many times but my recent visit was really impressive.Tried aromatherapy and I couldn't resist to come back for the second time during the same trip.The little fruit platter at the end of the course puts a perfect end to the relaxing pampering treatment.Staff are friendly as always.

Beautiful, Comfortable, excellent service. This is one of the best spa that I have been to. It is walking distance from Ashoke BTS station.Their service is good and their skills for massage is good as well. Most importantly, Value for Money.Highly recommended.

Beautiful Place. I love this place because i feel like my ideal house. Be shady, calm-hearted and relax. Spa programs are variously. Price is high but fair and worthwhile. 5 min from BTS Asoke station and Terminal21. I will be back again.

excellent spa in town. beautiful location. receptions are very classy. i had a good choice of various oils and scrubs. they went through the whole package with me. The room was very nice. the therapist also great. i had a wonderful time there. i will definately go back there and recommend my friends to go there as well.

Superb service beyond expectation. Traetments are great, very attentive to details process. I love the garden setting & decors. Plus, it's a short walk from Asoke BTS. One of my most favorite get away within the city. Truly relaxed. Highly recommended!!

Excellent. Booked a session here with my GF. beautifull serene location. reception is very classy and you have a good choice of various oils and scrubs. they go through the whole package with you, and make notes for the massaging ladies on your preferences of pressure and bodyparts that need extra or no attention.The rooms are beautifull, oriental, clean. The personel is very respectfull and servicable. Divana is not the cheapest, but will give the full spa treatment.I had a 120 minute oil massage and my GF a green thea scrub and oil massage. Showering facilities are excellent and the service afterwards includes tea and fruit.They also offer a wide range of products, which i highly recommend!Will go back!

Simply divine!. Yup! It was divine (pun intended!) my wife and I had the spa sensation package and we both enjoyed it. The masseurs were good and remembered our preference when the service staff asked us at the beginning. Location is just off the main road @ soi 25. Very near to Asok BTS. Price wise it's considered premium but we felt it was worth it.

Excellent spa. After multiple visits, I finally secured a reservation at Divana Massage & Spa. I had one of the 4+ hours signature spa. It wasn't cheap but it was worth it. Upon arrival, I was served a chilled drink before being brought to one of the private rooms. I had a combination of body scrub, steam bath, oil massage, etc. What I enjoyed the most was the massage - strong enough to my liking! After the spa, I was served a piece of mango. However, I realised that my spa entitled me to a meal, but I didn't get any due to the kitchen wasn't functioning, To make it up, Divana gave me one of their body creams - a good momento, and allows me to continue part of the Divana experience at home.
i dont want to leave !!!. 一入門口感覺就已經十分放鬆做了一個2小時的spa,完結時完全想再做多2小時最後送上mango sticky rice PS: print out the coupon to get the discount!!

Heaven. This Spa is in the middle of Bangkok, yet tucked away in Suk. Soi 25 is everything you would expect from the perfect Spa. When you enter the elegant reception area you are greeted with a chilled refreshment towel and offered the extensive Spa menue. Once you have chosen the treatment you require you are asked about the strength of the massage, any medical conditions you may have, any body parts to avoid, and so on. I mostly chose the aromatherapy massage. You have the choice of 4 different kind of oils. Once you are in the massage room and have changed into the underwear provided, your therapist starts with washing your feet, followed by one and a half hours of pure bliss. The first time I enjoyed this massage, I was not sure whether 100 minutes of massage was not too long lying still and so on. When the masseuse announced that she was finished, I only thought please don`t stop. After you are dressed again, you are offerd a refreshment and some fresh fruit.The price of the treatments are not exactly cheap, but you get what you pay for. In my opinion, it is worth every single Baht.P.S. To avoid dissapointment make an reservation.

3 hours treatement for men. This SPA was suggested to me by a friend.
I opted for a 3 hours treatement. The package included scrabbing, sauna, bath and oil massage and was extremely good.
Fare price.

A spa that is a dream!. This truly is a magical retreat. From the moment you arrive you enter into a spa oasis. Choosing your aromatherapy fragrances to tea and birds chirping.
