Everything you could want from a spa and more. I'll be going back tomorrow if possible. Thanks to all at infinity for the wonderful experience.

Clean and relaxing. A first class spa. Welcomed with tea, gentle music in the background, and an explanation of what I could look forward to. The massage was soothing and relaxing - just what I was looking for.

Unexpected services and treatments. We arrived the Spa late with a group of 4 people, but unexpected warm welcome were presented by all staff there. They don't have fancy decoration but each details are designed thoughtfully. They explained all treatments in details and let us try the products before making the decisions. Each of us assigned to a private room with shower facility. The treatment including a full body message, scrub and facial. After the treatment we were treated a home made sweet and warm tea. The whole experience were beyond our expectations. Price is good and the services are excellent. After the treatment they called a cab for us, the owner even took us to the main street and helped us to get on the cab. They treated each customer like an old friend. We are no doubt to recommend Infinity Spa to anyone and we definitely want to return there next time when we visit Bangkok.

Amazing service!. Had a beautiful experience at Infinity Spa, service was amazing, the massage was heavenly. The spa is stunning, so relaxing and beautiful. Very luxurious and classy. Highly recommend Infinity Spa.

Amazing Spa. We looked at all of the reviews are were excited to come. We arrived to an amazing welcome and incredibly relaxing and soothing. All of their products were very high quality. They had amazing techniques and is incredibly modern. We were the last appointment of the day and they took amazing time on us and made us feel wonderful. We did NOT want to leave and next time we are in Bangkok we will ONLY come here! Amazing experience.

Got potential. I think this place got real good potential to be tops. The girl at the front was super friendly and welcoming. I guess if you have someone like that dealing with customers you ll probably succeed in pretty much any business.. The massage was a bit of a let down as I was expecting better as lady in the coffee shop down the road(I love coffee I think it was called) highly recommended it. She usually has 5 hours massage there. I guess for this place to be tops you really need more qualified massuers with good customer service and checking if they need to press harder and try to connect to clients in some way. It felt like the girl that massages lacked a bit of skills in both massage and communication. (not the language she could speak English but you know that buzz feeling just was not there.. Especially paying double or tripple than most of other cheap places around bkk. I was really expecting a ripper massage.So far the best one I had was some place close to mbk I think her name was Ailine. Even though place was a bit dogy and girl asked if I wanted special ( I was not interested) massage was superb. But the experience was still positive overall. And I did recommend this place to few other guys I met at ibm seminar.
Massage. Very clean place, friendly and caring people. Took the relax-atherapy massage. Excellent service. Will come again and def. recommend this place.

A glance of heaven. . From the moment you pass in to the moment you walkout ( which you kind of don't want to ) you are a heaven sample on earth.Recommend to do the Infinity Aroma massage.Thanks for Ms.Oh and Ms.Sonisa.Will come a hundred times again.

Excellent Spa experience!. My partner and I went to this spa and we both commented this was the best massage experience we have ever had. We each had a two hour massage with both aroma and Thai massage elements. Book in advance via email and schedule the day after your flight! The spa always has promotions. Very clean and professional. Stayed at the Peninsula Hotel and it was a 10 minute walk after crossing river via boat. I highly recommend!

Best Spa in Bangkok. Everything in this Spa is perfect, from the brginning when your needs are asked and the packages explained, until the end when a light snack of mango sticky rice is given. Massage felt amazing (had the 90 minutes infinity aroma). Spa is built on several floors that separate noises.

Impressed . Visited with a friend. We were impressed by the minimalist set up of the spa - a rare sight in Bangkok.
We felt relaxed the moment we stepped into the spa. And left totally rejuvenated.
Good place for those who prefer to be pampered with little fuss and clutter.

Not worth it!. This was the first spa I visited on my 4th trip to BKK. Other than the manager & owner who were exceptionally warm & kind I found the services lacking. I started off with a body scrub, facial & aromatherapy massage. The facial was most disappointing & they charged me an extra 300THB as well saying it was a special one. The massage was mediocre.

Infinity Aroma Massage. The spa was a nice break from the hustle and bustle of Bangkok. The staff was very professional and everything was clean. The massage was great. It started out with too much pressure but they accommodated my request to lighten up. I enjoyed the mango and sticky rice after the massage also. It was a great experience!

Get the Jet Lag treatment!. This was the absolute best 3 hours I've spent at any spa. Got the Jet Leg treatment, A scrub down, a long massage and even a facial (my first - and it was very cool) The massage pressure was as strong as I could stand it and I got off the table barely able to walk.Then I had to get on a plane for another 20 hours...oh well,,, it was still a great spa experience! I'm going back if I'm ever in Bangkok again.

Love this place!. We first visited this wonderful spa last year and were delighted to be able to return this year. Luckily we got an appointment just turning up but I would recommend pre-booking because it is popular and busy - there may be many much cheaper places for a massage in Bangkok but this is a luxurious treat not to be missed!

Excellent Spa . We loved our experience! We visited infinity spa two times during our trip! Each time we were very pleased with the services. The atmosphere is great and all staff is very friendly and accommodating.

Very Impressive . Where do I start.....The professionalism of the staff & the customer service I received was very high.The decor and the special touches are well thought out and eye catching.The surround sound was very relaxing & the smell of the spa created an amazing atmosphere too.The Spa is very unique & clean with a personal & private experience. I have a lot of experience in massage. And I can say that the massage I had was of very good quality, by the hands of someone very experienced or well trained. I met the owner on my arrival and I would just like to say, Congratulations! Be very proud of your beautiful place. And thank you

Excellent welcome wonderful staff amazing massage. I was welcomed like in a palace, by a wondefull lady named Dada with : a smiling face, polite, good English,flower necklace ...She explained me the details of the different massages and helped me decide on which one to choose, in a matter of minutes I had booked my appointment.When i came back same welcome she remembered me well and had everything ready. Mong the masseur was really good, the oils were top quality from the smell and the texture point of view the place was quiet and the atmosphere really relaxing.Once i was finished Dada brought me a very good Sticky rice and mango with green tea and she talked with me to get a feed back on the massage and then as she was realy making me feel confortable we wwent on about Thai life and she answered all my questions about Thai culture; Moreover she showed me the good things and secret places of Bangkok to go to.I went out realy happy I Will DEFINITIVELY go back the next time i'm in Bangkok.

A bit overpriced, but nice!. I think the massage, at least the one I got, was a bit overpriced compared to the massages I've had in Thailand before and the quality of the massages I've had before. I told the masseuse that it was too hard on my back, but she didn't understand that much and just kept on going. Maybe let them know in advance how you would like it and then it will be fine.

Great ambience, great massage. Decided to try out this spa as it has excellent reviews on TripAdvisor. And yes, is totally worth it. We chosen the infinity aroma massage and it was good. The spa is also beautiful and clean. Ambience fantastic. The staff are friendly and give good recommendation on the type of massage and massage oil to be used. Thank you for the great service and massage!
classy place. great massage very clean and tidy. Massage was good and they focus on the customer experience. Even served us snacks after the treatment

Great massage! . I got the 30 min body scrub and 2 hour massage. It was amazing!!! Very relaxing atmosphere and the staff were all very friendly and polite. Definitely pricey for Bangkok but worth it for a treat.

Amazing Spa with no Comment!!. I have been past five day in top rank and rated spa in trip advisor the only word I can say why I did not come before ...Extremely great spa and best customer service the massager was the greatest and in very high stander experience ...I have chosen a package including facialDon't miss out infinity spaThey told they will have new building as well soon

Best spa experience!. A very very clean spa in Bangkok, would highly recommend. This is more expensive than your average massage in BKK but compared to HK this is not expensive at all. Would recommend checking out their website to see what services they offer and book in advance. Arrived there and was immediately asked about our massage preferences and they tailored the massage to our needs. I chose the relax therapy massage 90 minutes. I did not regret my choice at all, Cherry was absolutely fabulous she was so good that I fell asleep (usually I don't), she was very gentle and I thoroughly enjoyed the massage. Would DEFINITELY recommend this, there was also tea served before and after the spa, after you come out of the spa you will feel very relaxed. There was also shower services in the spa and couple rooms available.

Book immediately- best spa no questions!!!. I went here with 2 of my girlfriends and we booked the 3 hour package for 3100 THB which included a 30 min scrub, 90 min massage and 60 min facial. Every single treatment was excellent- literally I have no complaints whatsoever. This place is a hidden gem- we walked and felt totally relaxed from the get go. The spa manager benji is super friendly and makes you feel very much at home. One of my friends is allergic to nuts and they promptly went and bought coconut oil so she didn't ,it's out (they use almond oil). It's such great value for money and the spa is spotless, great modern decor with great products (all smell divine!). The staff are so lovely, friendly and professional. I only wish I could have gone more than once during our break in Bangkok. Do not miss out- this place is heaven & an absolute standout!

Perfection in spa-form. Very clean facilities and professional staff. The massage was deep, firm, and incredibly relaxing. I appreciated their attention to detail with my manicure, pedicure, body scrub, massage, and facial. Very reasonable price for all those services - approx. $150 USD. Be perpared to walk up stairs and be careful in the shower, the room is a bit slippery.I will definitely be back to Infinity Spa on my next trip to Bangkok. Thank you so much. ขอบคุณมาก

Zen to the max!. Get off that hot busy street and into Infinity Spa for a treatment. They offer everything from full body massages to mani/pedi. From the minute you walk through the door you forget the hustle bustle of this great city and take some me-time! You are seated and offered a cool drink while reviewing the menu of services with the receptionist. After you make your massage selection, you choose 1 of 4 scented oils that suits your fancy, then you are lead up the steps to the foot washing station, and then further up another flight of stairs to the private massage rooms. You can take a quick shower (right in the massage room) before beginning (highly recommend this), then you lie down for 1-2 hours of bliss. Your masseuse will ask how "firm" you want the pressure of her magic hands, and although I don't usually like a FIRM hand, this one was needed for some really tight leg muscles that she managed to release! Everything from the spotlessly clean facilities to the crisp clean linens on the tables, to the bowl of fresh flowers under the massage table which you look into through the donut for your face, to the finishing touch of a sticky rice and mango treat with warm tea is just five star. We visited twice on this trip - the second time as our grand finale massage the last day of our trip, and this first class spa did not disappoint!

Wonderful spa. This place is so wonderful me & my friends went back 3 times. Staff is pleasant location was in walking distance from our hotel . Very Clean & professional and gets the job done that's what I loved about this spa. The owners are great & friendly . On the first day I got a full body message with oil. The 2nd visit I got a package that included a 60 min facial, 30 min body scrub & gel manicure/pedicure it was fabulous. The 3rd visit I received a 90 min herbal ball massage. Me & friends really enjoyed this spa & I would recommend it to anyone visiting bangkok. It more luxury than the thousands of massage places u see on every corner of street but very well worth it. Prices are very affordable and to end it of with hot tea with mango & sticky rice is just wonderful.

A little oasis in Bangkok. After a few days of exploring Bangkok we were ready for some relaxation. We found it at infinity spa! I would recommend making a reservation ahead of time, which we did. When we walked in the gentleman at the front desk greeted us by name and made us feel welcome and ready to be pampered.The facilities were so clean and soothing, with simple and modern decor. And the staff were professional and nice. It was a real relief from all the spa storefronts you see when walking around and not even that much more expensive. I got the infinity aroma, a perfect blend of Thai and Swedish. I felt amazing during and all day after. It was exactly what I needed! I only wish I had more time to get the jet lag package.

Best service and free wifi. . I booked treatments for 3 friends long before arriving in Bangkok. The quick correspondence through email was really appreciated. We booked and extra two friends last minute and infinity Spa were more than accommodating. Our journey to Infinity didn't start so well with two taxis taking us to 2 wrong places. However, we disembarked and tried another taxi who called infinity, infinity explained how to get there and we were at our destination in no time. We had last minute changes to our bookings and infinity changed our treatments on the spot. We were greeted with essential oil test, cold water and towels. The basic pedicure was anything but basic. I thoroughly enjoyed the experience. It is a step by step process, my advice is to go with it. After the foot soak/wash we were taken up to another level where we settled in for an hour of pampering with free wifi. Afterwards we enjoyed tea, hot towel and mango sticky rice. While this is not the cheapest spa place it far exceeds any service I have experienced in my last 4 visits to Bangkok. You will not find a more clean and ambient space. My friend enjoyed a head, back, shoulder massage by Om and thoroughly enjoyed it. Joy and Sunia had great customer service skills. After our lost taxi ride Joy even went as far as standing on the main road to make sure our taxi and tuk tuk knew where they were going. Now that is service!!! Thank you so much ladies. We will be back

WOW!. Just one of the best spa i have ever been to! Amazing from the moment you step in the spa, friendly and very welcoming staff. The owner Benji is very kind and friendly.The hostesses welcome you and make you feel comfortable, explains all the therapy they offer and know them very well. The spa is spotless, very clean and beautiful design. I felt like i was in a bubble the whole 3 hours .The product they use is very good and great quality, hence the reason of a higher price than any other spa in BKK, but its worth it! At the end they offer a very nice tea with a portion of the famous mango sticky rice ;)Way to go Benji! I will defentely come back

Absolutely wonderful experience!. We had a fantastic experience at Infinity. We booked the 60 mins foot massage and were treated to a 70+ mins foot massage and shoulder massage. The staff are very friendly and sincere. Highly recommended.

Pampered like a princess. Having read so many reviews about this place, finally get to try it myself. Thoroughly enjoyed my experience here, had a full body massage and pedicure. The staff was really personal and get to to know your preferences. Very spacious, bright and clean. The price is slightly highly compare to other massage places but it's worth it. Would recommend the massage, as the pedicure wasn't as good as I hoped. Can book online and pick who you would like to have the treatment with.

One of the best spa I ever been in Bangkok super clean and friendly sweet Reception and staff .. The spa is easy place to fine and car parking for customers is safety area visit there every time when we go to Bangkok we love the couple room and the home made oil my husband enjoy with facial jetlag and we both do the 3hour treatment is was so amazing is the amazing place to relax in the big city from the busy day is very comfortable and Quiet place and the private room for the nail floor not have to sit next to other people while I enjoy doing my nail spa love it. .we looking forward to see you again soon .we love Infinity spa

Modern spa, fantastic ambience but the skill.... Visited this modern infinity spa couple of times and latest just in January 2016. The spa itself located on Silom road but it could be a bit difficult to find the place if you dont know where the sun square exactly is. The parking spot is messy, the area is not really specific at where the avaiable parking space should be. Luckily, one of therapist who saw me finding the space and she was very helpful to help me sort this out.I cant remember the name of massage I chose but there were 3 different types combined e.g. Thai + Aromatherapy ending with Herbal Compress. Overall experience is just average. Pedicure menicure service is just OK. Bur the staff took me a bit longer than usual service hour as it would be since there was some expected scratches from me opening the bag, grabing keys, bag but it was alright.Thank you for your service but it is not reaching my expectation with cost spent. I prefer going somewhere else.

Super Modern interior, so tastefully done and very professional!!!! Look no further !. One word... EXCELLENT!! Very clean, spacious... very professional therapists and such a wonderful warm welcome from the Manager Richard and Benji. Thank you for such a memorable experience!! Vanessa and Eric Tollemer- Singapore
Super clean, efficient & friendly staff. Spent four hours being pampered - absolutely wonderful experience. Great body massages and beautiful mani & pedi. Very happy customers indeed.

One of the best spa experiences . I loved my spa experience so much I went 5 times during my week visit in Thailand. I think I had every treatment. The owner, Benji, and is staff made me feel so welcome, I wanted to go back. Each treat was special in its own way. I get massages regularly and on all my travels. We were on a work trip and 7 other people went and raved about the experience. I highly recommend!!!

Spalicious!!. Benji and team are wonderful! Clean, relaxing environment to cast your worries into the best hands in Bangkok! I've been to Bangkok twice and I spent 4 days in a row there! Best manicure and pedicure I've ever had! A must do in Bangkok!

5 star Spa experience. If you would like to relax by professional hands, infinity spa is a the correct address to go. The owner Benji and all staff create an unforgettable atmosphere for their guests. Highly recommend the relax a therapy massage by M. Will definitely go again. Mert from Turkey.

Spa cum medi+pedi. Based on the raving reviews read here, we tried out, the location is out of the way, the place is nice and trendy. We spend half a day there for spa cum medi-pedi. Nice and enjoyable. The staffs are friendly.
Just Perfect !. Frindly staffs,Amazing massage,Lovely interior Design,Reasonable price!! I love infinity spa.I want visit again. Infiniy spa is one of the best massage shop in BKK :D

Good massage. This is a good place to go if you don't want a massage in the busier street side spa's. The place is very modern and clean and the staff are very helpful.We had the infinity aroma massage, we were taken upstairs for this and had the 90minute massage. It was a good massage. Nothing exceptional, but good.For the price however, i would have expected a bigger spa, maybe with showers, a swimming pool, small cafe area, like you might get in a hotel spa. I'm not that familiar with these places so don't know if that is unreasonable or not.

Pure amazingness. I went to multiple high-end spa facilities during my stay in Bangkok and Infinity Spa was by far the best one. The design of the spa is absolutely beautiful and unique. The staff are very friendly and are very knowledgeable about the treatments they offer. I had two treatments: their signature massage and a facial and I really enjoyed both of them. I've been to many spas in many places and I think Infinity Spa might be my favourite spa of all spas I've been to so far. Next time I'm in Bangkok I will definitely go back!
Great SPA. 整體設計非常的特別新穎，好像來到另一個世界。手法力道都非常專業。我體驗了一個非常舒服的下午。精油氣味調和且天然。態度、語言都專業。we highly recommend here. Fantastic experience.

Beautiful mani-pedi. It's been a while since I've been to BKK/infinity, whoa it's expanded a lot! Professional service and products. I always love coming here. My mani/pedi is beautiful and now my toes are sandal ready.

Best Oasis at a reasonable price in Bangkok.. Overall this is a cannot go wrong place to enjoy a few hours of peace and quiet in the middle of Bangkok. The reception is excellent, you can book online, the decor is serene and modern and super clean. . The staff is well trained and understand English so you have no communication issues. I suspect the management know a number of other languages so they can accommodate. I would definitely return and recommend to all my friends.. Please know this is excellent. GJH

Best place in BKK!. Really loved this place! So clean, modern and the people are very kind. I did the signature massage and the facial, and both were suberb! Would definitely recommend it if you are willing to pay a bit more than the street massages. To me, it was worth it for sure!
Best experience. This Place is Perfect.We came twice during our 3 days in Bangkok.Very nice atmosphere, very clean, friendly Staff and Perfect Massage.

Modern, clean, holistic spa. Very nice spa with modern and clean facilities. Products are not organic but no chemicals are used which is nice. Owners extremely friendly and fluent in English, other staff are very skilled in treatments but not in English which means conversation about special requirements is difficult, and guidance about what to and where to go is on a minimum and can turn into odd and comic situations in undressed condition...

Relaxing and hygienic spa. The spa was comfortable, relaxing and hygienic. Definitely recommend their signature full body massage. Walk-ins are possible but you should book a place in advance to ensure a spot. Would definitely recommend for a luxury spa treatment in Bangkok.

The best best best place. I was having an absolutely rubbish day when I came here, as soon as I walked through the door the staff put a smile on my face. They are so incredibly lovely and genuine. The massage is a bit more expensive than the standard but it is so worth it, I get massages at least twice a month and this was the best I've ever had. I went for the infinity signature massage and it was amazingggggg! The place itself is awesome, it looks like a cross between a fancy hostel and heaven. I would definitely get addicted to this place if I lived here.

Best spa in town . We just come back from amazing holiday at shangrila Bangkok. We took all of our spa tritments at infinity spa. It was woundeful experience. This is a professional and pleasant spa with a reasonable prices. Go and enjoy best of Bangkok We already want to come back...Arnon & hila

Great design, great massage, great service. I can highly recommend this spa, which opened only little more than a year ago. When you enter, you are greeted by extremely friendly staff. The whole place is designed in a very modern and minimalistic way I personally liked a lot. I was told it was created by design students. I booked a 2 hours signature massage, which is basically a blend of Thai and oil massage. First of all the therapist started out kind of soft and I was afraid it would become some kind of wellness massage - which wouldn't have been what I needed as I suffered from extreme muscular tension. But then I told her to go much firmer, which she immediately did. In the end it turned out to be one of the best massages I had during my time in Thailand. Design, service level and massage technique were all fabulous - which is why I would go back anytime.

Awesome service and nice place. It's really lucky for me and my friend to find this place and enjoy spa. The building just redecorated few days ago. Everything is new. The massagists are well-trained and have good attitude as well. After massaging, we'd plan to go another place to have dinner but not sure where it is, the reception personnel help us to have a phone call to the restaurant, and lead us outside to show the direction we should ahead, how nice they are. Thanks for those kindly people, we'd really enjoy for the whole treatment.

Fantastic relaxation experience. The spa is not as well known as other large spa chain shops, however it offers the best service and environment that I have ever experienced. The furniture and decorations are highlights, in Tiffany blue colour! The infinite aroma package is a must try which is a mix of Thai massage and soft oil massage. You can add scrub as option. The massage oil used is easy to absorb on skin and you will feel the great condition whole day long but not feel oily. I will recommend both the "relax" oil and "energise" oil, which the aroma is very refreshing. The good thing is this place is easy to make reservation while the quality is as good as the others. Best part is that it is not as crowded and filled up by tourists. Most visitors are Korean and I was told by the staffs, it was because the Korean bloggers highly recommend this place.
Great Thai massage. Really enjoyed the treatment and came back for more in a few days. Signature Thai massage was amazing.

Environment vs. massage quality. This place deserves a 5 star for ambiance, cleanliness of site, and ease of making reservations. However, if you value the quality of your massage over all these, I would suggest you go elsewhere as the massage itself was subpar and extremely expensive compared to other places. 800 baht for an hour foot massage is 2-3 times more expensive than elsewhere and I've had phenomenal massages for a fraction of the cost at very good locations.

Futuristic Good Service . This Spa may not be the cheapest in town but certainly offers great service and options for your buck. It's one of the more professional Thai massages I've had that really dug into my tissues rather than circle around them. The facial I had was good too, although they don't use any machine so no pore opening or hand picking blackheads, which would have been good.

More than expected. Such an awesome place! Don't know even why I kept on going to a place next door before, if only I knew about Infinity Spa sooner. The ambience, stuff, music and attentiveness are at the top. Bravo! Keep it up.

Relaxing and Super experience. After having reviewed this spa on trip advisor , i had booked for a spa treatment in advance. They were prompt to reply and confirm on mail. I went in for the infinity aroma. The place is recently refurbished and has interesting decor. Clean lines and bright. The staff is extremely friendly and they make you sit and choose the oil and the type of treatment etc. I would have preferred a exclusive room , but my treatment was in a room with the curtains around you. Overall a good experience and very relaxing.

Infinity Aroma was great. After 3 weeks of traveling and many massages throughout Thailand and Cambodia this was our final stop. We decided to go for the signature treatment "infinity aroma" and it was a great choice. This was one of our best massages ever: a very warm and charming welcome, great ambience and sound, everything clean and very professional. Looking forward to be back to BKK and see this place again.

Great experience!. Nice and welcoming ambiance. Staff are friendly and speak English. Patiently explained type of massages and treatment they have. Then oil selection for massage and they only use organic oil products. Then proceeded to level 2 where the therapist will wash ur feet. Nice.. After a good and clean wash, ushered to the treatment room where I had a relaxed (dozed off due to the nice and relaxing moves from the therapist) aromatherapy massage. After the massage, I'm ready to continue my second part of street shopping. Love the experience in the spa. Will be back!

Great customer service and ambience. But massage wasn't up to par. . Friendly staff. Great use of herbs and fragrances. More detailed than any massage place I've been to. But the massage was sub standard to 300 baht massages I had off the streets of Bkk. The staff was super friendly though. I rate it 2 stars because it's quite expensive.

Excellent Spa Services & Warm Attentive Staff. As soon as I stepped through the door I was greeted with a warm welcome. The treatments simply put - sent me straight to heaven! I had the Infinity massage with the body scrub to start. The Infinity massage technique combines the traditional Thai massage with Swedish/Aroma therapy massage techniques. Absolutely Lovely. The private shower/bathroom was a nice touch. Post treatment, I was served a cup of hot Tea. The owner Benji checked in to see how my treatment was and went so far as to provide suggestions of must sees during my trip. Incredible spa experience with a home away from home feel.Must make mention of how pleased I was with the Pedicure I received prior to leaving Bankok.Thanks Infinity Spa!
Underwhelming. Expected a lot but it was not as we expected. Its really small and not very impressive and the massage skill was no better than the cheap places that everywhere in Bangkok.

Very clean and professional. I have had a number of massages in Thailand and I must say that the ones you get at Infinity ranks among the best. As they've just renovated I ended up going to another place and it was horrible. I can't wait for Infinity to open back up again. The place is very fresh and clean and the staff is very friendly, professional and good. They take time listening to what you want/need before they sell you a product. Highly recommended!

Perfect to relax. The spa has a very good concept . First you get something to drink , can select his massage , gets a warm towel and the feet are washed . Then it goes depending on the massage in a small room and you can enjoy wonderful massages . We were there at the beginning of our holiday and went after 3 weeks traveling again to the spa . It was the best massage we had in all of Thailand .

Best Spa in Silom or Bangkok. I've been to the Infinity Spa two times in three days.This tells how much comfort and relax I felt from this spa.All the employees are very kind and nice. And the look and design ofthe spa is very modern and unique, which differentiates itself from allthe other spas in Silom area or whole Bangkok. I did 90min treatment and it was so great, the best treatment experience inmy life. Private room made me to relax and calm.Price is reasonable. Although it might be expensive comparing to otherspas which target tourists on the streets, the quality of this spa will not disappoint you for every baht you pay.If you stay in Silom area, this place is a must-visit. Infinity Spa would be my first place to visit for my future Bangkok visit from now on.

Perfect place for relaxing . The best spa day experience ever!The front staff is very attentive and explain the menu very well.I had the best massage (infinity aroma) follow by the mani and pedicure spa package. Never in my life seen the spa this clean. The nails equipment come in a steaming hot wrap package. The nails girl explain the steps to me.I feel that I can trusted them. Will recommend this spa to anyone.

Fabulous spa day out. I heard about this spa from a friend. So I decided to give it a go. I was so amaze of how beautiful the spa is.The nail floor was so beautiful. The front staff explained to me about the treatments very well. I pick the spa mani and pedi package. The nails equipment was very well sanitize. They looks very hot when the took it out from the wrap. They also spray they equipments again with the NAS99. They use all opi products. The smell from the products are amazing. I really recommend every one to try the spa mani and pedi package.I love it I will come back again.

Wow! Most hygienic spa. I been going to many spas in BKK. This is the first place that wow me with hygiene and service. The spa is lovely and white and so are the towels. I did the spa pedicure and basic manicure by opi. The staff took me through the cleaning steps of all the equipment and process. I never seen this at any other spa before. It made me feel safe and not worry. The manicure last for weeks after. I highly recommend you book before as this place gets busy. Will be back again soon

Cleanliness and Hygiene in the tools used for Mani & Pedi questionable. I was there recently with a friend and we had the express mani & pedi together with a foot reflexology session. We requested for firm pressure with the foot massage but didn't feel it was firm enough. We made several attempts to inform the therapists to increase the pressure but nothing happened. I had to let it go after a few more futile attempts! When we had our mani & pedi sessions, we noticed the nail clippers, cuticle trimmers and other tools did not come in sterilised bags. Neither were they sprayed with disinfectant before use. I could only assume it was already disinfected prior to our session. Unfortunately, I noticed they used the same set of tools which were unwashed and not properly sterilised nor disinfected on the next customer after me. Same goes for their soaking basins for both hand and foot wash. The used soaking water was just emptied out and wiped down with the same towel that was used to wipe dry my hand or foot previously before it was stored away for its next use. Least to say, I was appalled and unimpressed by this very unhygienic practice! There have been a lot of complaints lately in the media of customers getting fungal infection on their nails from visiting nail salons particularly in Bangkok that do not conform to strict hygiene practices. It would be unfortunate for Infinity Spa to suffer further negative feedback because of an oversight on this.
Massage was amazing!. Great service from the start! Massage was the best I've had for a while and would definitely recommend to people and will be going back next time :)

Clean and with very friendly staff. I have tried this spa couple of times already. Staff is very friendly and make a great difference with others massage places, they are willing to answer all your questions and help you at any time. Maybe what called more my attention is the cleanliness of the place. You won't see a single hair on the floor. They keep it clean at all the times. The massages were quite good and professional. Definitely it worth a try if you are in the area!

Didn't get a chance. Read the great reviews and went to check the place out. Greeted nicely as Thai-typical and services were explained. We took a few minutes to decide upon a time to book a couples message and when made our selection we were told the time had been taken by a couple who arrived after us (and subsequently left). Furthermore no additional times were now available nor apology given. Poor communication between staff, who knows, but it left a poor impression and we walked down the street to a competitor at half the price. Advise you to book in advance.

Beautiful relaxing and professional salon best in BKK . Beautiful relaxing salon, aromatherapy smells, calming music, clean, exactly how it should be. Lovely, friendly and Professional staff with high skill set. Manicure and pedicure done to perfection. The best massage I have had in a long time and a relaxing Thalgo Facial. All of this and it was very reasonable $$ Fantastic service and the owner is lovely and helpful and really makes sure u have a great experience. He even gave me a tuna sandwich when I said I was hungryDefinitely be back thanks guys x

Jet lag facial & Pedicure. I visited this spa with my daughter. I had booked from the uk and received an immediate response to book us in and confirm their offers.It was easy to find, we were offered cold drinks and cold flannels on arrival whilst a member of staff discussed our treatments.We both had jet lag facials and full spa pedicures.One of the best pedicures ever, our toes still look great 3 weeks later! All OPI coloursThe jet lag facial was soothing although not memorable for 3,200 baht!The staff were very good, my daughter left her necklace there and they found it and emailed us immediately.Definitely worth a visit to a clean extremely well run spa in Bangkok!

Good place to unwind and relax. Booking online using their website's form didn't work. I had to use their Line ID to confirm the booking and things went pretty well from there.We arrived on time for our appointment after the taxi driver got directions from Infinity spa staff. Once there, we were settled down and given towels to wipe ourselves down as it was raining. The products and services available were explained clearly and they even provided sampling of the oils and scrubs. Great stuff. We were spoiled for choice. After making our choices, we were paired with our masseurs and off we went.Infinity Spa is undoubtably clean and as good as other reviews say it is. You just got to try it to believe it.

Relaxing and soothing. Amazing experience !!!Bangkok is my second home so when ever iam there i never forget to take massage and for me no better place for massage than infinity!!! Everything is so perfect!! Friendly staff and good aroma !!! Keep it up guys

Fantastic 1st experience. Found them online and decided to give them a try. They had a promo on as they were having on-going construction work next door. (50% off from 1330hr-1500hr, value for money unless youre looking for a state of zen during your rub downs) LocationA short walk from surasak bts (train station) MassageThere is a list of options, i picked full body thai treatment. I am no expert, however i felt great after the rub down. My wife has the "signature" infinity aroma treatment ( full body + oil) and she too felt it was great! She noted that she did not feel oily compared to some other spas we have been too - which we felt is good.Overall, We feel this is 1 spa you should consider visiting. And if you're in time, you might still get the 50% promo.We hope you will enjoy the treatment as we did. Cheers

Much needed revitalising introduction to Thai massage . From the moment I walked in the door I could tell Infinity Spa knew what they are doing.The staff were gracious, the interior a beautiful modern design and the treatment rooms were clean and well thought out.My masseur was professional and instinctive, and seamlessly combined traditional Thai with deep tissue, using great hand made oils that left my skin feeling revitalised but not greasy.Highly recommended.

Heaven in Bangkok. Wonderful staff. Fantastic massageVery nice and relaxing.Good looking clean space.Tip. Ask... what the schedule is for the renovations going on next door so you are aware and can book accordingly. This was Sept 20th. 2015.

A Must-Try Spa in BKK!. A random massage place we chose from Trip Advisor (lots of good reviews) when we were there in June'15. Location is kinda hidden if you're traveling by BTS. On services, every single staff is very friendly and helpful. Explained every element in the spa, interior and exterior (I'm pretty amazed). Nevertheless, great spa massage! Do not miss it guys if you're planning for pleasant massage!

Best spa. This spa is new, well designed and has amazing staff. I had a spa pedicure, express manicure, body scrub and oil massage. The homemade oat and honey body scrub left my usually dry skin, soft and supple. The nail girls are able to do very cute designs. This spa experience was the best 5 hours of my trip.

Fantastic Service. Quiet Environment.. Reception - very helpful and friendly. Spa - they opened in January, 2015 so everything was spanking clean. Loved the colors and set up. Service - Facial - great touch. However, i would not choose the seaweed mask again. My face stank of seafood. Next time will be other types of facial treatmentsService - Mani and Pedi. Attentive and right on point. Location - 10-15 minutes walk from Surasek BTS. So its a bit of a walk. But worth it. Will definitely come back again when back in Bangkok

One of the massages ive had. I visited the spa after reading the reviews on trip advisor and was not disappointed. I had a 90 minute massage and the express pedicure and they were both very good.The reception area is quite cold and a little unwelcoming but don't be put off it was worth every penny.The staff there are fantastic, I will definitely recommend and will go back.

Oasis in Bangkok for unbelievable price. I am a spa junkie and was looking for something for my last minute Bangkok trip. Booked a session at the Infinity based on the positive reviews on tripadvisor. I was not disappointed.The moment you step in, it's quite obvious the owners put a lot of thoughts into the decor. Not your usual bamboo earth tone Thai spa. I had a 2 hrs Thai massage, with herbal compress included for only THB 1000. Of course there are cheaper options out there but not with such ambience and services.I also had the spa pedicure and it was the best I have ever had. My feet were scrubbed, masked, massaged and they have never feel so foot. At only THB 1100, I think it's a bargain.Will definitely recommend Infinity Spa and look forward to returning some day.

Excellent service, excellent massage. Visited after 4 weeks of backpacking and a very short notice booking. Couldn't have been more helpful. Kind, considerate and welcoming. On arrival I was given all the options and asked which oil I preferred. Chose to have 90 mins infinity message. My masseur escorted me to foot wash and then he provided one of the best massages I have ever had knowing exactly my needs and what to focus on and avoid. Highly recommended!

Memorable Spa Experience. I have stayed in Bangkok for 2 weeks for overseas training course. I have tried 6 spa treatment in the said period. This is the most relaxing feel and comfortable spa.I just searched this spa in tripadvisor. I have made a reservation for 2 hours Aromatic oil massage and half an hour body scrub before one day. The lady introduced the aroma massage and body scrub in phone very well. All staffs are very professional, nice and friendly. When I come to the shop, a non-Thai staff explained the spa details to me. I have chosen the mango sticky rice body scrub, it was special. The atmosphere of the shop were very relaxing and comfortable. I really forgot I was stayed in Bangkok. The Masseur (I forgot the name) was professional. This spa is really good for me to eliminate tiredness after having finished my 2 weeks training course. The price of massage with body scrub is expensive (few hundred Baht) than other shops but it is worth.

Great to help with jet lag. Had a two hour massage. Thai and oil. Medium pressure. You are in a lovely calm setting. Medium was very strong for me. Needed to tell girl softer. Very week trained staff. Very gorgeous place. Many air line staff go here as well. Variety of things on offer. Must book very busy. Facials. Manicures.

One of a kind experience!!. Although there are many other maybe cheaper massage possibilities around in Bangkok, you should really go to infinity spa!The moment you go in there, you Will suddenly forget the hectic of Bangkok and the other million spa's.Infinity spa is Very professional and the atmosphere is very relaxed and zen. Besides that, i liked the personal approach Very much. They ask (and remember!!) your name and you can always ask for different levels: soft medium or strong.I had the head shoulder Back massage and a foot leg massage which i both really recommend!!

Best spa!. Although it is more expensive than other spa/ massage places, it is by far more inviting, professional and friendly.The cute lady with the high heals will host you perfectly. All the staff are very friendly. You can choose soft, medium or hard massage and also the areas which you wish them to concentrate in. The massage in amazing! Infinity aroma therapy is recommended! Great place. We will definitely come back again!!

WOW! . I was looking for a couple hours spa treatment in Bangkok after a 10 days adventure trip in Bangkok. The spa offer in this city is huge. I decided to go to Infinity Spa. It was awesome! I had a foot massage, their special Infinity massage (thai massage with aromatic oils), a pedicure and manicure.I had several Thai massages before. This was the best I ever had. Also the Manicure and pedicure are excellent. The service of the staff is great. The spa itselve is very clean, modern designed and with a great relaxing atmosphere. The owner is western and very kind and friendly. There is really nothing negative to say and will definetly come back. Love it.

Miss. I do Spa in BKK every time I visit. Definitely the best one I did. Coming back for sure. Recommend Body scrub and aromatherapy massage Place is very clean, staff smiling and there is still someone speaking fluent English .A bit more expensive then the other street Spa places but 100% worth:)

Great spa with outstanding service!. We found this place on our stop over in Bangkok and had such a great experience we went back on our return journey. Service was fantastic and it was a lovely clean place. Tried the oil massage and traditional thai massage and both were good. Others in the group had the neck, back and shoulders and loved it. Would definitely recommend this place.

Excellent. I'm no expert on massages, but I thought it was great. Staff at reception speaks fluent English and after the massage I had a great time chatting with the 2 guys who created this Spa as well.

Relaxing.... The service is good right from the start. I went here after a lot of walking during the day. At the end of 2 hours, my whole body felt so relaxed and refreshed. The place is very clean and well maintained. Front desk staff are very friendly and they explain different techniques and essential oils. The masseuse are professionally trained, they were able to make my shoulder pain go away in just 15 minutes; i was having the pain for more than a month. Highly recommended.

great sevice, unbelievable relaxing. There service is good from the begining you open there door.good location, even there r small shop but there decoration is excellent. Massage is excellent.one of the best spa we had experience. hope they will keep this level of service,

Best Day Spa in Bangkok. This was such an amazing spa! Very beautiful decor with a very modern feel and sustainability about it. I had a 2 hour Infinity Aroma massage which is their signature treatment. It was the perfect mix of relaxation and Thai massage. I had just arrived in Bangkok earlier that day after an overnight flight so this was the perfect jet lag fix. The massage room itself had a dedicated bathroom area and was very quiet. The whole spa was spotless and inviting. I loved the hidden foot baths in the floor. Five star spa with an excellent focus on service. I got stuck in traffic trying to get to my appointment and my taxi driver dropped us a little down the road so I had some trouble finding it and I know now not trust the locals for directions! I emailed the Spa to say I was lost/running late and they called me on my mobile and guided me to the right street and even came out to find me. Benji was an incredible host and so helpful with tips and advice about Bangkok even getting his local staff to teach us how to say thank you and hello. The tea at the end was delicious too. I'm sad I ran out of time to get another massage but thank you so much! I'll be back in October!

GREAT . Excellent service!!!!!amazing staff,easy to find,high quality products.I had a 3h and a half treatment including body scrub,massage,facial,foot massage and it was superb.Thank you Benji the owner

Relaxation at its best!. My husband and I were in need of a little pampering. We found Infinity Spa and they spoke to our taxi driver to ensure that we found our way. We chose the Aromatherapy which is a mix with traditional Thai massage. It was amazing! After the massage we had pedicures and I chose to also get a manicure. They made sure that my husband wasn't waiting on me too long and had two ladies working on me to hurry the process. This was the perfect end to our trip. Great staff and very helpful. Definitely make this part of your trip!

Treated like a princess . This is without a doubt a must do in Bangkok I have visited Bangkok around 40 times with my job and always go for massages and facials .... I will never go anywhere else now after going to Infinity The welcome you get is worth going in itself and the treatments ? WOW !I left feeling as if I was floating on air !! My therapist Than made me feel so welcome with all the modern and high end products my skin was glowing as I left The owner Benji is such a nice guy also he thinks of literally everything, and treats his staff like his friends which is always lovely to see being in the customer service business myself A definite must do in Bangkok Will definitely return - Thank you

Great, affordable spa experience!. Was looking for more of a spa type of experience after 2 weeks of inexpensive, traditional thai massages, and saw that Infinity Spa was highly rated and within 10-15 min from my hotel. We were close to partaking at the Elemis Spa at our hotel (st.regis), but found it difficult to pay the high prices after being in Thailand for so long.Infinity is the perfect in-between of high-end luxury spa and the lower priced spas (good ones) that area all over the place in every major thai city. I had the 120 min infinity aroma treatment with the lemongrass & pink grapefruit oil and my wife had a 60min luxury mani and 60 min luxury pedi (at the same time). The massage was the first massage I've had in thailand that didn't poke, prod and bent me around too much, but also massaged my sore muscles (probably from too many massages?) and was extremely relaxing. The hot thai compress at the end was a great finish to the treatment. My wife said her treatment was also great, with up to 3 people treating her at some moments (someone took a picture of her as she seemed like a "VIP")!The service is also great, with the owner and people up front being super friendly and attentive. We were starving before our treatment and they recommended a solid Turkish place next door and told us to take our time and pushed back our treatment!I HIGHLY recommend dropping in if you're in Bangkok and need a nice, RELAXING massage, as this was the best of the 7 massages I've had in the past 11 days!
So So. I walked into the door and was greeted by the staff. They seemed to know what I wanted, although they couldn't understand my accent. Its a nice place but prices are were a bit high.

Best experience in Bangkok!!!. From the moment you enter the door this place will satisfy your needs. Outstanding in every way. You can't compare this spa with any of the other spas in Bangkok. The place is beautiful from decoration, staff , treatments , products even the smells help you relax in every way possible. Is a MUST DO if you go to Thailand. Sincerely the best !!

Oh! MG you have to GO!. I indulge in Spa's globally: Bali, Singapore, Cambodia, Thailand, Loas, Burma, Europe, Egypt, Aust, NZ, Sth. Pacific, to name just a few. So off I went to Infinity Spa my 5th in Bangkok this trip. Infinity is a delight, the ambiance is light and fresh with a touch of elegance, a hue of gold on white. Their oils and scrubs are quality, the staff are engaging, informed but not smothering, my treatment was personalised and my masseuse well what do I say Experienced with an innate ability to apply exactly the right pressure on that point that everyone else misses. The prices are surprisingly reasonable and I am returning to be further Indulged.Infinity Spa is POSITIVELY FABULOUS!

Wonderful service for a special event. I brought a group of 9 friends to Infinity for a special farewell celebration for a dear friend. Benji and his staff took excellent care of us! They were attentive, the spa is gorgeous, and the treatments were amazing. We had everything-massages, pedicures, manicures, and facials. Everyone walked away happy and relaxed. I especially appreciated Benji's attention to detail and our comfort. I'm already planning to return with another group of friends in the near future!

Relaxing SPA while in Bangkok. This is one of the best spa experiences that I have had in my entire life. The owner benji is pretty good and knowledgeable about the products and the tactics that will be employed and the same is customized to each and every clients tastes and interests. This is one place you should not miss when in Bangkok.

Top service. Was very impressed with this boutique spa. First place I've been to in Bangkok where they make the customer feel like bliss. I loved the design elements, and as I walked through the spa I became so aware of the total attention to detail. The service, especially, was tactful and subtle, from asking about the proper amount of pressure to adjusting the temperature of the room, I felt fully cared for and attended to. I recommend to reserve in advance, I did the Infinity Aroma, it was by far one of the best massages I had. You won't regret visiting Infinity Spa.

Out of this world. If you're looking for professional massage service at good price you should definately come here.Amazing service (including as many tea as you like) and very positive people!!I recommend the Infinity aroma massage (full body). You'll finish feeling like silk!! Thanks!
Small place and massage too strong. Compared to many good review this place is small and not so special. And massage was too strong next day it hurt my body so much.

To Relax . Amazing Spa in Bangkok. Great location calm atmosphere. Friendly staff especially Benji at the Reception. Wifi available, nespresso available. Pure detox drinks and oil available for customers. A step between tradition and new era of Thai Service. I will certainly recommend this Spa for family and couples. Enjoy the moment and be relax til Infinity :)

Heavenly Bliss at Infinity Spa. Infinity Spa is in a league of its own in Bangkok. Sure there are lots of similar enterprises all around Bangkok. However, what sets Infinity Spa apart from the others is the immaculate service and quality of treatments from the moment you enter until the moment you leave. The owner Benji greeted me by name as I had made a reservation. That is certainly how all staff at Infinity Spa go above and beyond what is expected to impress and welcome their guests. Benji proceeded to explain the treatments and recommend what I should indulge in based on my needs and the amount of time I had as I had dinner plans and needed to be back in my hotel by a set time. Benji offered me a glass of water with naturally flavoured ingredients to refresh me and proceeded to identify the types of treatment best suits me. I definitely wanted to have a massage, a facial as well as a manicure and a pedicure. I bought the signature massage called "the Infinity Aroma", a rejuvenating, moisture based facial called the "Revive Hydra" and had an express manicure and pedicure as I was in a hurry. The therapists were warm, friendly, polited, professional and highly trained. The treatments were just sublime and having travelled extensively around the world and in the Asian region, I have experienced many types of spas but nothing comes close to Infinity Spa. This is one place you want to go to complete any trip to Bangkok

Spa exceeded my expectations. I came to know of this spa through online research for top spas in Bangkok and so decided to try it out. From Google map, it was within walking distance from my hotel in Silom. Well, it would have been had I not gotten lost, gravely misled by the reliable GPS app in my phone which never failed me in other countries. Perhaps the GPS for Bangkok wasn't quite updated because it kept leading me towards a wrong direction. I had to reschedule my appointment several times because I kept missing the time due to being lost. The person I spoke with over the phone, Benji, was kind, very patient and empathised with my situation in being lost. There was no point in me getting a cab because it was really within walking distance, just that I kept turning into the wrong lane.By the time I finally found it, Benji was outside the spa looking out for me. My goodness, now that's what I call excellent customer service! His patience and continued guidance with directions made me persevered because had I been speaking with someone whose English wasn't so fluent, I would have abandoned the plan.Turns out Benji is the owner of the spa and the map was indeed faulty because his spa was newly opened and he had been trying to get the relevant authorities to update the map location correctly. So my advice is, get a cab unless you're very familiar with the address.Not only was the service top notch, I was welcomed with a nice cold towel and refreshing drink to cool down after having walked miles for hours.I was introduced to my masseur and then taken up to my massage suite after a brief feet wash. Being a regular spa goer, I must say that my expectations are high but the entire experience surpassed my expectations. Not just the service, the interior, layout and the hygiene, but also the quality of the massage technique and products used. I will definitely visit again every time I visit Bangkok!

Amazing!. Infinity Day Spa is amazing! Very professional, clean and neat! You could spend all day here and go from one treatment to another. Benji is so professional, speaks fluent Thai and English and he checks on each of his clients to ensure they are happy. Will definitely be going back each time I go to Bangkok.

Wonderful. An oasis of calmness and tranquility in the crazy city of Bangkok!I had the pleasure of visiting Infinity on Sunday where I enjoyed two hours of bliss.From the moment you are greeted by Benji to when you leave you are treated like a superstar. Beautiful decoration, spotlessly clean, ultra polite and discreet staff.After arriving you are seated and given a refreshing towel, delicious tea and are shown what treatments are available. You choose the treatment and you are given a choice of three homemade oils, relax, calm or refreshing.Once you have chosen your treatment and oil you are taken up to the massage suite, which includes a lovely shower and toilet for your personal use. The masseur is introduced to you and the type of massage is discussed and she enquires whether you have any injuries etc. This the start of 90 minutes of pure relaxation, just wonderful. Throughout the massage the masseur checks if everything is ok. She also checks whether you would like the massage to be stronger or softer. The lighting, temperature, music and atmosphere inside the massage suite is wonderful, so perfect. Once the massage is finished you are escorted downstairs and given a special tea to finish off a fantastic experience.I strongly recommend everyone, whether you are young or old to visit Infinity, you will not be disappointed. One of the best recommendations any business can get is that you will return. I WILL definitely return to experience different treatments and to relax and recharge my mind and body.I wish Benji and all his team the best of luck and thank you for an unforgettable experience.

Professional, Clean & Relaxing. Tried the Infinity Spa a few days ago for the first time after many years of going to my regular spa I decided to try somewhere still close by but new for a change...Very professional, greeted as you enter by Benji the owner, speaks fluent English & thai..A good range of services, performed in a clean, organised environment.I like that he makes his own essential oils it's nice touch, plus not your typical fragrances. Greeted with a welcome drink & a much needed cold towel after escaping the heat of Bangkok and also after your service a nice soothing Camomile tea hot drink.I tried the signature massage 90 mins very relaxing, loved the hot herb compress.Definetly will go back again & reccommended my friends to have a treatment there too.

Hidden treasure in the middle of busy Bangkok streets. I come to Bangkok regularly and always struggle to find clean, friendly and professional massage place, which would match my needs and budget. Infinity Spa is an absolute jewel. The place has a tasty design, snow white towels, cleanliness of the highest standard and well trained therapists who know what they are doing. Friendly owner Benji certainly knows how to treat the customers and is adding a real personal touch the moment you walk in. You are welcome with a big smile, offered a cup of detoxifying butterfly tea before you are explained the treatments. You then choose from high quality massage oils, which are hand made and contain no toxic ingredients. The body scrubs smell so delicious you want to eat them! You can ask your therapist to tailor make your treatment to match your personal requirements (I love my feet being massages longer). Certainly place to hide away from busy streets, relax and ease the tension and at the same time very reasonably priced, if not 'underpriced'. I cannot wait to be back! Ivana

Amazing . I maybe had the best massage here in years... Dong (I believe that's his name) was serious interested in giving you the perfect treatment. He was my first male therapist in Thailand and by far the best I ve had... I already have an appointment for tomorrow.. It's worth the price.. Totally recommended
Great experience. . Very unexpected comfort. The environment is so clean and people are very friendly, good service. I did the signature one and it relaxed me completely. Highly recommended.

Outstanding spa experience! . I have just come back from an amazing 4.5hrs session at the Infinity Spa in Bangkok. Such a flawless experience from the moment I arrived! Today, I experienced a 90 minute Infinity Aroma Massage and a Gel Manicure. Firstly, the spa is gorgeous, I was so impressed by the interior decoration and layout that I couldn't keep my eyes closed during my manicure! All of the treatment staff are highly skilled and consistent. Personally, I find it very difficult to relax during massage...but the unique incorporation of thai and swedish elements came together perfectly and the mind and body was, to my surprise, completely relaxed! The products used throughout the treatments are all of a high standard, and include Thalgo and OPI.Overall, the service at Infinity Spa is excellent. Big congratulations to Benji, Richard and all of their hardworking staff for pulling together such an outstanding product! Infinity is definitely the sort of spa you are expecting in a five star hotel, and will therefore, not disappoint. I will definitely return on my next visit!

An oasis of tranquillity in the heart of Silom. All you could ask for from a spa. Friendly staff, cleanliness, amazing treatment with top brands products. I tried the detox facial that comes with a free 30 mins massage. The total body scrub is so enjoyable! You forget to be in the bustling centre of Bangkok. Will be a regular.
Above and Beyond. Tranquil, professional, thorough. Custom service and personal attention was far above average. Will be a regular.

Mariam. Beautiful place! Extremely professional staff with magical hands. And it's so clean (one of the most important things for me). The only thing i regret is that i never really feel the whole process because i get so relaxed that i always fall asleep. The atmosphere is homy and friendly. I love this place!

Feeling Reborn. From the moment I stepped into this tranquille white cloud till hours after my glow had warn off, I felt under some kind of magical spell. Infinity Spa is my favourite, of all the spa's and massage palours I've visit in most countries I've visited, this gem stands out the most. Uniquely crafted from furniture and interior to the very oils used in my massage. A truely personal and rewarding experience. Thank you team infinity. PS. Best foot massage of my life from Aom. Magic hands.
Silom serenity. A beautiful spa in the heart of Silom , great treatments and very professional staff. The signature massage is a must do , highly recommend !

Very professional and clean!. My first impression of the Infiniti Spa was that of a modern, clean boutique style spa with very friendly and happy staff. I was welcomed with a drink and a cold towel and the menu was explained to me. All through my treatments I was given a fresh cup of ginger tea and water, and was also offered magazines.I was pleasantly surprised by the hygiene with which the mani and pedi equipment was handled and before each customer, was cleaned with a sanitizing spray. Over all a great relaxing experience and their massages are the ultimate!Whenever I am in Bangkok i always go back here!

Gem in the heart of the city!!. I am a luxury fashion professional who travel quit frequently for my job and am use too a level of exceptional service. I visit Bangkok a lot and have to say Infinity Spa is exactly what I need when I'm in the city. Amazingly professional therapist, luxurious and relaxing environment, a facial in the Cloud Room is highly recommended! For this little gem in the heart of the city is really value for money! Thank you Mr Pearce and your team, see you guys soon!!

Beautiful. An absolute oasis. For someone who lives in Bangkok, Infinity Spa is an escape from the chaos outside. I spent hours here and could have done many more. The staff are incredibly kind and well trained and the design is an unique, refreshing change from the typical Thai spa. Highly recommended

Uber cool!. We had a massage at this spa last night and absolutely loved it! It was very sleek and modern, totally different from other spas in Bangkok. We've been in the Far East (Bangkok, Myanmar, Laos) for 10 weeks now and had many, many massages but this was the best by far! A little more expensive than others in the area but well worth every baht! It's very clean and comfortable, the staff are very professional and the attention to detail is amazing. I couldn't recommend it more highly!

PAZ. They welcome everyone with their refreshing signature pineapple water. The ambiance is lovely, with soothing colours and awesome design, it's just beautiful to look at. The treatments -very well explained-are superbly executed by really well trained staff. I the quality of products is high standards too. My manicure still looks amazing about a week later. After my facial I look three years younger!!! I lovely the Whole experience, treatments people place... It's a bit more expensive than any other place but TOTALLY WORTH IT. Have been recommending it to anyone who asks about massage/salon in Bangkok. Can't wait to be back!

A great experience!!!. 我和媽媽在infinity spa做了90分鐘的全身massage。實在是太美好的經歷啦！這家店非常非常乾淨 裝潢佈置的非常精緻有品味。員工也非常熱情有禮。這家spa有好幾層 每層好像是提供不同服務的。價格也不貴 正好有promotion 我和媽媽一共花了1850泰銖 總之是個非常享受的經歷 。I highly recommend this place!!

A Hidden Gem. Unfortunately only discovered this little Gem on our last day in Bangkok, otherwise we would have gone back multiple times. From the moment we arrived to the time we left was a truly wonderful experience. We were warmly welcomed by Benji and as soon as the doors closed behind us we left the hustle and bustle behind and stepped into beautiful tranquility. We chose the 90 minute foot reflexology treatment, which was incredible. The therapists were attentive to our needs and very skilled, the chairs we lounged on very comfortable, the atmosphere calm and quite. I loved the attention to detail that Infinity offers, which makes you the client feel that much more cared for. It's the small things that count and it is clear to see that the owner has put a lot of thought and heart into this place. It is beautiful, immaculate and offers excellence at a very affordable price.Thank you Benji and team

A fantastic experience !. Well I have to say Infinity Spa is amazing as soon as you walk into the doors. The modern decor , relaxing atmosphere and friendly staff. My treatment was a xpress manicure the nail treatment was superb the staff brought me nail pallets of which I could choose from the service was amazing. And my nails stayed great for 2 weeks. This coming from me who chips nail polish ever time I paint my own.Can't wait to go back for my infinity aroma massage booked in for next week. Would definitely recommend to everyone. The spa is unique and in a great location.

overpriced facial, go elsewhere. I had the seaweed facial. I have had many facials in Toronto and found them more hydrating, nourishing and a much better experience. The towels that were used were cold and I prefer warmer towels to rinse off the products. Much time was spent washing off various face products. I also did not like the feel of the seaweed mask since gauze is placed on top of the face first and then hardens which I found unpleasant. Given that the price is the same as in Toronto I expected more.

Relax in a Mediterranean oasis. I have been to quite a few spas in Bangkok, I mean they're everywhere. But never had I been to a spa like Infinity. It's bright and fresh decor is quite refreshing from the typical spa scene in Bangkok. I loved the atmosphere and the relaxing scent of the spa. It was easy to slip away into la-la land while I received a foot massage and spa pedicure. The products that were used felt amazing and my toes stayed perfectly polished for weeks. The staff were very gentle and professional. They made me feel very relaxed. I can definitely say I will be returning to Infinity spa during my next trip to Bangkok.
Amazing. I just loved the place, so tranquil and modern! The girls did an exelant job and the hosts were lovely! Im coming back, thats for shure :)

Fantastic massage!. Me and my friend had a very nice time at Infinity Spa last week! We enjoyed a 90 minute treatment which was great! In ways of design this must be the most beautiful spa in Bangkok, the (Scandinavian) interior is fantastic. Together with a good price, the very (!) friendly staff and -most important- the quality of the massage this is a must visit for you when you're around! It's absolutely worth a little travel. I had lots of massages in Asia, but this was the best one I ever had. Go there, cause you won't regret!

So lucky to find this spa. We were staying at a nearby hotel, and decided to look for a spa to get a massage and pedicure. Luckily I saw the sign on the sidewalk directing us to Infinity. I appreciated the modern branding and resonated with the environment right away. Benji came out and introduced himself, then proceeded to explain the treatments and prices. As another reviewer said, we ended up feeling like long lost friends. The massage was wonderful and my pedicure still looks good after two weeks on tour. We felt like VIPs from the start to finish, and the quality if service and products is very high. Why go elsewhere? The interior is white, turquoise, and very modern. You know it is clean because the white floors and walls are shiny and without blemish. So refreshing and tranquil. Be aware there are stairs to the treatment rooms.

The "wow" experience. I was truly surprised by this boutique spa. The interior was beyond amazing. I have traveled the world and visited many spas. Infinity spa not only has a very unique design but the staff are very accommodating. I felt like I was in a 5 star hotel except the prices were very very reasonable. If you are looking for value of money, excellent service and high quality products...this is your spa

A spa that will see me coming back for more!. The ambience is superb. I would gladly come for a coffee and a cake and a catch up with old friends. Speaking of which, the owner Benji, is such a warm welcoming host, one is included to think he is in fact a long lost pal.The service and the treatments (in my case Infinity facial and express mani-pedi) were impeccable.Super clean and the minimalistic style is incledibly refreshing.Loved it and to quote Terminator... "I'll be back!"

Modern,Clean,Good. This relativly new spa just off Silom road, is not only conveniently located but but also very well run.The available treatments are very reasonably priced. The outfit is very modern, but you feel welcome and at home. If you are looking for a treatment above the ordinary numerous massage joints, but don´t want to spend a fortune, this is the place.

Best Spa experience. I Use TA as a serious guide about where to go, stay and what to do. I'm lucky enough i've been to Bangkok many times, and have had the privilege of having spa treatments in salons and hotels around the world. I'm only saying this because I want to highlight how good my experience was at Infinity. I took a chance by trying this new spa, as i stay in the area often and have always had a good experience on my regular spa, but a small sign intrigued me. From the moment I walked in i felt like i was in a boutique hotel spa, and was worried i was about to pay hotel prices! Not so, the prices were comparable to other spas in the are which are older and tired looking now i've been to Infinity. The service (as common in Bangkok) is impeccable and english is not a problem which really helps especially as I had a broken toe and my therapist Tarn didn't dare go near it for me :). the place is so clean, the decor is modern but not cold or stark and still has an asian feel, it's nice to have that lovely tiffany blue which is surprisingly relaxing. I would suggest taking a shower either before or after as it's lovely and luxurious. The massage itself, was great, no need to ask for more or less pressure, and felt professional from the start, i have to admit i nodded off a couple of times it was so relaxing, The facial (Detox) was different to what I've had before and lovely also with the added 30min massage focused on limbs which was excellent after the initial massage as they were loose so it was an extra benefit. I saw a 'crew' special I asked about it and it's for air crew so if you are, then you will get a discount there! Also unlike ALL the spa's in asia, the therapist offers after treatment amenities, says thank you and leaves, not waiting around for a tip, I asked and there are dedicated envelopes with their names on for this which was something i had never encountered! All in all, it's worth either the trip down to silom for a visit or worth a change from the usual if you are often in the area, just try and I can promise you won't go anywhere else! Thanks Infinity

Absolute bliss!. Visited Infinity Spa on a recent trip to Bangkok, and so glad I did. From the moment you walk in and leave the chaos behind, you start to feel relaxed. The ultra modern decor is tasteful but oh so trendy. The staff are friendly and efficient and it's not long before you are in your all white "cocoon" and under the care of your therapist. The rooms have a shower and toilet, but you are not aware of this until they are revealed. The therapist was amazingly professional, I had a massage and a facial, it was jus beautiful, I didn't want it to end. It was all about you!. The small details just created a perfect environment. I would highly recommend it, and it's also good value for money. Well done Infinity.

A unique experience for a Thai spa that brings tranquilly and calmness.. Infinity Spa brings a different kind of experience to Bangkok. It starts with the colors and personal touches such as the welcome drink that matches spa's theme colors. The staff are very friendly and professional, the space is very clean, and the prices are reasonable. I'd highly recommend a visit!

Lovely facility, amazing staff, great massage.. I wasn't quite sure what to expect, I just stumbled upon Infinity Spa. It was great. I highly recommend going. I had the Detox Facial, I came out feeling refreshed and greeted by the super friendly (and funny) staff. I would recommend this place to anyone. I will go back next time I'm in Bangkok.

Infinity Spa - there is nowhere else!. Infinity Spa has got to be the best place that Bangkok has to offer for ultimate relaxation with its extremely high standard of service, surroundings and simply the only place to just 'be' and yet be treated like the place has been created for 'you'. Clearly Infinity Spa has inspired from thought, appreciation and desire for customer satisfaction - understanding of what customers deserve has been entirely catered for to every fine detail covered - pure genius in tailor made services with sincerity and quality of service the contemporary and unique design sets it apart from the usual expectation.The high end standard of products Thalgo treatments are truly an amazing experience as are the OPI products,high standards of hygiene and attention todetails is a credit to the standard of skill, quality of the products and the people using them and aroma oils that create this becoming a requirement of going to Bangkok - you haven't been to Bangkok without visiting Infinity Spa - no just a place to go to - it's a way of life!Any option you choose from the vast menu of indulgences will not be regretted.I would plan my holiday around luxurious experiences at Infinity Spa - can't wait to get back to Bangkok.Thank you for the pleasure of experiencing your amazing place - do not go changing anything you do - heaven!

Amazing Spa experience. One of the best spa experience i ever had.Professional and very friendly staff, contemporary/elegant interior, the different treatment/massages are just great.Every detail has been thought of from the moment you set foot in.Will definitely go back and highly recommended!!!

5 stars all around!. I had a full body aromatherapy massage and it was the most relaxing experiene of my life. The oils, ambience, professional staff are all top notch. I will come back again for sure!!
