Treat yourself!. Unlike any other spa experience. Staff were friendly and professional. Really enjoyed the ambience and the original concept. Would highly recommend a visit as it's such great value and good location! Will definitely be returning.

An oasis in Bangkok. This spa is beautiful! It looks and feels like it belongs in Sydney or Manhattan, not Bangkok. Well done, Benji! Gorgeous, attentive staff who all make an effort to speak English, stunning interiors and fabulous services. No detail has been left out. I will definitely be back.
My favorite spa in Bangkok. One of the best spas in Bangkok, relaxing and friendly atmosphere.. Well decorated and super clean. I just love it!

Book and Pamper Yourself!. I was spoiled at Infinity Spa. I had visited the spa twice in 2 days when I was in Bangkok. I had a 60 min massage + OPI gel mani and pedi. The massage was good and relaxing. The gel mani & pedi was just good. The rates here are also definitely decent. Spa owner and therapist here are genuinely friendly and welcoming! Service is definitely top notch! I would highly recommend people to go to Infinity Spa @ Silom for a relaxing day.

5 star quality. The spa is beautifully designed and catering to all specialise spa treatments, had the aromatherapy massage and can fairly say that it was one of the best I have had. The staff are lovely and will ensure you an amazing experience from the moment you step through the door. Highly recommend this place to all wishing to experience quality massages and spa treatments.

ambient. I visited Infinityspa during their soft launch and the staff and owners were so pleasant. The spa has such an inviting feel and smells heavenly! They have great products and great service. I was a bit crunches for time and only got a gel manicure. They use OPI polish which is great! If you want traditional Thai spa techniques/treatments with western style customer service and products, this is the place to go.

Great Spa & Services. I recently visited Infinity Spa on my trip to Bangkok and I was very pleased! This is not your average Bangkok Spa; Infinity Spa is a 5-star spa with very affordable prices. Staff spoke English (major plus) & they were accommodating.
Amazing boutique spa. Fantastic service. I had my nails and a facial treatment done here. The spa is absolutely stunning and very clean. The staff are super nice and very professional.

Amazing. I love the design of the place and the massage is very good. You feel very spoiled and refreshed. It's not much to choose between yet but what they have is very good and price is not overpriced for what you get.
Great experience. I was pleasantly surprised by infinity spa. There concept is very unique for thailand. Not to mention the service is 5 star with very affordable prices.

Kawaii. The spa is clean and there are no bugs or mosquito. With online booking couple promotion we payed 6000Baht (17665¥) for me and my partner. Considering similar spas offering higher prices for less services this is a very good price.Our therapist was very friendly and professional. The different massages were performed perfectly.

Well trained staff. We had a very delightful spa treatment on 10 November. The staff is very professional and well trained in massaging skills. The room we used was clean, we had a private shower to refresh ourselves.

Good spa. We booked the spa for a big group and it was no problem. They had the rooms set up when we arrived and everything was fluent and easy to understand. The women doing the massages were always smiling and very polite.
Lovely spa. We had a great time, we opted for the 4 hour package in a shared room with my husband. The different treatments were well performed.
Brilliant. Had a lovely morning at So Thai Spa. We did 2 hours spa package including herbal ball heat massage and aromatherapy body massage combined together. Was most relaxing 2 hours ever.
Super!. Super experience! We went for a spa package, which including foot massage, body massage, scrub, and facial. All the treatments were done professionally and we left feeling very relaxed.
SO relaxing. Now i know So Thai Spa = SO relaxing. Was a great experience and will definitely go again because its such a peaceful place and nice massage.
Excellent spa. Was impressed on arrival by the privacy and peaceful setting. The treatment room was large and well decorated. And the massage was relaxing.
Great massage . We can only recommend this place as it is well maintened and clean spa. The staff is well experienced & professional. Check the website first as they offer great discount.

Excellent.. Excellent spa experience. We went as a group of 6 and the spa arranged us 2 big rooms, 3 people in each room, so we could experience together. We selected different packages, all 3 or 4 hours, and all enjoyed much.
Luxury. More luxury than other spa we go. We use web promo for couple 4 hours spa is 5000 THB. We both feel relaxed and happy with service.
Peaceful + relaxing. We always like to have a Thai massage when we go Bangkok but this time wanted to try a spa. The place was peaceful and the whole experience relaxing.
Brilliant. Brilliant massage! I did the Elite massage package - it was relaxing and refreshing - professional and polite staff too.

The perfect Birthday gift when in Thailand. My partner offered me a package at so thai spa for my birthday. It was an amazing gift. The massage package was great and the staff was wonderful. The each wished me a happy birthday, had some tea and cake ready for me and my wife. Thank you to the entire so thai spa team for giving me a wonderful afternoon!

Luxury spa at affordable price. Very surprising discovery in Bangkok. The spa has some of the lowest prices for high quality service i have ever seen in Bangkok. The service, location and staff are all luxury spa worthy. Wonderful spa!
Good massage in a good enviroment. We had a good afternoon at this spa. Our package included various massage styles each focusing on a different body part. The staff was polite and professional.

Excellent. The spa is a walking distance away from the bts on sukhumvit line. The entrance is decorated with a waterfall and a small pond with fish in it. The reception area is very pleasing for the eye, and as the rest of the building you can smell a nice fragrance in the air. Stepping into the reception area already made us come to peace. The receptionist was very helpful in our choice of package. She rec recommended us packages that suited our needs and was very professional about it, it was obvious that our well been was more important and that she did not try to push the most expensive package. The massage was wonderful and really made us feel much better.

Lovely spa. The people working there are very friendly. We were delayed after having made a booking in advance and the staff called us to ask if we were alright. We explained we were stuck in traffic and would be late and they changed our appointment. This is very rare to receive such a service. The massages were well worth the wait, it was amazing! So Thai spa Bangkok is one of the highlights of our Thailand trip.

Real Thai massage in a nice setting. They offer some amazing massages. A group of 6 people and not a single one who complaint that means allot. We all enjoyed it and wished it would have lasted longer.

Very relaxing. We booked a 2 hour package sharing the same room. Our children where allowed in the room with us so i could keep an eye on them while playing with their ipad. The massage package was very diversified and took care of the muscles that needed taken care of. Good spa, good staff.

An enjoyable treatement, very relaxing. Trough the online booking system we ordered the 4 hours So Thai Luxury packages, we paid a total for two people of 5000 Thai Baht due to a couple promotion they have on the website where if you share the room with your partner you get a discount. The package included a foot a massage, body scrub, oil massage, spa facial and a head massage. It was a blessing for every part of my body. I highly recommend to people to choose this package as it is wonderfully good.

Good massage therapies. The massage was very good. The ladies performing the massage are very friendly. We booked 4 hours for 4 people in two rooms and it was great. All 4 of us are happy with the massage.
Great spa. Have tried lots of spas in Thailand, and this is definitely one of the best for service, environment and amazing package price.
Wellness. Amazing. From start to end the staff made sure all our needs were met. We only saw friendly, helpful people working here. And the massage was fabulous.

Fabulous spa very close to the heart of Bangkok.. This spa is walking distance away from public transportation so easy to aces. We used the facilities yesterday and are delighted. The staff was friendly, the property is clean and well maintained, the massage was delightful.

Excellent spa. Excellent spa in every way - excellent setting in private house, excellent staff (friendly smiles from moment of arrival), excellent treatments and excellent prices (we did the 4 hours couple package deal).

Nice villa day spa. Really liked the setting of So Thai, hidden along a quiet street inside a private villa with garden around, nice feeling of serenity. Selected the "LUXURY" package and was exactly what I got.. 4 hours of premium spa.... excellent.
So Thai Spa = so relaxing!. Went to So Thai Spa for a 3 hours spa package and had the most relaxing 3 hours of my life! Peaceful spa in villa with relaxing massage!
Excellent. Excellent spa for spa package. Me and friends go together. We do 4 hours spa package. Is very good treatment.

So Thai Luxury Couples' Spa. Recommended by a regular Bangkok spa goer as the place to go for a relaxing spa experience, definitely agree, so relaxing. We did the spa promo for couple, luxury package, and recommend it.

Excellent spa. The receptionist is amazing, we were stuck in traffic and would have been late for our appointement but she made no troubles out of it and made sure we could start a bit later and still have our complete treatement. The previous spa we went to we started later but they deducted it from our time. This spa offers high quality service and has a great customer understanding.
Relaxing. We had a 4 hours package and found it to be very healthy and relaxing. They managed to un-tense all our muscles and we felt light and fresh after leaving the spa.
Good Spa, worth to visit. We visited the shop on 13/10/2016 and have enjoyed a wonderful spa package with just THB5,000 for 4 hours for 2 persons. Greatly recommend.
Spa packages. We went as group of 3 and the staff arranged a triple room for us to do our spa packages together, the rates are reasonable for luxury style spa.
Good massage in clean room. Clean spa, not many mosquito or bugs. Rooms clean regularly, bed sheets and towels smell fresh.Massage was perfect.
Nirvana package promo. Went with husband for the Nirvana couple package, it was 5 hours of massages and scrubs, and make us so relax!

Well organized spa. Very well organised spa. The online booking was fast and efficient.We got our booking confirmation within matter of minutes.The staff in the spa was polite and very well behaved. The massage lasted 4hours but we both wished it was longer. We enjoyed every bit of it.

Very satisfied. We booked a 4 hour package. I shared a room with my partner which i found to be very romantic. The 4 hours passed at the speed of light. We enjoyed it so much. The therapist was very professional and polite, amazing massage.

Aan oasis of peace. It is difficult to find a good location in bangkok to relax and come to peace. We found it in So Thai Bangkok. It is amazing how peacefull it is abut yet so close to the very busy area. We had a perfect treatement.
Great spa in the heart of bangkok. Beautiful spa with nice garden and swimmingpool. A good surrounding to have a very good massage.Clean and professionel spa with amazing service.

Amazing spa in Bangkok. We booked the 4 hours spa package. It was wonderful! Staff was so friendly and even when we asked many questions they kept smiling and always try to answer and help us. Very good clean spa.

Average service for the price. The lady at front desk was very nice. I took my mom there for a four hours spa package. My masseuse seemed nice but her skills were doubtful. She was still following and learning the techniques when she did the 4 hands massage with another masseuse. My mom's masseuse was very new, I think. She still needed to measure the pressure points with her fingers.I didn't think it was a bad massage though... Until I went back to my hotel and discovered red bumps all over my shoulder, neck and back. I has a severe allergic reaction from the cream/ massage oil. So, people with sensitive skin out there, BE AWARE!
great experiance. I needed time to just relax, and this place just game me what i needed, a freindly welcome, calming atmosphere, and realy good massageI deffinately will go back next time

A place to relax and come to peace. Excellent massages are given here. The people are all friendly. Not far from BTS so easy access. We used their services 3 times during our stay, and every time it was amazing good.

Thank you. I would like to thank the management and staff of So Thai spa for the wonderful time we spend. You did everything to make our treatements as enjoyable as possible. We will recommend this spa to all our friends and family who come to visit Thailand.
Wonderful moment. Wonderful moment and top massage ! The staff takes care of you from your entry to the end of the experience ! A must try !

Very friendly staff. We were running late for our booking but the spa called us and arranged for us to start later! This was the beginning of what would become a wonderful afternoon at So Thai Bangkok spa. The 4hours we spend at the spa were amazing, they realy did way more then we expected. When leaving the spa we fellt more as friends then as customers.

As good as the reviews say it is. Kinda stumbled upon this spa whilst roaming the streets near sukhumvit. It was a good discovery. I took one of the cheaper treatments but still feel they gave me the top notch quality service. I am very happy with the massage and overall performance of the spa.Good job.
Great Thai massage. We were surprised by the prices. The building is luxurious. The massage package is very big with many different massage. It was very good.
Amazing spa. Receptionist was smiling and very efficient. The reception we received in the spa was good, very good customer service. The massage was relaxing, and well performed.

High quality service. Perfect way to escape the stress the big city can bring onto you. The environment is peaceful and very relaxing. The staff is polite and speaks well English. The massage was a 4 hour delight consisting of different treatments. Our children where in the same room so we could keep an eye on them.
Very clean, friendly staff, good massage package. Close to BTS, Beautiful garden and building, friendly staff and very helpful, massage was amazing, price is cheap.

Must do when in Bangkok. They offer various massage packages from witch to choose. We opted for a more traditional Thai style massage. It was excellent. The massage was performed with allot of care and attention to our bodies.

10/10 service and massage. Flawless service. From beginning to end all was done in such a way we felt as being kings of the world. Very friendly staff willing to explain everything about the massage package we orderd. The massage was done in a way that at no point we had to leave our comfort zone. It was enjoyful troughout the entire proces.

Best spa so far. I have been living for 10 years in Bangkok and needles to say i have done many spas over the years. My wife offered me the Luxury couples package for my birthday knowing how much i love Thai spas. Best gift she could have given me. I have found in So Thai a new favorite place. I enjoyed every second of it. It is by far the best massage therapy i had so far, and the staff was amazingly friendly and polite.

Good looking spa, friendly staff and excellent massages. Had a couples massage with my partner in the same room. Very good experience as usually it is either in a separate room or in a dormitory style room when going to other spas. The masseuses were friendly and did everything to make our stay fully enjoyable. We highly recommend this spa.

Perfect afternoon. We used the online booking service to order the Elite couple package. We payed a promotion price of 5200Thai baht total so around 15156 Yen for two people. The spa is away from the big road so it is very peaceful and very silent. The rooms were clean, fresh towels were provided. No insects or other critters witch for me is very important. The 3.5h hours massage package was performed very professionally, and the staff made sure everything was perfect.
Massage very good. I have very good massage. Persons all friendly and polite. I have good time in spa. Thank you.Asnee Bingwen

Fabulous Service. Wonderful spa in the busy city of Bangkok. We enjoyed the pampering and massages. It felt good to be able to relax and come to peace in this busy city. They provided us with a high quality service.
Couples luxury package. We did the couples luxury package and really enjoyed it, the service is typical polite Thai style and the massage quality was excellent.
Clean and good service. Clean well maintained spa. Staff is friendly. Massage was very good. One of the better spa i have done in Bangkok.

Delightfull afternoon. Very professional spa. Unlike similar places they make a connection with the customer, not treating you like another number. The amount of service and dedication this spa offers is simply amazing. We will definitely use the So Thai services again.
Great. Nice looking spa near sukhumvit road. Me and my wife had a 4 hours treatement in one private room. Very good excperience.
Good massage. We have good massage here. All friendly people working. Room is clean. Have discount at website if book 2.

Nice cozy spa. Very nice spa in the Sukhumvit area. Big parking convenient for cars and minivan. Therapy rooms are clean, staff profesional, reception has a big knowledge of massages and can recommend a treatement that suits your need. 5 Star rating.

Very good massage. I highly recommend this spa. Being living for 3years in Bangkok and having done many spas this one really stands out. The massage is perfect, staff friendly and well educated, the spa is well located and looks great.
Perfect for in between business meeting. In between two appointments i went for massage at so thai bangkok. I had a very good one hour massage, they did back and feet and it is very well done.

Excellent value. This spa can be considerd a luxury spa. The prices are very reasonable for the services they offer. We had a four hours treatement and it was a true delight. The receptionist has a very good knowledge of the English language and was very polite.
couples luxury package. recommend the couples luxury package, we enjoyed all 4 hours, the masseuses really knew what they were doing and the spa house is nice and spacious
Professional. This is professional spa much more than other we tried. The room for spa was big with 2 beds so we have treatment together as couple. And promotion for couple spa package. Nice.

Relaxation. The spa is the perfect enviroment to come to peace. The massages are a true pleasure and helped me and my husband to relax and have our body and souls treated. We will reccomend to friends and family.
Very good. Beautiful spa, staff speaks a good amount of english, clean rooms and best of all: amazing massage sessions.
Excellent. Excellent spa with good staff. Massage and body scrub was great and made us feel revitalized. The drinks between treatments was a welcome and refreshing gift.
Clean spa with good massages in Sukhumvit area. Good spa, good location nice setting. People are well trained in customer service. Good value for your money.
excellent spa with friendly therapists. Spend 4 hours of delight. The treatment was relaxing and stress relieving. The therapist was polite and very professional.
Good massage. Had very good massage in the spa. Everything is very clean and tidy. Staff friendly and respectful .

Great spa. Had luxury spa package, 4 hours of message, feel very refreshed. Foot massage is outstanding. Had a 10 minutes break between massages, drinking tea and earing watermelllon. Quite area, spa is located in a privat house with own garden, easy to find.

Pristine spa in Bangkok. An oasis of peace in Bangkok. We have lost our heart to So Thai Spa. They were always friendly and kind, helping us whenever they could. The massages were on a different level compared to other places in that neighborhood and we have done a few of them. Our little peace of eden.

Great service and massage in Bangkok. Very surprised by this spa. Found it trough Google search and came out on their website where i booked a couples package for me and my wife. We are very grateful to have discovered this gem. The spa looks nice and clean, not too much decoration. Minimalistic while maintaining faithful to ancient Thai design. Clever way of decoration. The massage was very good,before the massage the therapist asked us if there were particular areas where we were in pain or wanted some extra attention given to it. Shows she was really wanted us to be relaxed and enjoy it to the fullest.
Good service for our group. Booked for 10 people and everything was perfect. Service very efficient. Everybody is happy, thank you.
Excellent. Excellent service en massage. Staff is friendly and polite, rooms are nicely setup, everything is clean.

Good spa. Online booking offers couples deals where you can save some money for their packages. The massages and treatments were performed nicely allowing the body and mind to relax and drift away. Very good sessions.

Professional friendly spa in Sukhumvit area. First tried out So Thai spa on our second day in Bangkok and we loved it. The entire experience has been satisfying and we went back two times since then. Before we leave back home we will go back one more time to have a splendid ending on our holiday.
Very clean beautiful spa with a sence for the art of massage. Marvelous spa. Beautiful scenery, friendly workers, and best massage we had in a long time. We highly reccomend So Thai for massages.

Good reasonably priced spa with friendly staff. Very nice spa with amazing staff. Everybody was friendly and very helpful in advising us which treatment to choose. They have a big menu with many options to choose from so there should be some for everyone's taste. The massage was very good performed and helped us relax.

Lovely massages. The spa is a walking distance away from Sukhumvit road in a quiet street. The entrance is large and decorated with fountains. The receptionist is a very nice lady who spoke English and had no problems in advising us which treatment would suit our needs best. The room we were taken to was clean, aroma scented and gave a feeling of peace. The masseuse was very handy, and performed her job perfectly.
A treat for our sences. Great massage given by polite staff in a beautiful setting. Very relaxing enviroment with waterfalls at the entrance and plenty of thai decorations. We had a great time.

4 hours of delight. Spend an amazing afternoon at So Thai Spa Bangkok. Everyone if friendly and always has that Thai smile. I felt at home from the minute i stepped in. The massage was a real delight and we both enjoyed it allot.

They gave me a good night rest. I spend a few hours at so Thai spa for one of their massage packages and it was wonderful. It removed the tension from my muscles, made my blood flow run properly and gave me an all around sense of inner peace. I have slept like a little baby that night, something that does not happen allot. Thank you for the wonderful service

Clean customer friendly spa. I booked the So Thai Elite package with the 2 people in 1 room couple promotion for 5200 Thai baht thats around 1200HKD so relatively cheap considering what you get for it. It was a 3 hour and a half of pampering and relaxing. It included body scrubbing and massages. It felt amazing.
Happy customer. We happy customer. We came with many and all are happy. Thank you for good greeting us and giving good service.

Great for couples. My husband and I had a delightful So Thai Luxury package. It was 4 hours of true delight. I opted for the facial and my husband opted for the herbal ball and we were both very pleased with the outcome. A very fine spa that truly earns it reputation and appraisal.

Efficient. Very efficient spa with a good customer awareness to it. From the Booking up until the treatment everything was handled fast and professional but without the mass production factory feeling you can have in other places. It is good to find a spa that keeps things in a more familial way. We were not treated as numbers but as royalty. Something i very much appreciated.
Good looking spa. A spa with a good look and feel to it. I booked the 2h relax package in promotion with my wife and the name suits the package. It was very relaxing for both me and the wife.

If you are in the Sukhumvit area this is worth a try. Spend a few hours in the evening of Saturday 13 August at the spa. it was a good way to relax and have our muscles back in shape after a day of cycling in Ayutthaya. We told the receptionist about our sore legs and she made sure the therapist took extra care of them. We were very pleased with the quality of service they provided for us and will go back on our next trip to Bangkok.

Friendly healthy spa. Good facilities, swimming pool, garden, nice reception are, clean and bright room, reception and masseuse are very friendly and know how to do their job properly. 10/10 in my book.

Quality service provided at a very reasonable price. This Spa offers professional staff in a clean and relaxing environment. We had the 4 hours luxury treatment where they treat pretty much every body part. The massages were very relaxing and helped us relieve ourselves from stress and pain. Me and my partner highly recommend this spa.With best regards,The Wing Family

Excellent Massage. A very relaxing place where i can enjoy an exellent traditional massge. This place give me a very cozy home feeling not like other congested spa places i visited before. The best one i had around sukhumvit area so far. Will definitely go back as soon as i can. Highly recommended!

Relaxing place. We felt relaxed as soon as we arrived and passed through the nice garden. The welcome from reception lady was warm and friendly, and she well explained the menu package options.We really enjoyed our treatments too.

top class massage. first time at so thai spa and definitely will not be the last. highly recommend the Swedish massage here, I liked the whole set up - nice garden, nice room and polite professional masseuse
couples spa promo. normally dont go spas but friend recommended here have promo for couples spa, we happy we went was a posh spa house and nice massage spa
So Thai Luxury Package. Did the 4 hours spa package with the couple promotion and was so relaxing. Next time we go Bangkok we will go So Thai Spa again.
Amazing massage. Normally go to Healthland but decided to try a real spa this time, and pleased I did. The massage and general service was all really professional and pleasant.
nice aroma massage. me and partner did the package scrub and aroma massage, the massage was really nice and relaxing, therapist very expert!

beautiful spa. Beautiful spa house with garden and private treatment rooms. We went 4 people and all did spa package 4 hours. We were all happy and i personally thought the massage was the best ive ever experienced.

Fantastic. Loved this spa, so relaxing and peaceful in a private villa with garden set back away from the main road. The spa room we got treated in was huge and the massage and spa treatments were excellent, especially the herbal ball compresser and aromatherapy massage.
luxury package. did the couples luxury package promotion advertised on web site - is great deal 5000 thai bahts for 4 hours treatments and the arrange us 2 people in couple room

A place to get away from the busy city. Living and working in Bangkok the city can sometimes become overwhelming. So Thai spa is my place to be if i need to evade the stress and noise of the big city. Located near Sukhumvit road i was surprised to find a place where one can relax and have the mind and body healed. The massages are always done in a very professional way. The therapist will always make sure she applies the right pressure where needed and will always try to make it as comfortable as possible. The rooms are clean and very well maintained. All the linen is clean and fresh. A lovely place for me to come to peace and let myself be pampered.

Great and professional spa. Big thank you to the So Thai Spa team for helping me out with my back problems. It has been a long time since i enjoyed a holiday free of pain. Excellent service and massages.

Delightful afternoon. After a few weeks of backpacking me and my mate decided to treat ourself by going to a spa. After some on-line searching we came across this one. They have an interesting promotion where if you book one package you get the second one for free so that worked out perfect for us. Never had a Thai spa package before so difficult to compare with others, but we were feeling amazing afterwards. We were pampered and treated like royalties by the staff and our backs felt light as feather after completion. Great experience!

Clean and proffesional spa on a walking distance from sukhumvit road. From the first step trough the entrance gate the spa gave us a feeling of peace. The bassins with fish and waterfall at the front of the reception are a nice touch of decoration and a good place to take a vacation picture. The receptionist was very friendly and helped us out with the choice of whitch treatement suited us the best. The rooms were well decorated and all the linnen available were clean and fresh. The therapist acted very professionally and made sure the massage was performed with the desired pressure. The price was very reasonable for the services provided.

My go to when in Bangkok. My favorite spa in Bangkok. The people are very friendly and professional. I have tried plenty of spas in Bangkok but this one is so far the best i found. Always a pleasure to go there.

Luxery package at a good price. We booked our appointments trough the use of their website. Everything was handled very fast and in a polite way. The Spa staff greeted us on arrival and started the massages without any problems. ME and my wife shared a room witch was great. Everything together we payed 5000 Thai baht for 4 hours of various massages. It was delightful.
good massage. this spa give good massage. cheap prices and buy 1 get 1 free for booking on internet.we are very happy to discover this spa.

Excellent massage near Sukhumvit. Beautiful spa near the Sukhumvit BTS line. My wife and myself had the luxury package that we booked online and our little boy had an oil massage. All three of us were very pleased with the service and quality of the massages.

Lovely massage! . Visited So Thai Spa in Bangkok three weeks ago on a recent holiday to Thailand. Amazing treatments, warm welcoming staff, lovely therapists and a nice clean spa. The only downfall was the temperature of the treatment room during the first two hours of our four hour package it was so cold from the air con to a point we did not enjoy the body scrub or foot treatment due to being freezing the actual treatment carried out was excellent however we understood the hot weather conditions outside does not make the therapists job easy. We asked them to turn the air con down during the second two hours meaning we both felt way more relaxed the herbal compress massage was absolutely amazing both myself and my friend fell asleep. The two therapists were very friendly however did talk to each other from time to time during our treatment in Thai which was slightly off putting, therapists should not speak to each other during a treatment . We were offered tea on arrival, snacks and tea during our treatment and tea after our treatments. Lovely touch, Would definitely recommend to friends and family great value for money and lovely staff / treatments.
Good price range. Close to skytrain station. Many food places around. The rooms were clean and therapist very professional.

Best massage in Bangkok. We are the SPA owner in Singapore, We have tried so many massage shop and this is so far the BEST massage shop situated at Shukuvmit soi 31, it was a terrace house with swimming pool, the staff are friendly and massage is pretty good especially the stone massage, would definately return to this place for the next visit to Bangkok
Quality service Spa place!. So Thai Spa Bangkok is a an outlet situated in a standalone bungalow. The service is of good quality with decent massage!
Very good. A very beautiful spa with a relaxing atmosphere. Very professional and clean at great prices. It was a very successful experience. Thank you.
Great. Have now been to So Thai Spa Phuket and Bangkok branches, and found both to be equally pleasant. At Bangkok, we did the luxury package for couples, which was extremely relaxing.
Highly recommend!. Great value. The place was very peaceful and cozy. The service was also among the best in Bangkok. Thumbs up!

Good price for great treaments. One of the best massage that I ever tried. Highlight of my holiday trips. Great price for the luxury package. Professional terapist with very good service. The pineaple snack at break time is so wonderful. Definitely will come back again.

Perfect spa for pampering myself. Great ambience. Located in heart of Bangkok with peaceful environment. Professional and friendly therapists. Definitely coming back to this place when i have a chance.

2 hours Couple massage. My husband and i booked a Two hours couples massage during our stay in bangkok. The place is very peaceful and near the end of the road. We felt welcomed and they were ready for us. I had the one hour thai yoga massage and one hour herbal ball massage. My husband had the one hour aromatherpy and foot massage. My husband was having knee issues and his masseuse was very knowledgable and did an excellent job. I did a little research on thai yoga massage and was quite excited to try this new experience. I have been practicing yoga for 10 years and i am quite flexible and strong. However, i was disappointed, it was just a regular massage with me lying down, using mostly her forearm and pinpoint technique. The herbal ball massage, i didn't care for either. It was a heated herbs wrapped in a ball and she just moved it on your body. Perhaps, that is what this massage calls for, but it did nothing for me. So at the end this was a mixed experience. As for pricing, we thought the pricing was extremely low when we made our reservation prior to our trip, upon arrival, there's so many many massage places even cheaper. Although, i don't think the ambience was as zen and peaceful. At the end, when it was time to pay, there was another woman there. She was not friendly at all and just asked for payment, which was 200 baht above the price quoted. No big deal, we tipped the ladies and left. I can't help but feel I was cheated out of the opportunity to a thai yoga experience.

Great experience. i get the best massage of my life from here. Everything was perfect. The masseur know what she's doing. The place was very nice and clean. The products that they used such as fragrant oils, herbal things and etc were great. I can sense that they're using premium grade products. Highly recommend

another good thai spa at a good value. frankly speaking I visited this spa quite sometime back which was Aug 2013. but I can still remember the good value of money spa package which was 5000baht for 2 pax. I went for this package with my friend and it was worth every baht.spa was clean and quiet and staff is friendly and helpful who also helped to hail a cab for me after my treatment.

Best Place For Traditional Thai Spa Massage. Very friendly masseuse , talkative and made me feel very welcome and relaxed. Her massage was outstanding and I could hear a few joints cracking ! Attention to details made it obvious she was a trained professional , a proper Thai massage with a choice of pressure , I took medium as usual and it was perfect, as if she knew by feel where pressure was needed. This was my third time at Klongton Nua and it is from now on the only place I will go in UK for massage even though it means 45 minutes drive each way . Well worth every penny and a real treat. Well done all the staff for being so friendly and welcoming
Wonderful experience. We really enjoyed our 4hr spa massage here. The place is clean place with such a great service of the reception and the therapists. Totally made my day

Very Nice. The massage was very relaxing, the thing which we were looking for to complete the trip. Was also very near to our hotel so walked down fir 15 mins and reached. The staff is very professional and cordial. They were ready for the tantrums shown by our little kid.

disappointing! Poor, unskilled massage. I know a spa experience depends on which masseuse you get but my massage was unpolagetically bad. It's a awful, sinking feeling when after much anticipation and not long in to the massage you realize this is not good! Hot stone massage- terrible! Swedish - she had no idea! and to massage against venous flow - really bad! Foot massage - pathetic.Sorry I didn't get the name of my girl.
The best ever!!!. Took the 4 hours luxury package It was the best thing ever! The massage the facial the body scrub... just a dreamComing here again tomorrow.Must have treatments!

Holiday. One of the best massage I try in Bangkok , Thailand. They have all kind of proffetional massage , very relaxing , the team are very kindly, very comfortable price. If you are in this area this place is must!!!

Quaint spa, relaxing experience . The spa environment really helps you relax with its greenery and water features. We got some ice water upon arrival and picked our massage oils. We had taken the luxury package with the four hands massage. We started off with the foot massage, which was great. The body scrub was a little uncomfortable as it was cold and wet on the bed, and the bathroom was so small only 1 person could take a bath at one time so someone else had to wait, all crusty with bits of scrub and freezing. However after that, we got a quick break with hot tea and some delicious biscuits, which was a nice touch. The Thai hot compress was just so-so. The four hands massage is a bit of a hit or miss, depending on your masseuse. I didn't enjoy mine as they weren't in sync, speed wise or pressure wise, but my friend enjoyed hers tremendously. Overall was a relaxing experience and pretty good value for money - just wish my massage had been better!
Amazing Experience. Had one of the best massage in Bangkok. The manager was very accommodating even when we were late.The expereince was on par with Plaza Athenee

Relaxing experience. So Thai spa is located on Sukhumwit 31 in the bustling soi of Bangkok. However, once I was at the place I feel very relax and calm . A great escape from chaotic Bangkok. I booked my service thru their website. The service was prompt and very good. Staffs were friendly. I chose elite package which I highly recommended for 90 minute massage including body scrub and swedish deep tissue massage. The masseuse know what she is doing. She gave me the best massage of my life. I tried several places but nowhere like this place. Highly recommended this place if you are visiting bangkok.

Massage good, wax terrible!. I went there on my birthday with my friend. They welcomed us really nicely. The message was amazing, but when it came to my half-leg wax, it felt like the two girls doing it was doing it for the first time! They had no technique, the wax was way to warm, and my friend who was sitting and waiting (and looking) also said they kept looking at each other, as if they didn't know what they were doing. So if you go there, don't get the wax!

Good value for money enjoyment. Place is not exactly easy to find but it's not difficult either. Environment is quiet and relaxing. Staff are friendly and attentive. Last but not least, price is very competitive for promotional items.

Lovely relaxing spa day!. I took my girlfriend here for her birthday and we both got the 'Elite Package' which consisted of a body scrub, body wrap and various massages. It was incredibly relaxing and they really worked some knots out of my back. Will definitely visit again.

Wonderful traditional spa. About a 10 walk off Silom is this gem of a massage spot
In an old traditional house, offers foot and body massages at bargain prices. The masseuses are excellent...private rooms for body massage.
Great 2 hrs oil massage experience. Wonderful oil massage experience with my wife today. Therapists were applying right pressures at the right points. A must try if you are nearby.

技術・雰囲気ともに最高 Best Technic and atmosphere. (English Below)技術・雰囲気ともに最高です。２時間で650バーツ＋チップと他と比べちょっとお高めですが、その価値は十分あります。飛び込みで入ると待たされることがありますので、ホテルのコンシェルジュの方などに電話で予約を取ってもらうほうが無難です。建物は趣のある木造２階建ての家屋。一階が受付で、受付が終わると２階に通され明るさを落とした個室に案内されます。そこで着替えをしてからマッサージです。マッサージは本当に技術高いですよ。２時間コースだと全身をもみほぐしてくれます。私は常に背中がパンパンなのですが、ここから帰ると羽が生えたように軽くなります。最後に生姜のきいたお茶が出ます。２階のテラスは植物が植えてあって雰囲気十分。心も体も癒やされます。アクセスはBTS Saradaeng駅から大体徒歩１０分、タクシーで行かれる方はConvent 通りのBNH Hospitalに行ってくれるように伝えてください。タイ語では「タノン　コンベント！ビーエヌエイチ　ローン　パヤバーン！」で通じます。*Trip Adviserの地図だとシステムの都合なのか隣の通りにあるように見えるのでご注意。Convent 通りにあります。Best Technic and Atmosphere. Price is 650THB, a little bit expensive than other shops, but the very price worthy. Better to make reservation thought hotel's concierge, otherwise you may wait long time.Technic is really good. In 2 hours, your body and soul are relaxed completely. Location is in Convent Road, walk around 10 min from BTS Saladaeng. If TAXI, ask driver to go in front of BHN Hospital in Convent Street, In Thai, please say "Thanon Convent! BHN Rong Phayabaan!".

Proper spa and place of peace. As far as I can see there are the “busy road massage parlours” with half a dozen staff waiting outside to entice you in and top end hotel spas. Ruen-Nuad Massage Studio is neither. Its traditional and colonial in appearance with a very peaceful vibe.I've been twice and will return EVERY time i come back to Bangkok.

Nice place to get massage. Found this place by chance, though this place is a bit difficult to find as it's located a bit from the main road. The rest is fine, they give you special clothes for massages, or if you order oil massage, you lay naked. The only drawback is that there's no background music :)

It can not be better. We have been coming here for over 20 years. It is not smart but it is very effective. Those massaging have exceptional skill. I do not have to say where I am having a problem, the expert hands find it with a few minutes. The price of 900bhat for 90 mins is exceptional value. We have never been disappointed.

Great massage and value!. A real gem in Bangkok... We keep coming back as often as possible. Very great professional masseurs. I highly recommend this massage house in traditional vintage Thai Teak Mansion.

Nice venue. Great massage. . My second time here. The massages are great value for money and the building is quaint with clean facilities. I've had a full body scrub and oil massage by a male masseur called "X" twice now and the quality is always perfect. Recommend booking slightly ahead to avoid disappointment. Highly recommended !

Great massage, good price. Went here with my fiancé and we both got traditional Thai massages. We didn't know what to expect but enjoyed it very much! Professional service and clean settings. They give you a scrubs like outfit to wear. The stretching is a little intense at times but overall we left feeling great.

Best place for Thai Massage. My favorite for years. In a quite thai house located opposite to Convent Road BNH hospital. 2 hours of thai massage at THB650 (it was THB450 back in years ago I started went their). Again, you can find a lot of cheaper place in Bangkok, but I like it here to ave a consistent performance, never let down. If you will only do 1 massage for the whole trip - this is the place to stretch your body back to balance.
A relaxing massage experience. The massage place is quite good. There was supposed a quiet place. However there was a continuing construction noise while we were enjoying our massage. What a pity!
Massage. We had a thai massage at this studio! Really nice place, we will recommend it to everybody - lovely relaxing start on a vacation!

Need to enforce no cell phones in treatment area. The 1.5 hour massage I received was excellent. The masseuse worked various acupressure points and worked out muscle knots I did not even have to point out.The rooms are clean and you are given loose pants and a shirt to change into.Management needs to enforce a no cell phone rule. A rude Chinese man walked through the treatment hall with his cell phone call blaring on speaker. He was in the room next to me and never turned off his ringer so I had to listen to over 20 text message rings go off through out my massage. On the door to the hall management has in English to silence your cell phone. They need it in Chinese too and they need to enforce it.

reasonable price and good masseuse. Found this place in tripadvisor. By distance , it was v close from Banyantree hotel where I stayed. It took me only several mins with taxi and cost 40 bat. I received 90 mins of Thai massage, which was pretty intense. If you are looking for sports massage like strong type, you may enjoy this one. I asked my masseuse name (Kai!) in case I have another chance to visit but I did not stay in Sathon area long...
Very energetic massage but with avarage skills. I tried the thai massage.The young lady was investing a lot of efforts but in my opinion was lacking some skills, not in the top.

90 minutes of heavenly massage!. Been to a couple of massage places in Bangkok, but Ruen-Nuad deliver the goods all the time. Their therapists are very polite and you can request on specific areas that you want them to focus on. The pressure is spot on and really relieves all week's stress. If you are in Bangkok and have a couple of hours to burn then visit this place. Only downside? The whole place doesn't smells like a spa, compared to other massage chains and hotel spas. But not a deal breaker for me. :)

Would Recommend.. I knew I wanted to get a thai massage while I was in Bangkok, but didn't want to just go to the hotel spa. This place was recommended to me by a friend because of their foot massages, so I gave it a try.I was able to put in a reservation through their Facebook page the day of which was really slick, and the place was relatively easy to find and only 15min walk from my hotel! I noticed on their facebook page that package 3 was the most requested, so I went for that one. It was 2 hours and 45 minutes, which was a nice amount of time.They do take credit cards for all massages over 500 baht, mine was a visa. Overall, the message was really good, the masseuse asked me about the pain and everything, and it really seemed like she cared about doing a good job. If I had to be picky, I would say her time management was a bit off, as she seemed to take longer on one part, then seemed to rush through the end. But the overall effect was still wonderful.Facilities-wise, the place is very nice and tranquil. Probably not as polished around the edges as the hotel spa, but much nicer than many of the houses I lived in during college, and it didn't bother me at all.

A must if you come to Bangkok. This is a nice experience of Thai massage. Even if the woman at the reception is not very friendly, everybody else is and the massage is great! The wooden house give a nice 'cachet' and everything is clean and right. I will try to return before I leave.

Good Massage!. Must call in advance to book a spot for massage as it does get a bit busy at times, especially on weekends. The place is easy to find as it is opposite the BHP private hospital. All the masseurs are very professional (no hanky-panky stuff going on). One could also request for a couples room, complete with shower and all. The price are very reasonable too. I often asked the masseur to concentrate more on my back/shoulders with strong pressure and less on the other part of the body - so in a way customise your treatment :)

Good massage. Had a real good quality massage at this place. Hope all other massurs are as good. Coz other places have been hit and miss one time real good other times oh well. So I came back and the place was busy ni worries about that I should have booked ur.. The lady at the front desk probably the owner seems always too serious and a little grumppy she seems upset like her cactus died or somwthig. Well no buggie as long as u m getting good massage I'm not complaining.

Worth recommending. I always take foreign friends who never experienced Thai massage to Ruen-Nuad (meaning massage house in Thai). The place is opposite BNH Hospital on Convent Rd. You can have good massage quality from any masseur. The place is simple Thai-style house yet clean. I'm sure it's good value for money. I'm always a walk-in customer but I recommend to book in advance especially during weekend.
nice place. I chose one hour Thai massage but the actual massage hour was less than one hour, anyway the thai lady still did good massage for me.

Legit Massage. This place is legit. It's very popular so you need to reserve a spot in advance. The set up is pretty basic, there are mattresses on the floor and partitions between each unit. You can choose between Thai massages, aromatherapy massages, and packages. The masseurs are professional and polite. Most speak some basic English. They are also very strong. Be prepared to get your muscles prodded and poked, and definitely tell the masseur to dial it down or up depending on your preference. Some areas of the massage parlour like the showers could do with a bit of cleaning. The massage rooms themselves are spick and span.

First stop. Ruen-Nuad is always my first port call when on BKK. Unfailingly professional and value for money.Set back a little from the street which is a bonus as many otherwise good massage venues tend to get traffic noise.Highly recommended.

Professional massages, nice atmosphere, kind staff. Good atmosphere and friendly professional masseuses. My first traditional Thai massage, 2 hours of precision muscle care. Felt very relaxed and comfortable. My girlfriend fell fast asleep :D

Great massage!. This massage place is slightly hidden, with a restaurant at the front..once at the wooden building, they are very professional. The website state it closes at 930 but they state on their door that the last appointment is at 9pm. The provide lockers to keep your valuables while u donyour massage. We did aromatherapy massage for 90min (B900). They had 5 choices of oil to pick from: lavender, mint, lemongrass, relaxing and energising. I tried the relaxing one which smelt like lavender and lemongrass mixed. Before the massage started we were asked to take a shower first. The treatment room was very simple: 2 hard mattresses on the floor. Rather than having the face donut, there was a pillow and towel to prop up your face and chest to let you breathe. The masseuse were good and professional, the strokes were on the hard side, similar to Thai massage but less of the cracking and body twisting. I think you can also shower after the massage but we were asked to shower when we get back to our hotel as it was late already. Overall still a very good experience and I will visit again in future.

Wonderful massage!. I came here, upon the recommendation of a friend, after a long day of sight-seeing the temples and 25 hours of traveling and was not disappointed. I got the traditional thai massage (without knowing what it was) and the guy who worked on me was incredibly professional while twisting my muscles into shapes I didn't know they could go into! I would certainly recommend people getting a Thai Massage if they haven't before as it really does loosen up the muscles and joints and doesn't leave you feeling sore or lethargic.Great experience all around!

Nice place to have Thai massage!!. Though here like a comfortable house in Bangkok, it do provide wonderful massage experience! It's easy to book a massage course from FB. The staff have great skill for massage, and the environment is nice too :) People are friendly here.

The best massage ever!. Friends took us the Ruen Nuad on a recent visit to Bangkok. We all left having experienced the best massages we have had anywhere. I enjoyed an amazing Thai massage and friends enjoyed oil. I have tried many places in Bangkok with little success. The masseurs here are well trained, discreet and professional. They feel your body and push your limits just enough so that you walk away completely relaxed. I have since returned and will again. There are many massage places in Bangkok. Forget them and visit Ruen Nuad.

Great massage for Males. I have had lots of massages, including in Bangkok, and the very best if you want a massage by a male is to go to Ruen Nuad and ask for Tum; also very good Mr. X and Mr. Gigi. They are consistent, experienced, polite, thorough. They rock! (best to call in advance for appointment).

Unique building with relaxing vibe!!. We loved this building and the staff!! if you love unique places you'd love it here. unlike those fancy massage places, it's an old building that's wooden decos. everyone there was happy and smiles all the time. We scheduled oil massage for 2 hours, their Technic is with thai massage so it's not the typical SPA like in Europe, but it helped to release the stress of your body A LOT!!

Feel Lighter. Very professional outfit without the hype of some of the more well-known massage centres. Every masseur is trustworthy and you are guaranteed to feel better for trying them out. I have been going there for about five years now and have tried other places in between time without too much success and so have gone back to Ruen Nuad many times. The Thai massage is hard going but worthwhile.

Great massage. A lovely quiet boutique that is slightly off the street and away from the loud cars and traffic. It is secluded which makes it more calm and serene, rather than walking into a room that is inches away from the street. I had to give it 4/5 as about half the time that I was in there, there was a loud clanging and crashing sound which could have been a construction site or simply someone washing dishes, but it did cut through the very soft music. The massage itself was wonderful and very relaxing. I walked out feeling like I was glowing! It's also very easy to get to, about a 10 minute walk from Silom train station. Thank you very much!

Best massage ever!!!. Ask my wife I have had sooooo many massages, I'm always on the hunt for a better massage. This time we have been traveling through Vietnam, Malaysia and Thailand and by far this is the best massage I've had.Such a cosy tranquil place in the middle of Bangkok. I can not recommend this place enough.

Was good but the woman massing my feet was falling sleep. The place is good and looks authentic, I ask for a foot massage and a Thai massage, for my foot massage the woman was literally falling sleep so I got the feeling the people there have very long working hours since they a are open until midnight and everyday, I hope they hire more people and make betters turns for the employees. for the Thai massage I requested a change and the new woman was great! yes it hurt but I believe it's worth!

Perfect place for Thai Massage. Located in an old building a little offside the road, they offer wonderful massage in a relaxed and friendly atmosphere. I felt like floating afterwards really. Highly recommended.

Relaxing!. My husband and I each received Thai full body massages after a few days of sightseeing in Bangkok. We were welcomed right away, then changed and got ready for our massages. It's nice that the studio is tucked away from the street- it made for a much more quiet and relaxing atmosphere. Our masseuses were incredible. We left feeling refreshed and energized for the rest of our trip. As another reviewer mentioned- this isn't an over the top fancy place, but it was very clean, nice, and as I mentioned, had a great atmosphere.
Good hard massages . Had an amazing hard massage. I asked for a male masseur. He totally destroyed me but I felt amazing afterward. Nice relaxing space away from the streets.

Charming and authentic place, but rushed service. I loved the ambiance of this place, however the ladies at the front were not very welcoming. My thai massage lady was good, but only gave me a 45 minute massage instead of a full hour. Overall, I felt the service was a bit rushed.
clean, professional... very good. having read some uneasy comments at first thought , maybe not to go... then, went there, and amazingly best thai massage we got in 29 days ...

Relaxing . A cozy atmosphere makes you feel like home, the team are very good of what they are doing , been to a lot of massage places in Bangkok but this one is different by its thai style decoration.

Great afternoon escape. This is an oasis in the city. A great place for a foot massage or whole body massage. Good prices, nice people. This is not a fancy place, but very straightforward. It is not easy to find, but worth the work to find!!

Great hard and bone cracking massage. The massage quality was rather good. Request for a male masseur if you want a good hard massage. Making an appointment is strongly encouraged as they are always packed with people!

Terrible service. The quality of massage was fine. However the lady boss/es seem to be eager to charge everything. We paid 30 baht each just to take a bath and 10 baht each for a drink when these in the first place should be complementary. The herbal pads seemed to be recycled across customers. We did not get to wash our feet before massage. Poor treatment for staff when management did not care about hygene standards. Imagine if u are the staff massaging some smelly feets. We did another massage at Diora which was around the same price but the quality of service was so much better. The staff was wearing mask. Shower, drinks and dessert were complementary. Forget about Ruen Nuad. They should be ashamed to put the tripadvisor cert on the table. Very poor service.

cheap, excellent massage. Every time I come to Bangkok, I come here. On my recent trip, I had three massages. Two that were 90 minutes and one that was 2 hours. All three were excellent Thai massages, in a no frills environment. The room is quiet and cool, with a mattress on the floor, which does the job effectively. All the staff have been excellent, although a bit different in their styles. all have spoke enough English to communicate as necessary. Overall, if you like Thai massage, this is a great affordable choice in Bangkok.

Nice massage for the price. This place offered a good quality massage in a quiet and pleasant location just off the main road. Although I prefer being massaged on a table the floor mattress was acceptable but I think it was the difference between giving them a good review rather than a great one. Pricing was reasonable.
Best massage. I have visit this massage studio three times in Feb and Sep. if you like strong and deep massage, ask male masseur. It's really good!

Traditional Thai massage in beautiful old Thai house. This is more expensive than the Healthland string of spas, but more intimate. You start by having your feet washed, then go to a small private room for your chosen treatment. For me, the draw is the environment. It's located well off the main road, right in back of another very old Thai house which is a restaurant. So if you are looking for a traditional Thai environment, try this. It's a 15 minute walk from either of 2 sky train stations.

Excellent Thai Massage. Important to note this is not a spa - this is a local massage studio. There is no relaxing before or after. That aside - it was a wonderful true thai massage. I would visit every week if I were local. I highly recommend - especially for the price. Book early.

Love this place!. Every time I come to Bangkok, I come here and it has never disappointed. I've tried more expensive and more elaborate places, but I always keep coming back here. Small and quiet, there is a lovely friendliness to Ruen-Nuad. The massages are wonderful and value for money fantastic. And if you ask for strong, you get it!

Good if not a little rushed . We chose this massage place on recommendations from here and lonely planet and whilst the massage was good we felt a little rushed afterwards. Perhaps this is because there is only limited massage rooms and they had bookings to cover but it would have been nice to have been offered a place to relax for half an hour before heading back out into the heat. All in all it was nice but it could be improved with a few tweaks to the service!

Real Thai Massage!! do not miss it. We went there for a real thai massage (first time experience) and were immediately stroken by personell professionalism and, at the same time, warm reception. The massage was a well-above-expectation experience.Also: very good value for money.should we come to Bangkok again, will not miss out on this!

Very professional. Fantastic and professional massage by Tum and Serm (please tip well, as the massage prices themselves wont make anyone rich). We wanted to go several to them both, but unfortunately time only allowed for one visit.It lies in an alley, which looks a bit dodgy, but its all fine, and inside it has a rustic cool feel.

Great massage, good prices. I come to this massage institution on Convent Rd every time I am in Bangkok. The convenient Silom location, and very competitive prices, keep people coming back. I always opt for a 60 minute body scrub and a 90 minute massage and the whole visit won’t hit the $50USD mark. The massage therapists are well trained and always give a great massage. I also tried a facial here, but I don’t think I would again. Also, make sure you review your procedures and their durations with your therapist, as mine was confused and almost canceled the second half hour of my full body scrub. Also, one good perk is that there is wifi available here, and if you are traveler without a local SIM card, it’s nice to be have access to the internet.
Good quality for great price. If you are looking for a good quality massage without the whims of a expensive spa ambience, this is the place.My favourite go to homely massage place.

Depends on the masseur. I've been here few times in the past and while the experiences were relatively consistent I didn't know how good they were until I got a massage from Pier. This guy was truly an expert and by far was the best massage of my life. Unfortunately things weren't so rosy for my gf as her masseur lacked prowess to relieve any pain from walking around all day. The staffs were very courteous and masseurs were very professional but your experience will vary depending on who's massaging you.

Best Cost/Performance Ratio in massage world. Been there quite a few times, this time i managed to have 1 hr session at ruen nuad after chiang mai tripChiangmai has quite some good massage shops too, but this time i can really tell the difference from mediocre to what ruen nuad gives!all these time i have visited, i never felt that they were slacking.never! not to mention they are still as popular as they were!!can't wait to go back again.

Fabulous professional massage at a great price!. I was in Thailand for only a few days, but knew that I had to get traditional Thai massage! I was looking for a real professional place, not some seedy tourist trap, so previous TripAdvisor reviews proved extremely helpful, as always. I also was very nervous, as this was the first time I got any kind of massage.So first of all, this place is a little hard to find, it is in an alley off the main street. Look for the bigger Naj (restaurant) sign on the corner, on the opposite side of the street from the BNH hospital; the green Ruen-Nuad sign is below it.You walk into a little waiting area, with a receptionist's desk right in front of you. They have a menu of services; I was going to ask for a 1-hour massage, but the receptionist convinced me to go for at least an hour and a half - very good advice! I wish I had gone for even 2 hours! (The time goes by very quickly.) She also asked whether I wanted a male or female masseuse; I didn't really care, so I just said I wanted someone good. After less than a couple of minutes' wait in the waiting room to the left of the reception, a young man summoned me to go to the treatment area to the right of the reception. He showed me to a small room with a mattress, gave me a robe to change into, and left me for a minute to change. (The room has a roll-up bamboo curtain instead of a door (or indeed the fourth wall) for privacy.) He also showed me the bathroom, which I recommend using before the session, because part of the massage includes abdomen pressure which could be uncomfortable if full. He came back a couple of minutes later, and told me to lay face up on the mattress. He started by wiping my feet with a wet and then a dry towel, and proceeded with the massage, which went all the way from my toes to the top of my head. Then he had me turn over onto my stomach, and repeated massaging the whole body from the other side. It was an amazing experience. He used his hands, elbows and even knees to get at knots and stress points I did not even know I had! His manner was exceedingly calm and polite, and he worked very hard. All the while, soft music was playing in the background. Altogether, I was very relaxed even though initially I was nervous about the whole experience.As other reviewers noted, this is not the place for candles and decorations and scents etc.; they focus on massage, and they do it very very well. It is impossible to describe in words how rejuvenated I felt in every part of my body. I wanted to go back the very next day, and probably every day thereafter, but unfortunately my schedule did not allow it. For everyone who is trepidatious about getting a massage, if it's professional massage that you want, this is the right place. The price, for a 1.5-hour session, was 500 baht - an excellent value!

A little peaceful house. I became a regular visitor of Ruen-Nuad Studio for a big while because of quality of the therapist and also its atmosphere.The old wooden house had been adapted and modified to the massage studio. On my first visit, it felt like I got into another zone that quite peaceful and separated from the busy Silom / Sathorn business areas.Reservation should be made rather than walk-in to avoid disappointment.

Nice experience. Our first aroma-oil massage. Really nice people and professional massage. Our 14 year old son felt it as a to close experience. We as the parents and our girls 18 and 20 years old loved it. 700 bath 1 hour.

Familly of 4 (children 10 and 12). We booked 1 hour before and got lucky to have the massages alltogether. We chose a 1h traditionnel Thaï massage. My man and 10 years old boy in a (adorable thaï room) me and 12 years old daughter in the next one. Everything was clean and soft. Masseuses dis not speak very good English but made efforts to talk to us. They seemed interested in massing the children and battled to have the youngest! They adapted the massage to them and we both adulte and children loved this moment. We all felt so relaxed for the next days! Thank you!

Excellent service. Had been here a few times before. Had this male masseur Piya who was great. He could identify which are my sore areas and apply the correct techniques to ease the soreness in my muscles. My friends who were with me also had enjoyable experiences with their massages.

Authentic and clean. In a city which offers all sorts of massages, here is a refreshing one. An authentic Thai massage, a great relief for sore muscles and aches especially the legs and at a wonderful price too. It's an old place with spaces for massage not even closed rooms and while it does make one feel awkward facing someone else having a massage, it's worth it. Try this rather than the other tempting varieties.

Best massage (non expert view). I don't purport to be a massage conessuire. I get one once every year or so and certainly don't know the scene in Bangkok. I think a good massage is hit and miss and here - my massage - was a home run. The place isn't a Four Seasons but it's clean and comfortable. There's no pretense of a spa but a simple good quality massage. The price is so reasonable price that I felt guilty. I've read some iffy reviews about this place but this novice massagee highly recommends this joint.

Good massage. I visited here few years ago for aroma oil massage but not very satisfied during my last visit. This round though of giving another try on thai traditional massage.Went to many other thai massage in Thailand and this is the place that really released lots of my body pain which was accumulated from my working postures.They know which part of your body need extra attention and they will put more "tension" at the spot. I definately feel better after the massage.If my next trip to Thailand is staying somewhere nearby, I dont mind paying another visit here for a good massage.

Meh. My friend and I both had a 2 hour Thai massage. I've had many Thai massages before and so I know what a good one is like. The girl I had did not seem interested in her job at all, and I would call her pressure 'very light' for a Thai massage. Also the massage was only about 1:45, even though it was supposed to be 2 hours.The building is cool, but that's about all this place has going for it.

Just what you need..... I read the reviews on trip advisor and like the reports on professional, not super pampering , not sleazy. I was a walk-in late Sunday afternoon and all they had open was foot massage so went for it. Perfect for me a guy that was a runner/ jogger most of his life and did she loosen my foot up; thanks You need to look down the alley across from the hospital and restaurant with same name looks out of business.If I had more days I would go back for full Thai massage. Thanks

Best massage in Bangkok in a historic house. We had the best massage sessions in this studio. The studio offers excellent service by experienced masseurs. In addition to the great service, the studio is an old Thai wooden house and we had great relaxing moments as if we were in good old time. After the best massage in the morning, we had lunch at Naj - the great combination of great Thai massage and cuisine. We look forward to our next visit soon in this studio.

Back after 13 years!. I was here 13 years ago and I'm so delighted to find that this place is still here!Had 1.5 hours of thai massage with herbal ball this time. It was excellent especially after walking whole morning at Chatuchak market. The place is small but charming, clean, and reasonably priced. Tips: If possible, ask for a room upstairs.

Brilliant Massage. This was a exactly what I was looking for - a peaceful location and some firm Thai massage!I had already had two Thai massages in the two days prior to visiting Ruen-Nuad, so I was able to enjoy a firmer massage. The price for a 1.5 hour massage was a bit more expensive than in other places, but I felt it was worth it afterwards.
Good and reasonable priced. Had a 1 1/2 hour Thai massage recently and felt that it was good value for money. Good service, pleasant ambience. Overall, a good deal.

Best ever massage. This a a very delightful place where I got several of the most wonderful Thai massages and foot massages over several days in Bangkok. Give the highest possible praise to Ging and Prae for Thai massage and to Wan for foot massage. Was so glad to have found this low key, clean, delightful, and quite charming place, with such superb massage therapists. When through your massage you can have a mango smoothie at the juice bar (which also has wifi).

Authentic Thai Massage. My partner and I both wanted a Thai Massage. We both enjoy sports massages and suffer with knotted shoulders, aches and pains. Having looked on Trip Advisor, Ruen-Nuad was close to where we were staying and priced reasonably so we decided it was worth a try. I called in the morning and obtained an appointment for a 2 hour massage priced at 350 tbh per hour, total 1400 for both of us. It isn't a luxury spa resort but it is simple, pleasant and calming. We were greeted with a smile and given sandals to wear and shown a locker to put our belongings. We were taken upstairs where our feet were washed and dried by 2 smiling Thai ladies, both very professional but with limited English. Then we were shown to a large room with divided partitions for individual treatments and were given rooms adjacent. There was a mattress on the floor and a blind was pulled down for privacy and we were given large cotton pyjamas to wear. My partner's lady had a good sense of humour and told him to lie down, then covered him with a blanket and said, "Goodnight!" The Thai massage was very thorough, no muscle was left unturned! It was painful in parts initially, but when the areas were revisited it felt deeply satisfying. It was 'good' pain! The Thai ladies were strong and powerful, manipulating, pulling, pushing with every part of their bodies and understood every muscle. They also included head & deep shoulder massage at the end and stretched us out. It was an excellent experience and I can highly recommend it. This is authentic Thai massage, not aromatherapy gentle massage! If you want to benefit from this type of firm massage you won't be disappointed! Many thanks from a happy pain-free couple!
Therapeutic! . The best massage in Thailand. I don't want to spoil it by many words. Original no frills place. TA forced to make this review long!

FANTASTIC. Ive been to bangkok many times. and this is one of the best massage ive had so far. lu wei was the one who massaged me, and I felt relaxed and knotfree after. price is quite good as well for a 1 hour massage at 350 for the thai massage. 3 of my other friends could not stop talking about the fantastic massage we had. worth the walk from bandara suites.
amazing massages and beautiful place. best massages in Thailand, and great place, beautiful wooden house in the city. good price, really an amazing discovery! Order a 2 hour thai massage, not less!

Genuine, authentic, wonderful. It's an authentic experience, decently priced. I had two massages whilst I was there, the first perfect, the second very good. Still a five star experience for me. Don't expect the boutique treatment, but enjoy the converted house. Worth booking a private room for quietness and privacy.

great experience. I wanted to try Thai massage. this is the place you want to go. It is based on finding energy points on your energy meridians and pressing. Traditional settings, very clean, very polite, great experience, aside from some noisy clients who probably, after too many beers, though that they could get a different massage. they soon found the "pains and pressure" of traditional Thai massage and that subdued their exuberance - but for the better.

My new "House of Pain" Reverence. During my vacation in Bangkok i was staying near Silom Road so I am near to the Lumphini Park, where I love to do QiGong and Tai-Chi exercises in the morning.At Silom Road nearly every third shop is a massage studio where young ladies and ladyboys offer theire services (including extra happy services too). There it is hard to get a real traditional thai massage, cause the young ladies do not have long experience, the right technique and also not the strength in theire fingers.so i searched the internet and found recommendations for the ruen-nuad massage studio. i found it without problems in the convent road at the opposite ot the hospital.i had to pay upfront 500 baht for 90 minutes of traditional thai massage. a usual price for a good massage. the lady was indeed older and definitly a pro. she found the spots where i had muscle ache from exercising and worked on it really deep and hard. of course this is no fondeling around and also not only close to the edge of pain. it is sometimes painful and it has to be when you have muscle aches. she did the whole body (without touching my dick) and also kept an eye on me lying comfortable on the massage bed so i can relax good. i would say this is definitly on the top-three list of all the massages that i had if not the best. it was strong but very good. so if you are staying at silom and don't need happy ending but a real massage this is the place to go. i definitly will go there again.
Excelent massage, clean not expensive. It´s a good option for a massage, place is nice and clean. I think you can pay some more to have a feet or more time on the back and legs, go for it !

Not the place for relaxation massage. thai massage here more like a deep tissue massage. I couldn't wait for the 1hr to finish. Was in pain for most of it.The lady at reception was very abrupt and unfriendly. Pretty crappy customer service from here actually. We didn't feel welcome when we came and we didn't feel valued when we finished. They didn't even say hi when we came in and didn't say good bye when we left!

Never Has a Bad Massage Here!. Whenever I am in Bangkok I try taking a few hours for a good massage. This place has never disappointed me. The massage was excellent. Part of the charm of this place is that it has not succumb to the modernization and Westernization of spas that make them all look and feel the same. Ruen-Nuad feels like it's 1965. Please don't change that.

Value for money in authentic atmosphere. I was a bit worried because of some of the comments on TA regarding the atmosphere and the welcoming. I decided to try it anyway because it was not too far from the Hotel we stayed (St Regis) and I was not disappointed. In contrary to some of the prior post I was welcomed at least warm and professional, I liked the to me very authentic and quiet atmosphere of the place. I had a traditional 90 min Thaimassage. The shirts and pants and towels were all fresh. My therapist was experienced and hit all the important spots. After a long day in the city I felt refreshed and fit. At 500 bath I considered this very good value for money. Recommended.

Keep this secret at #140 or it will be deservedly overrun. No trip to Bangkok is initialized after that killer flight without first the body scrub oil massage here. Old rustic house in city center 5 mins from Silom BTS or a 55-75 baht taxi from Asok Sukhumvit the dour expression of the tough lady at reception does nothing to suggest the quality of this place.I have written after every trip so much do I like this place so there's no need to carry on.In a nation of massage places this has always been a personal favorite and will I hope continue to be so.
